Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
ROLE OVERVIEW

How would you feel about working on something that has an impact on millions of lives? We at Signant Health are all here to work for a significant purpose: Making the world healthier! What we do, matters.

Our SmartSignals eCOA software platform is the market-leading eCOA (Electronic Clinical Outcome Assessments) solution for clinical trials. Patients, clinicians and caregivers around the world use this platform on daily basis to report outcomes in clinical trials by using mobile devices and personal computers. The regulated nature of our business is challenging, but you will soon learn this exciting new world with the help of our domain experts.

We're now looking for a new Software Developer.

Software Developer performs product design, systems analysis, and programming activities which may require some research. Performs bug verification, release testing and support for assigned products. May perform some on-site client work on applications. Operates under minimal supervision. 

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES
- Performs design, implementation and maintenance of product modules/sub-systems according to architecture, guidelines and good software engineering practice. 
- Responsible for products usability by designing user interfaces, creating use cases, and implementing prototypes and conducting usability tests. 
- Conducts the unit testing and integration testing. 
- Performs bug verification, release testing and support for assigned products. 
- Researches problems discovered by Validation or Product Support and develops solutions to the problems. 
- May assist in performing on-site client work on applications. 
- Other responsibilities assigned as required. 
- Dedication and commitment to promote diversity, multiculturalism and inclusion in all work activities
- Ability to collaborate in diverse teams to foster productive outcomes.

Essential
-Must have experience with modern web development 
- Must have the capacity to learn emerging technologies. 
- Must be a team-oriented person with a can do attitude. 

Desirable
- Web application development with React.js and Node.js (or mobile development with Flutter)
- Understanding of serverless services in AWS, such as Lambda and API Gateway
- M.Sc/B.Sc Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Information Systems. 
- Minimum two plus years of software development experience including server-side or client-side programming. 

Diversity and Inclusion competencies: 
- Dedication and commitment to promote diversity, multiculturalism and inclusion in all work activities
- Ability to collaborate in diverse teams to foster productive outcomes.

At Signant Health, accepting difference isn't enough we celebrate it, we support it, and we nurture it for the benefit of our team members, our clients and our community. Signant Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or veteran status.

Results.Heading: Android Developer, Helsinki
Results.Descr:
Etsitkö uusia haasteita Android - kehittämisen parista? Asiakasyrityksemme Optiscan Oy etsii vakituiseen työsuhteeseen Android Developeria osaksi eCommerce tiimiä. Jos sinulla on jo kokemusta Androidilla työskentelystä itsenäisesti ja olet innokas kehittämään osaamistasi myös backend-puolella, saatat olla etsimämme henkilö. Mikäli kiinnostuit, lue lisää alta ja hae paikkaa jo tänään!

Kuvaus

Tulet osaksi eCommerce-tiimiiä, jonka vastuulla on myymälähallintajärjestelmien sekä näihin kuuluvien mobiiliratkaisujen ylläpito ja kehittäminen. Android Developerina tulet työskentelemään kehitystehtävissä erilaisten eCommerce-asiakkaiden projekteissa. Hankkeissa pääset tekemään logistiikan ratkaisuja tiiviillä tiimillä ja näkemään oman työsi jäljen käytännössä. Lisäksi tulet vastaamaan yhdessä tiimin kanssa asiakkaiden järjestelmien 2nd line - tuesta. Asiakasprojektit ja työtehtävät räätälöityvät tarkemmin aiemman työkokemuksesi ja osaamisesi mukaan.

Saat tiimin kokeneemmilta kollegoilta tukea ja apua työtehtävässä menestymiseen. Tulet osaksi tiivistä tiimiä, jossa ratkotaan yhdessä ongelmia. Tehtävä tarjoaa uran alkuvaiheessa olevalle mahdollisuuden kehittyä mutta myöskin jo kokeneemmalle osaajalle haasteita ja kasvumahdollisuuksia.

Tarjoamme

Tiiviin ja osaavan tiimin tuen
Mahdollisuuden kehittyä ja kasvaa erilaisten asiakasprojektien myötä
Osittaisen etätyömahdollisuuden


Työtehtävä

Asiakkaiden järjestelmien kehittäminen
Järjestelmien 2nd line support - vastuu yhdessä tiimin kanssa
Tehtävät muodostuvat taustasi ja osaamisesi mukaan, pääset siis myös itse muodostamaan roolia juuri sinun näköiseksesi


Etsimällämme henkilöllä on

Aiempaa itsenäistä kehityskokemusta Androidilla
Teknistä orientoituneisuutta ja tietoliikenneymmärrystä
Sujuva suomen ja englannin kielen taito

Eduksi katsotaan osaaminen seuraavista järjestelmistä: Java, Spring ja SQL

Työntekijänä olet

Kehittymisorientoitunut
Ongelmanratkaiskykyinen
Yhteistyötaitoinen

Muuta tietoa

Aloitus: Sopimuksen mukaan
Kesto: Toistaiseksi voimassa oleva
Sijainti: Helsinki, osittainen etätyömahdollisuus

Yhteystiedot: Tästä rekrytointiprosessista vastaa Academic Work asiakasyrityksensä Optiscanin puolesta ja kaikki positioon liittyvät tiedustelut tulee lähettää Academic Workille.

Käymme hakijoita jatkuvasti läpi ja jos olemme jo edenneet haastatteluvaiheeseen, saattaa ilmoitus poistua sivuiltamme ennen kuin rekrytointiprosessi on saatu päätökseen.

Yrityskuvaus

Optiscanilla on yli 30 vuoden kokemus korkealaatuisten ratkaisujen toimittamisesta logistiikan toimialalle. Keskitymme ratkaisemaan logistisia haasteita voidaksemme parantaa asiakkaidemme tuottavuutta ja operatiivista laatua. Ratkaisuihimme ja palveluihimme kuuluvat ohjelmistoratkaisut, laiteratkaisut, tukipalvelut ja operatiiviset palvelut.

Results.Heading: Junior WordPress Developer / Web Developer - Internship
Results.Descr:
WHY WE NEED YOU

We aim to strengthen our position as the company who is changing how the world sees bees and pollinators with an online marketplace.

For this internship, you will develop Bee Rescue's website. We want to create a platform that is more enganging and would improve the overall customer experience. Your responsibility will be:Developing new features and enhancing existing core functionalities.
Innovating and developing the platform/product (this includes designing a new User Interface).
You can be creative and show us the way to do things.

We have a few ideas in mind but we really need you because we are no developers. We cannot wait to hear what other ideas you have. We are open to any suggestion!

ABOUT YOUNo work experience is needed. It is enough that you have studied or you are still studying computer science/software engeneering or any related program.
You know how to work with WordPress and WooCommerce.
You speak English. If you speak Finnish too, even better but it's not mandatory.
No need to explain a gap in your CV because life happens. We have been there!
You are committed and with a positive attitude.
Obviously, if you like honey, that is a plus :)

DURATION & CONTRACT MODE

The duration of this internship can be discussed. In a perfect world, until the project you will be working on is completed, but we believe it won't take more than 6 months.

This intership can be full-time or part-time (in case you have another job that is actually paying you :D).

WHAT WE OFFER

We are still very small, thus, what we can offer is an unpaid internship. We offer you an opportunity to put into practice what you have studied and learned.

We would like you to join our mission and help us to reach as many people as possible with an up-to-date solution for beekeepers and honey lovers.

Are you our next Web Wizard/Witch? (Or is it Wizardess, Wizardette, She-wizard...aah I don't know). Anyway, step forward! Let's have a chat and see if we can help each other! Maybe you can also tell us the feminine form of "wizard".

ABOUT US

We are a team of 3 with a diverse background:

Matteo - CEO & Co-Founder - F&B Business Expert

Cecilia - Co-Founder - Nature Guide & Hospitality Business Expert

Mariama - Shareholder - Marketing, Sales and Branding Specialist

Bee Rescue was founded in 2021 by Matteo and Cecilia. They both love honey and value the role of beekeepers and the importance of pollinators for the ecosystem. Mariama joined the mission later in 2022 to help with marketing and sales.

LOCATION

We live in 3 different cities so we work 100% remotely. However, it is appreciated if you live in the Greater Helsinki area so we can easily meet up if needed. Matteo misses face-to-face interaction!

For more information or questions please contact us at info@beerescuecompany.fi 

Perks and benefits 
 This job comes with several perks and benefits 

Flexible working hours 
Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.

Work life balance 
Carve out time for your kids, friends and personal cider projects.

Remote work allowed 
You know how you perform best. Work from your couch, your favorite cafe or abroad when you feel like it.

Pet friendly 
Dogs, turtles or goldfish are welcome in the office as long as they want to cuddle every now and then.

Social gatherings 
Social gatherings and games; hang out with your colleagues.

Working at 
Bee Rescue 
 
 See company profile 

Did you know that we are facing a rapid decline of the honeybee population? Honeybees play a key role in our eco-system as they are great pollinators. Sadly, their population is decreasing because of diseases, pesticides, and other man-made threats. Climate change is also playing a key role in this. Without honeybees, many crops would disappear. Thus, it is important that we take care of bees. To do so, we need beekeepers. Bee Rescue is a marketplace where users can decide to adopt a beehive. By adopting a beehive, you get the chance to help beekeepers doing what they love the most: taking care of bees and making sure bees stay healthy. In return, you will receive a jar of delicious honey and an adoption certificate. Our beehive adoption is available for everybody: costumers and enterprises. You can also decide to buy it as a gift for your friend, relative or significant other.

Read more about Bee Rescue

Results.Heading: Android Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a full-time Android developer (based in Helsinki downtown) to join our growing team working on making the world's fastest job-matching app.

Who we are

Treamer is a Helsinki based award winning startup, providing an on-demand staffing platform. We help companies to find and manage temp staff for retail, warehousing, maintenance and hospitality jobs while the platform workers get easy access to jobs nearby and are paid fast. Our unfair advantage on this €500Bn market is that we are super fast - last year 85% of filled orders were filled in under 55 minutes. We have raised 2m€ in funding, are a local champion in Finland and expanded to Estonia last year. We have 12 000 MAU across markets and are preparing to open new markets at a growing pace. Our team has previous exits and over 30 years of industry experience. We have a clear vision that we are working hard on implementing. Product is at the center stage of all success, we strive to improve product and vision over time.

What you would do

As a Senior Android Developer you will play a critical role in making the experience of job seekers and employers on the Treamer platform smooth and efficient. You will be working in a cross-functional product development team that is partially located in Helsinki, partially - remote. In the Helsinki office you will be working closely with CTO Artem, head of product, several software developers and a UX designer.

For this role you will needSenior level of software development experience. Exact number of years isn't important, but you are likely to have several of them under the belt. You should be comfortable speaking on why this or that approach to structuring code is good, on memory VS performance, on how much and which kind of testing is useful where and similar topics
Good experience with Android development, at least some of it being related to UI and related to consumer apps
Experience or interest in Jetpack Compose
Good communication skills. While we do prepare the projects before jumping into development, almost always they have a certain amount of flexibility as some needs for the tradeoffs can be found only when you do touch the code. Therefore discussion with the designer and other colleagues during the development is likely to be useful
Good level of English

Also good to haveExperience or willingness to learn Kotlin - it is our primary language for Android
Experience or interest in writing unit tests and UI tests
CI/CD and app deployment on Google Play
Interest in looking at the other parts of the stack. You will communicate closely with fellow developers on the Java/Kotlin-based backend and iOS side of things
Previous experience of startups or fast growing company is not required, but very welcome

What we offerMostly an in-office work environment (a few meters from Helsinki's Kamppi mall). We are flexible with vacation days, working hours and it is absolutely fine if you want to work from home a couple of times a week. However, we believe in value of live communication where it can be achieved easily, so the product development team works most of the days from the office
No-nonsense management. People at Treamer have several startups under their belt. We have worked on web services with millions of users (still running), we had our Android and iOS apps featured in the App Store and Google Play way more than once. Even some of our hobby projects sometimes dominate the less known app stores for months.
Agile development that makes sense. We do look at what our customers and users need, how they react to development and adjust accordingly. Yet we do not support any sort of "agile" crunches, do not buy the quickfix-driven development and give architecture the needed research time. You will receive help and you are expected to provide one.
High end company equipment: phone and laptop of your wish, good monitor if you like having one, whichever software and hardware you need for doing the job unless the price is much beyond reasonable
Competitive salary
Option package

 
 
 For more information or questions please contact us at artem@treamer.com 

Perks and benefits 
 This job comes with several perks and benefits 

Flexible working hours 
Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.

Free coffee / tea 
Get your caffeine fix to get you started and keep you going.

Near public transit 
Easy access and treehugger friendly workplace.

Social gatherings 
Social gatherings and games; hang out with your colleagues.

Equity package 
Want to be a partner? Look no further.

Pension plan 
We take care of you, even when you are old and wrinkly.

See all 9 benefits 

Working at 
Treamer Oy 
 
 See company profile 

TL;DR see our videopitch: https://youtu.be/GzusL5saTLI The multi-billion dollar blue collar industry is facing a major labor shortage. The traditional staffing services keep talking about employment mismatch but at the same time 4.4 billion people are online. Treamer is Helsinki based startup that turns the members of its app into on-demand workforce for casual jobs, empowering people to work when they want and businesses to find the help that they desperately need. We serve driven individuals and forward-thinking companies looking for immediate solutions to their need to either work or get work done. With the help of our latest funding, we are preparing to expand our business beyond the Finnish borders. "Modern people meet online. Staffing and recruiting services are strongly following this trend. Soon most of the employees will be available only online. We help both companies and employees reap the benefits of the phenomenon, such as speed, flexibility and transparency. With the COVID-19 crisis, the labor market has changed and the parties need new tools to prosper. Treamer platform offers equal opportunities for everyone to succeed." [Treamer CEO Peter Sazonov] Our target is to be in 2025 the biggest platform employer in Europe. What We Do Is Who We Are - continue reading if interested to get an idea of our culture and values. Direct We are direct and fair; everyone should speak up, be heard, and feel welcome to give their 100%. Be their authentic selves. We are honest, even if it sometimes hurts, because it makes us better and stronger as a team. We must be transparent in all our actions and be a positive example to the rest of the world. Empowering Treamer is an engaged work community characterized by encouragement, support and care. We embrace diversity because inclusion provides better possibilities for all jobs and talent to meet. By fostering active presence, we can empower more people and change the world one individual at a time. Fast The speed of our operations has a direct link to our growth. Action and determination to work hard will be measured by our success. We act fast, but our moves are strategic and calculated. Rather than just responding to changes on the market, we anticipate and build scenarios for the future. We are a bunch of focused, driven people willing to outsmart the competition. Fearless Treamer is an engaged work community characterized by encouragement, support and care. We embrace diversity because inclusion provides better possibilities for all jobs and talent to meet. By fostering active presence, we can empower more people and change the world one individual at a time.

Read more about Treamer Oy

Results.Heading: Mid-Senior Developer - Healthcare - Finnish Speaking
Results.Descr:
Mid-Senior Developer - Healthcare - Finnish Speaking - Helsinki office, flexible remote work

After hiring a number of back-end and front-end developer's during 2021 and 2022 we would like to add full-stack developer's who can tie-things together when needed - so having strong teamwork skills is important. Finding the best person who can code is not the only focus, being a good culture match to grow in our team is most important. 

Our product is used across a range of organisations including hospitals and pharmacies - with a focus on improving the UI/UX of our product being a focus in 2022 and 2023.

Role & Responsibilities

 * Develop and maintain the Medical IT Centre's solutions
 * Participate in technology choices together with the team
 * Spec solutions with other team members
 * Mentor and coach junior developers 

Skills & Qualifications

 * Fluent Finnish speaking required
 * Required experienced with: .NET, C#, SQL-Server, Javascript, React OR Angular front-end
 * Bachelor's or Master's Degree appreciated
 * 4+ Years of experience in professional software development role, hopefully with a number of full-stack projects
 * Interest in the medical industry appreciated 

Benefits

 * Very stable company & customers 
 * Positive development environment for Dev's to improve their technical ability, and professional skills 
 * Funding for certifications
 * Healthcare, lunch & culture vouchers and more
 * Depending on experience & culture fit, the expected salary range is 4000-5500€ per month 

If you have any questions, or would like more information, please send your CV and contact me at:

d.field@nigelfrank.com

+358 75 3266 582

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

Results.Heading: C# Developer, Semel Oy, Helsinki
Results.Descr:
Are you looking for an opportunity to grow as a professional in a stable and growing company? We are looking for a C# Developer for our client Semel Oy. Semel is the largest supplier of taxi information systems in the Nordics. The company highly values the well-being of its employees and this is reflected in the length of their employment in the company. Are you ready to hop on board? A team of enthusiastic professionals is waiting for you! Read more and apply as soon as possible!

About the role

In this role you will be working within a Windows environment focusing on maintenance of the framework, developing cloud systems and modernizing services. There are some senior coders doing similar tasks with you but the work is mostly independent maintenance, development and transferring of data into Azure and Kubernetes. This is a great opportunity to grow your expertise and take the next step in your career.

You are offered

Flexible working hours and a possibility to work remotely
An opportunity to grow with and within the company
Modern tools and equipment
Interesting job duties with state of the art applications


Job duties

Backend development for the applications with C# in MS Azure environment
Participating in co-operation meetings
Communication with various stakeholders


We are looking for

In this position, you can be a future talent at the beginning of your career or a professional who has already gained more experience. Let's get to know each other and figure out together if this position is suitable for you. Please attach a cover letter to your application.
Suitable educational background in IT
Good skills with C#
Some experience in software development (can be summer jobs and/or school projects etc.)
Good communication skills in English, Finnish is seen as an advantage
Experience with SQL, MS Azure and/or Kubernetes is considered an advantage

As a person you are:

Responsible
Proactive
Eager to learn and develop

Other information

Start: As soon as possible
Work extent: Permanent contract
Location: Helsinki, Valimotie 21
Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work. It is a request from Semel Oy that all questions regarding the position are handled by Academic Work.

Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

Client information

Semel Oy is a provider of mobile technology to customers operating with demanding transport fleets. For over three decades Semel has been delivering solutions for taxi companies throughout Europe. Their solutions include payments systems, communication systems and dispatch & fleet management solutions. Semel is also involved in the electrification of transport and offers a full-scale management systems for charging stations Today Semel Oy is the largest supplier of taxi information systems in the Nordics.

Results.Heading: Trainee, Technical Content Developer
Results.Descr:
Come create the technology that helps the world act together 

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people's lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of 

Our Business Group is a leader in wireless mobility networks and associated services. With more than 3.500 patent families essential for 5G we have a strong 5G portfolio and are a front runner in open and virtualized radio access networks (O-RAN and vRAN).

The Mobile Networks Customer Documentation team creates hardware and software descriptions and instructions for the use of the mobile operator personnel. Our goal is to bring the end-user documentation into the visual online world. 

What you will learn and contribute to 

As a Technical Content Developer Trainee in our team, you will:
  Assist our content developers in creating technical documentation for Nokia network management technology products
Study and clarify technical concepts with product designers and developers
Translate those technical concepts into modern, user-oriented formats
Analyze and manage existing and potential content, focusing on reuse and single-sourcing opportunities
Create operating instructions, installation manuals, and many other types of procedures needed for our customers
Create high-quality designed product documentation that meets Nokia standards

We work with: 
  Oxygen text editor
XML, HTML, CSS, Git
DITA
JIRA
Are these new to you? Don't worry, with us you will explore those and many more!

Your skills and experience
 You are a student of the last year of Bachelor or Engineer degree from a technical university (not only IT or telecommunications) or university
Fluent in spoken and written English
Interest in both technical writing and mobile telecommunications systems

What we offer

Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered.

Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:
 One of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark
LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation

At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people.

Nokia's employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
 We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect.

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

Results.Heading: Drupal Developer
Results.Descr:
Are you fierce in coding and fun in life? We've got the job for you as a Drupal Developer!

About Capgemini Finland

Capgemini Finland is a winning team of consultants, technology experts, developers, designers, and innovators. We are building a better, more sustainable, and inclusive future by transforming organizations and helping them grow. Our local expertise in cloud solutions, digital services, SAP, data, and AI is backed up by a powerful global network. 

The Opportunity

We are building up a new software development team to serve one of our biggest clients. To accompany the already assigned skilled developers we are now looking to hire 2 solid Drupal Developers to complete the team.****

In order to rock the role, we hope that

•  You are competent at software development on Drupal
•  You have passion to learn new technologies and environments
•  You like to work as part of a team and can communicate fluently both in English and Finnish (this is an absolute requirement) 

We hope you have at least a couple years of experience with software development and are willing and passionate to develop your skills further. Experience in PHP, Java, React, Vue and/or Angular would be a big plus. 

What is our promise to you?

At Capgemini Finland, you shape your own future. As one of our experts, you will combine cutting-edge technology with human insights to reimagine what's possible. You will have an impact on how leading Finnish organizations and entire industries operate in the digital era. Our work contributes to a more functional and inclusive society and touches the everyday lives of thousands. 

Our employee benefits include for example:

•  Global training & development support with free access to +250 000 classes and certifications from Coursera, Pluralsight, Harvard Spark and more
•  Fair and equal career management program and an unparalleled network of experts to learn from
•  Flexible working hours and remote working policy
•  Modern office spaces with a gym, swimming pool and spa area in Helsinki (you can also have our Lappeenranta office as your home base)
•  Extensive benefits to support your health and wellbeing
•  A tightly knit team and a culture devoted to building a sustainable and inclusive future 

Employees consistently praise Capgemini Finland for providing opportunities to grow and learn, for making work enjoyable with freedom and flexibility, and for embracing a truly diverse and inclusive culture. 

Apply now

Does this sound like your thing? Send your application latest by 30.9.2022
Got a question about this role? For more information, please reach out to Kari Lahtinen (kari.lahtinen@capgemini.com; +358 40 730 1946). 

Get The Future You Want.

#LI-HYBRID
#LI-FIEI

Results.Heading: .NET Software Developer - Oulu / Helsinki
Results.Descr:
Hiring for Junior, Mid & Senior Developer's - Helsinki, Oulu

We are working with a mid-large sized in-house development company. They are increasing their budget and planning new long-term projects that will begin before the end of 2022 - an example being their move from their private-cloud to Azure. 

The main focus of projects is with the financial industry and they are able to offer both hands-on work for those who want to be a coding-focused developer - and can help those who want more understanding and responsibility on the business-side of decision making.

Role & Responsibilities

 * Depending on experience, join one of our development teams as we increase the staffing for each team to reduce the workload and improve capability for existing and upcoming projects in 2022/2023. 
 * Can be some analysis of requirements and formulation work 
 * Software design and implementation
 * Join in with peer-review sessions on a regular basis 

Skills & Qualifications

 * Fluent Finnish, speaking and written & professional level English 
 * C#, .NET Core, REST API's, SQL Server, JavaScript/TypeScript, Vue.js/React/Angular/Knockout.js, Azure - not all expected but all would be beneficial.
 * Previous professional working experience for Junior's is required. 2.5+ Years for Mid-level Developer's and 4.5+ Years for Senior Developer's (estimated).
 * Experience with CI/CD is appreciated but not necessary.
 * Master's/Bachelor's Degree appreciated. 

Benefits

 * Salary range: 2800-5700€ per month 
 * Benefits including lunch and culture vouchers, gym membership, new mobile phone & laptop and more. 
 * In-house development projects, stable work and a long-term focus on the internal improvement of staff.
 * Finnish, US and European customer projects.
 * Time and financial support for certifications, training and events. 

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

d.field@nigelfrank.com

+358 75 3266 582

Whilst this position offers remote working flexibility, all candidates must be located inside Finland, be willing to do some travelling per year to Oulu or Helsinki and hold a valid work Visa.

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

Results.Heading: Developer, Sanction Screening
Results.Descr:
Position Description:
 
 Vuonna 1976 perustettu CGI on maailman ja Suomen suurimpia IT- ja liiketoimintakonsultoinnin palveluyhtiöitä - ja tuhansien erilaisten uratarinoiden talo. Lisätietoa www.cgi.fi. 

Developer, Sanction Screening

Etsimme kokenutta kehittäjää asiakkaamme OP Financial Groupin merkittävän kehitys- ja ylläpitotoimeksiannon pariin pakotetarkistuksen (Sanction Screening) alueelle. Tässä on mielenkiintoinen mahdollisuus päästä hyödyntämään osaamistasi back end teknologioiden, sekä pilvipalveluiden ja tietokantojen parissa. Olisiko tässä seuraava mahdollisuutesi?

Tässä tehtävässä
Toimit Lead -roolissa monipuolisten ja kriittisten NetReveal-järjestelmää koskevien kehitys- ja ylläpitotehtävien parissa. Sinulla on ymmärrystä järjestelmäintegraatioista ja omaat kyvyn omaksua sekä työstää ketterästi liiketoiminnan vaatimuksia soveltuviksi ratkaisuiksi. Aiempi kokemus NetReveal -järjestelmän parista on eduksi, mutta ei välttämätöntä ja tarjoamme sinulle tarvittavan koulutuksen sekä tuen tehtävässäsi menestymiseen. Toimit tiiviissä yhteistyössä oman paikallisen sekä kansainvälisen tiimimme lisäksi tarvittaessa myös NetReveal ohjelmisto-toimittajan kansainvälisen tiimin kanssa.

Tehtäviisi kuuluu:
•  NetReveal -järjestelmän tukeminen ja kehitystyö
•  Sovellusten ylläpito sekä olemassa olevan järjestelmän tunnistaminen ja parantaminen
•  Uusien sovellusten kehittäminen NetReveal / Sanction -moduulin vaatimusten mukaisesti
•  Alustan toimintojen päivittäminen
•  Työskentely OP:n sisäisten asiantuntijoiden, sidosryhmien ja kumppaneiden kanssa sekä koordinointi osapuolten ja eri sidosryhmien välillä
•  Uusien kehittäjien integroiminen tiimiin ja heidän valmentamisensa Suomessa ja ulkomailla

 Toivomme sinulta
•  Vankkaa kokemusta useammasta seuraavasta teknologiasta: Java, DB2, WAS, Linux/Unix, Unix scripting, Control-M
•  SQL-osaamista
•  Sujuvat viestintätaidot suomeksi ja englanniksi

Lisäksi eduksi on, jos sinulta löytyy osaamista joistakin seuraavista:
•  CI/CD, Cloud, Docker, Splunk ja Dynatrace
•  AML/CTF -transaktiomonitorointi
•  NetReveal

Tiimi, johon tulet
Pääset osaksi monimuotoista ja kansainvälistä tiimiämme, joka on osa OP:n asiakkuuksien parissa työskentelevää yksikköä. Tukenasi on laaja verkosto osaajia sekä CGI:ltä, että OP:lta ja työskentelemme tiiviissä yhteistyössä yhteisiä tavoitteita kohti.

Uudet ja modernit toimitilamme sijaitsevat Helsingissä hyvien kulkuyhteyksien varrella, mutta työskentelemme kuitenkin joustavasti hybridimallilla.

Meillä CGI:llä...

... olet member.
Tarjoamme sinulle paitsi työn, jossa voit kehittyä haluamaasi suuntaan, myös mahdollisuuden omistaa yhtiön osakkeita. Koska yli 80 prosenttia henkilöstöstämme on myös omistajia, kutsumme henkilöstöämme membereiksi. Membereinä pääsemme nauttimaan CGI:n taloudellisesta menestyksestä ja rakentamaan toiveidemme mukaista yhtiötä.

... saat olla sellainen kuin olet.
Meitä on 3 700 ympäri Suomen ja meille on tärkeää, että jokainen meistä saa olla työpaikalla oma itsensä. Monimuotoiset tiimimme määrittelevät itse, millaiset joustavat työnteon tavat niille parhaiten sopivat. Meillä työ myös joustaa, kun elämäntilanne sitä vaatii.

... sinusta pidetään huolta.
Meille CGI:n membereille on tärkeää, että tuemme ja autamme aina toisiamme. Et ole koskaan yksin: tuhansista huippuasiantuntijoistamme löytyy aina joku, johon tukeutua. Ja tarjoamme tietysti myös laajan valikoiman henkilöstöetuja, jotka auttavat sinua voimaan paremmin.

... innostut työstäsi - yhä uudelleen.
Meillä viihdytään pitkään, koska kokoisessamme talossa on tarjolla aina uusia uramahdollisuuksia ja niihin siirtyminen on tehty helpoksi. Kun kaipaat vaihtelua, voit ottaa haltuun uuden teknologian, toimialan tai asiakkuuden - ja kun kaipaat työltä joustoa uudessa elämäntilanteessa, sekin järjestyy. Tule meille rakentamaan itsesi näköinen ura!

Kiinnostuitko?
Mainiota! Seuraavaksi kuulisimme mielellämme lisää sinusta ja osaamisestasi.
Haethan tehtävää rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta osoitteessa www.cgi.fi/ura.

Viimeinen hakupäivä on 18.9.2022 Käymme hakemuksia läpi kuitenkin jo hakuaikana ja etenemme rekrytointiprosessissa heti sopivan kandidaatin löydyttyä - hakemus kannattaa siis lähettää vaikka heti!

Mikäli mieleesi heräsi kysymyksiä Klaus Hausen, Director COnsulting Services antaa mielellään lisätietoja. Klausin tavoitat parhaiten numerosta p. +358 40 5437 865.

Huomaathan, että tehtävän luonteesta johtuen teetämme valitulle henkilölle perusmuotoisen turvallisuusselvityksen.

Tutustu meihin lisää: 

•  Facebook 
•  Instagram 
•  LinkedIn 
•  Twitter 
•  YouTube 

#LI-SN1 
 
 Skills:
  BMC Control-M 
 DB2 
 Java 
 Linux 
 SQL 
 
 
 What you can expect from us:
 
Insights you can act on

While technology is at the heart of our clients' digital transformation, we understand that people are at the heart of business success. 

When you join CGI, you become a trusted advisor, collaborating with colleagues and clients to bring forward actionable insights that deliver meaningful and sustainable outcomes. We call our employees "members" because they are CGI shareholders and owners and owners who enjoy working and growing together to build a company we are proud of. This has been our Dream since 1976, and it has brought us to where we are today - one of the world's largest independent providers of IT and business consulting services.

At CGI, we recognize the richness that diversity brings. We strive to create a work culture where all belong and collaborate with clients in building more inclusive communities. As an equal-opportunity employer, we want to empower all our members to succeed and grow. If you require an accommodation at any point during the recruitment process, please let us know. We will be happy to assist. 

Ready to become part of our success story? Join CGI - where your ideas and actions make a difference.

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä / Simulaatiospesialisti
Results.Descr:
Magister Solutions is Finnish company specializing in network simulation tools and services for modelling mobile and satellite communication networks in detail. Our main competences relate to system level simulator design and development, mobile and SatCom communication protocol and algorithm design and verification, system level and end-to-end performance evaluations. We are working together with leading mobile and satellite communication players and do also research by ourselves to create better connected future. We are also offering Magister SimLab; user-friendly, vendor independent, high-class web/cloud -based simulation service; for an easy-to-use access our simulators and the whole simulation workflow.

Read more: https://www.magister.fi/

Ohjelmistokehittäjä / Simulaatiospesialisti

Haluatko työskennellä tietoliikennesimulaattoreiden ja langattomien viestintäjärjestelmien kehityksen kärjessä? Miltä kuulostaa arvokas ja merkityksellinen työ tulevaisuuden langattomien teknologioiden suunnittelussa yhdessä tämän hetken tärkeimpien tietoliikennevalmistajien kanssa?

Magister Solutions Oy tarjoaa verkkosimulaatioita palveluna, joka on suunnattu satelliitti- ja maanpäällisten viestintäverkkojen suunnitteluun, kehittämiseen, optimointiin ja ylläpitoon.

Työnkuvaus:

Magisterilla työpäivät ovat hyvin dynaamisia ja itsesäädeltyjä – vastapainona on kuitenkin alati tukeva ja asiantunteva tiimi, yhteisiä kahvittelu- tai biljardihetkiä unohtamatta.

Projektit, joiden parissa työskentelet, voivat olla pitkiäkin, ja pääsetkin tiiviisti pureutumaan alan tärkeimpien asiakkaiden projekteihin. Tulet työskentelemään tietoliikennesimulaattoreiden suunnittelussa, tutkimisessa, kehittämisessä sekä tulosten analysoimisessa, ja edistät sinulle kuuluvia projekteja. Myös tulosten raportointi ja konferenssijulkaisut kuuluvat työnkuvaasi. Projektit voivat liittyä mm. Magister SimLab -simulaatiopalvelun kehittämiseen, Euroopan avaruusjärjestön tutkimusprojekteihin ja/tai 3GPP-standardointiin. Roolisi voi määräytyä omien vahvuuksiesi ja intressiesi mukaisesti.

Tarjoamme sinulle:

Pääset mukaan n. 20 hengen asiantuntevaan työporukkaan, jossa työkavereihin voi luottaa – vaikka työ on melko itsesäädeltyä, vallitsee Magisterilla jatkuva työkavereiden auttaminen ja tukeminen erilaisissa tilanteissa. Magisterilla työntekijät ovat voimavara, ja heihin halutaan panostaa tarjoamalla lounas-, virkistys- ja puhelinedut, sekä kattavan työterveyshuollon ja hierontaedun. Yhteishenkeä pidetään yllä mm. yhteisten tapahtuma- ja virkistysiltojen merkeissä.

Magisterin työntekijät arvostavat sitä, että työnantaja luottaa heihin, ja työ ja vapaa-aika pysyy hyvin tasapainossa. Alla nykyisten työntekijöiden kommentteja Magisterilla työskentelystä.

Lauri, Senior Researcher, 6 vuotta Magisterilla:
”Työ on jatkuvaa oppimista ja ajan hermolla pysymistä – tämän vuoksi työ onkin todella mielekästä ja monipuolista.”

Mikko, Researcher, 2 vuotta Magisterilla:
”Magisterilla vallitsee kannustava ja joustava työkulttuuri ja -ilmapiiri. Täällä ymmärretään, että elämä on töiden ulkopuolellakin.”

Magisterilla pääset jatkuvan oppimisen ja itsesi kehittämisen pariin mielenkiintoisissa projekteissa! Tarjoamme sinulle kokoaikaisen ja vakituisen työn, joskin osa-aikaisuus on myös mahdollista.

Toivomme sinulta:

Olet sitten juuri koulusta valmistunut, tai viimeistelemässä opintojasi, haethan mukaan!

Menestyäksesi tehtävässä sinulta löytyy alalle soveltuva tekninen koulutus (yliopisto- tai AMK-pohjainen) Lisäksi sinulta löytyy aiempaa kokemusta esim. työharjoittelun kautta, jossa olet päässyt kehittämään ohjelmointitaitojasi (Python ja/tai C++).

Voimme tarjota sinulle myös lopputyö- ja/tai jatko-opiskelumahdollisuuksia.

Voit olla myös muutaman vuoden alalla toiminut henkilö, ja sinulta löytyy ainakin jommastakummasta ohjelmointikielestä (Python ja/tai C++) vahvaa osaamista ja kokemusta.

Hieno lisä olisi, mikäli sinulta löytyisi jotain seuraavista:
•	Simulaattorikokemus, esim. Network Simulator 3 (ns-3)
•	Tietotaitoa SatCom-, 4G/5G/6G- tai langattomista Wifi-verkoista
•	Tutkimuksellinen ajatustapa (research mindset)

Sinulle tärkeitä arvoja työyhteisössä on yhteen hiileen puhaltaminen ja olet aidosti kiinnostunut oppimaan koko ajan lisää ja pysymään ajan hermolla. Vaikka tiimin tuki on koko ajan läsnä, viihdyt hyvin itsenäisessä työssä. 

Lisätiedot ja hakeminen:

Kiinnostuitko tehtävästä? Hienoa, sillä haluamme kuulla sinusta lisää! Hakeminen on helppoa ja nopeaa – jätä vain yhteystietosi rekrytointijärjestelmäämme Hae tehtävää -painikkeen kautta ja olemme sinuun yhteydessä. Ensimmäinen haastattelukierros toteutetaan Teamsin välityksellä Temp-Teamin kanssa.

Rekrytoinnista Temp-Teamilla vastaa HR-konsultti Milla Äikäs. Lisätiedusteluihin liittyen tavoitat Millan joko numerosta 040 184 3384 tai milla.aikas@temp-team.fi.

Työtehtäviisi kuuluu laserleikkauskoneen ohjelmointi/nestaus ja teknisten dokumenttien tuottaminen. Toivomme sinulta 2D kuvien luku- ja piirtotaitoa, työstökoneiden ohjelmointitaitoa ja mahdollisesti aikaisempaa kokemusta metallituotannon töistä. Ohjelmistona on Nestix.

Työtä tehdään päivävuorossa ma-pe klo 8-16.00. Työt alkavat heti sopivan henkilön löydyttyä. Jätä hakemus oheisen linkin kautta tai soita 040 728 8728 /Johanna Kauppinen.

Kilta Henkilöstöpalvelu Oy on vuonna 2000 perustettu, luotettava ja ripeä lahtelainen henkilöstöpalveluja tarjoava yritys. Results.Heading: Lävistäjä/levytyöstökoneen ohjelmoija
Results.Descr:
Lävistäjä/levytyöstökoneen ohjelmoija
 
Asiakkaamme etsii Laitilaan lävistäjää, levytyöstökeskusten ohjelmoijaa, joka kykenee ohjelmoimaan kuvasta. Työntekijä voi olla joko suomen - tai englanninkielinen. Asiakkaalla on jo nyt puolan ja englannin kieli ohjelmointikielinä. Työ alkaa sopimuksen mukaan ja työ on vakituinen. Työ on vuorotyötä. 
 
Kuinka haen Carrotille?
 
 Työhakemuksen jättäminen Carrotille on helppoa ja nopeaa. Jätä hakemuksesi oheisen linkin kautta. Jos olet jo aiemmin hakenut töitä Carrotilta, voit kirjautua sisään käyttäjätunnuksillasi ja päivittää aiempaa hakemustasi. Saat tällä yhdellä hakemuksella yhteydet satoihin työpaikkoihin sekä mahdollisuuden koko elämän mittaiseen urapolkuun! 
 
 Tarvittaessa lisätietoja tästä työpaikasta saat soittamalla Elisa Aittamäelle p.040 199 6222, ark. klo 9-15. 
 
Nähdään Carrotilla! 
 
 Meille on erityisen tärkeää, että viihdyt työssäsi. Yhteisenä päämääränämme on löytää koulutustasi ja kokemustasi vastaava, toiveidesi mukainen mielekäs työ. Tarjoamme reilun palkkauksen lisäksi hyvät henkilöstöedut, sekä järjestämme erilaisia koulutusmahdollisuuksia; kauttamme pääset kehittymään urapolullasi! 
 
 Carrot on kotimainen henkilöstövuokraus-, rekrytointi- ja ulkoistuspalveluihin keskittynyt yritys, joka on toiminut jo vuodesta 1998. 
 
 Carrot - Muuttuvan työelämän asiantuntija

Results.Heading: Software Developer with a Flair for Modern Maintenance
Results.Descr:
Do you think that continuous software maintenance is a fascinating, inspiring and ever-developing field? Awesome, so do we!  Vincit has understood the value of continuous services and software maintenance. We have turned our maintenance business, Vincit DevOps & Platform Services,  i nto a strategic growth area, meaning we're now focusing even more strongly on our talents, practices and, of course, clients. Are you a software developer with a flair for modern maintenance? If so, this is your time to shine! 
 
Okay, so what's the job?
 
 In your work, you'll be taking care of our clients' digital assets, perfecting services and applications through continuous development and solving some of the more challenging problems the clients are bound to face from time to time. You'll also get to be part of development projects from the get-go. This means being responsible for bringing any maintenance-related matters into focus already during the construction phase of the solution. 
 
 We've got heaps of tech in need of support. Our main front-end technologies include JavaScript and TypeScript, React, Angular and Vue, whereas our back-end is dominated by Java/Kotlin, Node.js, C#/.NET and Python/Django. We expect you to know your way around at least one of these. Our code is AWS-, GCP- or Azure-based, depending on the need. 
 
Alright, but what is this "modern" of which you speak?
 
 When we say "modern", we mean that you understand the value of continuous development. For you, DevOps isn't only a bunch of letters but a way of building bridges between 'dev' and 'ops'. When it comes to different technologies and methods, you want to develop your own skills. You often think about ways in which unnecessary tasks could be automated, and client value is at the heart of what you do. 
 
 Do you believe that top experts - you included - are the best people to judge how to organize their work? Do you have a clear vision of how things should be done to prevent maintenance turning into a disposal site of last resort? If so, we are ready to offer you a golden opportunity that will allow you to get your hands dirty and change the way software is built today. 
 
Sounds good! Tell me about the team.
 
 The team's got your back. Our community of continuous developers has grown to a crew of almost 50 people scattered across five different localities! We're a diverse bunch: our team comprises software developers, mobile developers, WP gurus, DevOps talents, SysAdmins and service managers, all working side by side towards a common goal. Becoming part of this team also means becoming an important part of the Vincit ecosystem and a squad of more than 800 top professionals. 
 
 You will learn a lot from your new colleagues, and in this case, saying you will "occupy a vantage position" is no exaggeration: your range of potential clients will be as broad as your data transmission bandwidth is wide. In the future, we will also be providing support to the clients of Vincit USA, which will give you an opportunity to expand your horizons internationally as well. 
 
 Our everyday work is done in smaller teams, which are responsible for a limited number of clients and technologies - in other words, you won't need to tend to our dozens of clients alone. To understand what we're talking about, why not read  our team SysAdmin Petri's career  story . 
 
Cool, but why should I choose Vincit?
 
 We've always emphasized continuous development, agility, individual freedom and making dreams come true - and we're not planning to give up on any of these any time soon. We allow you to lead yourself and question the norms of work in a modern working environment. Click on the link if you want to learn how Vincit can offer you an excellent way to spend your waking hours  and what we do to create a feel-good environment where working doesn't feel like a pain in the backside. You might also be interested to know that we allow telework and have implemented multiple initiatives that help our employees find a good work-life balance. 
 
 Your salary will be based on your experience and skill set. You will also gain access to Vincit's bonus model and a wide range of benefits. 
 
Interested?
 
 Curious but still on the fence? Get in touch with Juulia Siivonen (juulia.siivonen@vincit.fi / +358 44 5749 896) for even more information.

Results.Heading: Senior Backend Developer - Oikotie Asunnot
Results.Descr:
THE OPPORTUNITY IN A NUTSHELL

You? Experience in agile development with object-oriented programming, writing testable code and developing web platforms. Eagerness to take part in product discovery.
Role? Seasoned backend developer contributing to the future of Oikotie Asunnot, one of the leading user-based real estate websites in Finland with over one million users every week: designing and implementing scalable and robust web services, APIs and databases in a cloud environment.
Tech stack? PHP with Zend and Slim frameworks, Ecmascript/Typescript, MySQL. Environments run in AWS and CI/CD pipelines are used to automate builds, run tests and make deployments.
Location? We work in a hybrid way, so you can be based anywhere in Finland! Our team is spread between Helsinki and Turku. If you like, our office is there for you just a few steps away from the Helsinki railway station.
Why us? Routine is not for you and you're more into a variety of tasks? With us, there's no day alike and your playground is tailorable to your ambitions! Developers are highly valued in our teams and are encouraged to pitch in with ideas on how to push the service forward. And talking about the future, we're on our way towards a deepened collaboration with the other Nordic Schibsted countries, which translates into even more opportunities for both technical and personal development! Our benefits include among others an extra week of holiday, recreational and lunch benefits on top of your salary, and flexible working hours and spots! 

Sounds like your cup of tea? Check out the details below!

WHO ARE YOU?
Mastering Object Oriented Programming (PHP would be luxurious, but any other OOP language is good for the start), Typescript and writing testable code.
Experience in relational databases e.g. MySQL.
You've already had your first touch point on AWS or other cloud environments.
Experience with API integrations.
Proficiency in Git is a big plus.
Fluency in English (even on Monday mornings;-). Our official language is English and we gather people together from multiple backgrounds (memes in Spanish, Indian cooking recipes, database parodies, and dog videos circulate on our Slack channels!).
As a person , you're a curious self-starter with a problem-solving mindset who shares our passion to constantly develop ourselves. If passion for what you do and trust among your team are values that resonate with you, we believe that our working culture is a great fit for you! Here's a bunch of positive thinkers waiting for you to share the journey!

WHAT'S THE JOB LIKE?Day-to-day work & Projects
As our Senior Backend Developer, you are part of our diverse Oikotie Asunnot tech team. 
With the mission to serve our customers to make smart choices in our marketplace, we deliver a first-class product thanks to dedicated teams both for web and mobile applications. Our setup is very diverse and offers many different challenges (read opportunities for learning), you get to touch to name a few - backend solutions, search indexes, map solutions, APIs, and AWS infrastructure. We have extremely high test coverage and utilise automated end-to-end testing comprehensively. Your main focus is on developing new features in the marketplace along with modernising the platform's architecture. Furthermore, you technically design and implement scalable and robust solutions in a high-load environment, and you know your way around how to organise the code in a sustainable & maintainable way in large-scale projects. 

Hadn't got a chance to get your hands dirty with something from the list above? Don't worry, you will learn by working with us! Giving trust and feeling trusted in our work and skills are core values to us. While we take ownership of applications and products, we never forget that it is by trusting each other and learning together that we are able to be the most efficient real estate marketplace in Finland. This is how we are able to drive +1 million users to our services every week, and here is where you can leave your mark. 

Not everything is sweet, so here's the main opportunity to improve
As this is a pivotal moment for Oikotie tech organisation, an open mind for new tech, best practices and methods are celebrated and learnings are guaranteed. While scaling up our software architecture and collaborating across teams, we aim to modernise the architecture and make it more loosely coupled. Thus, your expertise is needed in analysing the current situation and throwing in ideas. Are you ready to hop along on the development journey? 

Goal During your first few months, we expect you to take your time to get on board, settle in the team, gradually take over your role and collaboratively start building new features for Oikotie Asunnot. 

Further down the road, approximately after 6 months, we're eager to see you standing on your own (we're here to have your back!). You finish backlog tasks & also contribute to building our vision, strategy and work methods. For example, your expertise is needed in product discovery initiatives where you would act as a tech expert. How do we bring even more traffic and new listings to our real estate platform, it's up to you and to the team! 

Colleagues Here is a 98-member tech family eagerly waiting for you! Our Oikotie Asunnot Tech team gathers together 15 bright experts: developers, QA, designers, Product Managers & a Development Manager. There is a lot of experience within the squad and we're always ready to share our knowledge and polish our skills. We are mature in agile practices and our work is paced by two-week sprints and OKRs (Objectives, Key Results) in a network of empowered cross-functional squads. 

How do we collaborate? We win it together, thus we plan and prioritise together, discuss and decide technical details and then focus on implementation. Everyone works both independently and as a part of the team, so you can count on us to receive help and also support others when needed. When it comes to aspects outside of our expertise such as design, analytics, or marketing, there're specialists available in cross-functional teams to give a helping hand. 

Company Schibsted, product company, gathering together Oikotie, Tori, & Rakentaja reaching +4M users monthly. Over 250 colleagues in Finland and 5500 in the Nordics want to steer innovation on News media, Marketplaces & Growth adventures to empower the millions of people interacting with us in their daily lives. We're lucky to work with colleagues who share the passion for their work, are friendly and caring. Our community embraces curiosity, teamwork, a problem-solving mindset, and continuous learning. Have a sneak peek at our boogie on LinkedIn & Instagram and get to know the Schibsted Tech & Shetech Communities along with the Schibsted Talks podcast hosted by our very own colleagues. 

GOT YOUR ATTENTION? Let us hear from you!
If you are looking for a workplace and the role in which you could share your knowledge and expertise, learn and grow, get inspired, be yourself, and feel good, let us hear from you! We're eagerly waiting for you to turn yourself in by Sunday, September 18.

ANY QUESTIONS?
Our Development Manager (Oikotie Asunnot) Yevgeniya Nattila (yevgeniya.nattila(at)schibsted.com, or by phone on Wednesdays from 9-10 at +358468108645 ) is happy to tell you more about the daily work and she and Alessia Porazzi , Talent Acquisition Specialist, (alessia.porazzi(at)schibsted.com) can share insights about our company culture! 

RECRUITMENT PROCESS?
1. 60 min meeting with the Talent Acquisition Specialist, Alessia (your background & skills, career goals and Schibsted as an employer)
2. 45 min chat with the Development Manager, Yevgeniya (diving deeper into your background & experience, role goals & expectations)
3. 75 min technical interview with some developers and Oikotie Asunnot's Head of Engineer, Juha (get to know each other, how would it be to work as part of the team, diving deeper into your skillset)

Get your questions ready for us!During every interview, we aim to create a space for open and genuine communication from both sides. So think about things you would like to know from us and have courage to ask difficult questions too! The recruitment decision has always 2 sides: it's our decision, but most importantly, it's your decision who you trust with your growth & career. This way, we want to make sure that all your questions are answered and that you have the best possible tools to make a decision for your future.

Schibsted Finland doesn't accept unsolicited profiles from recruitment agencies and won't pay fees to any third-party agency or company that doesn't have a signed agreement with us. If provided, we're free to contact the profiles ourselves.

Results.Heading: BI-Kehittäjä (Junior/Senior), Keravan Energia Oy, Kerava
Results.Descr:
Etsimme nyt asiakkaallemme Keravan Energia Oy:lle liiketoimintadatan rakentelusta innostunutta uransa alussa tai jo vähän pidemmällä olevaa ohjelmistokehittäjää vahvistamaan tärkeää tiedolla johtamisen ja ohjelmistointegraatioiden tehtäväkenttää. Roolissasi pääset olemaan tärkeä osa paikallisen energia yhtiön sekä yhden toimialansa edelläkävijän toiminnan ydintä sekä mukana luomassa menestystarinaa. Voit olla valmistumassa, vasta valmistunut tai kokenut BI-kehittäjä/integraatiomestari. Tärkeintä on, että olet innostunut työstäsi, tulet hyvin toimeen ihmisten kanssa ja haluat oppia uutta sekä haluat luoda taidoillasi lisäarvoa liiketoiminnalle. Jos tämä herätti mielenkiintosi, haethan paikkaa pikimmiten, sillä täytämme roolin heti sopivan henkilön löydyttyä!

Kuvaus

Päätehtävänäsi on suunnitella ja rakentaa konsernin liiketoimintaraportointia Business Intelligence/Data warehouse ohjelmistojen avulla sekä rakentaa ja hyödyntää ohjelmistointegraatioita/rajapintoja. Business Intelligence -työkaluina on käytössä QlikSense ja ohjelmistointegraatiossa Frends-integraatioalusta.Odotamme sinulta soveltuvaa ohjelmistoteknillistä koulutusta tai muutoin hankittua ohjelmistoteknillistä osaamista sekä oikeanlaista innokasta ja ratkaisukeskeistä datamestarin asennetta. Osittainen etäily on mahdollista, mutta pääosin tulisit työskentelemään toimistolla Keravalla.



Tarjoamme

Mielenkiintoisen tehtäväkentän
Hyvän työilmapiirin mukavassa porukassa
Kattavan perehdytyksen rooliin

Academic Workin konsulttina tarjoamme sinulle loistavat mahdollisuudet kehittyä ammattilaisena, laajentaa verkostoasi sekä hankkia tulevaisuuden kannalta hyödyllisiä kontakteja. Lue lisää alta.

Kokoaikainen työ: https://www.academicwork.fi/tyonhakijoille/kokoaikatyo

Työtehtävä

Korsernin liiketoimintaraportoinnin suunnittelu ja rakentaminen Business Intelligence/Datawarehouse ohjelmistojen avulla
Ohjelmistointegraatioiden/rajapintojen rakentaminen ja hyödyntäminen Frends-integraatioalustalla


Etsimällämme henkilöllä on

Ohjelmistotekninen koulutus/muutoin hankittu ohjelmistotekninen osaaminen
Aikaisempi kokemus Qliksense (PowerBI kokemus eduksi), Datawarehouse
Sujuva suullinen ja kirjallinen suomen sekä englannin kielen taito

Katsomme eduksi tuntemusta ohjelmistokielistä ja datan hallinnasta (mm. Python, R, .NET, Java..), rajapintaosaamisesta (mm. WebService, SOAP/XML, REST/JSON, REST API...) sekä muiden integraatiotyökalujen sekä pilvialustojen osaamisesta (mm. Azure Data Factory, SQL Server Integration Services)



Työntekijänä sinulla on

Valmius itsenäiseen ja oma-aloitteiseen työskentelyyn sekä halu oppia ja kehittyä
Halu auttaa liiketoimintaa tekemisellään
Hyvät yhteistyö- ja kommunikointitaidot

Muuta tietoa

Aloitus: Mahdollisimman pian
Kesto: Toistaiseksi voimassa oleva
Sijainti: Tervahaudankatu 6, 04200 Kerava
Yhteystiedot: Tästä rekrytointiprosessista vastaa Academic Work asiakasyrityksensä Keravan Energia Oy:n puolesta ja kaikki positioon liittyvät tiedustelut tulee lähettää Academic Workille.

Käymme hakijoita jatkuvasti läpi ja jos olemme jo edenneet haastatteluvaiheeseen, saattaa ilmoitus poistua sivuiltamme ennen kuin rekrytointiprosessi on saatu päätökseen.

Yrityskuvaus

Olemme moderni energiayhtiö, jonka historia ulottuu vuoteen 1906. Vahvuutemme on monipuolinen tuotevalikoima ja erinomainen asiakaspalvelu. Täyden palvelun energiakumppanina selvitämme asiakkaidemme yksilölliset tarpeet ja tarjoamme heille aidosti sopivimman ratkaisun. Sähköä ja lämpöä siirrämme Keravalla ja Sipoossa, mutta tuotteita ja palveluita myymme kaikkialle Suomeen.

Katso lisätietoa tästä videosta.

Results.Heading: Senior Back-End Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a Senior Back-End Developer (B2B online)

DNA is recognized as an excellent employer. We are sure that you will enjoy working for us. Below, you can find reasons why you should choose us for the next stage of your career!

EMPLOYMENT DETAILS: Role: Senior Back-End Developer
Start date: As soon as possible
Employment: permanent
Location: Helsinki & flexible remote work in Finland
Application period ends: 18.9.2022
For further information, please contact: Joni Nyqvist, p. +358440442752 / joni.nyqvist(at)dna.fi


We at DNA aim to use the most cutting-edge technology to deliver high quality online services for both our consumer and business customers. Our online teams are responsible for developing DNAs web shop, self-service portals, websites and mobile applications. In the development we use both our internal developers and selected vendors to create the best customer experience as possible. To do so, we use a Headless CMS and microservice architecture on top of cloud services, supported by high end e-commerce and CMS platforms. 

We are looking for a Back-End Developer to be part of our B2B online development team. The person we are looking for is a strong team player who knows how to deliver high quality code and is interested in learning new technologies. We expect you to be fluent in English and have experience in agile working methodologies (Scrum, SAFe, Kanban) and DevOps (CI/CD). Some knowledge of Finnish language is considered a bonus but is not mandatory as we work with multicultural teams using mostly English as the working language.

We expect you to have software development experience and excellent coding skills with Java technologies. We use a lot of integrations so we expect that you are experienced in both using and implementing them (REST-APIs, microservices). Experience in e-commerce, telecommunications industry, SAP Commerce Cloud or microservice architecture is also considered a bonus. 

Our head office is in Helsinki and we have offices in most of the bigger cities in Finland like Turku, Tampere, Lahti, Oulu, Jyväskylä, Pori, Rauma. However you will be able to work remotely within Finland if you so choose.  We offer you:A chance to participate in different exciting projects and develop your skills as a software professional
Friendly and easy-going co-workers and work environment
Possibility to professional growth based on your own interests
Possibility to effect how the things are done
Nice and recently renovated office spaces at all our locations
Possibility to work remotely
Good benefits 


You can submit your application in Finnish or English.

If you have a public github repository or other ways to show case your earlier work, please include a link in your application.

REASONS FOR CHOOSING DNA: 

DNA strives to provide an excellent place to work, and we are constantly aiming to improve our practices as an employer to meet this goal. We want to appreciate all our employees as they are - as one-of-kind. No matter their age, gender, look, where they come from, who they love, or how you see the world. Being one-of-a-kind is our richness. Click the links below to find out more about things that may be of interest to you.   Employee Benefits   
  Learning & Career Development   
  Work Culture   
  Family-friendly Workplace   
  Diversity   
  Corporate Responsibility   
  Finance   
  Internationality   


DNA IN A NUTSHELL: 

DNA is one of the leading telecommunications companies in Finland. We want to make our customers' daily lives less complicated. We offer connections, services and devices for homes and workplaces, contributing to the digitalisation of society. DNA's customers are continuously among the world mobile data usage leaders. DNA has about 3.6 million subscriptions in its fixed and mobile communications networks. The company has been awarded numerous times as an excellent employer and family-friendly workplace. In 2021, our total revenue was EUR 956 million and we employ about 1,600 people around Finland. DNA is a part of Telenor Group, a leading telecommunications company across the Nordics. More information: www.dna.fi, Twitter @DNA_fi, Facebook @DNA.fi and LinkedIn @DNA-Oyj.

Results.Heading: Frondend-kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Ropo on sydämeltään teknologiatalo, jossa keskitytään laskun elinkaaripalveluiden kehittämiseen yhdessä asiakkaiden kanssa omaa teknologiaa hyödyntäen. Meillä työskentelee reilu 50 henkilöä teknologiatiimissä ja joukkoon mahtuu niin junior- kuin senior-tason tekijöitä. Haluamme tarjota asiakkaillemme laadukkaita palveluita niin Suomessa kuin muissakin maissa. Kasvu ja kansainvälistyminen takaavat sen, että meillä riittää mielenkiintoisia tehtäviä ja kehitysprojekteja!
 
 Haemme nyt Ropo Capitalille Kuopioon FRONTEND-KEHITTÄJÄÄ
 
 Toivomme, että sinulla on innokas asenne sekä aito halu oppia uutta ja saattaa asioita valmiiksi. Olet työskennellyt ohjelmoinnin parissa jo useamman vuoden ja mikä tärkeintä, omaat positiivisen asenteen sekä pyrkimyksen kehittää ammattitaitoasi entisestään. Näillä eväillä menestyt varmasti meidän dynaamisessa tiimissämme.
 
 Tarjoamme sinulle:
 
 - kiinnostavia työtehtäviä ja teknisesti haastavia projekteja vahvasti kasvavassa ja kansainvälistyvässä yrityksessä
 
 - ajan ja paikan suhteen joustavan työn
 
 - mukavat ja ammattitaitoiset kollegat
 
 - takuuvarmaa ammattitaidon kehittymistä
 
 - ilmapiirin, jossa työtä tehdään tavoitteellisella ja intohimoisella otteella
 
 - kattavan työterveyshuollon, laajat vakuutukset, lounasedun, ilmaisen pysäköinnin jne.
 
 Odotamme sinulta:
 
 - vähintään 2 vuoden kokemusta ohjelmistokehitystehtävistä
 
 - näyttöä Front End-toteutuksista, joissa hyödynnetty esim. React, Javascript, node.js.
 
 - intoa oppia uutta ja koet front-end kehityksen omaksi jutuksesi
 
 - kykyä saattaa asioita valmiiksi sovitussa aikataulussa
 
 Lisäksi arvostamme:
 
 - kokemusta UX & UI -suunnittelusta
 
 - referenssitöitä ja harrasteprojekteja
 
 Työsuhteesi alussa tuemme sinua sisäisten koulutusten sekä henkilökohtaisen mentorin avulla, jotta pääset mahdollisimman
 nopeasti sisään talon tapoihin ja työntouhuun. Työsuhteesi on toistaiseksi voimassa oleva ja alkaa sopimuksen mukaan.
 Työpaikkasi sijaitsee Kuopion päätoimipisteessämme Viestikadulla erinomaisten kulkuyhteyksien varrella.
