Results.Heading: Lead IA & RPA Developer
Results.Descr:
Älykäs automatisoija, robottien rakentaja - paikka on sinun!

Etsimme nyt kokenutta Lead IA and RPA Developeria luomaan ohjelmistorobotiikan ja älykkään automaation ratkaisuja ja kehittämään koko tiimimme toimintaa entisestään. Tuemme efimalaisia tasapainoisessa (työ)elämässä : sinulla on vapaus valita, kuinka paljon haluat työskennellä etänä ja kuinka paljon toimistoillamme Helsingin ydinkeskustassa Kaivopihalla tai Tampereen Tulli Business Parkissa. 

Mitä teet
Kehität ja toteutat ohjelmistorobotiikan ja älykkään automaation ratkaisuja mm. UiPath Studiolla. Vastaat asiantuntijan roolissa vaihtelevissa asiakasprojekteissa niin määrittelyvaiheen teknisestä tuesta kuin myös kokonaisratkaisun suunnittelusta. Ratkaisujen toteutus, laadunvarmistus sekä ylläpidon hallittavuus kuuluvat tehtäviisi
Vastaat ohjelmistorobotiikkapalvelun teknisestä sisällöstä ja kehität sitä yhdessä muun tiimin kanssa edelleen.
Toimit valmentajana koko tiimille jakamalla osaamistasi ja kehittämällä tiimin toimintaa eteenpäin. Toimit muiden kehittäjien tukena, ohjaat päivittäistä työskentelyä ja kehität yhteisiä toimintatapoja. Scrum-menetelmän hallitsemisesta on etua.
Osallistut sisäisen tuotekehityksen projekteihin. Markkina muuttuu vauhdilla ja pääset mukaan uusien tuotteiden testaukseen, pilotointiin ja lanseeraukseen. Seuraat UiPathin ja muiden käyttämiemme teknologioiden kehitystä ja uutisia.
Toimit tarvittaessa myynnin tukena sekä osallistut asiantuntijana tiimin rekrytointeihin.

Mitä tuot meille
Osaamista - Sinulla on useampi vuosi kokemusta ohjelmistorobotiikasta ja/tai älykkäästä automaatiosta sekä jostain ohjelmointikielestä (esim. C#), niiden mahdollisuuksista ja rajoitteista. Ohjelmistokehitys asiakkaalle on sinulle tuttua.
Aktiivista ja itsenäistä otetta - Olet valmis tarttumaan monipuolisiin tehtäviin asiakastoimeksiannoissa ja kehitysprojekteissa. Et myöskään pelkää kantaa vastuuta. Omaksut nopeasti uusia asioita ja haluat oppia lisää. Olet kiinnostunut kehittämään itseäsi ja menestymään työssäsi.
Asennetta - Haluat tukea ja auttaa muita. Tiimin toimintatavat ja hyvä yhteistyö ovat sinulle tärkeitä asioita ja pidät työkavereiden kanssa sparraamisesta ja oman osaamisesi jakamisesta. Sinulle myös tyytyväinen asiakas on intohimo ja määränpää.

Mitä me tarjoamme sinulle
Vakituisen työsuhteen ja hyvät edut - Työsuhteesi on vakituinen, ja toimipisteesi sijaitsee joko toimistollamme Helsingin ydinkeskustassa tai Tampereen Tulli Business Parkissa. Olemme valehtelematta kaupunkien parhailla paikoilla, joten toimistopäivinä pääset nauttimaan mm. lähialueen lukuisista lounasravintoloista ja erinomaisista liikenneyhteyksistä. Meillä saat työskennellä myös etänä niin paljon kuin haluat. Huolehdimme siitä, että arkesi rullaa, työkaverisi ovat tukenasi ja työvälineesi kunnossa niin kotitoimistolla kuin konttorillakin. Lisäksi tarjoamme tietenkin henkilöstöllemme kattavat edut ja vakuutukset.
Maailmanluokan tuotteet ja palvelut - Valikoimamme on laadukas kokonaisuus IT-maailman huipputuotteita ja loistavaa asiakaspalvelua ja palvelukonsepteja. Olemme edelläkävijäyritys, jossa tukenasi ovat Suomen parhaimmistoon kuuluvat liiketoiminnan ja pilvipalveluiden kehittämisen ammattilaiset. Pääset mukaan edistämään asiakkaidemme bisnestä viimeisimmillä työkaluilla ja menetelmillä. 
Parhaat työkaverit - Meiltä löydät joukon mahtavia työkavereita, joiden kanssa aika töissä tai tapahtumissamme työajan ulkopuolella kuluu kuin siivillä. Työntekijämme nostavat ensimmäisinä esiin työilmapiirin ja yrityskulttuurimme asioiksi, jotka erottavat Efiman heidän aiemmista työpaikoistaan. 
Ainutlaatuisen yrityskulttuurin - Tavoitteenamme on olla alamme kiinnostavin ja paras työpaikka. Siksi teemmekin monet asiat eri tavalla kuin kilpailijamme ja uskomme, että kaiken takana ovat tyytyväiset työntekijät. Yrityksemme arvot elävät aidosti arjessa - niin asiakastyössä kuin sisäisessä yhteistyössäkin. Etenkin "omana itsenä" ja "yhdessä eteenpäin" ovat monille efimalaisille arvoistamme lähellä sydäntä. 
Kasvupaikan - Pääset itsenäisesti, mutta muun organisaation tuella, ottamaan vastuuta mielenkiintoisissa asiakasprojekteissa. Nopeasti muuttuva kasvuyritys tarjoaa sinulle mahdollisuuden kasvaa ja kehittyä urallasi haluamaasi suuntaan.

Mitä seuraavaksi?
Nappaa tästä itsellesi ainutlaatuinen paikka ja lähetä meille hakemuksesi, CV:si tai ajan tasalla oleva LinkedIn-profiilisi ja palkkatoiveesi viimeistään 18.9.2022. 

Lisätietoja tehtävästä antaa rekrytoiva esihenkilö Piia Kataja. Piian tavoitat parhaiten sähköpostilla piia.kataja@efima.com.

Results.Heading: Audio Programmer
Results.Descr:
Company Description

Passionate about games, programming and game audio? Interested in joining a world-class game development team working in an inclusive and friendly environment? If so, we might be looking for you! We are Ubisoft RedLynx, a studio located in Helsinki bringing console, computer, and mobile game development together under one roof. 

Job Description

We are looking for an Audio Programmer to join our team! In this role you will become the main technical contact for the development and integration of audio systems in our games. You will be collaborating with Audio Designers and Gameplay Programmers, focusing on building state-of-art audio systems around Ubisoft's game engines and Audiokinetic Wwise. On top of that, you will take an active part in defining the audio integration workflows and improving the audio implementation pipeline. You other responsibilities will include: 
Designing and developing tools for the Audio team
Supporting the Audio team in problem solving, integration and bug fixing
Ensuring scalability and reusability of audio systems across different projects
Managing technical requirements and optimizing audio in our games


Qualifications

Requirements: 
Professional experience in C++, ideally in game audio context
Experience with game audio middleware, preferably Wwise
Solid understanding of gameplay systems and passion for audio
Tools development experience
Solid debugging skills

We also appreciate: 
Experience programming customized functions for visual programming languages such as the Blueprint Visual Scripting
DSP knowledge
Experience with automation scripting in C#, Python, etc.
Experience working with WAAPI
Experience developing games for multiple platforms

We offer: 
An open, international, and massively friendly work environment full of ambitious and skilled people
Variety of games to work on: we do both inhouse projects and participate in larger developments together with other Ubisoft studios. You can even combine work on multiple projects if this is your cup of tea!
An access to acoustically treated audio rooms with 5.1 and 7.1 surround setups.
Lots of interesting opportunities to develop yourself within Ubisoft
Cozy office space 10-minute walk from the Pasila railway station and right next to Tripla!
Competitive compensation and benefits such as wide healthcare and insurances, phone benefit, lunch vouchers, free gym, free snacks, free games, parties, events... you name it :)
Good work/life balance: We take our work very seriously, but we also respect and value our employees' personal lives, that's why we have flexible working hours


Additional Information

Do not wait any longer and let us hear from you! Please send your application and CV with your salary expectation. The application period closes on 14th of September 2022 but apply now because we can't wait to meet you! If you have any questions about the position, you can contact Denis Zlobin, Lead Audio Designer at denis.zlobin@ubisoft.com. 

Ubisoft's 21,000 team members, working across more than 30 countries around the world, are bound by a common mission to enrich players' lives with original and memorable gaming experiences. Their commitment and talent have brought to life many acclaimed franchises such as Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Watch Dogs, Just Dance, Rainbow Six, and many more to come. Ubisoft is an equal opportunity employer that believes diverse backgrounds and perspectives are key to creating worlds where both players and teams can thrive and express themselves. If you are excited about solving game-changing challenges, cutting edge technologies and pushing the boundaries of entertainment, we invite you to join our journey and help us create the unknown.

Results.Heading: Embedded Software Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for an Embedded Software Developer to make our team stronger! You will be working with our amazing development team, working as a part of the team of hardware engineers, UI designers, and software developers. 



WHO WE ARE 
Nextfour Group is an experienced product development company. We design and develop products all the way from the concept idea to production. This includes hardware, embedded software, backend, and frontend. We offer the complete solution under one roof. Our revenue is about 7 million euros, and we employ 50 professionals. Our main product is the Q Experience ecosystem https://theqexperience.com/



AS AN EMBEDDED SOFTWARE DEVELOPER, YOU Write software for various types of devices, from small headless microcontroller devices to GUI devices running multicore CPUs 
Participate in the whole chain from idea, design, implementation to a final product 
Take part in developing our expertise in embedded software further 
Participate in and/or lead customer projects 


WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
Good communication skills, English skills required 
A customer-oriented mindset 
Ability to write clean code that is designed for readability and maintainability 
Experience in embedded C/C++ development (e.g. FreeRTOS, embedded Linux) 
Relevant work experience of 3+ years 


Our projects cover a wide range of technologies, which is why we appreciate a keen attitude and willingness to learn new skills. We also hope that you are familiar with agile methodologies and understand their benefits. 



WHY US 
We can offer you: 

A chance to be part of interesting high-tech projects in our Turku-based office 
A relaxed environment where you are allowed to be yourself 
Projects where your input really matters 
A wide variety of tasks that supports professional growth 
Great teammates who support each other and fun events together 
Top-notch equipment 
Flexible working hours and autonomy 


The position is permanent and full-time. Contact and let us know more about you by e-mail career@nextfour.com

Results.Heading: DevOps Developer

Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
Job Description
 
AFRY is a European leader in engineering, design, and advisory services, with a global reach. We accelerate the transition towards a sustainable society. We are 17,000 devoted experts in infrastructure, industry, energy and digitalization, creating sustainable solutions for generations to come. We have a proud Nordic heritage and with presence in over fifty countries worldwide, we have a strong global reach.

AFRY X, one of AFRY's main divisions, is a leading Nordic digitalization partner combining deep sector knowledge and capabilities within design, engineering and technology, to offer digital solutions that accelerate the sustainability transition.  AFRY X offers a range of digital services, products and advisory creating value.

AFRY Smart Forestry digital solutions, software and services form a basis for sustainable and precise forest management and yield maximization. By combining our forestry expertise and the most advanced digital solutions, we enable our clients to reach their objectives for their forest assets - in a sustainable way.

Developed in direct response to client needs, AFRY Smart Forestry experts deliver leading-edge digital solutions for forest asset measuring, modelling, simulation and optimization; tactical and strategic planning; dashboard visualization of KPIs and forecasts; communication between strategic stakeholders and empowerment of managers with robust tools to manage and process forest data.

We are looking for a Software Developer to join our team of experts working with forest inventory data building a centralized platform for ingesting and processing various data sources including drone- and satellite images as well as various public forest inventory data sets, maps etc.

You will be working closely with Data Scientists who create algorithms and processes for e.g., satellite image processing, but your main focus will be on the workload distribution and orchestration in our data platform.

As the team is quite small, you will be expected to work quite independently and proactively seek help if needed to complete your tasks.

You will be working in a virtual team with members from different parts of Finland as well as Sweden. At Smart Forestry we have two main locations: Vantaa and Riihimäki, but many of us work remotely (part or full time) so that is also an option.
 
Qualifications
 
The successful candidates should meet the following core requirements:
Developing complex, containerized, Python applications using Linux as a runtime environment.
Solid understanding of microservice architecture.
Experience working with:RabbitMQ or similar AMQP engine
FastAPI
PostgreSQL
JSON, YAML


In addition to the requirements above, it is beneficial if you have experience from the following:
Satellite image or point cloud processing
Microsoft Azure Data Factory and/or Data Bricks
 
Company Description
 
 AFRY is a European leader in engineering, design, and advisory services, with a global reach. We accelerate the transition towards a sustainable society. 

 We are 17,000 devoted experts in infrastructure, industry, energy and digitalisation, creating sustainable solutions for generations to come. 

 Making Future 
 
Additional Information
 
Benefits at AFRY

AFRY employees are supported with lunch, sports, cultural, massage and commuting benefits. During remote work and leisure AFRY employees are covered by accident insurance. If a child of an AFRY employee becomes ill, they have a right to receive help in caring for the child.

AFRY employees are active organizers of free-time clubs, and our activities range locally from crossfit to golf and from hand crafts to board games. We support free-time clubs widely and also encourage active commuting. To commute emission-free, AFRY employees in permanent employment have the right to employment bicycle. All AFRY offices offer free breakfast porridge to active commuters.

Sustainability at AFRY

Sustainability is part of AFRY's business strategy and a prerequisite for AFRY's business as a whole. We connect technologies to create sustainable progress for you. Read more here.

 AFRY is committed to creating an inclusive & diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths. Join us to accelerate the transition towards a sustainable society.

Results.Heading: Sulautettujen järjestelmien kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
"Buutilla työskentely on kuin äiti peittelisi yöksi nukkumaan" - Anonyymin buuttilaisen vastaus työhyvinvointikyselyymme. Mitä tämä kertoo Buutista? Emme ole varmoja, mutta ihan mukavaa täällä kyllä on.

Buutti on luotu alun alkaen parhaaksi mahdolliseksi työpaikaksi ohjelmistokehittäjille. Meillä voit tehdä itsesi näköistä työtä: homma sopeutuu elämäntilanteesi mukaan. Kuuntelemme toiveitasi työajan, lomien, työvälineiden ja lisäkoulutuksen suhteen. Voit työskennellä mistä päin Suomea haluat, vaikka Inarijärven rannalta.

Olemme konsulttitalo, eli meillä työskentelet asiakkaidemme projekteissa. Tarjolla on monipuolisesti erilaisia hommia, ja myyjämme etsivät koko ajan lisää. Buutilla erityistä onkin, että voit itse vaikuttaa projektivalintoihin. Jos viihdyt yhdellä asiakkaalla, voit olla siellä vaikka vuosia. Jos sen sijaan haluat kokeilla uusia tuulia ja teknologioita, se järjestyy nopealla aikataululla.

Sulautettujen järjestelmien projekteissamme pääset niin lähelle rautaa kuin haluat. Oli osaamisesi sitten Linuxin, CUDA:n tai C++:n saralla, löytyy meiltä kehittävää ja vaihtelevaa tekemistä. Tällä puolella on tarjolla esimerkiksi tietoliikenneverkkoja, terveydenhuollon laitteita tai itseohjautuvia kulkupelejä.

Mukavassa työympäristössä viihtyvät erinomaiset koodarit. Buuttilaiset ovat työssään sanalla sanoen hyviä. Laadukkaasti toteutettu koodi on meille kunnia-asia, eivätkä buuttilaiset oikaise suunnittelussa tai toteutuksessa.

Vaadittava osaaminen

Vahva osaaminen sulautettujen järjestelmien kehittämisessä
Hyvä osaaminen C:ssä, Embedded Linuxissa tai C++:ssa
Kyky kyseenalaistaa, haastaa ja parantaa teknologiaratkaisuja kokonaisvaltaisesti

Eduksi katsotaan, yksi tai useampi

Robot Framework
Yocto Linux
Linux Kernel
RTOS
Python
Qt
Mikroprosessorien tuntemus
Virtualization (e.g. Docker)
Yleinen harrastuneisuus tekniikan saralla
Timanttisen biisivalinnat firman sisäiseen radioon

Palkkaus

Buutilla kehittäjän palkka muodostuu kuukausipalkasta sekä katteen mukaan maksettavasta provisiosta. Ohjelmistokehittäjän palkka on Buutilla 3500–5000 €/kk, senior-tason tehtävissä jopa 5000-8000 €/kk. Lopullinen palkkaus riippuu asiakkaan projektista ja teknologiakokemuksestasi.


Hakeminen

Kerro meille osaamisestasi ja millaisista projekteista olet kiinnostunut. Sinun ei tarvitse lähettää meille CV:täsi, vaan riittää että vastaat muutamaan nopeaan kysymykseen. Rekrytointiprosessin aikana pääset keskustelemaan rekrytoijamme ja ohjelmistokehittäjiemme kanssa. Prosessiin kuuluu myös pari koodaustehtävää. Rekryprosessimme on sujuva, mutta vaatii todellista tekniikan osaamista päästä siitä läpi.

Etsimme jatkuvasti uusia buuttilaisia joukkoomme ja haluamme tutustua sinuun mahdollisimman pian. Lähetäthän hakemuksesi kuitenkin viimeistään 22.9.!

Lisätietoa

Matilda Mustakallio
Rekrytointipäällikkö
045 7832 9415
matilda.mustakallio@buutti.com

Results.Heading: Senior Software Developer
Results.Descr:
In its over 30 years of operation, NAPA has become a global leader in developing and scaling software, services, and data analysis for a safer, smarter, and more sustainable maritime industry. NAPA operates globally, with 190 employees in ten countries in Europe, Asia and the Americas. To date, NAPA has 420 user organizations for its design solutions, nearly 3,000 installations onboard vessels and a growing number of subscribers for its cloud-based fleet services.

We are now looking for an experienced Software Developer to join our Platform Team. You could be located in Romania or Finland. The position is permanent and full-time.

What software would I develop in this role?


NAPA Design Solutions team develops ship design software. Our 3D modeling and design functionalities are the most powerful, making the ship design process the best. Built-in development and customizable capabilities enable users to automate repetitive tasks and include user-specific ship design know-how into the system. The largest shipyards in the world use our software.

The role – what would you do?


As a Senior Software Developer, your main responsibility will be the development, testing, and maintenance of our NAPA ship design solution. In this role, you will be working with .NET Desktop applications, some native libraries, third-party components, including 3D graphics library, database engines, licensing solution, etc.

The assignments and tasks in our self-managed organization can be tailored based on your competencies and interests.

What are we looking for?


The perfect fit for this role would have:

3-5+ years’ earlier experience in desktop application development
Experience with database solutions
Experience in automated testing methods
Good grasp of software reliability and maintainability


It would be a bonus if you also had:

Knowledge of computer graphics
Degree in computer science
Experience with application profiling
Your NAPA family and job locationWe have development offices in Helsinki, Finland, and Galati, Romania. You may also work remotely and flexibly.

You will work closely with your 5-member team and interact with local and global colleagues from various teams like software development, UX designers, DevOps, and sales. We speak English in all our locations.

We are a diverse family with a shared goal. Enjoying working together is one of our core values. Learning from and respecting each other provides a healthy and pleasant working environment.

We invite you to see the story of one of the team members.

NAPA as an employer


Meaningful work
We are proud to play our part in creating a sustainable world, and a career at NAPA means working with a purpose. We focus on building the best possible products for our customers, with whom we have close and long-lasting relationships. We protect the environment and human life at sea by powering safer and greener vessels with our technology.

NAPA way of working
We are a self-managed organization. Everyone is here to help and guide each other, but you’re your own boss. The core of our self-management philosophy is trust. We trust our employees to make the right decisions and take care of their personal growth. We provide several opportunities for that, and everyone can manage their own working time. You can work at the office, from home or even while abroad.

You can learn more about self-management at NAPA from our blog posts: NAPA way – new self-managed route to success.

Enjoy working together
…is one of our core values. Learning from and respecting each other provides a healthy and pleasant working environment. We, as NAPArians, share our knowledge and help each other when needed. NAPA has offices and customers around the world, and you will be able to meet people from many different cultures. We are a diverse family with a shared goal.

Read more about our people, values, and culture: https://www.napa.fi/careers

Ready to get on board and join the NAPA crew?


We kindly ask You to submit your application to us as soon as possible. The position will be filled once a suitable candidate has been found.

For more information about the position, please get in touch with Lauri Glad by e-mail: lauri.glad@napa.fi.

Results.Heading: Software Developer for Smartvatten
Results.Descr:
Software Developer for Smartvatten!

We are looking for a Developer (JavaScript) to work with product development for our client company Smartvatten. If you have a passion for software development, are familiar with JavaScript technologies, and are excited to join the sustainable journey of a rapidly growing water management service company, keep on reading and apply for the position already today!


About Smartvatten

Smartvatten is a rapidly growing water management service company with about 100 employees and operations expanding across Europe. Smartvatten´s remote monitoring service helps almost 10 000 property owners in already over 10 000 properties in 22 countries to stop flushing money down the drain and catch plumbing leaks before it’s too late.

The Smartvatten team consists of enthusiastic professionals, who take pride in continuously developing and sharing their expertise for a sustainable future.

Smartvatten offers you a key position in a financially stable technology growth company. Your work will have a direct impact on the success of the business and the preservation of one of the most precious natural resources, water.


About the position

In this position, your main task is to maintain and develop the Smartvatten technology based on requirements and feedback from our customers worldwide according to our growth strategy guidelines and targets. At Smartvatten, some of the technologies they use are Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, Javascript, React, NodeJs, MongoDB, and MySQL, but we don't expect you to know all of them.

You’ll enjoy the ultimate support from our R&D team and other smartvattenians across the globe, with experience from the fast-growing business and technology companies. The job satisfaction of Smartvatten team members is measured systematically, and it keeps hitting high rates! You can work remotely or at any Smartvatten office at Espoo, Kokkola, and Tampere.


Who are you?

For you to succeed in this role, you already have some experience in software development, and you are familiar with Javascript. You can be experienced with Front-end and UI/UX design, but we wish that you have also experience in Full Stack development. Knowledge of Google Cloud, Docker/Kubernetes, Javascript / React, NodeJs, MongoDB / MySQL is an advantage in this position. We appreciate your ability to work independently and proactively. We expect you to communicate clearly in English and in Finnish and hold a passion for software development and problem-solving.

If you can recognize yourself in the following, you might be the one we are looking for:

Previous experience in modern software development
Strong knowledge of Javascript
Experience in Full Stack especially Front-End development would be an appreciated
Strong verbal and written English and Finnish language skills
Ability to operate both individually and in groups



Start date: According to the agreement

Working hours: Full time

Duration: Permanent

Location: Espoo, Kokkola, Tampere, or remote

Salary: According to the agreement 

If you recognized yourself, apply already today! We will proceed with the recruitment process as soon as possible. If you have any questions regarding the recruitment process, please send us an e-mail at info@qasvu.com and we will get back to you shortly.

Results.Heading: Shift Lead BURGER KING, First-Level Manager Degree Programme, Pirkanmaa
Results.Descr:
Gap year incoming and looking for new challenges? Join our team as a shift leader through our first-level manager degree program! There's really only one requirement: that you are a nice person. Who has a suitable amount of leadership and customer service potential. 

What is working as a Restaurant Manager/Assistant Restaurant Manager/Shift Leader like? Check out [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IZYG-lmFz5T0k1EhXfZr2C_AZxqHHMaQ/view) #kingiduuni #burgerking #tiktok

We are looking for a Shift Leaders in the Tampere Region to make sure that the work of the king team is running, and customer service goes as smoothly as possible. You can get a qualification in first-level management while working in our team, and get valuable work experience in the meantime. The position is indefinite with 75-112,5h/3 weeks. And work begin as soon as the right person is found.

What does the program offer?

First-Level Manager Degree Programme is held in cooperation with Ava-Akatemia. During the program you'll learn managing the customer experience, building a profitable operation, guiding your team rousingly, strategic thinking and the leading style of your own.

The education is free, and most of the study related tasks are completed at work. At work, you'll get to practice your common skills such as working under pressure and prioritizing while getting experience for your studies and work! You'll get a personal tutor from the restaurant who will help you to further your studies. If you want to apply for further studies after graduating from our program, you can still continue working as a shift lead during the new studies.

Learn more about the program [here!](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ax5KcRBTL7hHM88qfeEO5q42srKh8tf8/view)

What else can we offer?

At Burger King, we're focusing on having people that are pleasant to be around. And that's why we are searching for nice people to join our king team. Your king attitude will make up for lack of experience since we will have a thorough training for the Restaurant Manager/Assistant Restaurant Manager/Shift Leader position.

We offer you not only the opportunity to take responsibility and the next step in your career, but also the opportunity to have fun and enjoy good company. You also get to be a part of our bonus system designed for our managers/shift leaders.

What are the expectations?

Above all, we are looking for a relaxed and open-minded person who is also determined with a managerial and with a problem-solving attitude. And since there is always the success of the whole king team behind a successful day, the creation of king team spirit is one of your most important tasks. Previous work experience or training is not necessary, and both Finnish and English are suitable as working languages.

There are many kinds of kings.

A nice person is always a nice person, and when you work with them, you can learn one thing or another, even useful things for your future career can be learned from customer service and teamwork. In addition to kitchen skills, also creative problem solving, interaction skills and suchlike.

Barona works in co-operation in the recruitment and depending on your working hours, you will be employed by either Barona or Restel.

Burger King is part of Restel, a financially stable Finnish restaurant company with approximately 200 restaurants that employs more than 2,500 food service industry professionals. Restel's food and beverage restaurants are widely spread from Helsinki to Rovaniemi, and there are many job opportunities available throughout the country. 

Restel's employees have amazing work benefits! Among other things, you'll get substantial discounts on our restaurants' food and beverage products, sports and cultural benefits, Shell and ST1 fuel discounts, significant benefits from Scandic hotel accommodation and food, and you'll be included in a comprehensive work benefit program that will give you discounts and benefits on dozens of different products and services. 

By working at Restel, you also play a part in corporate responsibility, as Tradeka, owned by Restel, distributes millions of euros annually to sustainability projects.

Results.Heading: Full Stack Developer for Viivi Health
Results.Descr:
Viivi Health is a video conference tool for therapists, vets and their patients. Its not everyday you get to revolutionize the healthcare sector with your own hands, so apply now! 
 
 About the role
 
 Were looking for a full stack developer to take Viivi Health to the future. Your work would include architecturing our JS-based SDK that is used in both mobile and web, solving connection issues, implementing new authentication methods and perfecting the UX.
 
 Our team is small so you will have a lot of freedom and ownership. You can work fully remote from anywhere in the European Union or one of our offices in Finland and in Norway.
 
 To succeed in this role, you will need
 
 - Frontend skills (React). TypeScript is highly preferred. Were also using libraries such as WebRTC, socket.io and MobX.
 
 - Backend technologies such as NodeJS and PostgreSQL.
 
 - Knowledge that Safari is the new IE.
 
 - Cloud technologies would be helpful. We use GCP (Cloud Run and Kubernetes).
 
 - Excellent communication skills in English.

Who we are
 
 Nordhealth (OB:NORDH) is the leading provider of cloud-based practice management software (PMS) to therapy and veterinary professionals.
 
 Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Nordhealth has a solid footprint in the Nordic region and a growing presence internationally, with more than 400 employees working either remotely or from offices (collaboration hubs). For more details visit the companys website at nordhealth.com (https://nordhealth.com/).
 
 Nordhealth is a leading therapy practice management solution provider in Finland and in Norway. Our mission is to leverage the power of software and design to help healthcare professionals save time so they can focus on what matters most-delivering great care, great experiences, and growing their business.
 
 Over the last three years, we have grown our ARR and team size by almost 10x. Today, more than 30,000 therapy and veterinary professionals use our software everyday to help treat over 20 million patients annually across 25 countries. Its been an exciting growth journey so far and we are just getting started.
 
 Our mission is to enable healthcare professionals to deliver better patient care through software, with a goal to help serve over 200 million patients by 2030. In support of this growth mission, in May 2021, Nordhealth raised 120M through a public-listing on Euronext Growth Oslo stock exchange.
 
 What we offer
 
 - The chance to work in a meaningful industry and in a fast-growing, global company on a path to changing digital healthcare
 
 - Talented and engaged colleagues in an international environment
 
 - Possibility to work fully remotely, or at one of our offices
 
 - Good work/life balance with flexible working hours
 
 - Learning platforms and training for all of our employees
 
 - Internet and phone bills covered
 
 - Several perks
 
 - Choose your own equipment, such as laptop, phone, and headphones
 
 - Remote support to help you set up your home office if you choose to work remotely
 
 - Opportunities for personal and professional growth
 
 - Social events (brunches, team building, parties, company trips)

 WWW-osoite  https://nordhealth.com/

Results.Heading: Backend Developer (C#), Glaston
Results.Descr:
Take your next career step at Glaston, as a member of development and innovation organization building cutting edge and intelligent glass processing machinery for our customer. We are looking for a Software Engineer, Control Systems to our team in Tampere. You will help your team to deliver on its goals by solving complex real-world engineering problems in your daily work. Does this sound like you? Apply as soon as possible since we will be moving forward with candidates continuously.

About the role

Glaston is looking for a new colleague who will be working in a cross-functional setup and cooperate with other software engineers and quality assurance engineers, as well as, with various internal stakeholders. In this job you ensure agreed content and quality are successfully delivered on time and cost. You work in collaboration with other developers and analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve issues together. This position offers you interesting and challenging work tasks as well as professional development in a great team.

You are offered
• The right tools to succeed in your position
• Opportunity to gain expertise, alongside a team of top technology professionals
• Communication with various stakeholders
• Challenging tasks as a part of an innovative and forward-thinking company

Job duties
• Analyze the requirements of a new product items and execute to delivery
• Design, test and develop the software to meet the product needs
• Create system architecture diagrams, flowcharts, and models
• Perform analyses to troubleshoot issues, debug problems, and understand performance of deployed software
• Ensure continued functionality of our application during maintenance and deployment of software

We are looking for
• MSc. or BSc. on automation, software development or equivalent
• Practical experience in normal software development tools and processes
• Some knowledge in programming languages, especially C#
• Fluent in English both written and spoken

As a person you are...
• Curious and always willing to learn
• Confident communicator with strong problem-solving skills
• Have a positive attitude towards new challenges

Other information
• Start: According to contract
• Work extent: Permanent contract with Academic Work
• Location: Tampere
• Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work. It is a request from Glaston that all questions regarding the position are handled by Academic Work.

Our selection process is continuous, and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

Client information

Glaston Corporation is a frontrunner in glass processing technologies and services. We respond globally to the most demanding glass processing needs of the architectural, solar, appliance and automotive industries. Additionally, we utilise emerging technologies that integrate intelligence and sustainability to glass. We are committed to providing our clients with both the best know-how and the latest technologies in glass processing. Glaston's shares (GLA1V) are listed on NASDAQ Helsinki Ltd. Further information is available at Glaston

Results.Heading: SW Developer - Tietoevry Care
Results.Descr:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile. 

 About us 

As the leading supplier of integrated solutions for healthcare providers in the Nordics, Tietoevry has years of experience in digitalizing the industry. Our mission is to support healthcare professionals in providing better care, help healthcare organizations improve their efficiency and empower citizens to actively participate in their care. As the market leader in Finland, our DynamicHealth team in Tietoevry Care is developing and delivering a healthcare information system to private healthcare providers in Finland. 

We are now looking for  a SW Developer  to work with Tietoevry's private healthcare products. In this role, you will have the key role in implementing our healthcare information systems different APIs together with our customers and contribute to our product development. Therefore, your key tasks will include implementing different REST and SOAP APIs in Visual Studio.

 To rock this position 
You have C# and SQL knowledge
You have several years of experience implementing SOAP and REST APIs
To thrive in our dynamic and constantly changing working environment, you are a true customer champion, empathic collaborator and curious self-leader
As a customer champion, you focus your energy and passion towards customer excellence, never compromising the quality of our work
You play to make the whole Tietoevry team win, sharing knowledge and seeking for feedback and dialogue
You also proactively set goals for yourself and curiously aim to discover how to change the world


 What's in it for you? 

In this role you'll have a possibility to define and contribute to how healthcare professionals will work and how they are managing their business in private healthcare. In addition, w e offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you an opportunity to create the future of a growing, fast developing and important sector. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge. 

 Join us and make your mark! 

Did we get you inspired? Please send your application already today as we proceed with the applications on a continuous basis. For additional information about the role, please contact hiring manager Timo Heikkilä ( timo.j.heikkila@tietoevry.com ). We look forward to hearing from you!

About Tietoevry

Tietoevry   creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, wework with our customers to develop digitalfutureswhere businesses, societies, and humanity thrive. 

Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of   enterprise   and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries.   Tietoevry's   annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company's shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo   Børs .

Results.Heading: .NET Developers - Tietoevry Care
Results.Descr:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile. 

Are you a curious and engaged software developer and want to create great software solutions for the healthcare and social care sector in the Nordics? Then this is the role for you! 

Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We put citizens and patients at the center, simplifying everyday life for all. We're the leading healthcare and welfare IT provider in the Nordics, with over 40 years of Nordic well-being expertise.

This extensive experience and our close cooperation with our customers give us a strong foundation to further enhance healthcare and welfare services at the individual, regional, and national levels. At Tietoevry Care organization you are part of an international team that develops and delivers high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care. 

We are now looking for Software Developers skilled in Microsoft technologies to work in Tietoevry Care's Health Village and Epidemia management solutions customer delivery. Health Village application development is a customer delivery for Hospital District of Helsinki and Uusimaa (HUS), which is coordinating a joint national effort of all five university hospitals in Finland. Health Village offers digital healthcare services to citizens and health professionals. 

With us you can influence citizen and patient lives, and the whole society through modern healthcare information technology and digitalization. You can read more about Health Village here https://www.digitalhealthvillage.com/ or in Finnish https://www.terveyskyla.fi/ 

Who we are looking for 
 Strong competencies in coding, including several years of work experience with Microsoft technologies (.NET/ .NET Core / C#) 
 Experience in using and designing Azure cloud services 
 Experience in technical design 
 Passion for future technologies and their ability to improve lives 
 Understanding, interest and experience in agile way of working 
 High appreciation for customer experience 
 Finnish language proficiency 


As a person, we believe you are a team player who takes action and demonstrates responsibility to organize your work and solve your tasks. With our agile end-to-end development process, you will continue to both learn from, and coach your colleagues, so communication is important for us. Technology is developing fast, so learning new cutting-edge technologies is something you strive to do.

We also appreciate 
 Experience or special interest in healthcare 
 Experience in microservices and API gateway 
 Experience in clean architecture, CQRS and domain-driven design 
 Experience in modern RESTful API design 
 Experience in DevOps solutions 
 Experience in Angular / ReactJS 
 A degree in information technology 


What's in it for you?

We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, open culture and an outstanding work-life balance! We offer you an opportunity to create the future of a growing, fast developing and important sector. We believe that our company culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge. 

Did we get you inspired?

We look forward to your application! Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the hiring manager Kristiina Väisänen, kristiina.vaisanen@tietoevry.com 

Hope to hear from you soon!

Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies. 

Tietoevry thrives with diversity, and we welcome applicants of all genders, ages, abilities, ethnicities, orientations, beliefs, and backgrounds. 

 About Tietoevry 

Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we  work with our customers to develop digital  futures  where businesses, societies, and humanity  thrive. 

Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. About our team

Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We put citizens and patients at the center, simplifying everyday life for all, and providing the tools required to transition towards increased self-and preventive care and lower cost-of-care settings.

At Tietoevry Care's Data & Analytics unit we are reshaping healthcare and welfare services by providing our customers with advanced data-driven applications, AI solutions and cloud data platforms. Our Data & Analytics team consists of high-end professionals working in data science, data engineering, data advisory, cloud solutions, security, and software development. We are a growing international team of talented, continuously improving experts. With us you get to work with latest technologies, innovative new solutions and create wellbeing for the society.

Your contribution and background

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to join our Health & Care projects. You will have a key role in developing and designing services and solutions for eg. our Tietoevry Data Platform in Azure and Big Data environment. You will be working in a diverse team consisting of top-level developers and customer's experts. Your tasks and assignments would be jointly tailored according to you background and interests.

We expect you to have
Hands-on experience in relevant techs eg. React, Typescript, Node.js, GraphQL, Postgres, Elasticsearch, Azure
Strong willingness to learn, improve and explore
Passion to build great products and solve complex customer problems
Confidence to take responsibility, honesty and openness as a member of a team


We are often working from different places, sites and countries so we expect communications skills and habits in Finnish and English.

What we are proud of

The health and care industries are undergoing huge changes and the opportunities with digitalization of healthcare services are tremendous.

In addition to meaningful projects we offer you professional growth, open culture and an outstanding work-life balance. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge. 

Join us and  make your mark!

Teemme yhteistyötä suoraan loppuasiakkaiden kanssa sekä konsulttipositioissa. Sydämemme on kuitenkin omassa tuotekehityksessä sekä yleiskäyttöisessä palvelualustassamme, jonka avulla tarjoamme asiakkaillemme kustannustehokkaita kokonaisratkaisuja.

Results.Heading: Backend Developer
Results.Descr:
And the developer said: "Let there be back-end" - and there was back-end.

Some years ago, our developers noted that our customers' back-ends were not as good as they could be, and thus began our journey to the cloud. We now have a growing back-end team and we are looking for new colleagues to join us! 

But first, quickly about Qvik. We are a consulting company, 100% owned and run by Qvikies. We design, develop and consult our clients - resulting in digital solutions with real measurable value. We have left our mark e.g. in finance, travel, media, healthcare, gaming, telecom and logistics industries. We are a group of 100+, tech-curious, fun loving problem-solvers who enjoy not only working together but battling each other in megazone or raising a toast in the company Oktoberfest. 

Now back to the back-end. You would join a team of 15+ developers focusing on designing and implementing meaningful products for end users. We work with infrastructure, microservices and scalable systems to help our clients build payment systems, efficient data pipelines, and cloud adoptions to name a few. Being consultants and experts in our field, we also discuss the best technology choices and solutions with our clients, as early as the sales phase of the project. 

Key technologies we are using: Python, Node.js, TypeScript, Golang, Java, AWS, GCP, Kubernetes, Docker...
 
Your background & skills:

Our team appreciates communication skills - the ability to discuss and listen, give and receive feedback. Curiosity and the capacity to learn. Willingness to share your knowledge. These qualities not only make you a good colleague but also help with understanding the needs of our customers. In addition to developing or helping out our sales team to define projects, you could be mentoring your teammates or sharing your expertise at our company guilds or in meetups. You've worked with agile methodologies and have good English language skills.

Technically we are looking for solid software development skills in modern cloud platforms. Our development environments are often in GCP or AWS using languages such as Python, JavaScript (Node.js), Go or Java. We hope that you would also have skills such as building CI/CD pipelines and automating cloud deployments. 

If you are already an experienced, senior-level developer, you will have opportunities to take more responsibility and a leading role in our projects. 

What we offer

Our benefits package is pretty nice, with the work equipment of your choice; lunch, commuter, culture and sports benefits; occupational health care with extra health insurance; travel and accident insurance; company-paid massages; and many company-supported sports and hobby possibilities with other Qvikies.

In addition, we offer our low-hierarchy culture; flexible working hours; support, and time for developing your skills, e.g. a chance to allocate 10% of your working time to it. 

If you want to hear more about this opportunity, get in touch with our TA Team: Mariella Merikallio (mariella.merikallio@qvik.fi), Tia Suokas (tia.suokas@qvik.fi) or Jari Sandström (jari.sandstrom@qvik.fi). And if you're into reading, you can learn more about our backend work, team & recruitment process. 

Please apply through our recruitment system to ensure that all personal information is handled accordingly.

Results.Heading: Junior Software Developer
Results.Descr:
Hei uran alkuvaiheessa oleva devaaja, tule Duunitorille kehittämään Suomen suurinta työnhakupalvelua!

Oletko vastavalmistunut koodari tai hankkinut alan osaamista muuta kautta? Luonnistuuko sinulta nettisivujen koodaaminen? Entä haluatko kehittää Suomen suurinta työnhakupalvelua, joka vaikuttaa aidosti tuhansien ihmisten arkeen? Jos vastasit kyllä, meillä on sinulle töitä! Etsimme nimittäin tiimiimme kahta uutta Junior Software Developeria.

Millaisesta  työstä on kyse?

Duunitorin Junior Software Developerina vastaat yhdessä tiimisi kanssa Suomen suurimman työnhakupalvelun teknisestä kehittämisestä. Duunitorin alustan lisäksi pääset tekemään töitä ruotsalaisen sisarpalvelumme Jobblandin parissa. Vaikka Duunitorilla keskitytään yhteen tuotteeseen, meillä on jatkuvasti käynnissä useita alustaamme liittyviä kehityshankkeita. Et siis ajaudu ylläpitämään yhtä softapalikkaa vuosiksi, vaan  pääset suunnittelemaan ja toteuttamaan täysin uusia ominaisuuksia työnhakupalveluumme.

Junior Devaajana opit varmasti uutta kokeneempien tiimiläistesi tuella. Meillä on tarvetta frontti- ja bäkkidevaajien lisäksi dataosaajille, eli voit kehittää osaamistasi haluamaasi suuntaan. Työskentely meillä on vapaata, eli sinulla on mahdollisuus vaikuttaa siihen, miten ja millä teknologioilla hommia tehdään. Tämänhetkinen stäkkimme koostuu mm. seuraavista teknologioista: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, React ja Vue. 

Mikä Duunitori on?

Duunitori on paitsi Suomen suurin työnhakupalvelu ja maan liikennöidyin rekrytointimedia, myös yksi nopeimmin kasvavista teknologiayrityksistä Suomessa. Kasvamme jatkuvasti ja tähtäämme myös maailmalle. Toimimmekin jo Ruotsissa nimellä Jobbland.

Me Duunitorilla haluamme toteuttaa ihmisten ja yritysten unelmia. Pyrimme siihen tarjoamalla työnhakualustat sekä Suomessa että Ruotsissa (duunitori.fi ja jobbland.se), kattavan sosiaalisen median verkoston sekä erilaisia rekrytointiin ja työnantajakuvaan liittyviä kampanja- ja sisältöratkaisuja, jotta työntekijöiden ja työnantajien olisi helppoa kohdata toisensa. 

Lisäksi olemme työelämän muutosvoima. Edistämme esimerkiksi helpompaa työnhakua, palkka-avoimuutta ja monimuotoisuutta.

Alustallamme on viikoittain n. 3,5 miljoonaa sivulatausta, ja sosiaalisen median kanaviemme kautta tavoitamme 700 000 seuraajaa. Meillä pääset siis vaikuttamaan isosti suomalaisiin työmarkkinoihin.

Ketä etsimme?

Tehtävä sopii parhaiten vastavalmistuneelle tai opintojen loppusuoralla olevalle kehittymishaluiselle tekijälle. Voit olla esimerkiksi tietojenkäsittelyn tai ohjelmistotekniikan AMK-insinööri tai IT-tradenomi. Yhtä oikeaa opintotaustaa ei ole, vaan pääasia on, että olet joko opinnoissasi tai harrastusten kautta ollut tekemisissä ohjelmoinnin kanssa. 

Sinulla ei tarvitse vielä olla alan työkokemusta, mutta odotamme sinulta olemassa olevia näyttöjä koodaamisesta.

Toivomme sinulta osaamista seuraavista:

✅ Nettisivujen koodaaminen itsenäisesti 

✅ HTML, CSS ja Javascript

✅ Suomi ja englanti: kansainvälistymisemme myötä tarvitset molempia kieliä työssäsi

Ilahdumme, jos sinulla on lisäksi osaamista jostakin näistä (ei kuitenkaan pakollista!):

📍 React, Vue

📍 Python tai vastaava

📍 Versiohallinta: Git/GitHub

Millainen tiimi sinua odottaa?

Lähimmiksi työkavereiksesi saat viidestä muusta devaajasta koostuvan tiimin sekä kymmenhenkisen tuotekehitystiimin. Tukenasi on tietenkin koko Duunitorin työyhteisö, johon kuuluu jo noin 90 henkeä.

Kulttuurissamme vaalimme yhteisöllisyyttä ja innostumme uusista ideoista. Juhlistamme onnistumisia, ja tarjolla on monenlaista yhteistä tekemistä, kuten pelailua, kulttuuria ja jokaviikkoisia treenejä ammattivalmentajan johdolla.

Millainen työpaikka Duunitori on?

Teemme töitä yhteisöohjautuvasti, eli tiimit tekevät työtään koskevia päätöksiä itsenäisesti. Saat työhösi kunnon perehdytyksen ja työkavereiden tuen, mutta on myös tärkeää, että osaat organisoida työtäsi sekä kysyä oma-aloitteisesti apua.

Teemme töitä projektien mukaan vaihtelevissa tiimeissä, ja siksi tarvitset halua ja kykyä tehdä yhteistyötä monenlaisten työkavereiden kanssa.

Duunitori on kasvuyritys, ja etsimme jatkuvasti uusia ratkaisuja sekä työnhakijoiden että työnantajien tarpeisiin. Muutos on siis vakio ja kasvu nopeaa. Viihdyt meillä, jos et säikähdä vauhdikasta menoa.

Olemme jo ansainneet paikkamme Suomen suurimpana työnhakupalveluna, mutta emme ole vielä valmiita. Siksi emme odota sitä sinultakaan. Lupaamme, että Duunitorilla sinulla on mahdollisuus kehittyä ja kehittää – sekä firmaa että työelämää. Meillä sinun ei tarvitse jäädä jumiin yhteen tehtävään, vaan saat tarttua itseäsi isompiin haasteisiin, jos siltä tuntuu.

Viihtyisä toimistomme sijaitsee Helsingin Sörnäisissä, ja ensi vuoden aikana muutamme upouusiin tiloihin Hakaniemeen. Teemme töitä joustavasti toimistolla ja etänä. Tiimit sopivat keskenään, missä työskentelevät. Toivomme, että olet valmis olemaan läsnä toimistolla noin puolet työajasta.
 
Lue artikkelista lisää Duunitorista työpaikkana.

Entä palkka ja muut edut?

Kuukausipalkkasi tulee olemaan 2 800–3 400 €. Tarkka palkka määräytyy osaamisesi ja kokemuksesi perusteella. Saat käyttöösi valintasi mukaiset työvälineet, 500 euron etätyövälinebudjetin sekä ePassille vuosittain reilusti saldoa, jota voit käyttää niin lounaisiin, hyvinvointiin, kulttuuriin kuin työmatkoihinkin.

Saimmeko sinut kiinnostumaan? Toivottavasti kuulemme sinusta pian!

Olemme tehneet työn hakemisen sinulle helpoksi: vastaa vain muutamaan alla olevaan kysymykseen ja jätä yhteystietosi, niin olemme sinuun yhteydessä. Aloita hakeminen helposti ilmoituksen loppuun scrollaamalla.

Jos haluat jutella työstä tai Duunitorista tarkemmin, tuleva kollegasi Petri kertoo mielellään lisää! Hänet tavoitat numerosta +358 440 422 294 tai osoitteesta petri@duunitori.fi.

Tässä vielä tiedoksesi alustava aikataulu rekrytointiprosessille:

📅 Hakuaika päättyy sunnuntaina 11.9. Käymme hakemuksia läpi jo hakuaikana.

🧑‍💻 Viikoilla 35–37 lähetämme osalle hakijoista ennakkotehtävän. Tämän tekemiseen arvioimme sinulta kuluvan noin 2–4 h, ja aikaa palautukselle saat noin viikon.

💬 Viikoilla 36–38 tapaamme haastatteluvaiheeseen valittuja hakijoita toimistollamme Sörnäisissä tai etänä.

🤝 Rekrytointipäätökset on tarkoitus tehdä syyskuun loppuun mennessä. Pidämme sinut ajan tasalla rekrytoinnin etenemisestä myös ennen lopullisia päätöksiä.

Results.Heading: Java-kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Buutti on tehty kehittäjiä varten. Meillä et joudu järjestelemään elämääsi työtä varten, vaan Buutti joustaa elämäntilanteesi mukaan. Kuuntelemme toiveitasi projektien, työajan, lomien, työvälineiden ja lisäkoulutuksen suhteen. 

Olemme konsulttitalo, eli meillä työskentelet asiakkaidemme projekteissa. Tarjolla on monipuolisesti erilaisia hommia, ja myyjämme etsivät koko ajan lisää. Buutilla erityistä onkin, että voit itse vaikuttaa projektivalintoihin. Jos viihdyt yhdellä asiakkaalla, voit olla siellä vaikka vuosia. Jos sen sijaan haluat kokeilla uusia tuulia ja teknologioita, se järjestyy nopealla aikataululla.

Rekryprosessimme on ollut aina teknisesti vaativa: vain todelliset osaaja pääsevät siitä läpi. Voit siis luottaa siihen, että muutkin buuttilaiset ovat todella kovan tason koodareita. Heiltä saat tarvittaessa myös neuvoja niin työasioissa kuin vapaa-ajan projekteissakin.

Vaadittava osaaminen



Vahva Java ja olio-ohjelmointiosaaminen
Kokemusta Java 8:sta tai uudemmista versioista
Intohimo ohjelmointiin: haluat nähdä maailman, jossa on parempaa koodia


Kyky kyseenalaistaa, haastaa ja parantaa teknologiaratkaisuja kokonaisvaltaisesti


Eduksi katsotaan



SQL ja tietokantaosaaminen
DevOps
Docker
Pilviympäristöt (Azure, AWS)
Yleinen harrastuneisuus tekniikan saralla


Hyvät biisiehdotukset firman sisäiseen radioon.


Palkkaus

Buutilla kehittäjän palkka muodostuu kuukausipalkasta sekä katteen mukaan maksettavasta provisiosta. Ohjelmistokehittäjän palkka on Buutilla 3500–5000 €/kk, senior-tason tehtävissä jopa 5000-8000 €/kk. Lopullinen palkkaus riippuu asiakkaan projektista ja teknologiakokemuksestasi.

Hakeminen

Kerro meille osaamisestasi ja millaisista projekteista olet kiinnostunut. Sinun ei tarvitse lähettää meille CV:täsi, vaan riittää että vastaat muutamaan nopeaan kysymykseen. Rekrytointiprosessin aikana pääset keskustelemaan rekrytoijamme ja ohjelmistokehittäjiemme kanssa. Prosessiin kuuluu myös pari koodaustehtävää. Rekryprosessimme on sujuva, mutta vaatii todellista tekniikan osaamista päästä siitä läpi.

Etsimme jatkuvasti uusia buuttilaisia joukkoomme ja haluamme tutustua sinuun mahdollisimman pian. Lähetäthän hakemuksesi kuitenkin viimeistään 21.9.!

Lisätietoa

Matilda Mustakallio
Rekrytointipäällikkö
+358 45 783 29415
matilda.mustakallio(at)buutti.com

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehityksen rooleja, 12 paikkaa Varsinais-Suomessa
Results.Descr:
Koodista riittää tekemistä – löydä uusi työ ohjelmistokehityksen parista, Code Academyn avulla!

Kiinnostaako sinua koodaus, softakehitys, pilvipalvelut tai vaikkapa DevOps? Etsitkö väylää suunnata kohti ohjelmistoalan tehtäviä? Koodaa urasi seuraava kappale Code Academy -rekrytoivaan koulutusohjelmaan ja vie osaamisesi uudelle tasolle. Aloita uusi työ koulutuksen kautta kasvualalla, jossa tekemistä riittää.

Mikäli haluat hyödyntää tulevassa työssäsi hyvää ongelmanratkaisukykyä ja kasvattaa samalla koodausosaamistasi, tämä on mahdollisuutesi! Tarjoamamme uramahdollisuudet eivät rajoitu pelkästään yhteen muottiin, vaan voit suunnata taustastasi ja mielenkiinnon kohteistasi riippuen mm. frontin, backin, pilviteknologioiden tai DevOpsin pariin.

Tekijöidensä näköisiä paikkoja – rooleja uraansa aloitteleville ja kokeneemmille tekijöille

Useat Varsinais-Suomen alueen yhteistyöyrityksemme hakevat nyt uusia osaajia erilaisiin ohjelmistokehityksen, järjestelmien, tietokantojen sekä IT-projektien asiantuntijatehtäviin. Uusia osaajia Academyn kautta etsivät mm. Devikone, Sensoan, Digia, Mediconsult, BCB Medical, Logisystems sekä Mirion Technologies. Koodi taipuu kauttamme moneen ja rooleja on useita ja eritasoisia – voitkin siis olla taustaltasi jo kokeneempi asiantuntija, urasi alkutaipaleella oleva tekijä tai alalle suuntaava uusi osaaja. 

Ohjelmointi on ongelmanratkaisua, dialogia, järkeilyä ja tiimityötä, mutta ennen kaikkea se on oikeanlaista asennetta. Yhteistyöyrityksemme etsivät riveihinsä motivoituneita ja oman asiantuntijuuden syventämisestä innostuneita uusia tekijöitä. Sinun ei välttämättä tarvitse olla vielä hakuvaiheessa valmis asiantuntija – me autamme sinua kasvamaan uuteen rooliisi! 

Tehtävät vaihtelevat yrityskohtaisesti ja rooleja muokataan mahdollisuuksien mukaan hakijoiden osaamisen ja mielenkiintojen mukaisesti. Kerro siis meille, mikä sinua eniten kiinnostaa!
 
Ohjelman kautta voit suunnata esimerkiksi seuraaviin tehtäviin:



Ohjelmistokehittäjä tai -suunnittelija
IT-projektipäällikkö
Sovellus- tai järjestelmäasiantuntija
Software Engineer
Front-end -kehittäjä
Web-Developer
UI/UX -kehittäjä
Back-end Developer
IT-tukihenkilö


Uusien osaajien rekrytointi tapahtuu Code Academy-RekryKoulutuksen kautta. Sen avulla pääset kehittymään kasvualan asiantuntijaksi uusien työtehtävien myötä. Samalla kasvatat asiantuntijuuttasi alan huippujen kouluttamana niiden taitojen parissa, joista työnantajat kilpailevat. Koulutuksen myötä pääset vaikuttamaan työurasi suuntaan ja siihen, miltä seuraava roolisi voisi näyttää. Lue koulutuksesta ja avoimista rooleista lisää Sarasen sivuilta. 

Näissä tehtävissä olet omimmillasi jos esimerkiksi:



Olet analyyttinen tekijä ja nautit ongelmanratkaisusta
Olet tiedonjanoinen ja haluat pysyä ajan tasalla viimeisimmistä teknologioista ja ratkaisuista
Omaat (mahdollisesti) aiempaa osaamista ja ymmärrystä esim. ohjelmistokehityksestä, -testauksesta, IT-alalta, pilvipalveluista, käyttöliittymäsuunnittelusta tai järjestelmistä työkokemuksen, opiskelujen, harrastuksien tai muiden projektiesi kautta.
Erilaiset ohjelmistokielet, tietokannat ja teknologiat kuten herättävät sinussa innostusta ja haluat oppia lisää!
Sytyt koodauksesta ja sinua kiinnostaa teknisemmät kehitystehtävät TAI haluat hyödyntää osaamistasi asiakasrajapinnassa ja syventyä monipuolisiin suunnittelu- ja DevOps-tehtäviin


Hyvän soveltuvan koulutustaustan antaa esim. IT-alan tutkinto korkeakoulusta (tietojenkäsittely, DI, FM, insinööri) IT-tradenomi, insinööri, datanomi tai opintotason koulutus IT-alalta. Myös harrastuneisuuden kautta hankittu osaaminen on eduksi.

Code Academy RekryKoulutus on työvoimakoulutusta, joka on suunnattu työttömille ja työttömyysuhan alaisille työnhakijoille. Etsimme ennen kaikkea motivoituneita ja oman ammattitaidon kehittämisestä innostuneita uusia tekijöitä. Tavoitteemme on löytää juuri sinun taustaasi, mielenkiintoasi ja urakehitystäsi parhaiten tukeva rooli useiden yhteistyöyrityksiemme joukosta.
 
Pistä koodi laulamaan ja hae mukaan pian - viimeistään 19.9. mennessä! Hakemalla mahdollisimman ajoissa varmistat, että pääsemme tutustumaan sinuun ja tukemaan sinua prosessissasi mahdollisimman aikaisessa vaiheessa! 
 
Etenet hakuprosessissa, kun olet täyttänyt kaksi lomaketta. 

1. Täytä TE-palveluiden hakulomake 
Esivalinta koulutukseen tehdään TE-palveluiden hakemuksen tietojen perusteella, joten perustele hakemuksesi huolellisesti. Koulutusnumero: 708753

2. Täytä Sarasen osaamisprofiili tästä
Sarasen osaamisprofiili toimii käyntikorttinasi kaikkiin ohjelman rekrytoiviin yhteistyöyrityksiin, jonka kautta pääset kertomaan taustastasi, osaamisestasi ja motivaatiostasi. Profiilin avulla vähennät työpaikkojen hakuammuntaa ja hakemuksien määrää!

TE-palveluiden hakemus ja Sarasen osaamisprofiili kannattaa tehdä pikaisesti – esivalinta- ja hakuprosessi ovat jo kovaa vauhtia käynnissä! 
 
Lisätietoja ohjelmasta: 
 
Ensisijaisesti lisätietoja ohjelmasta löydät Sarasen nettisivuilta. 
 
Voit halutessasi kysyä lisää Code Academysta koulutusjärjestäjä Sarasen yhteyshenkilöltä: 
Samuel Leivo, puh. 050 414 3304, email: samuel.leivo@saranen.fi

Rekrytoiva koulutusohjelma

Code Academyssa yhdistyvät käytännön työtehtävät sekä ohjelmistoalan asiantuntijakoulutus ainutlaatuisella tavalla. Ohjelma antaa sinulle aidon mahdollisuuden vaikuttaa uraasi sekä löytää tulevan työpaikkasi. 



Koulutuksesta eväät työllistymiseen. Koulutusohjelman tärkeimpänä tavoitteena on työllistää sinut yhteistyöyritykseen 6 kuukauden ohjelman päätteeksi. Koulutus on osallistujille maksuton.
Asiantuntijuus uudelle tasolle. Code Academyyn kuuluu 28 päivää koulutusta sisältäen asiantuntijakoulutuksia ja ohjatun itsenäisen opiskelun, sekä pääset hyödyntämään oppimaasi suoraan uusissa työtehtävissäsi. Lopputuloksena kasvatat oman asiantuntijuutesi uudelle tasolle.
Ohjelma avaa useita erilaisia urapolkuja. Ohjelmistoalan osaaminen on entistä kysytympi taito ja uusista osaajista on kasvava tarve. Yritykset etsivät ohjelman kautta tekijöitä erilaisiin ja eritasoisiin rooleihin.


Valinta RekryKoulutukseen edellyttää soveltuvan yrityspaikan löytymistä. Toimit yrityksessä koulutuksen aikana ja se on myös potentiaalinen tuleva työnantajasi. Suurin osa yrityspaikoista tulee Sarasen kautta, mutta mielenkiintoista yrityspaikkaa on mahdollista etsiä myös itse. Koulutuksen ajalta voi saada työttömyysetuutta (mahdollisuus korotettuun etuuteen) ja verotonta kulukorvausta. Koulutusohjelman ensisijaisena tavoitteena on solmia ohjelman päätteeksi työsopimus yhteistyöyrityksen kanssa. Ohjelman toteuttavat tiiviissä yhteistyössä Pohjois-Pohjanmaan ELY-keskus, TE-palvelut, Saranen Consulting ja rekrytoivat yritykset.

Avainsanat: ohjelmistokehittäjä, ohjelmistokehitys, devaaja, koodari, koodaus, software development, front-end, back-end, full stack, pilviteknologiat, DevOps, Lean, HTML5, Javascript, Azure, UI, UX, Python,

Results.Heading: Embedded Software Test Developer
Results.Descr:
About the job

 It’s an exciting time to join Nordic Semiconductor as we continue our rapid growth while perusing high aspirations with committed colleagues worldwide. Working with embedded SW in agile development projects, you will be responsible for developing automated test cases and maintaining build & test automation frameworks, according to the principles of Continuous Integration.  
 
Key responsibilities
 


Investigating new SW/HW features and non-functional requirements in order to design and implement automated test cases following the Nordic defined SW Verification process
Maintaining a fully automated build-and-test system to detect failures and errors as early as possible.
Following-up on bugs and providing test evidence for further analysis by team members or other projects in Nordic, to ensure end-to-end compatibility
Programming in embedded C for the target side for test case development and in Python on the PC side for test control and automation


 
Qualifications and skills
 


Bachelor or Master in Electronics Engineering or similar 
Experience or education with embedded FW development and micro-controllers based on RTOS architecture.
Knowledge of Embedded C programming and Python
Knowledge of test infrastructure development and automation using Continuous Integration
Written and verbal communication skills in English


 
Personal skills

 We are looking for a team-oriented person with efficient collaboration skills and the ability to work with limited supervision. We hope that you are curious to learn, eager try out new things and continuously improve, while acknowledging that failure is an important part of learning. You will be part of a busy environment with constantly changed priorities and not one quiet or repetitive day.

 Working for Nordic

 Working for Nordic Semiconductor, you will be inspired and supported to develop yourself. Our teams enjoy a professional and informal working environment. We value and encourage the continuous development of skills and expertise to the highest levels. We are proud of our Norwegian heritage, our highly skilled international workforce, world-leading innovation, and professional brilliance. We offer a variety of tasks and projects, and the possibility to work alongside some of the world’s most renowned experts within their field. We encourage our employees to question the established and innovate while expecting professionalism, commitment, and the will to learn.  
 
Benefits
 


Competitive salary with short- and long-term incentive plan
Flexible working hours
Medical insurance
Family friendly policies, insurances, and benefits


 
Practical details
 


Location: Tampere or Oulu, Finland or Trondheim or Oslo, Norway


 
For more information, please contact Mrs. Shanthalakshmi at Shanthalakshmi.shankar@nordicsemi.no   Please note that this position might be subject to a background check.

Results.Heading: Full Stack Web Developer (Helsinki, Tampere)
Results.Descr:
"Hey there, it's me, Elmeri! Ya know, I came up with this killer idea!" 

Elmeri doesn't need to worry, we heard him. We are developing better services for all Elisa customers in Sites development team. 

We are now looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our multitalented team which codes the tools behind our great web presence. In this role you have a great opportunity to take a key role for improving practices for example around technical SEO, Google Tag Manager, content modeling for headless CMS and personalization. Our primary playground is the elisa.fi website, where we take care of frontend and CMS development. A significant portion of people in Finland are our customers and our websites have millions of monthly visits, so your work won't definitely go unnoticed.

But hey, what about Elmeri's killer idea?

Your daily tasks consist of analyzing new ideas coming from our stakeholders, translate them into sensible and understandable software requirements and to estimate the implementation costs. So, you're solving how Elmeri's amazing idea could be implemented agile with minimum efforts. If it's successful, then how those new features could be implemented in phases. Our team is constantly pondering for example: What is the MVP in this case? What are the most important things? What can be left out? How will the idea be implemented fast and efficient and how will it be profitable?

One of your main duties is coding. You will implement all the great killer ideas together with the team. You will guide, mentor and do code reviews, and you will contribute to testing and DevOps development. You will improve and maintain our codebase. In time you will deepen your understanding to be able to answer business requests and to evaluate how our "machinery" is working and how to optimize it.

What do we expect from you?
Solid experience in modern software development
JavaScript is very familiar to you. We think that work experience rocks, but with very intensive hobby-based knowledge in coding you could succeed as well.
Previous working experience in agile development teams
You have gained experience on mentoring, guiding and doing code reviews
Software testing skills or at least good understanding and good documentation skills
You communicate easily in English as our team is international

Here are some of the techs we're using: JavaScript, React, node.js, next.js, Kubernetes, Docker, CSS/HTML, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Contentful, various SEO tools. All the experience from these techs will benefit you but we are always looking for new techs and ways to do stuff.

Your new team

Your new team is part of Elisa Customer & Online - an agile group in Elisa's Software Services unit developing online services for our consumer customers. We are about 100 software professionals in eight teams in roles of developers, designers, testers, architects, coaches, service designers, TPOs and POs. Some of us are based in Finland and some of us work internationally. We have a good community and we are gathering quite often (when possible without restrictions) thus building trust among our team. Elisa provides us a solid foundation to continuously develop ourselves to be even more agile. What we do directly affects all Elisa's current and future customers, even though our clients are Elisa's internal units.

What can you expect from us?
Very flexible working culture regarding location and time
A position that is important - your work has a great significance for corporate social responsibility!
A good opportunity to develop yourself and to learn new things
The best teammates and caring and supporting supervisors
A long-term possibility to have ownership of the codebase, commitment to the team and development of the services
Relaxed working environment with time to develop yourself as well

Learn more about Elisa as an employer from our career pages or check out our LinkedIn.

Got interested? Apply now by clicking the link and leaving a short introduction and CV.

If in doubt, please don't hesitate to contact our Service Manager Lari (lari.laine [at] elisa.fi)

Application period starts: 2022-08-22 11:00 Application period ends: 2022-09-18 23:59

Results.Heading: Full Stack Developer, OmaElisa (Helsinki, Tampere)
Results.Descr:
Our OmaElisa development team is growing. We are now looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer. In this role you will join us on developing consumer customer service portal OmaElisa on web and mobile devices and other tools for our customer service.

Who are we? We are Elisa Customer & Online - an agile group in Elisa's Software Services unit developing online services for our consumer customers. We are about 100 software professionals in eight teams of developers, designers, testers, architects, coaches, service designers, TPOs and POs. Some of us are Finland based and some of us work internationally. We have a good community and we are gathering quite often (when possible without restrictions) thus building trust among our team. Elisa provides us a solid foundation to continuously develop ourselves to be even more agile. What we do directly affects all Elisa's current and future customers, even though our clients are Elisa's internal units.

Role description

In this role you will join our multitalented team to develop OmaElisa, our consumer customer self-service portal (omaelisa.fi). Main tasks beside the actual coding will be defining new features and splitting the requirements to user stories, further developing, improving and maintaining codebase, performing code reviews, helping in test automation and some other DevOps tasks. We expect you to be Full Stack but your focus can be more either on Frontend or Backend development. Our stack is wide, and the most used techs are Java/Scala, JavaScript/React and React Native. We expect you to have several years of experience in Java/Scala and JavaScript.

We are experimenting and analyzing data to develop new features. In our development we utilize a wide variety of DevOps tools and methods and we are always going more and more towards Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. You will benefit significantly from all kinds of experience and interest in DevOps, CI/CD and data analyzing.

Our team uses agile methodologies and we are proud of the quality of our code. You will enjoy your role if you thrive in a team environment, since we like working closely together. We expect that you have experience in guiding and mentoring others and doing code reviews. You are fully aware that testing and documentation are vital parts of software development and you do them accordingly. You're eager to explore our codebase and to weigh our working methods and you know how to push things to be solved. You are fluent in English and as our customer service portal is mostly used in Finnish, skills in Finnish will be beneficial.

What do we expect from you?
You have several years of solid experience in modern software development
Java/Scala and JavaScript are very familiar to you
You are a team player and have experience working in an agile team
When needed you foster things proactively

Here are most of the techs we're using: Java, Scala, JavaScript, React, React Native, Node.js, Openshift, Kubernetes, Docker, Robot Framework, Mocha, Conductrics, MySql, MariaDB,Firebase, Google Analytics. All the experience from these techs will benefit you but we are always looking for new techs and ways to do stuff.

What can you expect from us?
Very flexible working culture regarding location and time
A position that is important - your work has a great significance for corporate social responsibility!
A good opportunity to develop yourself and to learn new things
The best teammates and caring and supporting supervisors
A long term possibility to have ownership of the codebase, commitment to the team and development of the services
Relaxed working environment with time to develop yourself as well

Learn more about Elisa as an employer from our career pages or check out our LinkedIn.

Got interested? Apply now by clicking the link and leaving a short introduction and CV.

If in doubt please don't hesitate to contact our Service Manager Lari (lari.laine [at] elisa.fi)

 We will perform a legitimate security clearance on the chosen candidate, which in turn requires having been a resident of Finland for a good number of years before the security clearance can be done.
