We welcome applications from everyone, regardless of their race, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, medical condition, or other non-merit factors - we care for each other!

Join us!

Results.Heading: Lead Developer
Results.Descr:
We thought there is no better way to tell about a job than hear it from a potential future colleague

So we asked one of our lead developers their views on their job. Let's hear what Vincent van der Weele has to say:

"A developer's job at Futurice is always a bit of a mix between software development and consulting. Not only do we try to build great software together with our clients, we also try to help them get the most out of our projects. We provide the most value when we look beyond the project scope and understand how that project fits in the bigger picture and can help our clients reach their goals.

As a lead developer the focus shifts more towards consulting, although it depends a lot on the project how far exactly. We typically lead by example, for instance by showing how lean principles bring fast results. Of course, the lead developer's technical experience is important too but the great thing about Futurice is that we are surrounded by brilliant people. All development teams are self-organising and make technical decisions together."

Here are some practical things that would definitely help succeeding in this job
Professional experience that covers several years in software development, ideally in the development of large scale web-based and mobile applications and services.
Strong consultant mindset and a client-oriented way of working. You enjoy helping and guiding clients as well as drafting proposals for their needs.
Prominent expertise in agile software development methodologies e.g. Scrum, Kanban.
An architecture-level understanding of software design, with experience in designing and implementing complex services.
Understanding and hands-on experience in Cloud platforms, scalability, serverless architectures and benefits/drawbacks of microservices.
Experience in designing and implementing modern GraphQL or REST-based APIs.
A good understanding of both relational databases as well as no-SQL databases.
A broad knowledge of tools, frameworks and technologies related to designing, implementing, deploying and hosting software services.
Interest in team management and career development.
Appreciating and practicing good communication. You are fluent at least in English. Finnish is a definite plus.
At the end of the day, the technology is but a means to an end, and your willingness to learn new things is what counts.

We offer you the Ultimate Learning Platform

With us you get the opportunity to work with the most motivated and multi talented forces in development, design and strategy. As an agency, we have a versatile portfolio of projects and we solve different kinds of problems that require different kinds of tools - for you this means the chance of a lifetime to follow your learning goals and broaden your skill set. You will be inspired and supported throughout your journey as our aspiration is to be the Ultimate Learning Platform for your career. We are a people-first-company and believe that at the end of the day happy people are the key to great software and happy clients. See our promise to you here. 

If you get good vibes after reading this, we would love to hear from you! Please click "apply" to show your interest and tell us a bit about your career background and why you are motivated to become part of the Futu family.

Join us!

Results.Heading: Senior Software Developer
Results.Descr:
Are you a developer and you have a strong drive to learn more?

Keep on reading! As a Software Developer at Futurice you get to work in a team of talented people. As an agency we co-operate with different clients in different business fields. This means there are options in terms of projects and technologies you can use when you join Futurice. Depending on your skills, impact and responsibilities we can customise a role fitting for your learning goals and professional aspirations. You can work f.ex. from from Tampere or Helsinki and we have different working modes including remote work in Finland, depending on the projects at hand.

You don't have to be a guru yet. More than that we hope that you are aiming to grow into one. These skills listed down below will support you on your journey at Futurice
You have a solid understanding of modern software development. Understanding and knowing how to build software in a cloud environment from the actual coding all the way to setting up deployment pipelines and understanding the principles well is definitely something that a programmer should know.
You know at least a few programming languages well. You can create something useful with the languages from scratch. You understand the basic paradigms of the languages and know how to connect your code to databases and other external systems. You know their strengths and the weaknesses, and you know where a certain language is used in the real world.
We work with digital services, meaning that we build software for people to use in their everyday lives. So we hope that you put people who use the services first.
You bring something extra to our culture. We are proud of our culture and it defines us. Our shared values are Care, Trust, Transparency and Continuous Improvement. It is the glue that keeps us together, and makes us stronger. You should not just fit in, but embrace and enrich our culture.

What we offer you?

With us you get the opportunity to work with the most motivated and multi talented forces in development, design and strategy. As an agency, we have a versatile portfolio of projects and we solve different kinds of problems that require different kinds of tools - for you this means the chance of a lifetime to follow your learning goals and broaden your skill set. You will be inspired and supported throughout your journey as our aspiration is to be the Ultimate Learning Platform for your career. We are a people-first-company and believe that at the end of the day happy people are the key to great software and happy clients.

We thought there is no better way to tell about a job than hear it from a potential future colleague. So we asked a couple of our full-stack developers their views on their job. Let's hear what Oskar Ehnström and Carita Niskanen have to say:

"For us, the daily work as full-stack developers is mostly about solving problems. Some days that means figuring out the most efficient algorithm for a particularly tricky piece of code or reviewing PRs. Often it means asking a lot of questions to figure out what the important problem to solve is and how to solve it in the best possible way for the client. Meetings with the team are often part of the day, and keeping them productive and engaging is everyone's responsibility. Finally, discussing with the client and explaining what we're doing and making sure our work fits with the rest of the organisation. 

In addition to client work we can also participate in developing the company by participating in some internal projects and different workforces. All the internal work is based on a person's own wishes and the ability to develop their own skills. At Futurice people are encouraged to actively take ownership of the company and that way you can really get to feel like you are a part of a tight group." 

If you get good vibes after reading this, we would love to hear from you!

Please click "apply" to show your interest and tell us a bit about your career background and why you are motivated to become part of the Futu family.

Come as you are

As an ultimate learning platform that empowers people to become a better version of themselves, we believe that diversity and inclusion are important to our company's success. We seek to recruit, develop and retain the most talented people from a diverse pool of candidates. We welcome applications from everyone, regardless of their race, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, medical condition, or other non-merit factors - we care for each other!

Why join Futurice?

We are very proud of our culture and our lean, flat company structure. It's not by accident that we've been selected as the best place to work in Europe twice. We have four core values, which are also our promises to you as a new employee.

Care: We care about the problems we solve and about each other as human beings. We hire people who intuitively and by default help each other out. It's a virtuous cycle that creates happy teams and happy clients.

Trust: At Futurice, trust doesn't need to be earned, it's given. This means that if you think something makes sense, you can go ahead and do it.

Continuous improvement: We want to help every Futurician get better at their craft every day. This happens through project-work, training and guided self-learning.

Transparency: We believe in being open about pretty much everything. No matter your career level, you can get involved in and informed about any topic company-wide.

Besides our overall cultural and organisational model, here are some specific Futurice perks:
Flexible working hours
Some are night owls, others early birds - you can work whenever you're most productive. Also, part-time work (e.g. 80%) is possible.
Futurice Hybrid Work Model
Personal IT budget
Free choice of laptop, phone, tablet, headphones and other work-gear
Sports & lunch benefit
Futurice's clubs for freetime activities
Learning events
Certification programs
Social responsibility program
You can give back to the community and receive sponsorship from Futurice for doing open-source projects in your free time.
FutuHike: Work in another office for a week


Join us!

Results.Heading: FutuRemote developer or data engineer
Results.Descr:
We offer the keys to your success

Take a peek into our internationally awarded work culture. Working near or far, everyone feels welcome. Here you can see why.

Culture of Care

The best thing about working at Futurice is the colleagues. You work with brilliant and talented professionals, all sharing the ambition to build a better digital future. And we take care of our own! Every futurician adds their own flavour to the mix. Each has a unique career journey that brings something special to the culture - starting from over 40 nationalities!

Trust and Transparency

Our culture is built on Nordic roots of trust. Trust is given from day one, and everything is transparent and out in the open (but we do wear clothes to the office). Our software engineers work closely together with designers, analysts, business consultants and customers, all for the common goal. Check out some recent cases .

Continuous Improvement

We want to grow the next generation of digital leaders, so this is the place to be for learning. You will be developing top-notch services in an environment that promotes constant self-improving and sharing ideas with colleagues. You will also receive a competitive compensation package, and plenty of opportunities to hone your skills or learn new ones.

How's your career journey so far?

We welcome people with a strong programming background, and a strong drive to learn more. You don't have to be a guru yet, just aiming to grow into one.
You have a solid understanding of modern software development. Understanding and knowing how to build software in a cloud environment from the actual coding all the way to setting up deployment pipelines, is definitely something that a programmer should know. You don't have to be a top expert on the subject, but you should know enough to understand the principles well.
You know at least a few programming languages well. You can create something useful with the languages from scratch. You understand the basic paradigms of the languages and know how to connect your code to databases and other external systems. You know their strengths and the weaknesses, and you know where a certain language is used in the real world.
You are excited about programming.Motivation is the key! We want people to enjoy their daily work. That's why you should find the practical work exciting. When you have an internal motivation to learn new things, facing even the more difficult situations is not a problem. And most of all, you are a team player.
You put people who use the services first. This is something particularly important to us. We work with digital services, meaning that we build software for people to use in their everyday lives. It is about understanding who is going to use the software and why.
You bring something extra to our culture. Our culture defines us. It stands on our shared values of Care, Trust, Transparency and Continuous Improvement. It is the glue that keeps us together, and makes us stronger by each talent we discover. You should not just fit in, but embrace and enrich our culture.

Ready to start the next chapter?

If you see yourself as the next FutuRemote team member, drop us a line! Tell us who you are, where have you been and where are you heading next. Describe what you already know, and what you will learn next. We are eagerly waiting to hear from you!

Join us!

Results.Heading: Embedded SW developer, SoC Validation
Results.Descr:
Come create the technology that helps the world act together  

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people's lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world. 

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work. 

 The team you'll be part of  

Our Business Group is a leader in wireless mobility networks and associated services. With more than 3.500 patent families essential for 5G we have a strong 5G portfolio and are a front runner in open and virtualized radio access networks (O-RAN and vRAN). 

System on Chip (SoC) organization and Validation Tribe is looking for new developers to join our LTE and 5G NR activities. We are validating SoC deliverables and creating fully automated CI flow. 

 What you will learn and contribute to  

Are you a professional embedded SW developer eager to create meaningful products? Did you know that in Nokia we are creating products that are changing and shaping how everything is connected? 

As part of our team, you will work in: 
   5G Layer validation on the world leading System-on-chip based on latest technology ASIC's 
 DevOps, CI, automation flow development 
 create and develop validation environments 
 create validation cases 
 analyse and debug the design 
 fluent written and spoken English 
 
  Your skills and experience  

You have/are: 
   advanced level competence in basic coding languages like C/++, Python and enjoy embedded software development 
 strong commitment to quality and a flair for innovative thinking to test & verify new 5G designs 
 fluent written and spoken English 
 
 It would be nice if you also have: 
   previous experience in SoC development 
 
  What we offer  

Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. 

 international teams with balanced  
  composition, getting to work with colleagues from  
  Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer  

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality: 
   One of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere 
 Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg 
 Workplace Pride Global Benchmark 
 LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation 
 
 At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. 

Nokia's employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. 
 We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect. 

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed. 

Additional Information

Results.Heading: Senior Full-stack Developer - Energy Team
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a new Senior Full-stack Developer in the technology unit at Virta. Our applications are making the charging experience simple and effortless for electric vehicle drivers.

We are also looking forward to using new tools and technologies to give a globally scalable, reliable, and maintainable service to our end-users and business customers. 

If you have a passion for pushing technologies to the limits and want to work together with our team of talented people, get in touch with us! 

Check out our Tech Blog with awesome stories from Virta's development team: https://medium.com/engineering-and-design-virta-ev-charging-platform 

Responsibilities: 

Building services that create benefits for thousands of devices (AC chargers, smart batteries, etc.) across the world. 
Creating highly scalable and reliable services. 
Working closely with project managers to solve demanding problems. 
Making the future world more sustainable by optimizing energy production and consumption.

Requirements: 
We design, build and maintain APIs and automation services using GraphQL, Node.js, and TypeScript, PostgreSQL, user interfaces using React, as well as service integrations to the other infrastructure. From you, we expect solid skills with React, Node.js, and TypeScript.

Skills we consider useful include software architecture principles, scalability, reliability, and modularity. Experience with HTTP, REST, WebSocket, and version control systems (git).
We highly appreciate it if you have proven skills in backend infrastructure, large-scale data processing pipelines, event-based systems, and modern front-end development.

To give perspective to what you'll start working with (or will be decommissioning), our current technology stack includes: 
NodeJS microservices with Typescript, a PHP 8, Laravel 8 Monolith, and PHP legacy systems
MySQL and PostgreSQL databases, Redis, RabbitMQ, and Elasticsearch, all running on AWS 
Dockerized microservices on top of Kubernetes 
Bamboo, Bitrise and Drone, Bitbucket pipelines for CI/CD 
React-based web UIs

What we expect from you: 
Create scalable, future-proof software products, and realistic plans towards developing them acrossthe whole Virta Platform 
Hands-on attitude and autonomy to achieve your plans and KPIs
Work with development and business teams to create new software solutions
You are comfortable with coaching other developers in the development work implementing the plans you have created. You don't sweat when writing technical documentation or internal tech blog posts 
In addition to technical competence, communication is key in this role, you are not afraid to ask hard questions or to provide simple instructions 
You have enough persistence and determination to build simple solutions to complex problems. You understand well the concept of solutions that are easily maintainable, of good quality, and also scalable. 


Who we are? 

Our story: Virta was founded in 2013 with a vision to integrate electric mobility, energy systems, and digital sectors into one ecosystem. Our mission is to help solve the climate crisis by bringing electric mobility to people's daily lives and the energy system. We don't just charge electric vehicles - we charge a positive change.

Our work: Our award-winning global digital platform integrates electric vehicles and the energy system. We have built 36 x 2 branded applications on Android and iOS. We have +440k EV drivers using services powered by Virta, and they charge about 164 MW per day on the Virta Platform. Virta enables businesses to launch, operate and scale their EV charging networks from conception to smooth-running operations in the shortest possible time.

Our growth: Virta is the fastest-growing electric vehicle charging platform in Europe and the global innovation leader in our field (measured by patents). 

Our culture: Hunger for knowledge is a key part of the Virta DNA. So is our adaptability, result-oriented attitude, and willingness to help each other. We have an innovative scale-up company mentality, and we value openness, initiative, and teamwork. It's a priority for us to ensure that our employees attain a healthy and balanced lifestyle. Together we find the most effective ways of getting things done with high quality, and we share the passion for working towards a sustainable future.

Sustainability is a cornerstone of all Virta's operations as we believe that electric vehicles are a powerful tool in fighting climate change. Environmental sustainability is naturally at the forefront, but our efforts don't stop there. Despite the grandiosity of the challenge, we are committed to making our best efforts to change the world for the better.

Our team: Virta has been international from day one, and today our team consists of well over 20 nationalities. Over 50 colleagues work in the tech team. All our employees are experts in their own field with diverse backgrounds and skills. 

Our offices: We have offices in 5 countries around Europe and one in Singapore. We run operations in over 30 countries globally. Our HQ in Salmisaari, Helsinki, is a modern, open office with fantastic sea views and even better coffee. But since we are result-oriented, not office-oriented, our employees can work from home, too.

Facts & Figures about Virta
Virta is Europe's fastest growing electric vehicle charging platform
2nd largest EV charging platform in Europe
30+ countries with charging networks on the Virta platform
Headquarters: Helsinki, Finland
Offices: Berlin, Stockholm, Paris, London, Singapore, Bucharest
140+ employees
180 000+ charging points in the roaming network
47 000+ stations online in the Virta Platform


For more information, please contact our Senior Talent Acquisition, Rafaela Tomasi by email: career@virta.global 

Want to join us? Please submit your application via the button below. 

Join us and be part of the growth and fun! 

Privacy Policy 

Please read ourprivacy policy before you submit your application. 

Note: In general, we do not ask you to provide us with any sensitive information. In the case that you provided us with sensitive information, we need your consent to be able to process your application.

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä (.NET), Solteq Oy, Useita paikkakuntia tai etätyö
Results.Descr:
Etsimme asiakasyrityksellemme Solteq Oy:lle .NET -ohjelmistokehittäjää ketterään Scrum-tiimiin yrityksen kasvaessa. Solteq on erilaisiin digitaalisiin energia-alan ratkaisuihin erikoistunut yritys ja tässä roolissa pääset työskentelemään Cloud -pohjaisten tietojärjestelmien parissa. Tehtävä tarjoaa loistavan mahdollisuuden syventää osaamistasi osaavien kollegoiden tukemana. Sinun ei tarvitse olla kokenut osaaja, mutta toivomme sinulta muutaman vuoden verran aikaisempaa kokemusta ohjelmistokehittäjän tehtävistä joko frontend, backend, tai fullstack puolelta. Mikäli kiinnostuit, hae paikkaa jo tänään, sillä pyrimme etenemään soveltuvien hakijoiden kanssa nopealla aikataululla. 

Kuvaus

Tässä tehtävässä tulet osaksi Scrum-tiimiä, joka työskentelee pilvipohjaisten tietojärjestelmien parissa. Pääset myös tarvittaessa osallistumaan asiakastyöhön ja osallistumaan asiakaspalavereihin yhdessä tiimisi kanssa. Sovelluskehityksessä käytetään seuraavia teknologioita: .NET, C#, TypeScript ja Vue.js, SQL, Angular. Solteqilla sinua odottaa innostava ja auttamishaluinen tiimi, jonka vahvuuksia ovat toimialaosaaminen sekä tekninen taitavuus.

Tarjoamme

Mielekkään työympäristön ja hyvät työsuhde-edut
Tilaisuuden päästä työskentelemään uuteen tiimiin osaksi suurta kansainvälistä IT-organisaatiota sekä vakaat tulevaisuuden työnäkymät
Monipuolisen työn missä kehittymistäsi tuetaan
Toimistoja usealla paikkakunnalla sekä etätyömahdollisuuden


Etsimällämme henkilöllä on

Tehtävään soveltuva IT-alan koulutus (esim. ohjelmistokehittäjä)
1-2 vuotta aikaisempaa kokemusta ohjelmistokehityksestä frontend, backend tai fullstack puolelta
Oletamme sinulla olevan kokemusta joistakin seuraavista, esim. backend puolelta C#, .NET framework/core entity framework, SQL tai frontend puolelta Vue, HTML/CSS, Javascript/JQuery, Typescript, Angular
Sujuva suomen ja englannin kielen taito

Katsomme myös eduksi aikaisemman kokemuksen pilvipohjaisista tietojärjelmistä, mutta tämä ei ole pakollista.

Etsimämme henkilö on

Yhteistyökykyinen tiimipelaaja
Itseohjautuvainen ja sinulla on hyvät kommunikaatiotaidot
Oppimishaluinen ja kykenet omaksumaan uusia teknologioita

Muuta tietoa

Aloitus: Mahdollisimman pian
Kesto: Vakituinen
Sijainti: Vantaa, Turku, Tampere, Oulu, Jyväskylä, Kuopio, Seinäjoki tai Lappeenranta sekä etätyömahdollisuus
Yhteystiedot: Tästä rekrytointiprosessista vastaa Academic Work asiakasyrityksensä Solteq Oy:n puolesta ja kaikki positioon liittyvät tiedustelut tulee lähettää Academic Workille.

Käymme hakijoita jatkuvasti läpi ja jos olemme jo edenneet haastatteluvaiheeseen, saattaa ilmoitus poistua sivuiltamme ennen kuin rekrytointiprosessi on saatu päätökseen.

Yrityskuvaus

Solteq on pohjoismainen IT-palveluiden ja ohjelmistoratkaisujen tarjoaja, joka on erikoistunut liiketoiminnan digitalisaatioon sekä toimialakohtaisiin ohjelmistoihin. Teemme huomisesta paremman yksinkertaistamalla digitaalista maailmaa. Palava halu kuunnella ja ymmärtää asiakasta ohjaa toimintaamme. Näkemyksellinen osaamisemme ja sitoutuneet ihmiset ovat perustamme. Lopputuloksena on käytännön työkaluja ja ratkaisuja - asiakkaidemme liiketoiminnan menestystarinoita. Lue lisää Solteqista täältä.

Results.Heading: Support -työntekijä
Results.Descr:
ETSIMME SUPPORT-PISTEELLE TYÖNTEKIJÄÄ VAKITUISEEN TYÖSUHTEESEEN TAMMISTOON
 
 Oletko henkilö, joka innostuu päästessään selvittämään miksi asiakkaan kannettava tietokone ei käynnisty tai saat auttaa häntä uuden puhelimen käyttöönotossa sekä yhteystietojen siirrossa? Haluat tarjota parasta asiakaspalvelua ja nautit siitä, että pystyt ratkaisemaan ongelmia päivittäin?
 
 Onko sinustakin parasta työpäivissä se, etteivät ne ole aina samanlaisia ja osaat nähdä asioihin ratkaisun silloin kuin välttämättä muut eivät sitä näe? Sytyt saadessasi työskennellä päivittäin erilaisten laitteiden parissa ja selvittäessä vastauksia ohjelmistoihin sekä käyttöjärjestelmiin liittyviin asiakkaiden kysymyksiin. Onko sinulla paloa uuden oppimiseen ja tunnet aitoa halua auttaa asiakkaita? Hienoa - jatka lukemista ja selvitä, onko Powerin Support-työntekijän paikka juuri sinua varten tehty!
 
 Me parannamme ihmisten päivää silloinkin, kun asiakkaan lattialle pudonneesta tietokoneesta pitää siirtää kuvat uuteen Macbookiin, tietokoneen näyttö tarvitsee lähettää takuuhuoltoon tai virus jyllää ja aiheuttaa murheita puhelimessa. Osaamme neuvoa asiakkaita uusien laitteiden käytön kanssa ja löydämme oikeat sanat asiakkaiden auttamiseksi silloinkin, kun neuvojamme tarvitsee oman elämänsä koodari tai ensimmäisen älypuhelimensa hankkinut seniori.
 
 Powerilaisille yhdenvertaisuus sekä monimuotoisuus ovat tärkeitä arvoja. Etsimme nyt siis hyvää tyyppiä osaksi Power Tammiston porukkaa.
 
 Haluamme sinut vahvistamaan tiimiämme ja tarjoamme:
 
 - Työpaikan hienojen ja alati kehittyvien tuotteiden parissa
 - Aloituksen sopimuksen mukaan sekä laadukkaan perehdytyksen
 - Monipuolisen ja osaamistasi laaja-alaisesti kehittävän työnkuvan
 - Mielenkiintoisen pohjoismaisen yrityksen puitteet työympäristöksi
 - Kaupanalan työehtosopimuksen B1 palkkaluokan mukaisen palkkauksen
 - Illoista, lauantaista ja sunnuntaista saat lisät työehtosopimuksen mukaisesti
 
 - Työtunnit viikossa 37,5 h/vko
 - E-passi 120 euroa/ 6 kk
 - Liittymäetu
 - Omia tulevia hankintoja varten tuotteet hyvään henkilökuntahintaan
 
 Voisit olla etsimämme henkilö jos?
 
 - Haluat palvella asiakkaita parhaalla mahdollisella tavalla
 - Aikataulujen ja rutiinien noudattaminen ei ole sinulle haastavaa
 - Tulet hyvin toimeen erilaisten ihmisten kanssa
 - Olet proaktiivinen ja valmis oppimaan uutta
 - Osaat työskennellä niin tiimissä, kuin itsenäisesti
 
 Kaikkea ei tarvitse osata meille hakiessa ja tärkeintä onkin, että haluat oppia uutta ja palat halusta työskennellä asiakkaiden parissa. Me perehdytämme sinut työtehtäviisi ja autamme sinua kehittymään työssäsi jatkuvasti.
 
 Työpaikkanasi tulee olemaan Powerin viihtyisä myymälä Vantaan Tammistossa. Aloittamisen suhteen olemme joustavia, mutta sopivan henkilön löytyessä aloitus onnistuu vaikka heti.
 
 Muuta tietoa
 
 Power Finland kuuluu Power International AS -konserniin, joka omistaa Power ketjut Norjassa, Tanskassa, Suomessa sekä Ruotsissa. Meitä Powerilaisia on Pohjoismassa yhteensä yli 6500, joista kaikki ovat sitoutuneet tarjoamaan ainutlaatuisia asiakaskokemuksia asiakkaillemme. Pohjoismainen keskusvarastomme sijaitsee Ruotsissa ja konsernin liikevaihto on yli miljardi euroa. Lisätietoa meistä löydät nettisivuiltamme http://www.power.fi

 WWW-osoite  http://www.power.fi
Yhteystiedot  Tommi Rintala Tommi.Rintala@power.fi
 Työpaikan osoite  Sähkötie 2-6, 01510 VANTAA
 Työ alkaa  Sopimuksen mukaan
 Työaika kokoaikatyö
 Työn kesto yli 12 kuukautta
 Haku päättyy  09.09.2022 klo 23:59
 Ilmoitus jätetty  19.08.2022
 Ilmoitusnumero  11574773

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä, Patria, Jämsä / etätyö
Results.Descr:
Patria on työpaikka, jossa rakennat yhteistä turvallisuutta. Meillä tavalliset ihmiset ratkaisevat epätavallisia haasteita. Kun on kyse kriittisistä operaatioista maalla, merellä, ilmassa ja verkossa, osaamisella on merkitystä. Laatu syntyy ihmisistä - jokaisesta meistä. Patriassa sinä ratkaiset. Patria on kansainvälinen puolustus-, turvallisuus- ja ilmailualan luotettu asiakaskeskeisten elinkaaren tukipalvelujen ja teknologiaratkaisujen tuottaja, jolla on vahva kasvustrategia. Lisätietoja löydät osoitteesta www.patriagroup.com

Kuvaus

Etsimme asiakasyrityksellemme Patrialle ohjelmistokehittäjää osaksi kehittäjien ja testaajien ammattitaitoista tiimiä. Tiimisi vastaa lentoalusten ohjelmistokehityksestä, testauksesta ja operatiivisesta toimintavarmuudesta. Roolisi on kehittää ilmailualuksien järjestelmien toimivuutta, tavoitteena lentoturvallisuus. Suunnittelet testitapauksia niin laboratorio-olosuhteisiin kuin koelennoille. Teet läheistä yhteistyötä järjestelmäsuunnittelijoiden, ohjelmistotestaajien ja koelentäjien kanssa. Työtä voi tehdä osittain etänä.



Työtehtävä

Ohjelmistokehitys
Analysointi ja dokumentointi
Muut kehitystiimin työtehtävät


Etsimällämme henkilöllä on

Hallussa ohjelmistokieli C tai C++
Muutaman vuoden työkokemus ohjelmistokehittäjän työstä
Soveltuva koulutus, esimerkiksi AMK tasoinen koulutus konetekniikasta (lentokonetekniikka) tai automaatiopuolelta
Aito kiinnostus ilmailualaan

Työntekijänä olet

Pitkäjänteinen
Järjestelmällinen ja huolellinen

Miksi Patria?

Turvaa yhteiskunnalle: edistämme ylpeydellä kansallista ja kansainvälistä turvallisuutta. Siihen tarvitaan vastuullista asennetta ja huippuosaamista, joka takaa toimintavarmuuden kaikissa olosuhteissa.
Sinä vaikutat: Patriassa sinä vaikutat työsi sisältöön, urasi kehittymiseen, asiakkaidesi ja koko yrityksen menestykseen. Meillä voit olla juuri niin hyvä kuin ikinä voit olla.
Keskity tärkeimpään: tee sitä, mitä rakastat ja näe kättesi jäljet. Olet meille ratkaisevan tärkeä. Haluamme että voit hyvin ja elät töiden ohella täyttä elämää.
Mahtava porukka: meillä teet työtä uudistuvassa ja energisessä työyhteisössä, jossa on hymy herkässä. Uskomme, että parhaat tulokset syntyvät hyvässä ilmapiirissä

Muuta tietoa

Aloitus: Sopimuksen mukaan
Kesto: 12kk, jonka jälkeen mahdollisuus rekrytoitua Patrialle
Sijainti: Jämsä Halli, Tampere, etätyö
Käsittelemme tietojasi luottamuksellisesti. Paikkaan valitulle henkilölle tehdään turvallisuusselvitys ja huumausainetesti.
Yhteystiedot: Tästä rekrytointiprosessista vastaa Academic Work asiakasyrityksensä puolesta ja kaikki positioon liittyvät tiedustelut tulee lähettää Academic Workille.

Käymme hakijoita jatkuvasti läpi ja jos olemme jo edenneet haastatteluvaiheeseen, saattaa ilmoitus poistua sivuiltamme ennen kuin rekrytointiprosessi on saatu päätökseen.

Yrityskuvaus

Lisätietoa yrityksestä verkkosivuiltaPatria Group

Results.Heading: Embedded Systems Developer
Results.Descr:
Our high-flying vision at Kelluu is to transform airships to new, compact, high-tech form that can stay in the air (almost) permanently. Everything that is valuable to be checked from birds eye view can be checked better, faster, cheaper and smarter with Kelluu. https://kelluu.com/
 
 We are looking for an
 
 Embedded Systems Developer
 
 To launch a professional software development culture at Kelluu. In this role you will collaborate on developing flight control code for airship modules. Kelluus technology and smart solutions are an answer to the ever increasing threat to our lives due to the climate change crisis. Scanning and collecting real time data from the air, we can prevent and minimise for example wild fires, floods and other natural disasters globally, all this with nearly zero emissions.
 
 Requirements for you:
 
 - Experience in development with C/C++ and Python
 - Knowledge about test driven embedded development. You are able to utilise testing tools as well as clean code
 - Ability to organise and instruct. You are attentive to detail and have the ability to communicate your ideas clearly to others
 
 Personal qualifications that help you in succeeding:
 
 - Excellent problem solving skills. You are able to rise above when faced with challenges
 - Explorer mindset. You are not afraid to branch out to fly to new heights. 
 - Long-term focus. You can see beyond the horizon and enjoy continuous development.
 
 We offer you an exciting project to work with and a position where you have a big impact in our team. We want to be the best in our field and this is your opportunity to make a difference for society. You get to be in a crucial role in Kelluus take off to revolutionise airships - to be the solution to the biggest threats we face today and in the future. Lets go.
 
 How to apply?
 
 Please submit your application as soon as possible via our career site, as we are conducting interviews throughout the application period. If you have any questions about the role or recruitment process, please do not hesitate to contact our HR Partner Kristian Paloheimo +358405738900 or at kristian@sytyta.fi

Yhteystiedot  kristian@sytyta.fi+358405738900

 Työn kesto yli 12 kuukautta

 Jätä hakemus  Please submit your application as soon as possible via our career site.

Results.Heading: Software Developer (Java)
Results.Descr:
Company Description

Handling billions of transactions annually, Nets is among the top payment processors in Europe. We keep a tight focus on making it even easier and more intuitive for our customers to handle digital payments and related services. This has made us a trusted partner to more than 700,000 merchant outlets, including 140,000 online merchant outlets, more than 260,000 enterprises and over 250 banks across Europe.

Changing the future of payments takes great personalities

At Nets, you'll develop in a fast-growing tech company in a high-paced, high-impact market. Working to change the future of payments, it's not just skills and aspiration that gets the job done, it's the full package that makes the difference. Together, we impact the lives of everyone around us by powering an easier tomorrow for every citizen, bank, business and colleague. What powers you at work?

Job Description

Nets are investing in modernizing the payment processing to a completely new level for our customers with the aspiration of being the best not only in the Nordics but in Europe.

Join a highly-skilled development team

Whether you are the highly experienced senior developer seeking a professional environment with team-oriented people or the motivated freshman who within the last few years finished university with an IT degree and is looking for the first big opportunity as a developer and is eager to excel and learn from the best we encourage you to apply for a position. You'll join an open and sharing community with highly skilled colleagues and a super interesting project with great career growth opportunities.

You'll work in a team of developers and test automation engineers and your responsibilities will be:

•  Design and develop features for our payment services together with your team

•  Resolve issues by troubleshooting and root cause analysis

•  Ensure quality via unit test and code reviews

•  Demo and document the results of your work

Working with modern tech stack
We mainly use the following technologies in daily work:

•  Java 17 (Spring Boot)

•  Angular & TypeScript

•  Openshift

•  Apache Kafka

•  MongoDB

•  Oracle Database

Multiple DevOps tools for development, automation and monitoring

Qualifications

What do we expect from you?

Java programming skills are important as Java is the main language in the project, but it is common for every developer in the project to be working with all parts of our tech stack with also considering personal preferences. We have high-quality standards regarding code, so we expect a similar attitude from you. You hopefully are also a team member with a flexible mindset and are accountable for your work.

Your qualifications include several of these items:
Master or BS degree in computer science or a career path that has provided you with similar capabilities
Java development skills (Spring Boot knowledge is favorable but not required)
Understanding of microservices and distributed systems development
Understanding of API design
Understanding of automated testing and test tools
Experience in DevOps and agile development methods and tools are considered beneficial.
Experience in cloud technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes (OpenShift) is favorable but not required.
Domain knowledge within the Financial Sector in general and especially payments is favorable but not required

Furthermore, we expect that you have good verbal and written communication skills in English, knowledge of Finnish is an advantage.

Additional Information

Results.Heading: Full Stack Java Developer
Results.Descr:
Position Description:
 
As a member of the system integration and consulting practice, you will be part of a software development and engineering team focused on new features, enhancements, and overall technical modernization efforts within a large and complex global enterprise platform. As part of a software development agile team, you will be responsible for developing and crafting complex technical solutions on the Momentum Micro service framework. Within the overall modernization effort, you will be responsible for deploying new micro service based applications and deploying solutions as containerized apps. You'll be positioned amongst a tight-knit team of cross-functional developers working alongside our clients to implement and advance customized solutions.

All applicants selected for hire must possess US citizenship and be eligible for a SECRET security clearance, per client requirements. An interim Secret clearance is required to begin working onsite with our client, and a Secret clearance must be maintained throughout the project duration. 
 
 Your future duties and responsibilities:
 
•  Full-Stack developer who will be able to use technical passion to learn new tools and techniques to drive solution decision making and identify system improvements for overall solution architecture.
•  Analyze client requirements of existing environment through working with business analysts and UI/UX engineers to build custom solutions that meet business cases and needs.
•  Design and build application architecture through angular web applications and understanding of RESTful API integration.
•  Analyze application development technology trends and advise clients and CGI on how this technology will benefit the future development efforts.
•  Participate in team problem solving efforts and offer ideas to solve client issues while working within the Agile Development Framework.

Required qualifications to be successful in this role:
 
•  An interim Secret clearance is required to begin working onsite with our client, and a Secret clearance must be maintained throughout the project duration. Due to the nature of the government contract requirements and/or clearance requirements, US citizenship is required
Must Have
•  Bachelor's degree and 3+ years of experience in enterprise software engineering leadership roles
Nice To Have:
•  N-tier application architecture familiarity (web servers, application servers, database servers) including microservices
•  Thorough understanding of and experience in API security: TLS, mutual authentication, certificates, Java keystores, and truststores
•  Experience in setting up SAML federated services and assertions, IDP technologies, and other authentication schemes
•  Experience in working with web servers (Apache and Tomcat) and middleware (JBoss)
Red Hat Linux 8.X expertise
•  Strong understanding of Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, and containerization concepts
•  Automation concepts and tools like Jenkins
•  Experience with cloud technologies such as Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure
•  Java and C++ development experience
•  Knowledge of Git and Bitbucket
•  Ability to write complex sql statements and PL/SQL, and familiarity with Oracle databases
Windows and Linux scripting
•  Ability to apply the principles of analytical and critical thinking skills and other professional practices to diagnose or define problems, collect data, and solve abstract problems with widespread unit or organizational impact
•  Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative and Agile environment
•  Highly self-motivated and directed, with keen attention to detail
•  Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities

•  As a Federal Contractor, all members of CGI Federal, regardless of role or work location are required to be fully vaccinated effective January 18th 2022 under the current policy, and be willing to provide proof of status, with the exception of those with approved medical or religious accommodations.

 What you can expect from us:
 
Insights you can act on

While technology is at the heart of our clients' digital transformation, we understand that people are at the heart of business success. 

When you join CGI, you become a trusted advisor, collaborating with colleagues and clients to bring forward actionable insights that deliver meaningful and sustainable outcomes. We call our employees "members" because they are CGI shareholders and owners and owners who enjoy working and growing together to build a company we are proud of. This has been our Dream since 1976, and it has brought us to where we are today - one of the world's largest independent providers of IT and business consulting services. 

At CGI, we recognize the richness that diversity brings. We strive to create a work culture where all belong and collaborate with clients in building more inclusive communities. As an equal-opportunity employer, we want to empower all our members to succeed and grow. If you require an accommodation at any point during the recruitment process, please let us know. We will be happy to assist. 

Ready to become part of our success story? Join CGI - where your ideas and actions make a difference.

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, ethnicity, ancestry, color, sex, religion, creed, age, national origin, citizenship status, disability, pregnancy, medical condition, military and veteran status, marital status, sexual orientation or perceived sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, and gender expression, familial status, political affiliation, genetic information, or any other legally protected status or characteristics.

CGI provides reasonable accommodations to qualified individuals with disabilities. If you need an accommodation to apply for a job in the U.S., please email the CGI U.S. Employment Compliance mailbox at US_Employment_Compliance@cgi.com . You will need to reference the requisition number of the position in which you are interested. Your message will be routed to the appropriate recruiter who will assist you. Please note, this email address is only to be used for those individuals who need an accommodation to apply for a job. Emails for any other reason or those that do not include a requisition number will not be returned.

Background investigation components can vary dependent upon specific assignment and/or level of US government security clearance held. CGI will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrests and conviction records in accordance with all local regulations and ordinances.

CGI will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with CGI's legal duty to furnish information.

Results.Heading: Senior Mobile Developer
Results.Descr:
F-Secure Corporation is undergoing perhaps the most significant transition throughout its history so far, as the company has separated its consumer and corporate security businesses from each other through a partial demerger. Now after completion of the demerger, F-Secure’s B2C and B2B operations are continuing as two independent publicly listed entities: F-Secure Corporation, focusing on consumer security business, and WithSecure Corporation, focusing on corporate security business.

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Developer to work with us to ensure we can deliver amazing cyber protection on mobile platforms to millions of users across over 50 countries globally. In this role you’ll be working at the core of our Android security product and SDKs that are responsible for detection and elimination of cybersecurity threats. This is at the forefront of our security development on the Android platform.

You’ll work as part of our international team of talented engineers, contributing to your team’s success by possessing not only quality code writing and problem-solving skills, but also by collaborating in improving ways of working and how we make our excellent software.


We actively encourage our fellows to grow and develop within F-Secure, and in your career here you can find yourself contributing to any number of our other products and teams. You decide what to make of this role, what your priorities are, and how you organize your work for best benefit to us all. You can work at our Helsinki or Oulu offices, but we also have a flexile remote work policy.
 
Key Responsibilities



Diving deep into our core technologies to have an end to end understanding how we protect consumers from threats and using that knowledge, together with backend team, building and maintaining SDKs for mobile apps.
Participating in mobile/Android app and SDK development as a code contributor and reviewer
Collaborating with your team to find best solutions to problems and new challenges
Keeping up to date with Android platform development trends and news
Translating roadmap and customer requirements to development items, in collaboration with our architects

What are we looking for?



Strong experience in native development in the Android ecosystem
Experience with Kotlin and Java
Hands-on experience with unit testing
Experience in delivering software in a team setting, in an Agile environment
Curiosity to learn and share your learnings with other developers
A security and privacy oriented mindset
Fluent communication in English

Bonus points



Experience in SDK development
Experience in Android test automation
Experience in secure coding practices or developing cybersecurity software
Familiarity with modern UI development (Jetpack Compose UI)

What will you get from us



You will work together with experienced and enthusiastic colleagues, and within F-Secure you'll find some of the best minds in the cyber security industry
You get to work in flexible, agile and dynamic working environment
Rich development and learning opportunities

Our benefits include extensive health care, remote working, company supported sport activities, lunch vouchers, regular massages, gym and sauna at the premises and many more things to keep our best asset – people - happy!


See yourself here? Bring your best self and apply now with your CV and application with a salary request by 4th September 2022 via our job portal. 

A security background check will possibly be conducted for the selected candidate in accordance with Finnish Security Clearance act 726/2015.

Results.Heading: Kehitysinsinööri, prosessitietojärjestelmät
Results.Descr:
SSAB:n Raahen tehtaalla valmistetaan ns. standardi-, premium- ja erikoisteräksiä. Tehdas on kooltaan noin 500 hehtaarin suuruinen alue, joka sisältää tehtaita tehtaan sisällä. SSAB:n tavoitteena on siirtyä vaiheittain kohti fossiilivapaata teräksentuotantoa. Raahen tehtaalla muutoksen tekninen suunnittelu käynnistyi vuonna 2020. Mikäli muutos toteutuu suunnitellussa aikataulussa, tehtaalla valmistetaan eriä fossiilivapaasti tuotettua terästä vuonna 2030.  Lue lisää matkastamme kohti 100 %:n fossiilivapautta ssab.fi/fossiilivapaa. Tutustu Raahen tehtaaseen osoitteessa ssab.fi/raahe.
SSAB Europe Oy Raahen tehdas hakee prosessitietojärjestelmätiimiin
 
 KEHITYSINSINÖÖRIÄ
 
 Etsimme prosessitietojärjestelmätiimiin kehitysinsinööriä kehittämään nauhavalssauksen valmistuksenohjaus ja -prosessitietojärjestelmiä. Työssäsi osana kokenutta ammattilaistiimiä toimit lähellä tuotantolinjoja, suunnittelet eri sidosryhmien kanssa tarvittavia järjestelmämuutoksia sekä koordinoit niiden toteutusta eri alihankkijoilla. Työpanoksellasi pyrit varmistamaan järjestelmien korkean käytettävyyden ja pääset vaikuttamaan tuotantoprosessien kokonaistehokkuuden ja digitalisaation kehittämiseen. Työsuhde on voimassa toistaiseksi.
 
 Edellytämme sinulta tehtävään soveltuvaa insinöörin koulutusta. Tehtävässä menestyäksesi sinulla olisi hyvä olla kokemusta tai opintoja ohjelmistokehitykseen ja tietokantojen käyttöön liittyen. Aiempi työkokemus, tuntemus valmistavasta teollisuudesta tai tiedonkeruujärjestelmistä katsotaan eduksi. Sinulla on vastuuntuntoinen turvallisuusasenne tehdasympäristössä työskentelyyn ja kykenet työskentelemään sekä suomen että englannin kielellä.
 
 Pidät ongelmien ratkaisemisesta ja omaat hyvät tiimityöskentely- ja viestintätaidot sekä kykyä toimia eri sidosryhmien kanssa. Sinulla on työhösi oma-aloitteinen, aktiivinen, järjestelmällinen ja kehittymisorientoitunut ote.
 
 Tarjoamme mielenkiintoisen, haastavan ja monipuolisen työn yhtiössämme prosessitietojärjestelmien parissa. Järjestelmämme ohjaavat nauhatuotteiden valmistusta ja logistiikkaa teräsaihioista aina kohti valssattuja ja jatkokäsiteltyjä kelatuotteita. Kattava perehdytys ja ammattilaisista koostuva tiimi antavat sinulle hyvät edellytykset oman ammattitaitosi kehittämiseen ja tehtävässä toimimiseen. Liity mukaamme matkalle kohti fossiilivapaata terästuotantoa.
 
 Lähetä hakemuksesi viimeistään 18.9.2022.

Results.Heading: Java-sovelluskehittäjä, kokoaikainen, CGI, useita eri paikkakuntia
Results.Descr:
Haluatko päästä osaksi merkittäviä ohjelmistoprojekteja? Innostutko yhdessä tekemisestä? Onko Java yksi päätyökaluistasi? Jos vastasit kyllä, saatat olla etsimämme Java-sovelluskehittäjä!  

 

Etsimme sinua 

Me Clevryllä etsimme CGI Suomi Oy:lle Java-sovelluskehittäjää vakituiseen ja kokoaikaiseen työsuhteeseen. Työsuhteen ensimmäiset 6kk työskennellään CGI:lle Clevryn kautta. Voit valita, miltä CGI:n toimipisteeltä käsin haluat työskennellä.

Tässä Java-sovelluskehittäjän roolissa pääset työskentelemään monipuolisten liikenteen toimialan projektien parissa. Työnkuvaasi kuuluu mm. ohjelmistojen kehittäminen ja jatkokehittäminen ketterien menetelmien tukemana, sekä ratkaisujen suunnittelu ja asiakasrajapinnassa työskentely. Projekteissa käytettyihin teknologioihin kuuluu mm. React, Node, Angular, AWS, Azure, GCP ja Java. Tässä tehtävässä edellytetään vähintään kahden vuoden työkokemusta Javasta. 

Tämä tehtävä tarjoaa upean mahdollisuuden päästä työskentelemään merkittävien projektien parissa, ja kehittämäsi ohjelmistot ovatkin hyvin tärkeitä yhteiskunnan toimivuuden kannalta. Tehtävässä voit todella syventyä pitkäaikaisiin projekteihin ja kasvattaa asiantuntijuuttasi. Tehtävässä on myös hyvät mahdollisuudet vaikuttaa työnkuvan ja roolin muotoutumiseen. Pääset myös työskentelemään läheisessä yhteistyössä innostavan ja osaavan tiimin kanssa.  

Valitulle henkilölle tullaan teettämään perusmuotoinen turvallisuusselvitys. 

 

Asiakasyritys 

Vuonna 1976 perustettu CGI on maailman ja Suomen suurimpia IT- ja liiketoimintakonsultoinnin palveluyhtiöitä. Oivaltavana ja osaavana kumppanina CGI auttaa varmistamaan asiakkaidensa menestyksen. CGI:n vahva toimialakokemus ja -näkemys sekä tuloskeskeinen toimintatapa auttaa yrityksiä ja julkisen sektorin organisaatioita saavuttamaan tavoitteitaan entistä tehokkaammin. CGI:n asiantuntijat työskentelevät Suomessa 18 paikkakunnalla ja globaalisti toimipisteitä on jopa yli 400.

 

Pääasialliset tehtävät 
  Ohjelmistojen kehittäminen ja jatkokehittäminen tiimissä ketterien menetelmien tukemana 
 
Ratkaisujen suunnittelu 
 
Asiakasrajapintatyöskentely 
 
 

Odotamme sinulta 
  Vähintään kahden vuoden kokemusta ohjelmistokehittäjän tehtävistä, jolloin olet työskennellyt käyttäen Javaa pääkielenäsi 
 
Hieman kokemusta JavaScript-sovelluksien ohjelmointikehyksistä (esim. Angular, React tai Vue) 
 
Proaktiivista otetta ja mieltymystä tiimityöhön 
 
Sujuvaa suomen ja englannin kielen taitoa 
 
Kokemus ketteristä menetelmistä (mm. Scrum) ja DevOps-toimintamallista on tehtävässä eduksi 
 
 
 

Tarjoamme sinulle 
  Monipuoliset työtehtävät ja mahdollisuuden muokata työnkuvaa ja roolia 
 
Yhdessä tekemisestä innostuneen tiimin, joka tukee sinua aktiivisesti 
 
Erinomaiset kouluttautumismahdollisuudet ja kehittymistä tukevan työyhteisön 
 
Suuren kansainvälisen palveluyhtiön tarjoamat uramahdollisuudet 
 
Henkilölähtöisen ja joustavan yrityskulttuurin 
 
 
 

Hae tehtävään heti!   

Mikäli tunnistit itsesi yllä mainitusta, niin haethan tehtävään nopeasti, sillä etenemme heti potentiaalisten hakijoiden kanssa. Viimeinen hakupäivä on 1.9.2022, mutta nopeus on valttia ja etenemme prosessissa heti potentiaalisten hakijoiden kanssa. Huomioithan, ettemme voi tietosuojasyistä vastaanottaa hakemuksia sähköpostitse. Lisätietoja tehtävästä antaa Recruitment Manager Helmiina Hirvonen (helmiina.hirvonen@clevry.com).     

Huomioittehan, ettemme voi tietosuojasyistä ottaa hakemuksia vastaan mailitse, ja hoidamme asiakasyrityksen puolesta kaikki tiedustelut työpaikkaan liittyen.   

   

Lisätietoa rekrytointiprosessistamme   

Me Clevryllä uskomme siihen, että työntekijän menestyksen tehtävässä ratkaisevat kovia taitoja paremmin pehmeät taidot ja halu kehittyä. Tämän vuoksi rekrytointiprosessiimme kuuluu psykometriset arvioinnit, jotka kartoittavat roolissa tarvittavia pehmeitä taitojasi sekä kognitiivisia kykyjäsi. Kartoittamalla työn kannalta kriittisiä pehmeitä taitoja, voimme auttaa työnhakijoita tunnistamaan ja sanoittamaan omia vahvuuksiaan paremmin sekä työllistymään helpommin ja nopeammin.   

Meidän kautta hakiessasi saat myös itsellesi myöhempää käyttöä varten henkilökohtaisen palauteraportin, joka perustuu tekemääsi persoonallisuusarviointiin. Hakuprosessiimme kuuluu myös haastattelu sekä Clevryllä että asiakasyrityksessä, joten rekrytoinnin edetessä pääset tutustumaan vielä paremmin meihin molempiin.   

   

Lisätietoa Clevrystä   

Yli 30 vuoden ajan me olemme olleet muuttamassa työelämää pehmeitä taitoja korostavaan suuntaan rekrytointien, henkilöarviointien ja liikkeenjohdon konsultoinnin avulla. Me toimimme globaalisti Pohjois-Amerikasta Singaporeen erilaisten asiakkaiden, konsulttien ja kandidaattien kanssa, ja meidän pääkonttorimme sijaitsevat Helsingissä, Tukholmassa ja Brightonissa. Me tarjoamme palvelukseenne yli 150 pehmeiden taitojen tunnistamiseen sertifioitua rekrytoijaa, psykologia ja asiantuntijaa. Me rakennamme parempaa työelämää yhdistämällä toisilleen sopivimmat työnhakijat ja työnantajat keskenään!

Results.Heading: Mobile Software Developer (React Native)
Results.Descr:
Do you want to work with something innovative and be involved in the development of some of the coolest TV applications? Viaccess-Orca, part of the Orange Group, has 20 years of experience in broadcasting pay-TV markets. Viaccess-Orca has more than 300 employees and provides services for more than 27 million customers. Here in Tampere, they have an independent team of skilled professionals working for the parent company, Orange, and for other customers on their large-scale TV projects. The good news is that they have a role for you as well. Read more about the company: www.viaccess-orca.com

We are now looking for a

Mobile Software Developer (React Native)

to work with Viaccess-Orca Finlands TV applications development team. Your main task is to be part of an experienced team and to participate in software development according to agile processes. In order to succeed, you should have:

- good knowledge of mobile software technologies
- good understanding of the latest mobile technologies
- prior experience in React Native programming, and React programming is a plus
- will and capability to learn what you dont already know

In addition, it is beneficial for you to have programming experience in the main mobile platforms Android and/or iOS. Understanding of Kotlin/Java is also a plus in our team.

You will mainly be working on cross-platform projects as well as:

- Working with applications and being at the core of the development work of Orange/Viaccess-Orca TV applications
- Collaborating with your key stakeholders in Tampere and Paris, but also with an international team on assignments as well
- Taking part in the actual software design and development work.

Viaccess-Orca has a long experience in mobile TV applications development, and you will now also have the possibility to become an expert in the field, or further develop your skills in this area and to learn new technologies in the future. It is also a great opportunity to take part in international projects. 

Viaccess-Orca offers you a great team that has worked together for over a decade and continues to grow. You will learn and work with the best people in their business. The atmosphere is relaxed and informal. At Viaccess-Orca, you get to work in an independent role in a truly international company. You can largely choose your own tools and define the best working practices for yourself, and it is also possible to partially work remotely.

How to apply?
Submit your application via Sytytä career site with your salary request and CV as soon as possible. The position will be filled once a suitable person is found. For further information, please dont hesitate to contact our HR Partner Kristian Paloheimo via LinkedIn, email, or phone (kristian@sytyta.fi, +358 40 57 38900) During the summer, you can also contact our summer HR rep Wilhelmiina Kastikainen (wilhelmiina@sytyta.fi, +358449949912)

Results.Heading: Backend Developer
Results.Descr:
Etsimme IT-osastollemme järjestelmäkehittäjää tukemaan kasvuamme.

Mirkalla on käynnissä useita projekteja, joissa IT-ratkaisut ovat keskeinen osa kokonaisuutta ja joita Mirkan IT-osasto tukee IT-näkökulmasta. IT-osasto osallistuu liiketoiminnan kehittämiseen tarjoamalla prosesseihin ratkaisuja, jotka ovat yhteensopivia yrityksen kokonaisratkaisujen kanssa. IT-osasto suunnittelee ja kehittää prosesseja sisäisesti ja yhdessä yhteistyökumppaneiden kanssa.

Järjestelmäkehittäjänä pääasiallinen tehtäväsi on Mirkan kehitteillä olevien verkkopohjaisten ratkaisujen backend-toimintojen kehittäminen.

Pääasialliset vastuualueesi:

- API:en kehittämien ja olemassa olevien integraatioiden muuttaminen
- Ohjelmointi C#:lla ja .NET frameworkillä
- SQL-ohjelmointi

Odotamme että sinulla on useampia seuraavista kelpoisuuksista ja valmiuksista:

- soveltuva IT-alan tutkinto tai muulla tavalla hankittu, vastaava osaaminen
- muutaman tai useamman vuoden kokemus backend-ohjelmoinnista
- halu tehdä töitä itsenäisesti, mutta osana tiimiä
- halu ratkaista ongelmia
- kokemusta agiilista kehittämisestä (katsotaan eduksi)
- Azure Devopsin tai Git versiohallinnan tuntemus
- englannin ja ruotsin tai suomen kielen taito.

Tarjoamme sinulle:

- mahdollisuuden työskennellä innovatiivisessa ja luovassa ympäristössä kansainvälisessä yrityksessä
- mahdollisuuden työskennellä asiaan omistautuneiden ammattilaisten kanssa uniikin järjestelmän parissa
- hybridimallin mukaisen työn (osittain jollakin Mirkan konttoreista, osittain etänä).

Hae paikkaa täyttämällä työnhakemuslomake Mirkan verkkosivulla. Käynnistämme rekrytointiprosessin välittömästi ja täytämme paikan sopivan henkilön löydyttyä. Lisätietoja tehtävästä antaa Christian Palm. Hänet tavoittaa sähköpostitse osoitteesta christian.palm@mirka.com.","sv":"Vi söker nu en systemutvecklare till vår IT-avdelning för att stöda vår tillväxt.

Mirka har flera projekt där IT-lösningarna är en central del av helheten. Mirkas IT-avdelning stöder projekten genom att delta i affärsutvecklingen ur ett IT-perspektiv och erbjuder passande lösningar för de olika processerna som är kompatibla med Mirkas helhetslösningar. IT-avdelningen gör upp planer samt utvecklar processer internt och med samarbetspartners.

Din huvudsakliga uppgift är utveckling av backend-funktioner för de Web-baserade lösningar vi har börjat utveckla.

Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:

- Utveckling av API:er och ändringar av befintliga integrationer
- Programmering med C# med .NET framework
- SQL-programmering

Vi förväntar oss att du har flera av följande kvalifikationer och färdigheter:

- En lämplig examen inom IT, eller på annat sätt erhållen motsvarande kunskap
- Några, eller flera års relevant erfarenhet av Backend-programmering
- Att du trivs med att jobba självständigt men som en del av ett team
- Att du tycker om att lösa problem
- Erfarenhet av Agil utveckling är meriterande
- Kunskap om Azure Devops eller Git versionshantering är meriterande
- Språkkunskaper i engelska och svenska eller finska

Vi erbjuder dig:

- Möjligheten att arbeta i en innovativ och kreativ miljö i ett globalt företag
- Du kommer att arbeta med engagerade proffs med ett unikt system
- Arbete enligt hybrid-modell, delvis på något av Mirkas kontor samt hemifrån

Ansök genom att fylla i ansökningsformuläret på Mirkas webbplats, vi rekryterar fortlöpande och kommer att tillsätta positionen när vi hittat en lämplig kandidat. För mer information, kontakta Christian Palm, christian.palm@mirka.com.

Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
Software Developer 

I am Kalle Virtanen, and I am leading Telia's Digital B2C channels in Finland. We are looking for a Software Developer for our eCommerce team in Helsinki or Vilnius. We are an easy-going group of people, ready to help and happy to welcome new colleagues. As a team, we have a lot of exciting challenges ahead. Now we want to meet and invite you to join our crew.

Is this your next opportunity?

We as a team are building Telia's future Online services, like eCommerce, Customer Portals, and Mobile apps for Consumer segments. We are very passionate about technology and therefore our team utilizes the latest modern development tools and frameworks, such as React, Flutter, Node.js, GraphQL, and TypeScript. Our stack is built on AWS and Microservices with a common Design System.

As a member of the team in our new open-space office in Vilnius, you will be part of a self-organized international development team, working as a developer closely together with businesspeople, UX- and visual designers, and other developers. Your responsibility will not only be implementing code but also truly caring about the product you will be working on. You will get the chance to show the best of you in the areas which are passionate you the most. 

Is this you?

We are on a journey to become the new generation telco, which means that you need to be open-minded and not be afraid of change. And to really enjoy your job here, you need to be forward-thinking, customer-oriented, and truly understand that the solutions you are creating will ultimately connect people in society to what matters most to them.

 Your main responsibilities: 
 Within the Delivery team deliver results to our stakeholders by developing and deploying solutions based on CI/CD pipeline 
 Co-operate with business (users) and other areas on common deliveries 
 Drive your area according to decisions and goals in a modern, agile, and DevOps way 

 Appreciated skills and experience: 
 Passion and relevant experience in JavaScript, PostgreSQL, React, NodeJS, GraphQL  and TypeScript
Understanding of Design approach, customer experience and accessibility standards
Good practices with test automation and unit testing
Experience in agile development methods and practices, i.e. Scrum, SAFe
Extra points for experience with component libraries like Design Systems
Extra points for hands-on experience in CI/CD pipeline with Automation (Ansible, Terraform), Docker, AWS, Flutter

It's more than just a job!

Regardless of the position you are looking for, we will give you the tools and support you need to grow both as a professional and as a person, with us. We can offer you your next big opportunity in a creative, motivating, and welcoming company where everyone can be themselves, with equal access to opportunities. We respect and value the diversity of people. In addition to an attractive and inclusive work environment, we also enable flexibility and offer a wide variety of employee benefits.

Working in this position you will receive a base salary from 2986 Eur (gross) to 4479 Eur (gross) plus annual bonuses which vary, depending on your competencies and your and Telia results. Besides each employee Telia has an additional employee benefits package which includes:
Health insurance and pension plan;
Various Telia and partners discounts and offers;
Additional vacation days;
Workation;
Flexibility that enables work-life balance;
Chance to grow both personally and professionally with our internal programs;
Open, relaxed and fun working environment;
19 000 awesome colleagues across Nordic & Baltics.

Interested?

If you fancy joining our team, don't hesitate to apply! If you want to know more about the job you are welcome to contact me at kalle.virtanen@teliacompany.com.

We look forward to receiving your application and to make sure that your personal data is kept safely, we kindly ask you to apply through our recruitment system. We are not able to handle resumes via e-mail or equivalent. Selection will take place on an ongoing basis and this position might be filled before the application deadline. The application deadline is 2022-09-30

WELCOME TO TELIA - HOME TO YOUR NEXT BIG OPPORTUNITY!

Results.Heading: Senior Full Stack Developer Etuovi.com
Results.Descr:
Senior Full Stack Developer Etuovi.com 
Etsitkö kiinnostavaa työtä, jolla on merkitystä miljoonien suomalaisten arkeen? Meillä pääset kehittämään moderneja verkkopalveluita, jotka keräävät päivittäin Suomen suurimmat yleisöt. Ympärillesi saat sopivan kokoisen tiimin kovia ammattilaisia. 
 
Haemme senior tason frontend painotteista full stack kehittäjää vahvistamaan Etuovi.comin kehitystimiä. 
 
Edellytämme
  Useamman vuoden työkokemusta web-kehityksestä.
Vankkaa kokemusta React ohjelmistokehityksestä. Monipuolista JavaScript- sekä CSS-osaamista ja silmää yksityiskohdille. Eduksi lasketaan myös kokemus React Nativesta.
Osaamista taustajärjestelmien kehittämisestä. Sinulla on kokemusta erilaisten mikropalveluiden sekä REST-rajapintojen toteuttamisesta. Eduksi lasketaan kokemus Java kehityksestä.
Kykyä ja intoa oppia uutta, hyviä tiimityötaitoja sekä rohkeutta tarttua asioihin.
 
Käytössämme olevia teknologioita ovat mm.
  Frontend: React, Redux, TypeScript, Material-UI, Webpack, BabelJS ja React Native
