Results.Heading: Java Ohjelmistosuunnittelija / Software Developer
Results.Descr:
We are now looking for multiple
 
 Java Software Developers
 
 to join our Traffic Management System (TMS) and Automatic Train Supervision (ATS) teams. In this role you will be responsible for maintaining existing Mipro's product family products, together with developing new features according to the requirements and specifications.
 
 In this role, you can be a well-established expert with several years of experience in software development, or someone with less work experience, but a lot of enthusiasm and willingness to learn. A degree in Computer Sciences or similar, provides you a good base to succeed in this job, but your degree is not a determinative factor: you might have gained experience in some other way too.
 
 To be successful in this role, it would be good to have good, couple of years hands-on knowledge with different software development tools, such as Java, Node.js, Angular and TypeScript. You should also have good knowledge in API protocols and it is a big bonus if you have worked with DevOps tools and you're familiar with Agile and Scrum methodologies.
 
 In Mipro we hold high value in collaboration, therefore, we expect you to be a professional with good team spirit and who is comfortable in communicating with different people with different backgrounds and cultures. Due to the nature of our business, we also expect you to have a strong sense of responsibility and quality in your deliveries.
 
 You can work in our headquarters in Mikkeli, or our offices in Espoo or Oulu. Remote work is also possible and decided based on the candidate's previous experience.
 
 What does a Software Developer do at Mipro?
 
 Software Developers at Mipro work as a part of a dynamic team, between 3 to 5 people, consisting of Product Manager, Architect and Software Developers and Testers. Your main tasks include designing, developing and documenting, as well as maintaining Mipro's software products. As every team member have their own strengths, it is essential to make your voice heard and contribute in the product and software development technologies and processes, to improve the product and working methods. As the team works very closely together, sharing information and consulting one another, some part of time is spent in mutual meetings, workshops and sprints. All in all, you will have a well-established and strong team behind you to back you up, so succeeding in this job is really up to you!
 
 We are a flexible and employee-friendly company. We'll give you responsibility and freedom to grow on your own career pathway. At Mipro you can have an impact on everyday safety - traffic, environment and water supply. We can offer you an interesting and challenging work in a fast-growing and internationalizing company, good employee benefits and a pleasant and modern working environment with experienced and enthusiastic colleagues.
 
 Are you interested?
 
 For enquiries, please contact Omair Javed (Product Manager) by email omair.javed@mipro.fi. Please apply by filling the application, included with a salary request, and adding your CV.

Results.Heading: Azure Developer
Results.Descr:
The Company

Our client is looking for an experienced full-stack developer with a hunger to grow!
 
 They are a leading intellectual asset lifecycle management SaaS -solution with 5000+ users in 350+ well-known organizations in Finland and abroad. Their clients include innovative companies and organizations of all sizes, who want to protect, expand and utilize their intellectual property efficiently. They have customers of all sizes from smaller companies to companies with tens of thousands of employees. Now they are looking to expand internationally, currently, 10% of their revenue comes from outside of their domestic market.
 
 They decided a number of years ago to rebuild their solution from the ground up from a system that had been running for 20 years previous to a new modern Azure environment, hence the new hires who will drive this change and implement their Azure and new cloud technology experience. 
 
 The position
 
 We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Azure Developer to further strengthen the product development team whose mission is simply to build the very best cloud-based IP management solution in the world. Their product development crew is an integrated agile team of highly skilled technical and functional professionals supported by IPR specialists.
 
 Your role would be crucial, and they expect you to contribute significantly to their product development. You will report directly to the Head of Technology and additionally, you will be supported & coached by a product owner, other developers, and the rest of their organization. They are open to defining your exact responsibilities as per your own interests and current plus future abilities.
 
 They utilize the latest tools and methodologies as much as possible, for example, they use Azure DevOps with CI/CD to manage, design, build, test and deploy their products. In addition to the software development tasks from all parts of the software development lifecycle, they expect you to further contribute to their way of working in terms of new ideas, feedback, and thought leadership on software development questions.
 
 Requirements

* Deep technical understanding of the Microsoft stack (incl .NET Core, C#, Azure)
 * Professional experience on .NET & Azure with any modern front framework (e.g. Vue/React/Angular)
 * Experience with various architectures (incl. microservices) and stateless APIs
 * Understanding of various database and data storage solutions such as traditional relational SQL, schemaless and cloud-based binary options such as Azure Blobs
 * Business-oriented mind-set and positive can-do attitude
 * Ability and willingness to work with a diverse team across functions
 * Generic understanding (& seeing the value of) how to build business-critical software

Bonus Points

 * You have been Scrum Master or have other team leading experience
 * You have previous experience (and keen interest) in taking architectural responsibility
 * You have DevOps experience & care deeply about Test Automation
 * You are Microsoft certified on Azure, DevOps, Data or Development
 * Demonstrated success in building SaaS solutions, either B2B or B2C

What they offer

 * Modern zero-legacy Microsoft tech stack (Azure, .NET Core, EF Core, React, Azure SQL, Blobs etc.)
 * Possibility to grow in or out of position as the client grows (Scrum Master, Technical Architect etc.)
 * Stable but fast-paced long-term product development company that can offer a long career in development rather than consultancy (project) focus.
 * An open start-up spirited company culture, and ability to make an impact in the early stages.
 * Possibility to grow in or out of your position as the company grows
 * Stable but fast-developing business with huge global market potential
 * Social events and training (incl. certification)
 * Prime office locations in Helsinki, Tampere & Oulu with fun and professional teammates & good overall benefits
 * Full remote availability.

We require fluency in English, both spoken and written. Some rudimentary understanding of Finnish is highly beneficial. Most importantly, you must already be eligible (authorized) to work in the EU.

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

Benjamin Wilson-Lake

b.wilson-lake@frankgroup.com

+358 9 42452358

https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjaminwilsonlake/

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

Results.Heading: Senior Tools Programmer
Results.Descr:
Remedy Entertainment, the creator of Control®, Max Payne®, Alan Wake® and one of the leading independent game studios in the world is looking for a Senior Tools Programmer to join our in-house technology team and help drive our in-house tool development to help create high quality gaming experiences for the next generation of games. 

As a Senior Tools Programmer, you will be part of the Northlight tools team for our ambitious game projects. You will be in a key role designing, developing and delivering new tools and features to our content teams. In this role you will get to own multiple tool sets and work with a group of multi-disciplinary people to iterate them to final quality. Your main aspiration is to solve and optimize workflows for producing content to make great player experiences, and if needed, you feel comfortable in making integrations with our desktop tools too. The role can also be tailored to match with your skills and interests.

As a programmer, you participate eagerly in code reviews and take pride in writing clean, efficient, readable, portable, and reliable code. You have great communications skills and enjoy elaborating your technical solutions to colleagues in engineering, design, and art teams alike.

We enthusiastically welcome diverse viewpoints and backgrounds. We at Remedy value and are committed to ensuring an inclusive and safe work environment for all our team members.

What you bring to the roleDemonstrated experience as a programmer ideally working with game engines and tools
You have excellent C++ or C# skills and experience with multithreaded programming
You have experience working with UI-frameworks. E.g. WPF or Qt
You have the ability to collaborate and work with a range of disciplines from art to design
You are able to take ownership of building and designing tools and to drive them to final quality
Additionally, in this role it is beneficial if you have strong mathematical skills and/or knowledge on USDs and DCCs
What is in it for youAt Remedy you get to work on awesome, memorable gaming experiences for our players, in a studio where your input is valued and your creative freedom is encouraged. 
We work in an environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone's voice is heard & workload stays sensible. We believe in and support work-life balance. Happy people work better! 
We offer an extensive set of employee benefits and an annual bonus system as well as opportunities for you to develop your skills further. On top of this, in Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to public holidays and other special occasions. 
Our studio is based in Helsinki metropolitan area in Finland, a safe country with exceptional quality of life, free education and pristine nature at your doorstep. If you're not already in Finland, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we'll take care of everything else! 
If you are based in Sweden, we also welcome candidates to our new location in Stockholm.
To apply, please fill in the application form with your CV (in English), github and other information relevant to the position.

Results.Heading: Senior Full Stack Developer
Results.Descr:
Company Description

Handling billions of transactions annually, Nets is among the top payment processors in Europe. We keep a tight focus on making it even easier and more intuitive for our customers to handle digital payments and related services. This has made us a trusted partner to more than 700,000 merchant outlets, including 140,000 online merchant outlets, more than 260,000 enterprises and over 250 banks across Europe.

We have an ambitious goal of implementing a next-generation payment solution to conquer Europe and operate millions of payment terminal devices. Our product will impact everyday life across the continent. Usability, security, and high quality are key elements when transferring money is involved. At some point, when travelling across Europe, you will be proud to see people paying for purchases using a system you've built together with your Nets colleagues.

Job Description

Your new base

You will join a team of experienced full stack and backend developers of the Backoffice team.

We are responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and operating the React user interfaces and associated server-side services. The team picks the best tools for the job ー current languages include React, Node.js, and Java, with AWS services including Lambda, DynamoDB, RDS PostgreSQL, and S3. We are building a system to handle the load of entire Europe.

Expect to meet people passionate about user interfaces, security, availability, and scalability.

We don't always build APIs for our master data, but when we do, we make them idempotent.

Qualifications

Skills and ambition make you succeed

First and foremost we expect you to be open-minded and not afraid to learn new things. We're looking for a person who takes responsibility and initiative, takes the lead where needed, and embraces team work. Don't worry, you won't be the only one with these traits.

To grok the job you should feel comfortable with:
React or other modern web frameworks
Node.js / JavaScript / TypeScript
Java, or strong experience with other server-side languages
Databases. We use PostgreSQL and DynamoDB.
Memes ー the struggle is real

Earn street creds by also knowing these:
AWS, or modern server-side tech in general
Docker
Linux ー majority of the development tools run on Linux
Basics of cryptography like TLS and certificates

If you love to code, you will enjoy working with us

We want to create the best product in the payment industry, and make it happen by building the best software team. So we offer you an opportunity to be surrounded by experienced software developers, with a great view over the payment industry. You can influence the team's ways of working, tools, technologies and architecture. We support you in developing your skills further in a way that suits your way of learning. You'll find the freedom to balance an exciting job with life outside of work. We enjoy working here.

Additional Information

Our hiring team is on vacation from 27th June until 18th of July. 

As next step with the process, we will invite potential candidates to meet and greet both hiring manager and some of the team members (virtually or physically), so you will also have opportunity to get to know more closely the team members, specifics of the role and our working culture.

Send your application soonest, as we will start interviewing and shall fill in position as soon as right candidate is found. If you're curious to learn more about the job, you're welcome to contact mikael.siirtola@nexigroup.com

You can meet more of our personalities by visiting our careers page: https://www.nets.eu/careers/employees/Pages/default.aspx

We conduct background checks on relevant candidates through our partner Semac, www.semac.no

Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
LM-Dental(tm), founded in 1973, develops, produces and markets high-tech dental hand instruments and their tracking system together with ultrasonic devices, orthodontic appliances and more. With the innovative product design and high-tech production technology we are the fastest growing manufacturer of hand instruments in Europe, the market leader in all Nordic countries and over 80% of our products are exported globally. There are over 100 employees at LM- Dental(tm) and we are part of the Finnish medical corporation Planmeca Group www.planmeca.com. For more information visit our website www.lm-dental.com.

We are looking for a 
 
 Software developer
 
 to strengthen our SW team
 
 As a developer in our team, you will be a vital part in our journey to develop global success of Dental Tracking System(tm) (www.dentaltracking.com). Your main responsibility is to design and implement new features based on customer feedback. You also get to be a crucial part in defining the future of DTS(tm).
 
 You stay up to date with needed technology stack (e.g., JavaEE, web programming languages, cloud solutions). You'll also be in a leading role in improving our organization's working methods and you'll get to influence how we work, not just what we are building. Our small and efficient software team is working agile way and is a part of our innovative R&D team. Our toolkit consists of modern frameworks, architectures and cloud services such as Vaadin and Microsoft Azure.
 
 Requirements
 
 Appropriate technical education
 Several years of experience in object-oriented programming
 Good teamwork skills and practical way of working
 Ability to work autonomously on complex issues
 Good English and Finnish skills in speaking, reading and writing
 Proactiveness, initiative taking and get-it-done attitude
 In addition, we appreciate any prior experience in
 
 Cloud environments
 Embedded software development
 Integrations to other systems
 Java, C#, C++, Qt, Linux, Vaadin, IoT, SQL, Azure, Docker
 We offer
 
 Challenging and varied position with personal growth opportunities 
 Chance to take part in international and interesting software development projects
 We are profitable, domestic and innovative market leader acting in global and growing health technology industry
 Modern and pleasant working facilities with also the possibility to hybrid work
 Support from team of professionals locally and from the group level
 We are development-oriented company and offer versatile employment benefits
 Interested to join our software team? Send your application and CV including salary request by August 29th.
 For more information you can contact DTS Program Manager Tomi Muuri, tomi.muuri(at)lm-dental.com or HR Manager Sanna Glückert, sanna.gluckert(at)lm-dental.com.

Results.Heading: Senior Software Developer for Payment Terminals
Results.Descr:
Company Description

Handling billions of transactions annually, Nets is among the top payment processors in Europe. We keep a tight focus on making it even easier and more intuitive for our customers to handle digital payments and related services. This has made us a trusted partner to more than 700,000 merchant outlets, including 140,000 online merchant outlets, more than 260,000 enterprises and over 250 banks across Europe.

Changing the future of payments takes strong personalities

At Nets, you'll develop in a fast-growing tech company in a high-paced, high-impact market. Working to change the future of payments, it's not just skills and ambition that gets the job done, it's the full package that makes the difference. Together, we impact the lives of everyone around us by powering an easier tomorrow for every citizen, bank, business and colleague. What powers you at work?

Job Description

You'll be powering our Payment Terminal Application team

You will be in a team which implements software for the physical payment terminals. These devices are the same ones which can seen all around us in shops, hotels, restaurants, everywhere. The existing codebase is a combination of different technologies, but you will be focusing on the part implemented in Lua language. This piece of code is responsible for the business logic and integration interfaces towards other systems outside of the terminal.

As a location wise, we are open to for either in Finland or Germany. You also have a valid working visa for EU country.

Qualifications

Skills and ambition make you succeed

We expect you to have a strong passion for coding, which eases your learning of Lua. You should also be outspoken and active in sharing your views when improvements or changes are needed. You always optimize your code while keeping the highest possible security and quality in mind. Lastly, you understand the concept of product development where the maintenance of the software is only as smooth as the code you've written earlier.

Your qualifications include:
Outstanding coding skills. E.g. JavaScript or Python experience would be good basis to learn Lua.
Embedded development experience. Understanding how hardware limitations (e.g. RAM) impact the code.
Programming experience with different communication protocols (e.g. USB, Serial, TCP/IP).
Payment and EMV knowledge is appreciated but not mandatory.
Linux knowledge is beneficial as majority of the development tools run on Linux.

If you love to code, you will enjoy working with us

We want to create the best product in the payment industry, and make it happen by building the best software team. So we offer you an opportunity to be surrounded by experienced software developers, with a great view over the payment industry. You can influence team's ways of working, tools, technologies and architecture. You'll find the freedom to balance an exciting job with life outside of work. We enjoy working here.

Additional Information

Apply now to power your career

Please send your application as soon as possible, as we will start interviewing and shall fill in position as soon as candidate is found.

In case you're interested in hearing more about this opportunity or Nets as an employer, then please contact the recruiting manager Mikael Siirtola mikael.siirtola@nexigroup.com

You can meet more of our Nets personalities by visiting our careers page: https://www.nets.eu/careers 

Our recruitment team is on vacation from 27th June until 18th of July. 

We conduct background checks on relevant candidates through our partner Semac, www.semac.no

Results.Heading: Lead Developer - Oulu / Helsinki

We are working with a mid-large sized in-house development company. They are increasing their budget and planning long-term projects - such as the recent move from their private-cloud to Azure, and adding a new product to their library. 

They are able to offer both hands-on work for those who want to be a hands-on Lead Developer - and can help those who want more understanding and responsibility on the business-side of decision making/career progression.

Role & Responsibilities

 * Lead our development team as we increase the projects and team size, focusing on improving our long-term capability for existing and upcoming projects later in 2022. 
 * Can be some analysis of requirements and formulation work.

 * Join in with peer-review sessions on a regularly.
 * Strong communication skills, both one-to-one and when speaking to a group.

Skills & Qualifications

 * C#, .NET Core, REST API's, SQL Server, JavaScript/TypeScript, Vue.js/React/Angular/Knockout.js, Azure - not all expected but all would be beneficial.

Benefits

Results.Heading: Backend Developer, Customer Facing Solutions
Results.Descr:
ONEiO is going to be scaling up a lot in the near future, so you have a chance to develop yourself professionally in the direction you want - there will be plenty of room to take ownership and specialize. We've been working in the cloud and with microservices architecture from the beginning, with the sole purpose of being able to scale up - now is the time to join the team and grow together with us! This role is a full-time role, and the selected person will be employed by ONEiO Cloud Oy, located in Helsinki, with possibility to work remotely within Finland.
About us
ONEiO is an integration service provider helping companies collaborate without complex technical integration projects. We have built the world's first Integration Automation Platform that automates many of the development tasks related to a successful integration project. We are disrupting the market of established iPaaS products and we have several well-known customers to back up our claims. The likes of Bayer, Volkswagen, Atos and CGI all trust us to deliver them enterprise-scale integrations.

ONEiO has strong roots and a homebase in Finland, the happiest country in the world. We embrace the Nordic straightforwardness and the famous Finnish Sisu attitude while our SaaS product is used worldwide by the largest global brands and companies. Our current client base consists of companies in Europe, USA and partners around the globe.
What does this job do
Daily responsibilities include designing and building features for the ONEiO platform. The Customer Facing Solutions (CFS) team produces the functionalities that help our external and internal customers to create and operate integrations.
What are we looking for 
You have a strong track record from working with the JVM ecosystem.


You share our thought that everyone should do their own testing (and are proficient enough with testing frameworks and libraries).


You have excellent communication skills in English (written and spoken).


You want to continue working as a hands-on engineer.


These are a must
 
You live and breathe the JVM ecosystem (specifically Kotlin, Java and Spring).


You enjoy hands-on development work.


You are ready to push yourself to stay on the cutting edge of technology.


You like to work following DevOps practices.


You are interested in working in a multinational team using English.


These are a plus
 
TypeScript


MongoDB


Kafka


Microservices architecture, distributed systems


AWS


Kubernetes


DevOps, PagerDuty, New Relic


JavaScript or Python scripting


Docker, Jenkins

What can we offer
We are a flexible organization with low hierarchy and bureaucracy. A supportive team that tackles challenges together - there are no lone cowboys here. Our product operates globally 24/7. This means we need to have the best technology solutions available, and develop them continuously.

Here's what we can promise:
 
Competitive salary


Employee stock option plan as applicable from time to time


Possibility to work remotely within Finland


Lunch & culture vouchers


Mobile phone benefit


Good level of occupational healthcare


Comprehensive leisure-time accident insurance


Spacious & functional office in Munkkivuori with free parking, gym & lunch restaurant


Great team spirit, a multicultural and fun atmosphere and a supportive working culture.



Additional information
Please note the position requires you to have a valid Work Permit for Finland or be an EU citizen.

Perks and benefits 
 This job comes with several perks and benefits 

Free coffee / tea 
Get your caffeine fix to get you started and keep you going.

Flexible working hours 
Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.

Social gatherings 
Social gatherings and games; hang out with your colleagues.

Near public transit 
Easy access and treehugger friendly workplace.

Free friday beers 
Friday is something special, let's enjoy a beer together.

Skill development 
We want to take you from good to great.

See all 18 benefits 

Working at 
ONEiO 
 
 See company profile 

ONEiO is a cloud-native integration service provider. We are driving the industrial revolution in the enterprise integration space by removing all traditional integration challenges by automating integration delivery and production and providing integrations as a cloud-based, enterprise-grade, secure and always-on service with an affordable pay-per-use pricing model. We are a partner and a service provider for internal and external IT and technology service providers who need to collaborate with different customers, vendors, suppliers, and subcontractors thus need to solve not only internal but also external integration challenges. Founded in 2011 in Helsinki, Finland, and now with offices in Germany, the United Kingdom, and the United States, ONEiO's approach to solving traditional integration delivery and production challenges with their vendor-neutral integration solution has seen rapid demand among European and North American enterprises as well as Managed Services Providers. ONEiO - The Integration Success Company

Read more about ONEiO

Results.Heading: Low-code developer
Results.Descr:
Do you want to be part of a data driven company with easy-going values? Become our next low-code colleague! 

Solita is a digital transformation company driven by data and human insight. We have implemented hundreds of data-driven solutions for large-scale companies and organisations. Automatization of processes with the help of AI and Machine Learning, as well as helping companies create new data-based services are some of our core competences. We have more than 1300 highly skilled specialists in the fields of software development, data, cloud and service design.

Sharing knowledge is one of the cornerstones in our culture. We are constantly developing ourselves by sharing our expertise and best practices with other solitans. By cherishing continuous learning, we make sure that we have interesting projects for the future, and also possibilities for project rotations. You get to do work in a caring and ambitious community that embraces each others' (im)perfections.

To be successful in this position, you should…
  Have basic understanding and/or experience of software development.
Enjoy working in a team with other developers and architects.
Feel comfortable working directly with clients.
It's a big plus if you have some OutSystems experience and an OutSystems developer certificate.
 
What's in it for you
  The possibility to join the team at an early stage and build up your career & competence in low-code development. 
Challenging, impactful projects to work with - not only with dev professionals but also design, cloud and data.
Our culture is self made - trust, responsibility and maximum freedom are in the center of it. We have many subcultures in our dev community so it's easy to find your own place.
The possibility to learn and develop your skills and competence in various ways e.g. via our internal skill-communities, via more formal or casual trainings or by taking on more challenging projects
Flexible working conditions to support the work-life balance - freedom to choose when and where. 
 
Interested to hear more?

We want to hear who you are and what you have done and figure out together what works best for us both. Tell us about yourself and your background in your own words.

Our recruitment consists of two rounds of interviews where you will meet our team and learn more about working at Solita. You will be given the opportunity to show your skills and ask us questions. The purpose is to get to know each other better.

If you have any questions about the role, technologies or work culture don't hesitate to reach out to Pauline, +32 499 92 83 46,  [email protected]

Results.Heading: Developer (Python)
Results.Descr:
Position Description:
 
 Vuonna 1976 perustettu CGI on maailman ja Suomen suurimpia IT- ja liiketoimintakonsultoinnin palveluyhtiöitä - ja tuhansien erilaisten uratarinoiden talo. Lisätietoa www.cgi.fi. 

Python-Developer Paikkatiedon tiimiin

Liiketoimintamme kasvaessa voimakkaasti haemme nyt avaruus- ja kaukokartoitustiimiimme lisää kehittäjiä asiakkaidemme ottaessa avointa teknologiaa käyttöön. Tiimimme kehittää kaukokartoitusperusteisia koneoppimista hyödyntäviä seuranta- ja kuvatulkintamenetelmiä sekä suunnittelee ja toteuttaa niihin liittyviä tietojärjestelmiä. Haluatko sinä mukaan tähän porukkaan?

Tässä roolissa tulisit toimimaan toteutus- ja tuotekehitysprojekteissa sovelluskehittäjän roolissa. Tavoitteenasi on toteuttaa ja olla myös mukana suunnittelemassa moderneja asiakaslähtöisiä sovelluksia avoimeen paikkatietoteknologiaan pohjautuen. Asiakkaidemme tietojärjestelmien toimivuus on yhteiskuntamme kannalta kriittistä ja luonteeltaan useimmiten hyvin tietointensiivistä. 

Rakennat pääosin Helsingissä toimivan tiimisi kanssa tulevaisuuden digitaalista yhteiskuntaa, jossa asiakkaan palveluita kehitetään ketterästi yhdessä asiakkaan asiantuntijoiden kanssa.

Meillä CGI:llä...

... olet member.

Tarjoamme sinulle paitsi työn, jossa voit kehittyä haluamaasi suuntaan, myös mahdollisuuden omistaa yhtiön osakkeita. Koska yli 80 prosenttia henkilöstöstämme on myös omistajia, kutsumme henkilöstöämme membereiksi. Membereinä pääsemme nauttimaan CGI:n taloudellisesta menestyksestä ja rakentamaan toiveidemme mukaista yhtiötä.

... saat olla sellainen kuin olet.

Meitä on 3 700 ympäri Suomen ja meille on tärkeää, että jokainen meistä saa olla työpaikalla oma itsensä. Monimuotoiset tiimimme määrittelevät itse, millaiset joustavat työnteon tavat niille parhaiten sopivat. Meillä työ myös joustaa, kun elämäntilanne sitä vaatii.

... sinusta pidetään huolta.

Meille CGI:n membereille on tärkeää, että tuemme ja autamme aina toisiamme. Et ole koskaan yksin: tuhansista huippuasiantuntijoistamme löytyy aina joku, johon tukeutua. Ja tarjoamme tietysti myös laajan valikoiman henkilöstöetuja, jotka auttavat sinua voimaan paremmin.

... innostut työstäsi - yhä uudelleen.

Meillä viihdytään pitkään, koska kokoisessamme talossa on tarjolla aina uusia uramahdollisuuksia ja niihin siirtyminen on tehty helpoksi. Kun kaipaat vaihtelua, voit ottaa haltuun uuden teknologian, toimialan tai asiakkuuden - ja kun kaipaat työltä joustoa uudessa elämäntilanteessa, sekin järjestyy. Tule meille rakentamaan itsesi näköinen ura!

Näin menestyt kanssamme

Sinulla on jo kertynyt työkokemusta sovelluskehityksestä sekä hyvät Python ja Javascript-taidot. Sinulta löytyy myös mielellään kokemusta tietokannoista (esim. PostgreSQL, PostGIS, Oracle, SQL Server). Eduksi katsomme paikkatiedon ja QGIS-ohjelmiston tuntemuksen. Älä anna odotustemme kuitenkaan lannistaa, vaan tärkeintä on halu oppia ja kehittyä ja toimia ratkaisukeskeisesti ja asiakkaan tarpeiden mukaisesti. 

Roolissa sinulla on halutessasi mahdollista päästä työskentelemään myös Java- ja JavaScript-kehittämisen parissa.

Edellytämme tehtävään sujuvaa kommunikointia suomeksi ja tarpeen mukaan englanniksi.

Kiinnostuitko?

Kesällä on oiva mahdollisuus miettiä työkuvioita, joten haethan tehtävää järjestelmämme kautta 31.8.2022 mennessä klikkaamalla tehtävänkuvauksen alalaidassa olevaa painiketta "I'm Interested".

Olemme lomalla heinäkuun ajan, mutta 8.8. alkaen lisätietoja tehtävästä antaa mielellään tuleva esihenkilösi Marko Määttälä p. 040 7621463.

Perusmuotoinen turvallisuusselvitys tullaan tekemään tehtävän niin vaatiessa. 
 
 Skills:
  JavaScript 
 Python 
 
 
 What you can expect from us:
 
Insights you can act on

While technology is at the heart of our clients' digital transformation, we understand that people are at the heart of business success. 

When you join CGI, you become a trusted advisor, collaborating with colleagues and clients to bring forward actionable insights that deliver meaningful and sustainable outcomes. We call our employees "members" because they are CGI shareholders and owners and owners who enjoy working and growing together to build a company we are proud of. This has been our Dream since 1976, and it has brought us to where we are today - one of the world's largest independent providers of IT and business consulting services.

At CGI, we recognize the richness that diversity brings. We strive to create a work culture where all belong and collaborate with clients in building more inclusive communities. As an equal-opportunity employer, we want to empower all our members to succeed and grow. If you require an accommodation at any point during the recruitment process, please let us know. We will be happy to assist. 

Ready to become part of our success story? Join CGI - where your ideas and actions make a difference.

Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
Tule sellaisena kuin olet. Meillä työn tekemisen tavat rakentuvat sinun ympärillesi ja työskentely on muokattavissa joustavasti jokaisen siilin oman elämäntilanteen mukaan. Siili on sinun kasvualustasi, jonka avulla pääset rakentamaan oman tarinasi.
 
 Oletko sinä seuraava siili? 
 
Tekemisessämme uskomme puhtaaseen koodiin, testiautomaatioon, ketteriin toimintamalleihin sekä pilvipohjaisiin ratkaisuihin. Osaamistaustaasi voi olla mm. Java, Scala, NodeJS, Clojure, ReactJs, AngularJS, Vue.js tai Typescript tai jokin muu ohjelmointikieli, joka antaa pohjaa moderneissa ympäristöissä toimimiseen. Pilvipalveluosaaminen ja/tai kiinnostus (AWS ja Azure) kohtaan katsotaan eduksi.
 
Siili on vastuullinen. Vastuullisuus siilien arjessa näkyy konkreettisesti toteutetuissa projekteissa. Siili konseptoi yhdessä Verohallinnon ja Digi- ja väestöviraston kanssa Kuoleman ekosysteemin, jonka tavoitteena oli luoda visio verkkopalvelusta, joka helpottaisi läheisen kuoleman jälkeen omaisten asiointia. Voit lukea lisää Kuoleman ekosysteemistä täältä . Siili haluaa myös kantaa kortensa kekoon ilmastokriisin selättämisessä. Istutamme vuosittain 43 puuntaimea jokaista työntekijäämme kohti. Istutetuista puista muodostuu SiiliMetsä , joka toimii tehokkaana hiilinieluna sitoen hiilidioksidipäästöjä itseensä).
 
Tutustutaanko lisää?
 
Meillä Siilillä ei ole haastatteluita vaan tapaamisia. Kahden tapaamisen avulla varmistumme yhdessä siitä, että molempien tavoitteet ja toiveet ovat linjassa. Näin saamme rakennettua lähtökohdat loistavalle yhteiselle tulevaisuudelle. Hae alla olevan linkin kautta tai ole yhteydessä Ilonaan (ilona.lapinkyla@siili.com) keskustelujen aloittamiseksi ja kerro meille, millaisista projekteista sinä motivoidut!
 
Tarjoamme sinulle merkityksellisen tehtävän lisäksi turvallisen, vakaan ja inhimillisen työyhteisön, jossa voit itse rakentaa oman polkusi. Luomme yhdessä asiakkaidemme kanssa moderneja digitaalisia palveluita, joita käyttäjät voivat rakastaa. Emme työskentele erillään toisistamme, vaan yhdessä toisiltamme oppien. Kanssamme pääset syventämään osaamistasi ja kehittämään itseäsi eteenpäin sinulle räätälöidyn suunnitelman mukaisesti. Lisäksi Siililtä saat hyvän palkkatason erinomaisilla eduilla höystettynä, tehtävääsi sopivat työkalut ja erilaisia vapaa-ajan aktiviteettejä.
 
MAKE IT REAL

Results.Heading: Senior Fullstack Developer / Mehiläinen
Results.Descr:
Mehiläinen hakee Helsinkiin, Turkuun , Tampereelle tai Jyväskylään vakituiseen työsuhteeseen

SENIOR FULLSTACK-KEHITTÄJÄÄ DIGITAALISIIN PALVELUIHIN

Haluatko tehdä merkityksellistä työtä ihmisten terveyden ja hyvinvoinnin edistämiseksi, jossa yhdistyy sekä vastuu että vapaus?

OmaMehiläinen-palveluamme ja Digiklinikkaa käyttää yli lähes miljoona suomalaista, ja olemme lähteneet myös viemään osaamistamme maailmalle ja kansainvälistämään toimintaamme. Nyt etsimme kokemusta kerryttänyttä, innostunutta ja vastuuntuntoista fullstack-kehittäjää osaksi tiimiämme, jossa rakennetaan maailman parasta digitaalista terveydenhuoltoa.

Tässä roolissa pääset kehittämään mm. Mehiläisen lääkäreille ja muille asiantuntijoille tarkoitettua Mehidocia, jolla on jo lähes 5000 käyttäjää. Mehidoc on hyvin käyttäjälähtöisesti kehitetty sovellus asiantuntijoidemme päivittäisen työn hallintaan sekä oman tarjonnan johtamiseen, ja se löytyy sekä selaimesta että mobiilista. Fullstack-kehittäjänä meillä sinulla on myös mahdollisuus päästä jättämään kädenjälkesi OmaMehiläisestä löytyvään chat-pohjaiseen etävastaanottoomme Digiklinikkaan.

" Jalat maassa, järki päässä ja sydän paikallaan" , kuten yksi devaajistamme sanoi, tiivistää hyvin sen, miksi meillä työskentely kannattaa.

Tässä kuitenkin vielä muutamia muita syitä: Tarjoamme mielekästä, merkityksellistä työtä terveydenhuollon parissa, jossa tekemäsi
Pääset jättämään oman kädenjälkesi yhteen terveysalan kiinnostavimmista ja nopeasti kasvavimmista palveluista. 
Sinulla on oiva tilaisuus päästä vaikuttamaan ja kertomaan omia näkemyksiä, joita meillä todella kuunnellaan ja arvostetaan. 
Sinun ei tarvitse viettää päiviäsi miettien mikromaksuja ja mainospaikkoja, vaan saat keskittyä aidosti asiakkaiden hyvinvointia ja terveyttä tukevien palveluiden kehittämiseen oman työsi kautta. 
Saat ympärillesi tiimin, joka ei ole vain täynnä kovan luokan osaajia, mutta oikeasti hyviä, avuliaita tyyppejä, joiden kanssa on mukava tehdä töitä. Vaihtuvuus tiimissämme onkin todella pientä, mistä olemme erityisen ylpeitä. 
Meillä on toimistot Helsingin, Turun, Jyväskylän ja Tampereen keskustoissa, mutta tuemme joustavaa työskentelyä sekä kotoa & toimistolta! 
Mitä toivomme sinulta:Vahva osaaminen ja kokemus seuraavista: Javascript (Node.js, React, (Redux)), Typescript, relaatiotietokannat.
Lisäksi katsomme eduksi kokemuksen RX & FRP -ohjelmoinnista sekä AWS / GCP -palveluista
Puhut REST-rajapinnoille sujuvasti ja osaat myös tarvittaessa toteuttaa sellaisen tarpeen tullen
Hyvät kommunikointi- ja tiimityöskentelytaidot sekä kyky reagoida ja sopeutua muutoksiin
Kokemus sovellusarkkitehtuurin parista katsotaan eduksesi
Pärjäät loistavasti tässä tehtävässä, mikäli sinulla on kaipaamaamme kokemusta sekä olet vastuuntuntoinen ja auttavainen hyvä tyyppi. Ennen kaikkea haemme tiimiimme henkilöä, jolla on hyvä asenne - meillä tehdään töitä tärkeiden teemojen parissa, can do -asenteella, aina pilke silmäkulmassa ja työstä nauttien.

Kiinnostuitko?

Jätä meille hakemuksesi ja CV:si rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta, niin katsotaan voisimmeko olla hyvä match! Voit jättää hakemuksesi elokuun loppuun mennessä. Koska meillekin on tärkeää nauttia kesästä ja lomista, käymme hakemuksia läpi heinäkuun aikana epäsäännöllisesti ja palaamme vastaamaan niihin elokuun puolella. Lisätietoja roolista voit pyytää Josetta Lehtoselta (josetta.lehtonen@mehilainen.fi) tai Melanie Rinteeltä (melanie.rinne@mehilainen.fi) heinäkuun tai elokuun alussa.

Results.Heading: Azure Developer / Architect
Results.Descr:
Our client provides flexible CNC automation solutions for manufacturing companies around Europe.

They're a family-owned open integrator with over 40 years and 4000 installations of experience with 90+ machine tool brands. The majority of their customers are industrial machine builders or subcontractors of various kinds, located in Europe, North America, and Asia. Improving the productivity and profitability of metalworking manufacturers is their mission.

Their main application fields are pallet and robotic automation - always equipped with their industry-leading production planning and execution software MMS. They also have solutions for automating the production and resource planning of stand-alone machine tools.

Responsibilities

Architect:

 * Architect, design and build the client's new cloud-based solutions integrating customers' production and IT systems
 * Participate in planning the new concepts and technical implementation
 * Cloud architecture and development ownership
 * Work closely with internal and external stakeholders

Developer:

* Design, develop and maintain the client's new cloud-based solutions

 * Working closely with Product Owners and feature teams to design, develop and maintain new features
 * Hands-on developing their Cloud Services
 * DevOps, unit and integration testing related to microservice and API development
 * Co-developing with software partners at detailed level
 * Collaborating closely with other development teams, software architects, partners, project managers and stakeholders

Requirements: 

Architect:

* Several years of experience in technical or industrial operations.
 * Strong skills with cloud services, especially Azure platform services
 * Strong experience in some of the following programming languages/frameworks: .NET, C#, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Angular
 * Architected, designed, built, deployed, and managed Azure PaaS applications and services
 * DevOps experience and attitude
 * Strong communications and team working skills
 * Remote working is an option but presence in Tampere office is needed at least 1-2 days a week
 * University degree or corresponding knowledge in software technologies.
 * Ability to work closely with technical leads and architects in the development of cloud services

Developer:

 * Experience or strong interest in cloud technologies (MS Azure preferred)
 * Experience with Agile frameworks (Scrum)
 * Strong experience in some of the following programming languages/frameworks: .NET, C#, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript
 * DevOps experience and attitude
 * Fluent English skills
 * Strong communications and team working skills
 * Remote working is an option but presence in Tampere office is needed at least 1-2 days a week

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

Benjamin Wilson-Lake

b.wilson-lake@frankgroup.com

+358 9 42452358

https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjaminwilsonlake/

Whilst this position offers remote working all candidates must be located inside Finland with a valid work Visa.

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

Results.Heading: BI Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a BI Developer to assist our clients in generating meaningful data-driven insights.
 
 Gambit Quantic (part of Atea) supports businesses to become data-driven by offering business intelligence, machine-learning expertise and state-of-the-art data integrations. We do this by providing high-end consulting services and tailored software solutions.
 
 In this role, you would collect internal and external client data and use it to develop and create Business Intelligence applications for various areas of our customers' businesses, such as financial, manufacturing and HR. The ideal candidate is analytical, has a genuine interest in data processing and can easily comprehend complex entireties. If you are used to using figures, reports and analytics tools that's a big plus.
 
 Your daily tasks and responsibilities:
 
 - Locating, analysing, and verifying data.
 - Spotting trends and areas for client purposes.
 - Developing KPI:s that identify critical business development for our clients.
 - Managing BI projects from start to finish.
 - Meetings with involved stakeholders to present findings that support decision-making.
 - Working with data analytics tools and visualization platforms.
 - Supporting and collaborating with colleagues on a daily basis.
 - Guarantying security and confidentiality of all material related to BI operations.
 
 What we are looking for:
 
 - A degree in data analytics, computer science or economics.
 - Preferably a background (3-5 years) within data or business intelligence.
 - Skills in data mining, business intelligence tools (e.g. Power BI, Qlik or similar), data processing frameworks and report writing.
 - Insights in automation, machine learning and database management.
 - Capability to utilize different technologies, such as SQL, RPA, NLP, API:s and data visualization platforms.
 - A business-minded attitude towards data and the opportunities it offers companies.
 - Great analytical expertise, critical thinking skills and a genuine interest in data.
 - A solution-oriented mindset and ability to comprehend the big picture.
 - Very good collaboration and leadership qualities.
 - Great presentation skills and a customer-oriented mindset.
 
 Joining our crew
 In your role as BI Developer, you would enjoy the support of the entire Gambit/Atea organization, with a high-profile and experienced sales team. We can offer a positive work environment, low hierarchy, strong brand recognition and fantastic and fun colleagues. Your work location would be Runsor, Vaasa or Pietarsaari.
 
 Next steps
 If you are up for the challenge, please use this form to send us your application. The position will be filled when we find the right person so send us your application as soon as possible and we'll get back to you! If you have questions, you are welcome to contact our Head of Data Science Daniel Djupsjöbacka.

Yhteystiedot  Emma Granholm, 050 408 3075, emma.granholm@gambitgroup.fi
 Työpaikan osoite  65380 VAASA
 Työ alkaa  As agreed
 Työaika kokoaikatyö
 Työn kesto yli 12 kuukautta
 Haku päättyy  03.09.2022
 Ilmoitus jätetty  29.06.2022
 Ilmoitusnumero  11494611

Results.Heading: Software Developer (C++ / Qt)
Results.Descr:
Are you an experienced and challenge loving C++ expert with Qt twist? Are you interested in working in big project with a complex architecture? Do you see international environment as an asset? If so, we have the most exciting position to offer for you! 
 
 Siili_Auto is The Qt Company trusted scaling Premium Service Partner. Thanks to that, you would have an opportunity to use/up-skill your Qt knowledge and develop new products worldwide! You would be an essential part of our projects for major car manufacturers worldwide by building prototypes and production software or working closely with our technology partners to help us develop the Automotive Industry's needs. Please check our credentials: Siili Auto - Showreel , Origo Steering Wheel , or AutonoMIA . 
 
If any of this sounds interesting, we strongly encourage you to check out our website auto.siili.com where we showcase some of our most innovative and award-winning work, as well as the showcase of the customers and partners you can expect to work with after joining us.
 
What it takes to succeed in this position? 
  Your main competence should be with C++ and/or Qt, at least 3 years of experience with your chosen language is required. 
Understand the requirements and constraints of embedded software development
Fluent Finnish or English skills in addition to good communication skills
A craftsmanship attitude with passion for quality
 If you have expertise in QNX, don't hesitate to get in touch because there is a real need for your expertise, even if not all criteria match! 
 
Bonus competences that help in this position: 
  Experienced in system bring-up and module integration
Understanding of agile software development and modern Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery processes
 
We offer: 
 
At Siili you can expect to thrive and to learn with colleagues who are driven towards excellence. Working at Siili means that you get to be the master of your own work - we trust you, which also means that you are able to work independently (empowerment & decision making) and flexibly. With us, you get to work with colleagues who challenge you every day and expect the same from you. There are more than 900 of us in Europe and the US, and we keep growing. This means we are constantly improving and evolving the ways we operate. We offer a great ride for those who enjoy the new possibilities it has to offer!
 
The atmosphere of our place is relaxed and highly professional at the same time. Our company's philosophy is to empower people to take responsibility and become true heroes in their respective areas of expertise. We work in self-organizing teams where everyone brings value and is able to make use of the skills to the fullest extent. People and interactions matter here.
 
If you are a master in your field and recognize yourself as the One - please, come and meet us. Let us show you that work can be enjoyable and meaningful at the same time. If you have any question, please contact: jenni.raaska@siili.com . We are already waiting for you!

Results.Heading: RekryKoulutus: Test Automation Developer Trainee, 2 paikkaa, Cinia Oy / Jyväskylä, Jyväskylä
Results.Descr:
Cinian ohjelmistoratkaisuissa teemme modernia softakehitystä eri alojen toimijoille ja tuemme näin asiakkaidemme digitaalista kehitystä. Arjessamme yhdistyy projektitalon ja tuotekehittämisen parhaat puolet; Pitkäjänteiset jatkuvat asiakkuutemme tarjoavat vakautta ja toisaalta mahdollisuuksia työtehtävien vaihtuvuuteen ja kaikki tämä oman tiimin kanssa kätevästi hybridimallissa. Teemme tietoturvallisia ratkaisuja tiiminä, yhteen hiileen puhaltaen ja innokkaasti innovoiden.

Test Automation Developer Trainee

Etsimme joukkoomme teknisesti orientoitunutta henkilöä vastaamaan testauksen automatisoinnista. Tässä tehtävässä sinulla voi olla koulutustaustaa tekniseltä alalta tai jo kertynyttä kokemusta työelämästä tai harrastusten kautta. Kaikista tärkeintä on kuitenkin halusi ja motivaatiosi oppia ja kehittyä testauksen monipuoliseksi asiantuntijaksi! Tulet osallistumaan projekteissamme testiautomaation kehittämiseen ja ylläpitoon ja kiinnostustamme sinua kohtaan lisää kaikenlainen muu osaaminen työkaluihin, ympäristöihin ja menetelmiin liittyen eli kerrothan rohkeasti kaikesta osaamisestasi meille! Tyyppinä olet sujuva kommunikoija ja iloinen työasenteesi välittyy tiimillesi asti. Työkielemme on suomi ja toivomme myös lisäksi englannin kielen taitoa. Tule osaksi ihmisläheistä hupparikansayhteisöä ja alhaisen byrokratian organisaatiota, jossa kollegat odottavat sinua jo mukaan!

Uusi työ asiantuntijakoulutuksesta

Tämä työpaikka on auki Smart Code Academy- Rekrykoulutuksen kautta. Smart Code Academy tarjoaa sinulle ainutlaatuisen mahdollisuuden aloittaa uudet työtehtävät, sekä kasvattaa samanaikaisesti alan osaamistasi asiantuntijakoulutuksen kautta.Testauksessa riittää tehtävää!

Voit olla jo kokeneempi asiantuntija tai alalle vastavalmistunut tekijä - meille tärkeintä on halusi kasvaa testauksen asiantuntijaksi sekä motivaatiosi kehittää omaa osaamistasi. Sinun ei siis välttämättä tarvitse olla vielä hakuvaiheessa valmis asiantuntija.

Ohjelmassa yhdistyvät käytännön työtehtävät sekä testauksen asiantuntijakoulutus ainutlaatuisella tavalla. Ohjelma antaa sinulle aidon mahdollisuuden vaikuttaa uraasi sekä löytää tulevan työpaikkasi.

-Koulutuksesta eväät työllistymiseen. Koulutusohjelman tärkeimpänä tavoitteena on työllistää sinut yhteistyöyritykseen 6kk ohjelman päätteeksi. Koulutus on osallistujille maksuton.
-Asiantuntijuus uudelle tasolle. Saat ohjelman aikana laadukasta koulutusta alan johtavilta tekijöiltä 20-25 koulutuspäivän myötä, sekä pääset hyödyntämään oppimaasi suoraan uusissa työtehtävissäsi. Lopputuloksena kasvatat oman asiantuntijuutesi uudelle tasolle.
-Ohjelma avaa useita erilaisia urapolkuja. Testauksen työtehtävät ovat entistä kysytympiä taitoja ja uusista osaajista on kasvava tarve.

Lue lisää Smart Testing Academystä https://www.saranen.fi/rekrytointikoulutus/smart-testing-academy

Sivuilta löydät myös tarkemmat hakuohjeet ohjelmaan sekä pääset tutustumaan aiempien osallistujien kokemuksiin ohjelmasta.

Results.Heading: Developer, Qasvu Oy, Lääkärikeskus Aava, Helsinki
Results.Descr:
Etsimme asiakkaallemme Lääkärikeskus Aavalle Developeria (TypeScript, Node.js + React) työskentelemään monipuolisten ja modernien terveysalan palveluiden parissa. Aavalla pääset osaksi itseohjautuvaa ja innostavaa tiimiä, jossa tehdään merkityksellistä työtä lasten ja aikuisten terveyden parantamiseksi. Lue tehtävästä lisää alta ja jätä hakemuksesi siihen jo tänään!

Miksi töihin Aavalle? 

Lääkärikeskus Aava ja Pikkujätti ovat osa täysin kotimaisessa omistuksessa olevaa Aho Group -perheyhtiötä. Yritys on edistänyt terveyttä ja hyvinvointia yli 50 vuotta ja työllistää reilu 1300 ammattilaista. Lääkärikeskus Aavan tavoitteena on alan paras asiakas-, lääkäri- ja työntekijäkokemus. Tällä hetkellä Aavalla tehdään siirtymää transaktiopohjaisesta kivijalkaliiketoiminnasta kohti kokonaisvaltaista terveyden ylläpitoa ja kehitystä. Yhtiössä ei haluta ainoastaan saada ihmisiä hoitamaan oireitaan lääkärin vastaanotolle, vaan tavoitteena on auttaa asiakkaita pysymään terveenä. Tässä digitaaliset ratkaisut ovat avainasemassa.

Lääkärikeskus Aavan digikehitystiimissä nykytekeminen aloitettiin vuonna 2017 yhteistyössä Reaktorin kanssa. Tänä päivänä tiimissä työskentelee 15 alan ammattilaista ja työskentelyssä arvostetaan erityisesti avoimuutta, luottamusta sekä muiden huomioimista. Tiimi toimii itseohjautuvasti ja vastaa itse omasta tekemisestään. Lääkärikeskus Aavalla panostetaan myös työhyvinvointiin ja työssä jaksamiseen sekä tarjotaan mahdollisuus etätyöhön sekä joustaviin työjärjestelyihin (kuten halutessaan 4-päiväiseen työviikkoon).

Työtehtävät: 

Tehtävässä pääset kehittämään moderneja terveysalan palveluita kokeneessa ja motivoituneessa seurassa. Tarvetta on monipuoliselle ja monenlaiselle osaamiselle, ja lopullinen tehtävänkuva onkin muokattavissa valittavan henkilön kokemuksen ja kiinnostuksen pohjalta. Tiimissä kehitetään henkilöasiakkaiden palveluita, työterveysasiakkaiden ratkaisuja, ennaltaehkäisevää terveydenhuoltoa sekä palveluita hoitohenkilökunnan työn helpottamiseen. Teknologioista ja työkaluista käytössä on mm. TypeScript, Node.js, React, GraphQL, T-SQL, AWS, Docker, PostgreSQL, Github, Slack, Figma, Confluence ja Jira. Tiimissä ollaan avoimia miettimään uusia työtä ja kehitysympäristön toimintaa parantavia ratkaisuja. Techejä tulee ja menee - siksi Aavalla keskitytään ensisijaisesti ratkaisuihin.

Kuka sinä olet? 

Tässä tehtävässä menestyy oppimiskykyinen ja tiimityöskentelystä innostuva ohjelmistokehittäjä. Voit olla jo hiukan osaamista kerryttänyt tekijä (1+ vuotta kokemusta) tai kokeneempi alan ammattilainen. Arvostamme ennen kaikkea modernien teknologioiden osaamista sekä halua kehittyä omassa työssään. Sinulla on osaamista etenkin TypeScriptistä, Node.js:stä sekä Reactista. Katsomme eduksi kiinnostuksen ja osaamisen backend-kehitykseen ja/tai devopsiin. Tulet toimeen suomen kielellä.

Mikäli tunnistat seuraavia asioita itsestäsi, saatat olla etsimämme devaaja: 

-Sinulla on vähintään vuoden kokemus modernista ohjelmistokehityksestä
- TypeScript, Node.js sekä React ovat sinulle tuttuja teknologioita
- Työskentelet mielelläsi tiimissä ja arvostat keskustelua sekä yhdessä tekemistä
- Haluat tehdä merkityksellistä työtä ja olla mukana kehittämässä terveyspalveluita eteenpäin
- Kielitaitosi on suomi

Jos tunnistit itsesi, hae tehtävään jo tänään! Etenemme potentiaalisten hakijoiden kanssa nopealla aikataululla. 

Aloitus: Sovittavissa/kesän jälkeen

Työaika: Kokoaikainen 

Työn kesto: Vakituinen

Toimipiste: Kamppi, Helsinki

Palkkamalli: Kuukausipalkkaus sopimuksen mukaan

Results.Heading: RekryKoulutus: Test Automation Developer Trainee
Results.Descr:
Cinian ohjelmistoratkaisuissa teemme modernia softakehitystä eri alojen toimijoille ja tuemme näin asiakkaidemme digitaalista kehitystä. Arjessamme yhdistyy projektitalon ja tuotekehittämisen parhaat puolet; Pitkäjänteiset jatkuvat asiakkuutemme tarjoavat vakautta ja toisaalta mahdollisuuksia työtehtävien vaihtuvuuteen ja kaikki tämä oman tiimin kanssa kätevästi hybridimallissa. Teemme tietoturvallisia ratkaisuja tiiminä, yhteen hiileen puhaltaen ja innokkaasti innovoiden.
 
 Test Automation Developer Trainee
 
 Etsimme joukkoomme teknisesti orientoitunutta henkilöä vastaamaan testauksen automatisoinnista. Tässä tehtävässä sinulla voi olla koulutustaustaa tekniseltä alalta tai jo kertynyttä kokemusta työelämästä tai harrastusten kautta. Kaikista tärkeintä on kuitenkin halusi ja motivaatiosi oppia ja kehittyä testauksen monipuoliseksi asiantuntijaksi! Tulet osallistumaan projekteissamme testiautomaation kehittämiseen ja ylläpitoon ja kiinnostustamme sinua kohtaan lisää kaikenlainen muu osaaminen työkaluihin, ympäristöihin ja menetelmiin liittyen eli kerrothan rohkeasti kaikesta osaamisestasi meille! Tyyppinä olet sujuva kommunikoija ja iloinen työasenteesi välittyy tiimillesi asti. Työkielemme on suomi ja toivomme myös lisäksi englannin kielen taitoa. Tule osaksi ihmisläheistä hupparikansayhteisöä ja alhaisen byrokratian organisaatiota, jossa kollegat odottavat sinua jo mukaan!
 
 Uusi työ asiantuntijakoulutuksesta
 
 Tämä työpaikka on auki Smart Code Academy- Rekrykoulutuksen kautta. Smart Code Academy tarjoaa sinulle ainutlaatuisen mahdollisuuden aloittaa uudet työtehtävät, sekä kasvattaa samanaikaisesti alan osaamistasi asiantuntijakoulutuksen kautta.Testauksessa riittää tehtävää!
 
 Voit olla jo kokeneempi asiantuntija tai alalle vastavalmistunut tekijä - meille tärkeintä on halusi kasvaa testauksen asiantuntijaksi sekä motivaatiosi kehittää omaa osaamistasi. Sinun ei siis välttämättä tarvitse olla vielä hakuvaiheessa valmis asiantuntija.
 
 Ohjelmassa yhdistyvät käytännön työtehtävät sekä testauksen asiantuntijakoulutus ainutlaatuisella tavalla. Ohjelma antaa sinulle aidon mahdollisuuden vaikuttaa uraasi sekä löytää tulevan työpaikkasi.
 
 -Koulutuksesta eväät työllistymiseen. Koulutusohjelman tärkeimpänä tavoitteena on työllistää sinut yhteistyöyritykseen 6kk ohjelman päätteeksi. Koulutus on osallistujille maksuton.
 -Asiantuntijuus uudelle tasolle. Saat ohjelman aikana laadukasta koulutusta alan johtavilta tekijöiltä 20-25 koulutuspäivän myötä, sekä pääset hyödyntämään oppimaasi suoraan uusissa työtehtävissäsi. Lopputuloksena kasvatat oman asiantuntijuutesi uudelle tasolle.
 -Ohjelma avaa useita erilaisia urapolkuja. Testauksen työtehtävät ovat entistä kysytympiä taitoja ja uusista osaajista on kasvava tarve.
 
 Lue lisää Smart Testing Academystä https://www.saranen.fi/rekrytointikoulutus/smart-testing-academy
 
 Sivuilta löydät myös tarkemmat hakuohjeet ohjelmaan sekä pääset tutustumaan aiempien osallistujien kokemuksiin ohjelmasta.

 Sarasen osaamisprofiili toimii käyntikorttinasi, jonka kautta pääset kertomaan taustastasi, osaamisestasi ja motivaatiostasi.
 
 Koulutuksesta järjestetään VirtuaaliMiitti -tilaisuus 16.8.2022 klo 13-14 ja mukana on ohjelman järjestäjä Saranen Consulting Oy.

Results.Heading: Frontend Developer
Results.Descr:
WithSecure delivers research-led cyber security to defend organizations, society and people from real-world attacks and build resilience into their approach. Our people are a mix of technical and creative experts - diverse, talented, and passionate people - working tirelessly to help us advance the industry with new ways of thinking. They lead their own development, in and out of the office. They call the shots when it comes to building a place to call home in our organization. 

WithSecure is looking for a full stack software developer to join our global team. The successful candidate will help to deliver our Managed Detection and Response (MDR) service, Countercept, which defends organisations against targeted cyber attacks. The MDR development team designs and develops technology for our internal operations teams.

We are looking for a skilled and motivated full stack software engineer to work on the web interfaces and data processing and visualisation tools that the Countercept operations teams use to deliver and communicate the service to our customers.

The location for the position is at our offices in Finland either Helsinki or Oulu - but we do offer extensive possibilities for remote working from within Finland.

Key Responsibilities...
Design and implement web applications that are used by our security operations and customer experience teams 
Design, implement and maintain Frontend visualizations of data processing and analysis tools that are used by our security operations team 
Brainstorm, define, and build collaboratively with members across multiple teams within MDR - DevOps, Platform Management, Detection & Response Team 
Enforce good software engineering processes, from design through to QA 
Add your perspective to influence the engineering culture of the development team 
Constantly re-evaluate our product to improve architecture, user experience, performance and stability 
Be an energetic 'self-starter' with the ability to take ownership and be accountable for deliverables.

You'll use...
Svelte / SvelteKit as our UI Framework
Storybook & Figma 
GraphQL and OpenAPI 
DB - SQL, NoSQL, OpenSearch 
AWS services 
CI/CD technologies, e.g. Jenkins 
Linux, Docker, Kubernetes 

What we are looking for...
ideally 3+ years' experience in software engineering - but we're open to less! 
Passion and an eye for good design and UX 
Experience with two or more product deliveries 
A versatile programmer who can rapidly build proof-of-concept solutions but knows when a disciplined approach is needed (e.g. when modifying critical services!) 
Familiarity with fundamental security concepts, e.g. certificates and encryption, and common networking protocols such as DNS and HTTP/S 
Degree educated, with at least a 2.1 in a numerate subject such as Computer Science, Maths, Engineering 
Innovative mindset, to work on unique solutions to common problems 
Ability to grasp the inner workings and philosophy of the WithSecure Countercept service 
Ability to work in a multicultural environment with English as your working language 

Bonus points...
Experience developing solutions using AWS, AWS-native services and a microservices architecture 
Experience with security products such as firewalls, proxies and VPN's 
Experience in languages (Rust, Go, Python) is a bonus - knowledge of comparable languages will be considered 
Experience with Svelte or similar JS frameworks like React, Vue.js, Angular, etc.. 

Our four promises to you...
You will have the freedom and flexibility to define new methods and products for solving real world challenges
You will develop your expertise in current technologies whilst increasing your exposure to the information security space
You will work together with experienced and enthusiastic colleagues, and within WithSecure you'll find some of the best minds in the cyber security industry
Your work will be clearly visible - all over the world

Results.Heading: Cloud Developer,  Full-Stack Developer or DevOps Engineer to Cargotec
Results.Descr:
We are currently looking for Developers to different roles to our client company Cargotec. Their Digital Solutions Hub creates data-driven software and services for intelligent cargo handling for all of the three Cargotec businesses: Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor. If you are passionate about software development and eager to learn new skills, this might be a perfect opportunity for you! 

About the role

By using cutting-edge cloud technologies and industry best practices, Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub is responsible for driving digital transformation and accelerating the development of software solutions across Cargotec.

Sustainability is at the core of everything they do and they strive to make global trade smarter and eco-friendly while securing the growth of new digital business for Cargotec and its customers. Cargotec is a leading provider of cargo and load handling solutions globally so your actions will have a great impact on the industry.

You will be working in an agile, cross-functional, and international team utilizing modern software development and testing.

We offer

The possibility to collaborate with a highly skilled group of developers to deliver innovative solutions

A great chance to develop your skills and grow inside the role



Job duties

There are three potential roles for you: Cloud Developer, Full-Stack Developer, or DevOps Engineer:
Cloud Developer works on implementing REST APIs, microservice containers, and serverless data processing components on our IoT cloud platform, using e.g. Typescript, Python or Java, and works with AWS services like ECS, RDS, Lambda, Glue, S3, and IoT Core.
Full-Stack Developer works on application development, implementing Web and mobile applications for our customers using e.g. Javascript/Typescript, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, React and React Native.
DevOps Engineer works on developing automation for the purpose of streamlining, implementing, and testing software components using e.g. Ansible, AWS CloudFormation, and Jenkins.

For more information about Digital Solutions Hub visit: their web pages

We are looking for

Relevant academical backgound majoring in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent
Proficiency in one or more programming languages including Java, Javascript/Node.js, or Python
Depending on the role, some experience in application development, AWS cloud technologies, or DevOps tools
Fluent English skills

As a person you are

Eagerness to learn new technologies
Strong analytical and problem solving skills
Communication skills, ability to influence, explain, collaborate, and inform

Additional information

Start: As soon as possible

Working hours: Full-time

Employment period: 6 months, with the possibility to continue after this

Location: Tampere

We are continuously screening and contacting candidates so make sure to send your application as soon as possible.

Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase. Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work. It is a request from Cargotec that all questions regarding the position is handled by Academic Work

Client information

Read more about Cargotec Oyj

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä, Full Stack
Results.Descr:
Vitabalans Oy on yksityisomistuksessa oleva suomalainen lääketehdas, joka kehittää, valmistaa ja markkinoi resepti- ja itsehoitolääkkeitä, ravintolisiä, lääkinnällisiä laitteita sekä eläinten täydennysrehuja ja hoitotuotteita. Päämarkkina-alueemme on Suomi, ja lisäksi tuotteitamme viedään oman myyntiorganisaatiomme voimin 13 maahan Euroopassa.
 
 Haemme toistaiseksi voimassa olevaan työsuhteeseen OHJELMISTOKEHITTÄJÄÄ vahvistamaan Hämeenlinnan konttorillamme työskentelevää kehitystiimiä.
 
 Ohjelmistokehittäjänä toimit osana ketterää kehitystiimiämme, joka suunnittelee ja kehittää monipuolisia in-house-ohjelmistotuotteita. Tarjoamme mahdollisuuden työskennellä asiakasrajapinnassa lääketehtaan eri osastoilla esimerkiksi markkinoinnin, tuotannon, logistiikan ja laadun ratkaisujen parissa.
 
 Olet etsimämme henkilö, jos sinulla on kokemusta ohjelmistojen kehittämisestä, palava halu kehittää itseäsi, ylpeyttä omasta työstäsi, ja sydämesi sykkii yhdelle tai useammalle seuraavista:
 
 C# / .NET Framework
 PHP / Laravel Framework
 JavaScript / Vue.js
 Tietokannat / SQL
 Pilvialustat
 CI/CD
 
 Tarjoamme sinulle:
 vakituisen työsuhteen vakavaraisessa yrityksessä
 mielenkiintoisen kehitysympäristön Suomen suomalaisimmassa lääketehtaassa
 mahdollisuuden nähdä työsi jäljen heti tuotannossa
 ympäristön kasvaa ja kehittyä erilaisten projektien kautta
 
 Kiinnostuitko? Hae rohkeasti!
 Lähetä CV tai linkki GitHub/LinkedIn-profiiliisi ja kerro lyhyesti miksi olet kiinnostunut työskentelystä meillä osoitteeseen recruitment@vitabalans.fi otsikolla "Ohjelmistokehittäjä". Paikka täytetään heti sopivan henkilön löydyttyä.

Vitabalans Oy on vuonna 1980 perustettu yksityisomistuksessa oleva vakavarainen suomalainen lääketehdas, joka kehittää, valmistaa ja markkinoi resepti- ja itsehoitolääkkeitä, ravintolisiä, lääkinnällisiä laitteita sekä eläinten täydennysrehuja ja hoitotuotteita. Päämarkkina-alue on Suomi, lisäksi tuotteita viedään oman myyntiorganisaation voimin 13 maahan Euroopassa. Pääkonttori ja tuotantolaitokset (lääke- ja ravintolisätehtaat) sijaitsevat kaikki Hämeenlinnassa. 
 Vitabalansin tuotteilla on Avainlippu-tunnus.
