Results.Heading: Full Stack Developer
Results.Descr:
Position: Full Stack Developer 

Sanoma Media Finland's (SMF) Technology is an organisation operating at the very heart of the fast-paced media world. We develop digital services and create Innovations for Helsingin Sanomat, Ilta-Sanomat, Aamulehti, Nelonen Media and tens of other leading media brands.

Do you want your work to directly monetize the biggest media brands in Finland? Do you want your work to contribute to help our journalists and media brands to be independent? 

In Sanoma's B2B Digi (Digital E2E Advertising Technology) team, we develop digital advertising products and services using modern front end and backend technologies. We develop E2E self-serving tools to support our advertisers/clients. We drive and deliver digital advertising across all media brands within Sanoma, handle numerous integrations with our advertising partners and different data platforms to meet our business specific needs. Most of our development work is driven directly by our B2B Digital Business and we closely Collaborate with our Advertising Operations (Ad-Ops), Data Science, Data Platform, News Platform and Software Development Teams from different Media Units. Working together with the dynamic B2B digital business along with modern technologies and tools will give you a great opportunity to develop your technical skills and gain a great view on the fast-moving and exciting media industry. We use modern technologies such as, Javascript+HTML5, VueJs, Python, AWS, Azure, NodeJs, C#, Docker, Github, and Datadog.

Your role will be Software Developer in our B2B Digi team, helping the B2B digital business organisation in their journey towards an increasingly digital future.

As a full stack developer you will develop solutions along with business stakeholders, architects, lead developers and other developers. You'll be working in front end or backend technologies, integrating different web SDKs, APIs, data integrations, and work with SaaS applications/tools. You will also help in developing and extending modern dev-ops practices and test automations. You will work following the Agile based work culture and frameworks.

We are looking for:
In front-end (JavaScript/HTML5, VueJs orReact)
Python 
AWS or Azure practitioner knowledge, Nodejs, SQL.
2 to 5 years of experience in frontend/backend technologies 
Willingness to learn new technologies
Excellent knowledge and work background on Agile and DevOps methodologies incl. good quality and level of Automation
Excellent co-work skills with stakeholders from business, technology, and partners.
Mindset looking to continuously improve development practices, assist with troubleshooting, debugging, and knowledge sharing within a team.
Enthusiastic work attitude and person who can actively collaborate with different teams.
Good written and spoken English language skills

Nice-to-have wish list:
Media / Advertising industry experience.
Experience with platforms like CDP, DMP, Salesforce etc.
Tag Managers like Adobe Launch

Why Sanoma? We:
have an open culture that supports your development and offers international work surroundings,
great senior team around you to spar with
rotation / pair work opportunities around different business components and technologies inside the Digi area
excellent chances to develop yourself in a challenging and rapidly evolving media / advertising industry,
work-life balance so that you can harmonize your job with your family and personal life,
workplace located in the heart of Helsinki / hybrid working model,

Interested? Make your move and apply now.

Work location: Helsinki

If you have any questions, please contact Zahoor Khan ( zahoor.khan@sanoma.com ) or Jaana Tanskanen (jaana.tanskanen@sanoma.com)

Benefits 
  Sanomain Kerhon toiminta (esim. liikuntajaos, viinikerho, kulttuuritapahtumat jne.)
E-passi
Tasokas työterveyshuolto
Ryhmäliikuntaa
Lomamökit mm. Vierumäellä ja Rukalla
Henkilöstörahasto
 

Sanoma Tech & Data 

Sanoma Tech&Data on mediayhtiö Sanoman teknologiaorganisaatio, joka työllistää yli 100 IT- ja data-asiantuntijaa ympäri Suomen. 

Vastaamme mm. Ilta-Sanomien, Helsingin Sanomien, Nelonen Median ja kymmenien muiden Suomen johtavien mediabrändien digitaalisten palveluiden kehityksestä ja innoivoinnista varmistaen samalla liiketoimintaprosessien toimivuuden. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat myös infrastruktuurin ja liiketoimintasovellusten luotettavan toiminnan ja jatkuvan kehityksen. 

Kehittämillämme kuluttaja- ja mainosliiketoiminnan palveluilla on miljoonia käyttäjiä ja saamme olla tukemassa yhteiskunnallisesti merkittävää journalismia. Data on tekemisessämme keskiössä. 

Sovellamme joustavaa työkulttuuria ja tarjoamme mahdollisuuden työskennellä etänä - myös normaalioloissa. Meillä voit kehittää omaa osaamistasi monipuolisten tehtävien ja koulutustarjonnan kautta. Pääset osaksi huippuluokan kehittäjä- ja datatiimiämme Tampereella ja Helsingissä.

Contact: 
 rekrytointi@sanoma.fi

Results.Heading: Mobile Developer - Tampere, Espoo
Results.Descr:
Tule meille rakentamaan mobiilipalveluja niin kuluttajille kuin teollisuuteen. Asiakkaamme vaihtelevat startupeista kansainvälisiin yrityksiin, ja pääset vaikuttamaan niin isoissa kuin pienissä projekteissa. Olemme mm. olleet auttamassa Tikkurilaa ja Buildieta digiaskelissaan. Meillä pääset työskentelemään seuraavilla teknologioilla: Swift, Objective-C, Java, Kotlin, React Native ja Flutter.
 
 Etsimme kokenutta mobiilikehittäjää
 Haemme nyt joukkoomme devaajaa, joka tuntee mobiilialustat kuin omat taskunsa. Toimit läheisessä yhteistyössä tiimiläistesi kanssa luoden ratkaisuja asiakkaillemme. Autat asiakkaitamme löytämään sopivan ratkaisun heidän kulloiseenkin haasteeseensa. Tarvittaessa pääset tukemaan osaamisellasi uuden myyntiä kuin myös tiimitovereita.
 
 Mitä sinun tulisi saavuttaa ensimmäisenä vuonna?
 Tavoitteesi on saavuttaa vankka jalansija joukossamme rautaisena ammattilaisena. Teet projektitöitä tiimin jäsenenä ja kykenet ottamaan vastaan myös itsenäisiä tehtäviä. Annat oman panoksesi osaamisalueesi kehittämiseen talossamme tuomalla ajatuksesi ja mielipiteesi esille.
 
 Tarvittavat tiedot ja taidot
 Ennakkotiedot ja -taidot

- Hyvät viestintätaidot - Vuorovaikutus on tärkeä osa työtäsi ja tulet keskustelemaan paljon niin asiakkaiden kuin kollegoiden kanssa.
 - Kokemus iOS-, Android-, React Native - tai Flutter-kehityksestä - olet ehtinyt jo harjaannuttaa taitojasi sovelluskehitysprojekteissa ja ymmärrät modernin mobiilisovelluskehityksen päälle.
 
 Lisäksi arvostamme, jos sinulta löytyy kokemusta seuraavista:

- Kokemus mobiilisovellusten julkaisusta (CI/CD)
 - Testaamisen suunnittelu ja toteuttaminen
 
 Lupaamme sinulle
 Huld on kansainvälisesti ainutlaatuinen teknologia- ja suunnittelutalo. Tarjoamme uniikin yhdistelmän softa- ja tuotekehitystä, ja projektiesi aihepiirit voivat vaihdella terveydenhuollosta teollisuuteen tai maankuoren tutkimisesta ilmakehään ja avaruuteen asti.
 
 Kulttuurimme perustuu humaaniin kanssakäymiseen ja matalaan hierarkiaan. Meillä voit olla oma itsesi. Vaalimme henkilökohtaista kasvua sekä kehitystä: tarjoamme sinulle aikaa ja mahdollisuuksia kehittää osaamistasi ja ammattitaitoasi. Kerro, minne haluat uraasi viedä ja me löydämme tavan tukea sinua tavoitteissasi.
 
 Huldilla sinulla on aito mahdollisuus vaikuttaa työhön ja työskentelytapoihin. Vaikka olemme ylpeitä monista saavutuksistamme, tiedostamme, että aina on varaa kehittyä. Tuomalla juuri sinun näkökulmasi ja osaamisesi esiin voit olla osa muutosta. Ideat ja ehdotukset ovat aina tervetulleita, arvostamme rohkeutta myös tällä saralla!
 
 Työhyvinvoinnin tukemiseksi tarjoamme sinulle etuja kuten sportti- ja kulttuuriedun, mahdollisuuden työsuhdepolkupyörään, työterveydenhuollon ja lisätyt vakuutusturvat. Toimistoilla on virvokkeita, pientä purtavaa ja rento meininki.
 
 Kuulostaako hyvältä?
 Jos löydät itsesi tästä kuvauksesta, klikkaa Lähetä hakemus ja jätä meille hakemuksesi CV:n ja palkkatoiveesi kera. Kerro meille itsestäsi ja osaamisestasi. Haluamme kuulla lisää sinusta!
 
 Käsittelemme hakemuksia jatkuvasti, mutta hae viimeistään 31.8.2022. Prosessi kestää yleensä 1-4 viikkoa sisältäen yhden tai kaksi haastattelua. Kaikille hakijoille ilmoitetaan etenemisestä viimeistään kolmen viikon sisällä hakemuksen jättämisestä. Huomioithan kuitenkin, että kesälomakausi voi aiheuttaa viiveitä erityisesti heinäkuun aikana.
 
 Yhteystiedot
 Jos sinulla on kysyttävää tai muuta asiaan liittyvää tiedusteltavaa, laita sähköpostia tai soita ja jutellaan lisää! 
 
 Meistä
 Olemme teknologia- ja suunnittelutalo täynnä itsenäisiä ajattelijoita ja innokkaita oppijoita, joita yhdistää intohimo tehdä huomisesta parempi niin ihmisille kuin koko planeetalle. Taustalla, iällä, koulutuksella tai etnisyydellä ei ole väliä. Otteemme on aina humaani ja rohkea - unohtamatta pientä pilkettä silmäkulmassa.
 
 Software-tiimissä ratkaisemme ihmisten jokapäiväisiä ongelmia yhdistämällä muotoilun ja käytettävyyden teknologiaan. Erityisesti korkealaatuiset mobiili- ja web-palvelumme erottavat meidät muista. Hallitsemme alan kuin omat taskumme ja kokemusta löytyy niin kuluttajatuotteiden kuin raskaan teollisuuden parista. Olemme luoneet mobiilimaksupalveluita, toiminnanohjausjärjestelmää terveydenhuoltoalalle ja erilaisia mobiiliapplikaatioita sekä video-, AR- ja VR-ratkaisuja.

Jos tämä tehtävä ei ollutkaan sinulle tarkoitettu, kurkkaa muut avoimet työpaikkamme tai jätä meille avoin hakemus!

 Työpaikan osoite  02150 ESPOO
 Työ alkaa  tbd

 Työn kesto yli 12 kuukautta

Results.Heading: Developer for Test Automation Infrastructure
Results.Descr:
Company Description

Handling billions of transactions annually, Nets is among the top payment processors in Europe. We keep a tight focus on making it even easier and more intuitive for our customers to handle digital payments and related services. This has made us a trusted partner to more than 700,000 merchant outlets, including 140,000 online merchant outlets, more than 260,000 enterprises and over 250 banks across Europe.

Changing the future of payments takes strong personalities

At Nets, you'll develop in a fast-growing tech company in a high-paced, high-impact market. Working to change the future of payments, it's not just skills and ambition that gets the job done, it's the full package that makes the difference. Together, we impact the lives of everyone around us by powering an easier tomorrow for every citizen, bank, business and colleague. What powers you at work?

Job Description

You would join our testing team which does certification and functional tests for next generation payment terminals.

Your responsibilities would include:
Developing and maintaining test infrastructure that includes physical robots and peripherals.
Writing and maintaining CI.
There is also possibility to participate in writing test cases using Python and Robot Framework.


Qualifications

You are quality minded software engineer who wants to become more involved with testing.

Ideal candidate would have following:
Embedded development experience.
Courage to work with physical devices.
Familiarity with CI practices.
Experience with unit testing.

These are not requirements but tools and technologies we are using:
Git
Github actions
Docker
Gnu Make
Virtual Box
CNC
Grbl
AWS
OpenCV
Tesseract
Linux
Python
Robot Framework


Additional Information

Apply now to power your career

Please send your application as soon as possible as we will start interviewing and shall fill in position as soon as candidate is found, latest until 20th of June 2022. 

You can meet more of our Nets personalities by visiting our careers page: https://www.nets.eu/careers 

We conduct background checks on relevant candidates through our partner Semac, www.semac.no

Results.Heading: OHJELMISTOKEHITTÄJÄ
Results.Descr:
Patria on työpaikka, jossa autat turvaamaan yhteiskuntaa. Meillä tavalliset ihmiset ratkaisevat epätavallisia haasteita. Kun on kyse kriittisistä operaatioista maalla, merellä, ilmassa ja verkossa, osaamisella on merkitystä. Laatu syntyy ihmisistä - jokaisesta meistä. Patriassa sinä ratkaiset.

 Lisätietoja löydät osoitteesta  patriagroup.com 

Haluatko koodata tällaisessa ympäristössä? 🛫 ⛴ 🚓 🛰 🚨💻

Nyt se on mahdollista! 

Toimintamme kasvaessa ja kehittyessä etsimme tiimimme vahvistukseksi

OHJELMISTOKEHITTÄJIÄ 

useampaan tiimiin ja toimipisteeseemme!

Maailma ympärillämme muuttuu ja yhteiskunnassamme tarvitaan vastuullisia, kestävää tulevaisuutta rakentavia ja luotettavia kumppaneita. Patrialla pääset tekemään työtä aidosti merkityksellisten järjestelmien kanssa. Järjestelmät ovat laajoja ja osa yhteiskuntamme kriittistä turvallisuustoimintaa.

Syväsukella tai laajenna osaamistasi, kerro meille mikä sinua innostuttaa ja valitse työpaikka, jossa sinä ratkaiset!

Haemme puuttuvia palasia tiimeihin, jotka ovat osa ohjelmisto-osaamisen ja järjestelmäintegroinnin huippuyksikköämme. Näissä tiimeissä rakennetaan ylpeydellä sekä kansallista että kansainvälistä tilannekuvaa ja turvallisuutta. Tarjoamme asiakkaillemme tiedustelu-, valvonta- ja johtamisjärjestelmiä sekä niiden elinkaaren tukipalveluita uusimpia teknologioita hyödyntäen. Osaamisemme ydintä ovat tilannetietoisuuden keräämiseen ja esittämiseen liittyvien järjestelmien ja tuotteiden toimittaminen.

Hypätessäsi kelkkaamme, voit päästä osaamisesi, kiinnostuksesi ja kokemuksesi kautta tekemään ohjelmistokehityksen kaikkia osa-alueita. Koodaamisen lisäksi tiimeissämme tehdään järjestelmä- ja arkkitehtuurisuunnittelua, testausta ja toimitaan tiiviisti asiakasrajapinnassa. Mikäli sinulla riittää kokemusta ja näkemystä ohjelmistokehityksestä, pääset vaikuttamaan laajasti järjestelmämme kehitykseen kuten testausautomaatioon ja konfiguroinnin automatisointiin. Jos taas olet vielä urasi alkutaipaleella, tiimimme antaa askelmerkkejä kehittymiseesi. 

Lupaamme, että tehtävissämme teknisen osaamisen karttumisen lisäksi saat laajalti osaamista myös itse toimialasta ja mahdollisuuden kehittyä alan huippuosaajaksi.

Lisäksi Patria tarjoaa työntekijöilleen suuren talon edut ja etenemismahdollisuudet, kilpailukykyisen palkan sekä vakaat tulevaisuudennäkymät. Työntekijöiden viihtyvyyteen panostetaan, työsuhteet ovat pitkiä ja vaihtuvuus pientä. Tekemisestämme voit lukea lisää myös tuoreesta artikkelista täältä: https://news.calcus.com/patriassa-tyopoydalleen-saa-haastavia-ohjelmistotehtavia-joiden-lopputuloksilla-taataan-yhteiskunnan-toimintavarmuutta/

💡 Tehtävissämme onnistumista tukee, jos sinulla on 
tietotekniikan tai ohjelmistokehityksen korkeakouluopintoja
opintojen tai työn kautta hankittua kokemusta koodaamisesta 
positiivinen ja innostunut asenne kehittämiseen ja ratkaisukeskeinen työote 
sujuva suomen- ja englanninkielen kirjallinen ja suullinen taito


Haluaisitko olla osa tarinaamme? Me kuulisimme mieluusti sinusta lisää!

Juttelisimme mielellämme kanssasi lisää sinusta, Patriasta työnantajana sekä työn teknisemmistä yksityiskohdista. Kyseessä on vakituinen, kokopäiväinen työ. Työn sijaintipaikka on jokin Patrian toimipisteistä. Osassa rooleista myös etätyö onnistuu. 

Lisätietoja paikoista antavat rekrykumppanimme Porkkana ja keppi: Enni p. 040 630 8125 ja Sonja p. 050 337 2144.

Kerro itsestäsi meille jättämällä hakemuksesi oheisen linkin kautta 31.8.2022 mennessä. Laita hakemuksesi heti tulemaan, sillä etenemme prosessissa jo hakuaikana ja paikkoja täytetään heti, kun löydämme etsimämme. 

Prosessiimme kuuluu myös koodaustesti, jolla asetamme lähtötason sille, minkälaista "kakkua" meillä olisi sinulle tarjota. Käsittelemme tietojasi luottamuksellisesti. Paikkaan valitulle henkilölle tehdään turvallisuusselvitys.

Results.Heading: Azure Developer
Results.Descr:
The Company

Our client is looking for an experienced full-stack developer with a hunger to grow!
 
 They are a leading intellectual asset lifecycle management SaaS -solution with 5000+ users in 350+ well-known organizations in Finland and abroad. Their clients include innovative companies and organizations of all sizes, who want to protect, expand and utilize their intellectual property efficiently. They have customers of all sizes from smaller companies to companies with tens of thousands of employees. Now they are looking to expand internationally, currently, 10% of their revenue comes from outside of their domestic market.
 
 They decided a number of years ago to rebuild their solution from the ground up from a system that had been running for 20 years previous to a new modern Azure environment, hence the new hires who will drive this change and implement their Azure and new cloud technology experience. 
 
 The position
 
 We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Azure Developer to further strengthen the product development team whose mission is simply to build the very best cloud-based IP management solution in the world. Their product development crew is an integrated agile team of highly skilled technical and functional professionals supported by IPR specialists.
 
 Your role would be crucial, and they expect you to contribute significantly to their product development. You will report directly to the Head of Technology and additionally, you will be supported & coached by a product owner, other developers, and the rest of their organization. They are open to defining your exact responsibilities as per your own interests and current plus future abilities.
 
 They utilize the latest tools and methodologies as much as possible, for example, they use Azure DevOps with CI/CD to manage, design, build, test and deploy their products. In addition to the software development tasks from all parts of the software development lifecycle, they expect you to further contribute to their way of working in terms of new ideas, feedback, and thought leadership on software development questions.
 
 Requirements

* Deep technical understanding of the Microsoft stack (incl .NET Core, C#, Azure)
 * Professional experience on .NET & Azure with any modern front framework (e.g. Vue/React/Angular)
 * Experience with various architectures (incl. microservices) and stateless APIs
 * Understanding of various database and data storage solutions such as traditional relational SQL, schemaless and cloud-based binary options such as Azure Blobs
 * Business-oriented mind-set and positive can-do attitude
 * Ability and willingness to work with a diverse team across functions
 * Generic understanding (& seeing the value of) how to build business-critical software

Bonus Points

 * You have been Scrum Master or have other team leading experience
 * You have previous experience (and keen interest) in taking architectural responsibility
 * You have DevOps experience & care deeply about Test Automation
 * You are Microsoft certified on Azure, DevOps, Data or Development
 * Demonstrated success in building SaaS solutions, either B2B or B2C

What they offer

 * Modern zero-legacy Microsoft tech stack (Azure, .NET Core, EF Core, React, Azure SQL, Blobs etc.)
 * Possibility to grow in or out of position as the client grows (Scrum Master, Technical Architect etc.)
 * Stable but fast-paced long-term product development company that can offer a long career in development rather than consultancy (project) focus.
 * An open start-up spirited company culture, and ability to make an impact in the early stages.
 * Possibility to grow in or out of your position as the company grows
 * Stable but fast-developing business with huge global market potential
 * Social events and training (incl. certification)
 * Prime office locations in Helsinki, Tampere & Oulu with fun and professional teammates & good overall benefits
 * Full remote availability.

We require fluency in English, both spoken and written. Some rudimentary understanding of Finnish is highly beneficial. Most importantly, you must already be eligible (authorized) to work in the EU.

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

Benjamin Wilson-Lake

b.wilson-lake@frankgroup.com

+358 9 42452358

https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjaminwilsonlake/

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

- Datan muuntaminen myös muille ymmärrettäväksi on mielenkiintosi

Työssäsi voit työskennellä osittain etänä, mutta roolissasi tulet työskentelemään myös toimitiloissamme Littoisissa innovoidessasi uusia ratkaisuja kollegoiden kanssa. Käytämme työssämme seuraavia teknologioita:

 Django, Flask, ReactJS

Teleste-kollegoidesi mukaan meillä parasta on mahdollisuudet kehittyä ja kasvaa. Luomme tilaa opetella uusia teknologioita ja olemme todella kiinnostuneita oppimaan toisiltamme. Työyhteisömme on kannustava. Innostamme toisiamme testaamaan, innovoimaan, kokeilemaan ja oppimaan mahdollisuuksia löytämällä eli oppimalla virheistä!

Jos työtehtävä innostaa sinua, niin lähetä hakemuksesi palkkatoiveesi kera. Rekrytoiva esihenkilö Antti Kuisma kertoo mielellään lisää +358445005327 tai antti.kuisma@teleste.com.

 Lead the development team not only through technical expertise but also as a mentor and coach for the team members. Directly responsible for HR management of other developers, including goal setting, performance reviews, making recommendations for promotions, performance and issue management, career development and coaching.
 
 Key Responsibilities:
 
 - Line manager for developers on the team

Results.Heading: (Senior) Backend Developer, Detection and Response
Results.Descr:
WithSecure™ protects businesses all over the world from modern threats. We do this through a Co-security approach born from first-hand knowledge that no one can solve every cyber security problem alone. Every single day, our diverse, growing team fights against online extortion, threats to national infrastructure, the unlawful spread of sensitive information, and everything in-between. The best part about working for WithSecure is our people! We are a community of dedicated and passionate professionals that take workplace happiness seriously. If you're looking for something that's more than just a job - we'd love to hear from you.

Are you interested in learning what it takes to build highly scalable production grade distributed systems and want to work with the most modern cloud technologies, then this role is for you! We, in Detection and Response R&D unit, are looking for a (Senior) Backend Developer to join our new and exciting cloud project. The technologies we build provide industry leading capabilities to detect and respond to advanced cyber attacks. 

Key responsibilities
Designing, developing, maintaining and operating backend systems
Understanding the business requirements and finding elegant solutions to fulfill them
Stay up to date with public cloud technologies and understand how to apply those
Building observability into the systems so that they are easy to operate
Building CICD pipelines to deploy your code all the way to production
Take ownership of the systems you develop and resolve any issues should they rise

What are we looking for
Knowledgeable with Typescript / Node.js / Python
Hands-on working experience using public cloud services and deployment automation. We use mostly AWS but Azure and GCP experience are strong plus!
Good communication, team work skills and positive attitude.
Security mindset
Understanding of modern software development practices that ensure safe, reliable and continuous deployments using cloud native tools
Fluent written and spoken English

About the team

We are a high performing team working on world class systems. We have people from multiple cultures and backgrounds, spread across multiple sites and we use remote-first approach when collaborating within the team. However, this is not a remote-only position.

We work in close co-operation with other teams at WithSecure such as Threat Hunters who provide the Managed Detection and Response service to our clients and with teams who are specialised in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to name a few.

What can you expect from the job
Well established remote working culture, suited for the current global pandemic situation
Real meaning for your work, make an impact and help to protect organizations and individuals from cyber threats
Work in the domain that is the fastest growing market in cyber security (MDR & EDR)
Use of the most modern cloud based technologies
Work with highly scalable systems that process billions of events per day as well as serverless REST & GraphQL APIs
Emphasis on deployment automation and immutable infrastructure
Something new to learn, even after months and years!

The applications will be considered on a rolling basis, so don't hesitate to apply!

A security background check will be conducted for the selected candidate, in accordance with the Finnish Security Clearance act 726/2014.

Results.Heading: Software Developer, 2 paikkaa, Etteplan Finland Oy, Espoo

This permanent position includes versatile tasks ranging from application coding and design, to developing and maintaining API-surfaces, microservices and data pipelines in cloud environments. In addition you may for example work on embedded software. Your colorful variety of tasks also include software lifecycle design and planning, DevOps related tasks, and unit testing. Most importantly you will support our customers in developing their business through digitalization. In this position, you have the opportunity to work even completely remotely. 

In this position you will have an opportunity to work as part of an experienced team of true, rock solid professionals and become accustomed to utilizing agile methods in your work. The most modern equipment in the industry will be at your disposal, either at one of our own offices or in our customer's premises.

Who are we looking for?

Preferably you have several years of experience in working with backend (eg. C#, NET Core, Node js or Java) and frontend (eg. Results.Heading: Public Cloud Full Stack Developer/SW Architect
Results.Descr:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile. 

Tietoevry's Cloud practice is part of Tietoevry Create that is a leading accelerator to customers' digital products and business models. We combine design and software engineering to create new experiences and growth opportunities for our clients. With data, cloud and the latest technologies as the foundation, we use our diverse global skills to accelerate innovation and reinvent how businesses create sustainable value.

Our Cloud practice helps customer to maximize the value of cloud by modernizing applications utilizing cloud native capabilities and by accelerating application development and enabling customer's growth with new Cloud innovations. This is a quite new practice that has high ambitions to grow and take to role as thought leader in cloud application development. We work together with leading cloud platforms (Microsoft, AWS, Google) and utilize the latest technologies and tools in our daily work.

We do our best to match you with the projects that suit your interest and expertise the best possible way. Whether you are a junior developer or seasoned cloud architect, we will offer you projects where you get to learn.

In general, in our Cloud Development team, you get to: 

Join team of highly skilled cloud developers/architects and learn new things with and from them Work in an agile manner Develop cloud native applications for our clients Automate cloud infrastructures for applications Implement and develop DevOps toolsets for our clients

We take pride in doing things the right way. We follow the automate everything principle and master all major public cloud platforms. We want to be the public cloud SW development trusted advisor for our customers.

Buzzwords: Azure, AWS, GCP, Java, Python, Go, C#, Terraform, JavaScript, React, Docker and Kubernetes. 

 TietoEVRY as an employer for cloud developers: 

 Professional growth 

Professional growth is guaranteed. We have a large client base, covering all industries. You get a chance to learn from and work with our top cloud experts.

 People 

Ask anyone, the number one reason to join and work in our teams is people! We have a diverse group of great individuals here, all eager learners and doers.

 Meaningful projects 

Genuinely meaningful work - you get to influence how digitalization serves millions of Finns, today and tomorrow. From e-healthcare services to state administration, and everything in between.

 Benefits 

As a big organization, we are able to provide almost unparalleled development and promotion opportunities. Salary is important, right? We offer competitive compensation and a great work-life balance. It's all in the details such as free parking, carwash, a variety of clubs, and hobby circles.

Our values:

Continuous Learning, Inclusion, and Flexible Working. Our values are our benefits. Experience them in your everyday life at TietoEVRY.

 Want to learn more about our projects and role specs? 

Have a chat either with Head of Public Cloud Petri Ohtonen ( petri.ohtonen@tietoevry.com ) or with our Tech Recruiter Minna Ahlvik (minna.ahlvik@tietoevry.com). 

#LI-Hybrid and #Li-Remote #LI-MA1

Results.Heading: Software Developers
Results.Descr:
Our traffic is picking up and we want to significantly invest in digital services to support our growth and better customer experience. To enable this we are looking for skilled Software Developers to join the team responsible for Finnair.com, our booking engine and other digital customer services. 

 About our team: 

Finnair.com team includes a total of 24 members, who are working together in 4 cross-functional sub-teams. At the moment we have 4 designers, 18 frontend and backend developers and 2 scrum masters. The team is part of Digital Solutions Development, a growing unit of 40+ people, who own and are fully responsible for developing Finnair's digital platform and our digital customer experience. This talented team is proudly working on one of the biggest ecommerce platforms in Finland with millions of visitors on a monthly basis. 

 Ways of working: 

Our environment is start-up like, dynamic and development-oriented and our work roughly follows Scrum, in two-week sprints. 

From the business-side we are closely working together with a Product Owner as well as with various individuals from direct business to customer experience. We also have cross-product co-operation with other software development teams such as payments, Finnair mobile app as well as Aurinkomatkat.fi and Aurinkomatkat mobile app and IFEC (In-flight Entertainment) teams. 

We strive constantly to be more data-oriented in our goal setting, product design and customer impact assessment. Recently we have added regular A/B testing activities into our toolbox, which helps us to fine tune our products into the right direction. 

 Technical stack: Frontend: Angular 11, TypeScript/JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, SaSS
Backend: Java11, Spring, AWS, Micro-services, Docker, Node.js, serverless, TypeScript
CI/CD and test automation: CodeBuild & CodePipeline, Test Café, Junit, Jest
 Things that we are especially proud and excited about: Getting to create one of the biggest ecommerce service platforms in Finland
Possibility to have an impact over the product roadmap and choose our own tools
Chance to work with aviation industry experts
Shared eagerness to develop our ways of working
Flat organization - possibility to get heard and impact how our products work
Companywide growth mindset
In order to succeed in this role, we expect you to have an excellent grip of relevant modern programming techniques ideally with a high-quality product. In addition to this, you are interested in working in an agile team that is fully responsible for creating and operating well-designed and lovable digital experiences for our customers. 

We are very much interested in welcoming you to the team, if you are either already skilled in working full-stack or strong on the frontend side but having the interest towards learning backend work in the future. 

Our recruitment process is typically following: first interview to discuss about the role and get to know you better, technical interview + meeting the team members and a final interview. 

We are continuously reviewing applications and will get back to you as soon as possible. If you wish, you are welcome to attach a Github link to your application. 

Should you have any questions, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Johanna Ilves by email ( johanna.ilves@finnair.com ).

Results.Heading: Lead Frontend Developer
Results.Descr:
Our traffic is picking up and we want to significantly invest in digital services to support our growth and better customer experience. 

To enable this we are looking for an experienced Lead Frontend Developer to join the team responsible for creating and operating the Finnair Digital Platform, including Finnair.com, Finnair app and In-flight entertainment services. 

About our team:

Our team is Digital Solutions Development, a growing unit of 40+ designers, developers and scrum masters.   We own and operate Finnair's digital platform and our digital customer experience and we want to grow Finnair.com to be Finland's biggest ecommerce site. We design and bring to life Finnair.com and all our booking and customer services, the Finnair mobile app, our In-Flight Entertainment services as well as some of the Aurinkomatkat services. 

Ways of working:

Our environment is start-up like, dynamic and development-oriented and we work closely with Product Owners and other business stakeholders. We also have cross-product co-operation with other software development teams, namely Aurinkomatkat.fi, Aurinkomatkat mobile app, IFEC (In-flight Entertainment) and Finnair Mobile app.

In the frontend, our technical stack consists of mainly Angular 11, TypeScript/JavaScript applications, although there's also some React in the mix. All of our software runs on cloud (AWS) together with necessary testing, integration and deployment automation.

About the role:

In this important and exciting role you will act as a technical lead for all of our frontend development and especially our flagship store Finnair.com. You will be responsible for promoting uniform, accessible, quality driven and secure design as well as ensuring that our services are implemented according to jointly set best practices.

Your day-to-day role includes the following activities: frontend architecture design for all new services, facilitating development across teams, feature development and making sure our quality standards are met. In addition to this, you are expected to promote shared ways of working and share practices and experiences across the teams.

We hope that you are experienced and passionate about frontend development and technologies as well as crafting great digital user experience.

In addition to this, we wish you to have:
Previous experience in leading teams and/or technical subjects
Experience with frontend architecture & system design
Experience in developing high quality software
Strong analytical and planning skills
Fluency in both written and spoken English
Master's degree or equivalent in technical or commercial sciences
We are continuously reviewing applications and will get back to you as soon as possible! We will fill this role as soon as we find the right person. Should you have any questions, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Johanna Ilves by email ( johanna.ilves@finnair.com ). 

In the meanwhile, check out some of our products, like finnair.com or the Finnair app! 

#LI-IJ1

Results.Heading: Senior Test Automation Developer
Results.Descr:
MAKE YOUR STORY REAL.  
 
 Tule sellaisena kuin olet  . Meillä työn tekemisen tavat rakentuvat sinun ympärillesi ja työskentely on muokattavissa joustavasti oman elämäntilanteesi mukaan. 

 OLETKO SINÄ ETSIMÄMME TESTIAUTOMAATION AMMATTILAINEN?  

Haluatko olla tekemässä laadukasta ja kestävää softakehitystä, jonka selkärankana testiautomaatio toimii? 
 
 Etsimme joukkoomme kokenutta Test Automation Developeria. Olet tekninen laatuekspertti, suunnittelet ja toteutat testauksen tehokkaasti sopivia työkaluja ja frameworkeja käyttäen. Tuet myös jatkuvan julkaisun prosessia mahdollistaen nopeat palautesyklit. 
 
 Tulet osaksi Siilin lämminhenkistä ja osaavaa SALabs-heimoa (Software Automation Laboratory). SALabsissa luomme uusia teknisiä- ja palvelukonsepteja ohjelmistoautomaatioon sekä rakennamme merkityksellisiä digitaalisia ratkaisuja yhdessä asiakkaidemme kanssa. Uskomme, että ohjelmistokehityksen nykyisyys ja tulevaisuus on automaatiossa, jonka avulla voimme tehdä asioita älykkäämmin. Hallitsemme Siilillä automaattisen testauksen ja etsimme sinua, joka pystyt testaamaan melkein mitä tahansa ja asetat laaturiman korkealle. 

Mitä teet:
   Kehität ja ylläpidät erilaisia testiautomaatioratkaisuja ja a utat asiakkaitamme varmistamaan tuotteidensa erinomaisen laadun 
 Tuot laatunäkökulman vahvasti esiin ja varmistat, että testaus on saumaton osa softakehitysprosessia 
Olet osa Siilin osaavaa testaus- ja automaatioyhteisöä, joka jakaa mielenkiintosi laadunvarmistukseen ja osaamisen kehittämiseen 
 
 Muutamia ominaisuuksia, joita toivomme sinulla olevan:  
   Nautit ongelmanratkaisusta, ja sukellat mielellään järjestelmäarkkitehtuuriin etsiäksesi mahdollisia ongelmia 
 Tunnet softakehityksen elinkaaren sekä testausmetodit ja -työkalut 
 Tunnet CI-järjestelmät ja sinulla on kokemusta testiautomaation hallinnasta ja integroinnista julkaisuputken eri kohdissa 
 Osaat Pythonia ja / tai Javaa. Pidät ohjelmointikieliä kuitenkin työkaluina, etkä pelkää astua pois mukavuusalueeltasi oppiaksesi uutta 
 Laatu on sinulle tärkeää, ja tiedät mitä korkealaatuisen koodin tuotantoon saattaminen vaatii 
 Olet itseohjautuva ja työskentelet sujuvasti osana ketterää softakehitysympäristöä 
 
 TUTUSTUTAANKO PAREMMIN?  
 
 Jos mielekäs työ osana vastuullista ja ammattitaitoista yhteisöä tuntuu omalta jutultasi, täytäthän tietosi viereiselle lomakkeelle niin jutellaan lisää! Meillä Siilillä ei ole haastatteluita vaan tapaamisia. Kahden tapaamisen avulla varmistumme yhdessä siitä, että molempien tavoitteet ja toiveet ovat linjassa. Näin saamme rakennettua lähtökohdat loistavalle yhteiselle tulevaisuudelle. Lisätietoja antaa Anna Kerava (anna.kerava[at]siili.com) talent-tiimistämme. 
 
 SIILI PÄHKINÄNKUORESSA  

 Mitä   teemme?  Asiakkainamme ovat Suomen suurimmat yritykset, joille tuotamme digitaalisia strategioita, innovaatioita ja palveluita, räätälöityä ohjelmistokehitystä, pilvipalveluita sekä älykästä automaatiota ja dataa. Meille keskeistä on asiakkaiden ongelmien ratkaisu, huippuosaamisen jatkuva kehittyminen sekä tiivis yhteisöllisyys. Töissä pitää olla myös hauskaa! Tutustu asiakasreferensseihimme täällä. 
 
  Vastuunkanto  on meille sydämen asia ja tärkein arvo. Tämä näkyy kaikessa toiminnassa - pyrimme ympäristövaikutusten minimointiin, tasa-arvoisten mahdollisuuksien ja diversiteetin edistämiseeen, yksityisyydensuojan ja tietoturvan varmistamiseen, eettiseen liiketoimintaan sekä oppimisen ja hyvinvoinnin edistämiseen. Lue lisää vastuullisuudestamme . 

Konkreettisena vastuullisuustekona olemme pystyttäneet  SiiliMetsän  , jonka avulla kompensoimme kaikkien työntekijöidemme vuosittaisen hiilijalanjäljen niin työ- kuin vapaa-ajaltakin täysimääräisenä. Istuttamalla vuosittain uutta metsää, rakennamme parempaa yhteistä tulevaisuutta meille kaikille. Lue lisää SiiliMetsästä

Results.Heading: Senior Full Stack Software Developer - Oulu

Mid-level & Senior Full Stack Developer's - Oulu - Finnish speaking - Permanent

Information
This role would be working for a excellent mid-sized financial services company, who are looking to hire an experienced Full Stack Developer to mainly work with MS tech such as .NET/C#. Both Mid and Senior-level Developer's are welcome to apply.

The company are moving towards working with Azure in the next couple of months, and there are range of development teams also working with different technologies. As this team are given wide access to a range of project areas, the focus needs to be on finding and implementing flexible solutions - not only focused on coding with one piece of tech.

Role & Responsibilities

 * Find flexible solutions to a range of project requirements - working as part of a team. Although we are working with more modern technologies more, we still have legacy tech which needs to be maintained/improved.

 * Work using agile methodologies, and being open to changing tech stack if needed. 
 * Show an interest in self-improvement, through certifications, training and other methods - with our support. 
 * Not "just a developer" - you will be involved in understanding areas of the business and improving more than just your development skills.

Skills & Qualifications

 * Positive extra experience: Azure 
 * Native level Finnish written and verbal
 * Degree is beneficial

Results.Heading: (Senior) Engine Programmer
Results.Descr:
Remedy Entertainment, the creator of Control®, Max Payne®, Alan Wake® and one of the leading independent game studios in the world is looking for a  (Senior) Engine Programmer  to create high quality gaming experiences for the next generation of games. 

As a (Senior) Engine Programmer, you will be working with highly talented team members to design, develop and deliver new features to our games. We are constantly seeking new ways to make our games better and we value everyone's opinions and expertise for making the whole process from ideas to technology to final game more than the sum of its parts.

What you get to doIn this role, you will be working with the core functionality of the Northlight engine such as ECS, asset streaming, resource management, scripting and core gameplay systems.
 You will get to design and implement performance-critical core engine features and provide a good developer experience by equipping your systems with great debugging tools.
You will build performant and scalable systems for our new in-house technology that will be used for future Remedy games.
Examples of what you would be able to contribute to include systems to define and manage in-game content budgets, creating new content pipelines for efficient asset authoring and loading, new data and serialization formats, better APIs for creating data-oriented gameplay code, interfaces for save game systems, etc.
As a member of the Northlight Core Engine team, we also expect you to contribute to the overall performance and memory characteristics of the engine and its API design.
What you bring to the roleDemonstrable experience in gameplay or game engine programming
Experience in working on various platforms
Strong background in C++
Experience with multithreaded programming
Strong mathematical skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Prior experience of working with proprietary game engines
Ideally you also have experience in shipping AAA game titles and with Entity Component Systems (ECS)
What is in it for youAt Remedy you get to work on awesome, memorable gaming experiences for our players, in a studio where your input is valued and your creative freedom is encouraged. 
We work in an environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone's voice is heard & workload stays sensible. We believe in and support work-life balance. Happy people work better! 
We offer an extensive set of employee benefits and an annual bonus system as well as opportunities for you to develop your skills further. On top of this, in Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to public holidays and other special occasions. 
Our studio is based in Helsinki metropolitan area in Finland, a safe country with exceptional quality of life, free education and pristine nature at your doorstep. If you're not already in Finland, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we'll take care of everything else! 
If you are based in Sweden, we also welcome candidates to our new location in Stockholm. 
Our studio is embracing hybrid work model that gives you the flexibility to work from home and have valuable face-to-face time with your colleagues. 
We enthusiastically welcome diverse viewpoints and backgrounds. We at Remedy value and are committed to ensuring an inclusive and safe work environment for all our team members. 

For this role we can case-by-case consider remote working within Europe.

To apply, please fill in the application form with your CV (in English) and other information relevant to the position. This position will be filled as soon as suitable applicants are found.

Results.Heading: Frontend Developer
Results.Descr:
WithSecure delivers research-led cyber security to defend organizations, society and people from real-world attacks and build resilience into their approach. Our people are a mix of technical and creative experts - diverse, talented, and passionate people - working tirelessly to help us advance the industry with new ways of thinking. They lead their own development, in and out of the office. They call the shots when it comes to building a place to call home in our organization. 

WithSecure is looking for a full stack software developer to join our global team. The successful candidate will help to deliver our Managed Detection and Response (MDR) service, Countercept, which defends organisations against targeted cyber attacks. The MDR development team designs and develops technology for our internal operations teams.

We are looking for a skilled and motivated full stack software engineer to work on the web interfaces and data processing and visualisation tools that the Countercept operations teams use to deliver and communicate the service to our customers.

The location for the position is at our offices in Finland either Helsinki or Oulu - but we do offer extensive possibilities for remote working from within Finland. 

Key Responsibilities...
  Design and implement web applications that are used by our security operations and customer experience teams 
Design, implement and maintain Frontend visualizations of data processing and analysis tools that are used by our security operations team 
Brainstorm, define, and build collaboratively with members across multiple teams within MDR - DevOps, Platform Management, Detection & Response Team 
Enforce good software engineering processes, from design through to QA 
Add your perspective to influence the engineering culture of the development team 
Constantly re-evaluate our product to improve architecture, user experience, performance and stability 
Be an energetic ‘self-starter' with the ability to take ownership and be accountable for deliverables.
 
You'll use...
  Svelte / SvelteKit as our UI Framework
Storybook & Figma 
GraphQL and OpenAPI 
DB - SQL, NoSQL, OpenSearch 
AWS services 
CI/CD technologies, e.g. Jenkins 
Linux, Docker, Kubernetes 
 
What we are looking for...
  ideally 3+ years' experience in software engineering - but we're open to less! 
Passion and an eye for good design and UX 
Experience with two or more product deliveries 
A versatile programmer who can rapidly build proof-of-concept solutions but knows when a disciplined approach is needed (e.g. when modifying critical services!) 
Familiarity with fundamental security concepts, e.g. certificates and encryption, and common networking protocols such as DNS and HTTP/S 
Degree educated, with at least a 2.1 in a numerate subject such as Computer Science, Maths, Engineering 
Innovative mindset, to work on unique solutions to common problems 
Ability to grasp the inner workings and philosophy of the WithSecure Countercept service 
Ability to work in a multicultural environment with English as your working language 
 
Bonus points...
  Experience developing solutions using AWS, AWS-native services and a microservices architecture 
Experience with security products such as firewalls, proxies and VPN's 
Experience in languages (Rust, Go, Python) is a bonus - knowledge of comparable languages will be considered 
Experience with Svelte or similar JS frameworks like React, Vue.js, Angular, etc.. 
 
Our four promises to you...
  You will have the freedom and flexibility to define new methods and products for solving real world challenges
You will develop your expertise in current technologies whilst increasing your exposure to the information security space
You will work together with experienced and enthusiastic colleagues, and within WithSecure you'll find some of the best minds in the cyber security industry
Your work will be clearly visible - all over the world

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjiä Helsinkiin
Results.Descr:
Etsimme Helsingin toimistolle noin 500 asiantuntijan joukkoon ohjelmistokehittäjiä työskentelemään monipuolisten ja vaikuttavien projektien pariin. Projekteissa riittää valinnanvaraa ja asiantuntijamme työskentelevät laaja-alaisesti eri teknologioiden mm. web-kehityksen ja pilvisovellusten parissa. Teemme läheisesti töitä satojen muiden goforelaisten kanssa isoissa ja vaikuttavissa hankkeissa kuten KEHAn TE-Digi ja Digi- ja väestötietoviraston Suomi.fi.
 
Voit olla urallasi hyvään vauhtiin päässyt tekijä tai ainakin muutaman vuoden työkokemusta kartuttanut tulevaisuuden lupaus. Projekteissa pääset työskentelemään ja oppimaan uutta modernien tekniikoiden parissa. Pystyt rakentamaan omaa urapolkuasi kiinnostuksesi mukaan. Vapaus ja vastuu kulkevat käsi kädessä, joten itseohjautuvuus ja jatkuva halu kehittyä ovat onnistumisen edellytys.
 
Projekteissamme käytetään esimerkiksi seuraavia tekniikoita:
  .NET, Java, Spring Boot, Python, Django, Node.js, Express
SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB
Azure, AWS, Serverless Framework
JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, Next.js
 
Pääset itse vaikuttamaan siihen, missä projektissa ja millä tekniikoilla työskentelet. Työtä voit tehdä siellä, missä itse parhaiten viihdyt.

Mitä toivomme sinulta 
 Kokemusta joistain yllä olevista teknologioista ja halua oppia uusia teknologioita
Mahdollista kokemusta pilvipalveluista tai halua kehittyä niiden saralla
Hallitset modernit ohjelmistokehityksen menetelmät
Kiinnostusta konsulttina toimimiseen eri asiakasprojekteissa
 

Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Haluamme olla jokaiselle goforelaiselle hyvä paikka työskennellä sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat kaikkein tärkein voimavaramme. Toimistomme sijaitsee erinomaisten kulkuyhteyksien varrella Kampin kauppakeskuksessa. Modernilta toimistoltamme löytyvät mm. mukautuvat ja viihtyisät työtilat, välipalat sekä biljardi. Helsingin toimistollamme sinua odottavat aktiivinen ja intohimoinen ohjelmistokehittäjistä sekä muista asiantuntijoista koostuva osaajayhteisö. Yhteisömme kanssa pääset oppimaan uutta ja kehittymään urallasi mm. kiltatoiminnan kautta. Pääset osalliseksi myös paikalliskerhoihimme sekä työyhteisötoimintaan. Kerhotoiminnan puitteissa kokoonnumme työn ulkopuolella mm. lautapelien, liikunnan, elektroniikan ja elokuvien parissa.
 
Asiakasprojektiin sijoittuminen Goforella on työntekijälähtöistä. Meillä on jatkuvasti avoinna noin 20-50 asiakastarvetta. Jokaisella goforelaisella on täysi läpinäkyvyys asiakastarpeisiimme ja teemmekin lopulliset projektipäätökset aina yhdessä keskustellen.
 
Sinua odottavat myös seuraavat edut
  Monipuoliset opiskelumahdollisuudet ja Goforen kustantamat verkkokurssit (mm. Udemy-lisenssit)
Joustavat työajat ja yhteisöllisen kulttuurin sekä koko Goforen osaajayhteisön tuen
Vaikuttamisbonukset (blogi-, open source) ja sertifiointibonukset (AWS, Azure, Scrum)
Kattavan etupaketin sisältäen mm. hieronta-, silmälasi-, kulttuuri- ja liikuntaedut (400€/v.)
 
Tutustu toki Goforen omaan työehtosopimukseen ja kokonaisuudessaan työsuhde-etuihimme.
 
Tehtävään valitulle henkilölle voidaan tehdä henkilöturvallisuusselvitys.

" Olen työskennellyt sovelluskehittäjänä Goforella pian kaksi vuotta. Ensimmäistä projektiani etsiessä otettiin hienosti huomioon teknologiat, joista pidän ja joista oli hyötyä urakehitykseni kannalta. Mieluisa projekti löytyikin yllättävän pian. Projekteissa olen päässyt työskentelemään frontend ja full stack -rooleissa, teknologioina mm. React, Typescript, Node.js, AWS ja Docker. Lisäksi olen päässyt osallistumaan Goforen sisäiseen toimintaan, kuten järjestämään tech-painotteisia eventtejä, joissa alan eri osaajat kertovat tämän hetken kuumimmista teknologioista. Olen myös pitkään ollut kiinnostunut rekrytoimisesta, ja kun ilmeni mahdollisuus osallistua Helsingin rekrytoimintaan, tartuin oitis tilaisuuteen. Goforella on lämmin ja rento kulttuuri, jossa työntekijästä välitetään ja kehittymismahdollisuudet ovat erinomaiset! "

Results.Heading: (Senior) Full Stack Developer
Results.Descr:
Oriola is a health and wellbeing company operating in the Nordic countries. In Sweden, Oriola owns the country's third-largest pharmacy chain, Kronans Apotek. 

We want to help people make healthy choices and feel better. To ensure this, our business keeps evolving. We are growing and developing within health and wellbeing and developing our services and pharmacies. Our important role in society gives a great purpose to working with us. In return, we expect you to aim as high as we do. You will need to be customer oriented and proactive. Together we work towards an even healthier future. 

About the position

We are currently looking for skilled developers to join our team located in Espoo. We are building our own internal software development team. The team is focusing to build our B2B digital services that 1000+ healthcare experts are using. Currently, we have immediate need for both front-end and back end developers. 
 
All developers:
Excellent skills for teamwork. You have willingness to continuous improvement.
Critical thinking skills are also more than welcome.
We appreciate your persistent efforts for good code quality and professional engineering practices. (The evaluation will be done partly by provided code samples.)
Several years programming experience with JavaScript (or TypeScript).
Full working proficiency in English.

(Senior) Full Stack Developer
Sufficient experience working with Node.js environment
Experience working with NoSQL databases (e.g. DynamoDB) or SQL and Postgres
Developing experience with AWS cloud and RESTful web services addition, you have experience with serverless architecture and microservices.
It is a plus if you have data modelling skills or experience with react.js
It is a big plus if you have excellent JavaScript programming skills

We offer you:
Interesting pharmaceutical working environment covering several different businesses
Variety in your work with opportunities to expand your skill set
Life-work balance and flexible hours
Supportive leadership and team members
Competitive benefits package
A fun, supportive work environment

We also offer you remote working possibilities. Our team is currently working mostly remotely, and we have good tools for that as well. Currently, we work two days per week onsite to boost collaboration.

Terms of Employment:
This is a full-time position.
This position is based in Espoo
The Employment is within the Oriola Group. 

Application:

If you think this could be your next career step, please send your application including CV in English. Please also provide working link into your code samples (e.g. at GitHub or Bitbucket).

We will start recruitment interviews with the applicable candidates already during the application period. We hope to hear from you soon! 

Contact:

If you have any questions, please contact us via janne.jarvenpaa@oriola.com and we'll get back to you ASAP. 

We want to hire and communicate the talents directly. Therefore, services provided by recruitment companies or head-hunters in this position will not be accepted.

Senior Developer / Architect - Kuopio / Jyvskyl / Helsinki / Tampere

Our client is a cloud-based SaaS company who delivers customer-specific software solutions and industry-specific software products. They digitize their customer's processes into stylish, user-friendly cloud services. Their high-productivity development platform enables an efficient, intuitive, and inclusive way to implement applications.

They have new projects starting in the very early stages which require more Senior Developers to take on the more demanding requirements of the projects. They need these Seniors to enable them to build teams beneath, so you can lead the next up-and-coming team within the business forward into these new exciting projects.

They offer no maintenance or 'boring stuff' in these projects as their intelligent platform does it for them. They have created a revolutionary platform that does all the scrappy work for their developers - that means no boring SQL query development etc, this has been completely automated. Senior .NET and Azure Developer/Architect - Oulu

Our client company is looking for a Senior Developer or Architect to join their team in Oulu. This client is one of the leading providers of intellectual property (IP) management software in Finland. The company's products enable companies to create, manage, visualise and ensure secure and easy sharing of IP data.

Results.Heading: Lead Developer, käyttövaltuushallinta/asiakirjahallinta
Results.Descr:
Lead Developer, käyttövaltuushallinta/asiakirjahallinta 

Haluatko olla osaltasi varmistamassa, että 4 miljoonan asiakkaamme asiakirjat löytyvät jatkossakin asianmukaisesti arkistoituna? Kiinnostaako sinua syventyä Lead Developerin roolissa käyttövaltuushallintaan? Jes, sillä tiimissämme on nyt Lead Developerin mentävä aukko! Tehtävä sijaitsee Helsingissä, mutta kuten muuallakin OP:lla, yhdistelemme arjessamme joustavasti lähi- ja etätyöskentelyä.

Millainen on tuleva tiimisi ja roolisi? 

Tiimimme vastaa koko OP Ryhmän tasolla asiakirjojen arkistoinnista, joka on luonnollisesti isossa roolissa 4 miljoonan asiakkaan pankkiryhmässä. OP:n keskitettyä sähköistä arkistoa potentiaalisesti hyödyntäviä järjestelmiä on useita satoja, ja niitä hyödyntävät suoraan tai välillisesti kaikki sisäiset ja ulkoiset asiakkaamme. Palvelun toimivuus on toimintamme kannalta kriittistä ja perusta liiketoiminnallemme. 

Tiimimme koostuu 13 asiantuntijasta, osa meistä työskentelee Suomen rajojen ulkopuolella ja tiimimme sisäisenä työkielenä toimiikin pääasiassa englanti. Ominaispiirteenä tiimillemme on hyvin avoin ilmapiiri, tästä osoituksena toimii myös pulssikyselyssä 100% tunnustus sille, että joukossamme saat olla täysin omana itsenäsi. 

Tekemisemme jakautuu kahteen osaan: käyttövaltuushallintaan ja asiakirjahallintaan. Sinun fokuksesi tulee olemaan käyttövaltuushallinnan puolella. Käytännössä työarkesi koostuu siis käyttövaltuuksien hallinnoimisesta ja uusien käyttöoikeuksien koodaamisesta Axiomatics-tuotteeseen. Tämän lisäksi osallistut ABAC-tuotteen kehittämiseen ja myös integraatioiden toteuttamiseen. Tulevaisuudessa roolissasi on mahdollisuus myös ABAC-tuotteen käyttölaajuuden kasvattamiseen OP:n sisällä.

Mitä toivomme sinulta & mitä etsimme hakemuksestasi?

Rekrytointimme ei ole tarkoitus olla missään nimessä salatiedettä, vaan pyrimme kertomaan mahdollisimman selkeästi, millaista osaamista uskomme tehtävässä tarvittavan. Tässä tehtävässä tärkeimpänä työkalunasi tulee olemaan Axiomatics-tuote, jonka kautta toteutetaan käyttöoikeuksien hallintaa. Emme kuitenkaan oleta sinun tuntevan tuotteen käyttöä etukäteen, vaan meillä on valmiina perehdytysmateriaali tuotteen käyttöön. 

Muita osa-alueita, joista toivomme sinulla olevan aiempaa kokemusta:
• vahvaa aiempaa kokemusta ohjelmistokehityksen parista, jotta pystyt ottamaan haltuun sinulle mahdollisesti täysin uuden käyttövaltuushallinnan tuotteen ja toimimaan Lead Developerin tehtävässä. Arvostamme erityisesti aiempaa koodauskokemusta Javalla ja RESTful API-osaamista., kuten myös kokemusta yleispalveluiden toteuttamisesta.
• toimimme ketterässä kehitystiimissä, joten kokemus ketterästä kehittämisestä on sinulle eduksi (JIRA, Confluence).
• hyvät kommunikointitaidot sekä suomeksi (liiketoimintojen suuntaan viestimiseen) että englanniksi (tiimimme pääkieli).
• Robot framework, pipelines ja release -paketointi, dokumentointi.

Teknisten taitojen lisäksi arvostamme erityisesti oma-aloitteista ja pitkäjänteistä otetta tekemisessäsi. 

Miksi meille kannattaa hakea? 

Finanssialan toimijana voisi helposti kuvitella muuta, mutta olemme yksi Suomen suurimpia IT-taloja ja tuotamme asiakkaille näkyvät IT-ratkaisut pääosin itsenäisesti alusta loppuun. Siksi meiltä löytyy tuhansia alan osaajia ja esimerkiksi koodarikulttuuri näyttäytyy jo nykypäivänä vahvana. 

Kannustamme ja autamme sinua kehittymään myös ammatillisesti. Meillä on käytössä ns. 70-20-10 -periaate, mikä tarkoittaa, että käytät 70% ajastasi päivittäisiin tehtäviin, 20% työskentelytapojen hiomiseen ja viimeiset 10% vapaasti uusien taitojen oppimiseen. Tämän osuuden voit käyttää esimerkiksi OP Software Academyssa, jossa voit laajentaa osaamistasi monella eri osa-alueella. Voit siis laajentaa osaamistasi työajalla!

Saat lisäksi käyttöösi monipuoliset henkilöstöetumme, johon kuuluvat henkilörahasto sekä henkilökuntaehtoiset pankki-, vakuutus- ja lainapalvelut. Tarjoamme myös kattavan työterveyshuollon, laajan hoitokuluvakuutuksen sekä täysajan tapaturmavakuutuksen. Työssäjaksamiseen panostamme arjen tasapainolla ja joustavuudella sekä tarjoamalla käyttöösi lounas-, liikunta- ja kulttuuriedut sekä mahdollisuuden edulliseen lomailuun OP:n lomaosakkeissa. 

Kuulostaako sinun tulevalta rooliltasi?

Jes - tämä oli toiveenammekin! Hae tehtävää rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta viimeistään sunnuntaina 4.9.2022. Kaikkea emme saa varmasti mahdutettua yhteen työpaikkailmoitukseen, se nyt vaan on selvä. Tästä syystä Maija Pasternack (Product Owner) antaa tehtävästä mielellään lisätietoja puhelimitse +35840 501 9505.

Finanssialalla luottamus ja vastuullisuus ovat toimintamme perusta, minkä vuoksi tehtävään valittavalta henkilöltä tarkistetaan luottotiedot ja yritysyhteydet sekä teetetään huumausainetesti ja perusmuotoinen turvallisuusselvitys. 

OP Ryhmä on Suomen suurin finanssiryhmä. Olemme asiakkaidemme omistama, finanssialan houkuttelevin työnantaja Suomessa. Ryhmässämme työskentelee yli 12 000 alan ammattilaista, ja tuotamme sekä kehitämme pankki-, sijoitus-, vakuutus- ja kiinteistönvälityspalveluita neljälle miljoonalle asiakkaallemme. Lisätietoa OP:sta työnantajana ja kaikki avoimet tehtävämme löydät osoitteesta www.op-careers.fi.

Results.Heading: Frontend developer (React)
Results.Descr:
Are you looking for a place where your daily work helps thousands of people, specifically people that need help the most? Are you a team player that has specialties in Frontend Development and craving to update your skillset to the latest technologies? Do you like fast-moving and flexible work where your work-life balance is a must-have standard? If your answers are yes, yes and yes. We have good news, we are looking for a frontend guru to join our squad!
 
 Who we are
 
 Nordhealth (OB:NORDH) is a leading therapy practice management solution provider in Finland and in Norway. Our mission is to leverage the power of software and design to help healthcare professionals save time so they can focus on what matters most-delivering great care, great experiences, and growing their business.
 
 Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Nordhealth has a solid footprint in the Nordic region and a growing presence internationally, with more than 330 employees working either remotely or from offices (collaboration hubs). For more details visit the companys website at nordhealth.com (https://nordhealth.com/).
 
 About the team
 
 We have colleagues around the world, and for the team you will be working with we have awesome teammates from Norway and Finland who are waiting to be your co-workers. We have offices around Finland (Helsinki, Oulu, Kuopio, Lohja) and in Norway. So if you happen to like being at the office, there are plenty of choices for you.
 
 Were now looking for a Frontend developer to support our growth and join our Clinical workflow team! The team has people with different roles and backgrounds working together toward our brand new therapy practice management solution. That means, every commit you push is a stepping stone, the foundation of our new product.
 
 Excellent individuals in our team will help you and for sure we will have a lot of fun.
 
 We are thrilled if you have
 
 - Frontend expertise with extensive experience in React, other modern frontend frameworks experience are considered a big plus.
 
 - Typescript is highly preferred.
 
 - Testing frameworks for frontend development (i.e: Enzyme, Mocha, Jest, etc) are in your bag.
 
 - Clean code as your standard.
 
 - Micro-frontend concept is relevant to you, as well as microservice architecture knowledge will help you a lot with our system.
 
 - Experience in backend development (Python) is considered an advantage
 
 - A team player mindset
 
 - Excellent communication skills in English

Sounds like YOU? Join us!
 
 What its really like to work here
 
 At Nordhealth, we do things a little bit differently. Stuff like complex and old fashioned hierarchy, etc are unheard of. Instead, we value self-sufficiency, autonomous teams which, we believe, are the best way to bring out the best version of us.
 
 Your ideas, suggestions and concerns are listened to and carefully considered. We appreciate all constructive contributions, suggestions and feedback. Thanks to our flat hierarchy, we can react fast and sufficiently to brilliant ideas and suggestions without a doubt.
 
 As mentioned many times, the team you are in will have autonomy, no micro-management, no hiding behind fancy titles.
 
 This means you have more power as a team to make decisions without having to constantly approve them from management.
 
 We have skillful professionals and yet fun and helpful colleagues that are always there to help and guide you if you need.
 
 Here comes the best part, you can work 100% remote if you want to. Sounds cool, right? Flexibility and efficiency are the most important, you can choose wherever and whenever you want to work (clarification here, attending necessary meetings/shared work hours is required).
 
 What we are offering
 
 - Talented and engaged colleagues in an international environment
 
 - Possibility to work fully remotely, or at one of our offices
 
 - Good work/life balance with flexible working hours
 
 - Learning platforms and training for all of our employees
 
 - Internet and phone bills covered
 
 - Several perks
 
 - Choose your own equipment, such as laptop, phone, and headphones
 
 - Remote support to help you set up your home office if you choose to work remotely
 
 - Opportunities for personal and professional growth
 
 - Social events (brunches, team building, parties, company trips)

We will hire as soon as the right candidate is found, so please send your application as soon as possible.

Results.Heading: Lead Developer (JVM, .NET or Node.js)
Results.Descr:
We can affect people's everyday lives with the work that we do together here at Solita. In addition to interesting projects, we want to ensure that Solitans have a balance between work and free time. Want to join our diverse community? 

Apply 

We are looking for Lead Software Developers to work with us in Helsinki, Lahti, Tampere, Turku, or Oulu, as well as in our light offices (Jyväskylä, Pori, Kuopio, Joensuu), and in some cases completely remotely in other locations within Finland. What is it that we're looking for now? Passionate people who want to work in meaningful projects and help others around them shine! 

We are developing solutions for both  private and public sector customers  . We don't have customers from any specific business area, as we concentrate on having varied projects that are meaningful. This can mean that we have an impact on how we help users find more convenient routes, we get to use the newest technologies or we handle a global pandemic. Solita's projects are a combination of dev, data, cloud, and service design. The diversity of our projects also gives opportunities for continuous learning and rotation. 
 Possibilities are endless 
 Creating opportunities for developing your skills really is in the core of working at Solita, no matter how senior you already may be. When you arrive at Solita, the role that you first start with won't be the only one you'll have on your journey with us. For example, one of our Senior Software Developers Heikki describes his past five years like this: 

"I've worked at Solita for five years now. During that time I've worked with two different clients, in various projects. The work that we do is so versatile that it allows constant learning no matter how senior you already are. The project team has a big impact on what technologies we use in different situations. During my time at Solita, I have deepened my knowledge for example with Java, Clojure, Typescript / Node.js 

What's the best thing about working at Solita for me? I would say it's learning from others, and getting to do very diverse tasks, such as coding, job interviews, participating in book clubs / study groups etc.- whatever interests me the most!" 
 Some things we offer for you   We have  Solita Growth Academy  to support your continuous learning. This offers you for example in-house learning paths and O'Reilly licenses. 
 We also have great possibilities to learn from our info sessions, code coffees, mentor programs, and continuous possibilities to learn from each other in customer work. By cherishing continuous learning we make sure that we have interesting projects for the future, and also possibilities for project rotations. After all, all we have is our people. 
 You have an effect on the technologies and methodologies we use in projects. 
 Human-centric work environment where people take care of each other. 
 We want to ensure you have a good balance between work and free time. That's what our employees see as one of the biggest benefits at Solita. 
 Great benefits - such as choosing your own devices (you can freely choose PC laptop with Windows/Linux or Apple laptop, and the phone you like), massages to relax during your workdays, In-house coach to support your mental well-being, many hobby clubs, gyms (Hki and Tre), sports / culture and lunch benefit, extensive occupational healthcare and many more! 
 These qualities help you to succeed in this position  You help but also challenge the customer to solve the right problems, aiming to create maximal value to the customer through our work 
 You have the ability to work as an architect who defines the base of projects. 
 You are interested in creating software with a long and sustainable life cycle. 
 You are eager to share your knowledge with your colleagues. 
 You have gathered strong experience in working with for example Java, Kotlin, Clojure, Node.js or .NET 
 You also have some experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Google Cloud or Azure) - and you will definitely learn more with us! 
 
 Have a look at some of our tech talks from Core 2021 event and check out our dev-blog too! 

Let's talk more 
 We want to hear from you and figure out together what works best for us both. Tell us about yourself and your background in your own words. 

Our recruitment consists of two rounds of interviews where you will meet our team and learn more about working at Solita. You will be given the opportunity to show your skills and ask us questions. The purpose is to get to know each other better. 

Any thoughts or questions, please reach out to dev-recruiter Mirka / [email protected] / 0407258194

Results.Heading: Senior iOS Developer
Results.Descr:
WithSecure™ protects businesses all over the world from modern threats. We do this through a Co-security approach born from first-hand knowledge that no one can solve every cyber security problem alone. Every single day, our diverse, growing team fights against online extortion, threats to national infrastructure, the unlawful spread of sensitive information, and everything in-between.

The best part about working for WithSecure is our people! We are a community of dedicated and passionate professionals that take workplace happiness seriously. If you're looking for something that's more than just a job - we'd love to hear from you. 

We are looking for a  Senior iOS Developer  to join our mobile team in Helsinki and have the overall responsibility of developing high quality products to satisfy our customer needs and continuously improving working processes, tooling and ways of working.

The position is to be considered on-site/hybrid from Helsinki office, working remotely is permitted If you live permanently in Finland, Poland, Belgium, Germany or Norway.

Key Responsibilities
  Develop iOS B2B cyber security products and utilize the latest and greatest technologies, processes and tools
Improve processes, ways of working and common practices
Contribute to products roadmaps and other long-time plans
Proactively collaborate with all technical stakeholders, in- and cross-team, such as lead developers and architects
 
What are we looking for?
  Experience with Swift & Objective-C development
Experience with secure programming practices
Quality mindset
Experience in the whole software development process, from working with requirements to maintaining software and handling support cases
Fluency in English
Ability to clearly and reasonably conduct a technical discussion
Can-do attitude and excellent problem-solving skills
Excellent collaboration skills, self-confidence and willingness to work in fast changing environments
 
Bonus points
  Experience with AngularJS development
Experience with MDMs
 
What will you get from us
  A team that is technical, ambitious and friendly, that will share their knowledge and expect you to do the same
A lot of responsibility and freedom to make decisions
Challenging and interesting problems that will push you to learn new ideas, systems and ways of working
Modern laptops (Windows, Linux or Mac)
The opportunity to master new skills in different areas and develop yourself
Remote work option from Finland, Poland, Belgium, Germany and Norway
 
Both within our existing mobile products and new exciting cyber security solutions there is significant potential for further success in the market - if you are the right person to pursue and realize this success - this is a very rewarding position within WithSecure.

Our benefits include extensive health care, remote working, company supported sport activities, lunch vouchers, regular massages, gym and sauna at the premises and we even subsidize your commuting by paying you a bicycle and many more things to keep our best asset - people - happy!

Dare to be the best? Please send your CV and application as soon as possible! 

A security background check will be conducted for the selected candidate in accordance with Finnish Security Clearance act 726/2015.

Results.Heading: Senior Full-stack Developer - Oulu
Results.Descr:
Senior Full-stack Developer, Oulu 
 
 Would you like to work for a company where the sky is not the limit? Take your next career step at Huld! Here the earthly concerns of life are dealt vigorously, and space is great but known. We offer a humane workplace that lets you thrive and to grow as an expert in your field. 
 
 About us 
 
 We are a technology and design house full of independent thinkers and keen learners with humane hearts and bold attitudes. We are from different educational backgrounds and ethnic groups coming in all ages, shapes, and sizes. What unites us is our passion to pave way for a more humane and bold tomorrow for both people and our planet - with a twinkle in our eye. 
 
 In the Software team, we solve people's everyday problems by combining design and usability with technology.
 We are particularly distinguished in implementing high-quality mobile and web services. Our team has extensive industry knowledge and experience from consumer business to applications and heavy industry. Among other things, we have implemented new mobile payment solutions, an ERP system for the healthcare sector, mobile applications and video, AR and VR technology implementations for millions of users. 
 
 We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Developer 
 
 We are now looking to strengthen our team in Oulu with a senior developer. You will work closely together with our designers and other developers creating state-of-the-art online services for our customers. You help projects reach the appropriate solutions for the challenges they face. You are ready to offer a helping hand to your fellow developers as well as for the sales team for evaluations. 
 
 What should you expect to accomplish the first year? 
 
 Your goal during the first year is to establish yourself as a solid member of our team of experts. Your expertise can be relied on, whether there is a need to staff a new project or to assist our junior developers in ongoing projects. Your thoughts and opinions are appreciated to formulate sales offers to our customers. 
 
 Skills needed to succeed in this position 
 
 Prerequisites 

- Minimum 3 years of experience working with modern web technologies, frontend and/or backend.
 - Communications skills - almost as much as coding, this work is about the ability to communicate with people, whether it is a customer or a colleague. 
 - Curiosity and hunger for new things - this role offer continuous opportunities to participate in new projects, develop innovative products, learn modern technologies. You should have a bold attitude and approach to the unknown. 
 - Systematic approach, organizational skills - at any time you might be working in one or multiple projects, carrying responsibilities as both individually and as a team. This requires organized working methods.
 
 Nice-to-haves 

- Experience in cloud ecosystems
 - Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes knowledge
 - Database expertise
 - Interest in architectural and lifecycle design
 
 We promise you 
 
 Huld
 is an internationally unique technology design house: we offer a combination of software and product development expertise that is sure to offer you a variety of opportunities. Your projects may be related to, well, anything between mushrooms, medical devices and the Moon. 
 
 Our culture is based on humane interactions and low hierarchy. You can be your true self. We also cherish personal growth and offer you time to train your brain to further develop your expertise. Let us know where you want to take your career and we will find ways to support you. 
 
 At Huld you will have a genuine chance to influence the way we work. While we are proud of the way we do many things, we acknowledge there is always room for improvement - bringing a different viewpoint, you can be a key player in change. Ideas and suggestions are welcomed, boldness is encouraged also in this aspect. 
 
 We offer your basic fringe benefits such as sports and culture benefits, employee bikes, health benefits with added insurance, refreshments at the office etc. We also provide relocation support to Finland from abroad. 
 
 Sounds good? 
 
 If you recognized yourself in this job posting, click Apply now and leave us your information and CV with your salary expectation! Let us know about you and your talents. We cannot wait to hear more from you. 
 
 We process applications as they arrive, so don't wait! The process typically includes 1 to 2 interviews and lasts 1 to 4 weeks. All applicants are informed of the status of their application within 2 to 3 weeks from the application.
