Results.Heading: Sulautettujen järjestelmien ohjelmistokehittäjä älykkään teollisuuden hankkeisiin
Results.Descr:
Rekrytoimme 
Sulautettujen järjestelmien ohjelmistokehittäjiä älykkään teollisuuden hankkeisiin
 
Oletko se sinä?
 
Etsimme kehittäjiä, joilla on palo työskennellä älykkään teollisuuden parissa. Hankkeemme ulottuvat koneiden ja laitteiden sulautetuista järjestelmistä kokonaisiin teollisuuden digitalisointiratkaisuihin.
 
Suunnittelemme softaa sekä fyysisiin laitteisiin että pilviympäristöön, ja ratkomme ongelmia tuotekehitysvaiheesta alkaen aina tuotteen elinkaaren loppuun saakka. Pääset mukaan joko liikkuvien koneiden, energia-alan, valmistavan teollisuuden, tietoliikenteen tai hyvinvointi- ja terveysteknologian projekteihin. 
 
Osaamisellasi on iso vaikutus. Autat asiakkaita heidän liiketoimintansa kannalta kriittisissä hankkeissa. Teollisuuden digitalisoiminen auttaa myös koko Suomen kilpailukyvyn vahvistamisessa.
 Meistä 
Vuonna 2014 saimme ensimmäisen toimeksiannon: koodatkaa softa metsäkoneeseen. Meitä oli silloin kaksi tekijää. Asiakas tykkäsi lopputuloksesta. Kohta meiltä haluttiin järjestelmiä traktoreihin, energiamittareihin ja muihin teollisuusratkaisuihin. Siksi tarvitsimme lisää osaajia. Paljon. 
 
Nyt vajaa vuosikymmen myöhemmin meitä on jo yli 130 osaajaa. Halu auttaa asiakkaita vielä isommin ja kansainvälisemmin on kasvanut. Yhdistyminen Goforen kanssa mahdollisti osaamisemme kokoavan Intelligent Industry -kokonaisuuden. 
 
Tarjoamme ison työnantajan monipuoliset edut ja tiiviin työyhteisön meiningin. Tehtävämme on auttaa asiakkaitamme saamaan liiketoiminnastaan enemmän irti, parantamaan loppukäyttäjänsä kokemusta sekä löytämään uusia suuntia liiketoimintansa kehittämiseksi.
 Panostamme työntekijöidemme viihtymiseen muun muassa näin:   Lounas-, liikunta- ja kulttuurietujen lisäksi meillä on kattava työterveyshuolto. 
Voit tehdä työt joitakin poikkeuksia lukuunottamatta etänä - vaikka laiturinnokasta.
Meillä pääset kehittämään itseäsi työn ohessa. Jos törmäät asiakasprojektissa aihepiiriin, josta kaipaat lisää ymmärrystä, järjestämme sinulle haluamasi valmennuksen tai koulutuksen.
Teknologia-aamiaisten yhteydessä tutustumme porukalla uusiin työkaluihin ja käytäntöihin sekä niiden sovellusmahdollisuuksiin omassa työssä.
Olemme koonneet porukastamme aktiiviset teknologiaryhmät, joiden ihmisiltä saat nopeasti apua akuutteihin ongelmiin. Aina löytyy joku, joka jeesii.
Porukan yhteishenkeä pidetään yllä kokoontumalla liikunnallisten aktiviteettien kuten maastopyöräilyn, paintballin ja mikroautoilun ääreen. Onko sinulla jokin suosikkilaji? Ehdota niin järjestetään! 
Olipa sinulla huolia töihin tai perhetilanteeseesi liittyen, esihenkilösi ovi on aina auki.
CrewShare-osakesäästöohjelman ansiosta voit halutessasi ruveta Goforen omistajaksi. Meillä on vahva usko siihen, että yrityksen suunnan pitää olla oman porukan päätettävissä. 
Huomaathan, että vielä vuoden 2022 aikana älykkään teollisuuden työpaikoissa työsuhde-edut poikkeavat osittain Goforen muista työpaikoista, kunnes yksikkömme on yhdistynyt Goforeen myös etujen osalta. 
 

Millaista osaajaa haemme 
 Toivomme, että hallitset joko sulautettujen ydintekniikoiden salat (C/C++ -ohjelmointi, laiterajapinnat ja reaaliaikakäyttöjärjestelmät) tai Qt/QML-kehityksen tai sulautetun Linuxin säätämisen.
Sinulla on kokemusta joko sulautettujen järjestelmien ohjelmistoarkkitehtuurisuunnittelusta, ohjelmoinnista tai testauksesta.
On iso plussa, jos tunnet yksikkö- ja integraatiotestausta.
Olet avoin ja positiivinen tyyppi, jolla on iso halu oppia uutta.
Hallitset ketterän ohjelmistokehityksen menetelmät.
Olet kiinnostunut teknisistä vempeleistä 
Haluamme löytää sinulle juuri sellaisen roolin, joka tukee kykyjäsi ja kiinnostuksenkohteitasi.
 

Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Arvostamme vahvuuksiasi, joten saat kilpailukykyistä palkkaa osaamisesi mukaan. Saat haastaa itsesi mielenkiintoisissa ja innovatiivisissa hankkeissa, joilla on vaikutusta sekä asiakkaan liiketoimintaan että laajemmin suomalaiseen yhteiskuntaan. Projekteissa saat ottaa vastuuta niin paljon kuin haluat mutta pakko ei ole. 
 
Punnitsemme yhdessä hankkeet, jotka tukevat sinun osaamistasi ja haluasi kehittyä. Meillä pääset luomaan itsesi näköistä asiantuntijuutta. Halutessasi saat syventyä tiettyyn rajattuun erityisalueeseen tai laajentaa ymmärrystäsi monilla toimialoilla ja monissa ohjelmointikielissä. 
 
Pääset tekemään töitä alan kovimpien ammattilaisten kanssa. Nopeasta kasvustamme huolimatta täällä on pienen talon välitön meininki, joten uskomme, että viihdyt meillä. 
 Jäikö jokin mietityttämään? 
Jos mielessäsi heräsi kysymyksiä, älä jää niiden kanssa yksin, vaan ota yhteyttä Petriin tai Kimmoon (ks. alla), he auttavat sinua mielellään.
 
Soita tai meilaa 
 
Petri Ingalsuo

Results.Heading: Azure Developer - Product Development - Tampere
Results.Descr:
Job Title: Azure Developer

Hiring Company: Mid-sized Product-development company

Office Location: Tampere

"Expected" long-term remote-work flexibility: 1 office visit per week. Shorter term, full-remote is fine. Can be more flexible for individual cases. 

Are you interested in Automation? Are you passionate about working with the cloud, in particular Azure?

This is a stable option who are ambitiously investing in new products, using modern technologies to continue to build on their impressive international client-base. 

Role & Responsibilities

 * To design, develop and maintain the new cloud platform and cloud-based solutions. 
 * Work closely with Product Owners and other teams to design, develop and maintain platform functionalities and new features.
 * DevOps, unit and integration testing related to Microservices and API development.
 * Co-developing with software partners in detailed level.

Skills & Qualifications

 * +20 months professional experience as minimum, a range of mid and senior experience can be hired.
 * Company tech stack (Not all are required experience): Azure, C#, REST API's, Microservices, Python, JavaScript, SQL and more.
 * DevOps experience and experience with Agile frameworks (Scrum) is appreciated.
 * Fluent Finnish verbal & written required. 
 * Strong communication and team-work skills required.

Benefits

 * This is a chance to join a stable company with a wide range of well-known, reputable clients across the world. 
 * A great opportunity to learn more about automation, while other options to learn new things in Data and machine learning can be available. 
 * There are a range of great benefits included.
 * Growth and career & personal development meetings are regularly held to make sure you feel valued as an individual, and to be sure that your career can move forward.

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

d.field@nigelfrank.com

+358 75 3266 582

Whilst this position offers remote working flexibility, all candidates must be located inside Finland, be willing to do some travelling per year to Tampere and hold a valid work Visa.

All interviews will be carried out remotely.

Results.Heading: Full-Stack Azure Developer
Results.Descr:
Full-Stack Azure Developer - Helsinki, Tampere, Oulu & Full Remote 

The Company

Our client is looking for an experienced full-stack developer with a hunger to grow!
 
 They are a leading intellectual asset lifecycle management SaaS -solution with 5000+ users in 350+ well-known organizations in Finland and abroad. Their clients include innovative companies and organizations of all sizes, who want to protect, expand and utilize their intellectual property efficiently. They have customers of all sizes from smaller companies to companies with tens of thousands of employees. Now they are looking to expand internationally, currently, 10% of their revenue comes from outside of their domestic market.
 
 They decided a number of years ago to rebuild their solution from the ground up from a system that had been running for 20 years previous to a new modern Azure environment, hence the new hires who will drive this change and implement their Azure and new cloud technology experience. 
 
 The position
 
 We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Azure Developer to further strengthen the product development team whose mission is simply to build the very best cloud-based IP management solution in the world. Their product development crew is an integrated agile team of highly skilled technical and functional professionals supported by IPR specialists.
 
 Your role would be crucial, and they expect you to contribute significantly to their product development. You will report directly to the Head of Technology and additionally, you will be supported & coached by a product owner, other developers, and the rest of their organization. They are open to defining your exact responsibilities as per your own interests and current plus future abilities.
 
 They utilize the latest tools and methodologies as much as possible, for example, they use Azure DevOps with CI/CD to manage, design, build, test and deploy their products. In addition to the software development tasks from all parts of the software development lifecycle, they expect you to further contribute to their way of working in terms of new ideas, feedback, and thought leadership on software development questions.
 
 Requirements

* Deep technical understanding of the Microsoft stack (incl .NET Core, C#, Azure)
 * Professional experience on .NET & Azure with any modern front framework (e.g. Vue/React/Angular)
 * Experience with various architectures (incl. microservices) and stateless APIs
 * Understanding of various database and data storage solutions such as traditional relational SQL, schemaless and cloud-based binary options such as Azure Blobs
 * Business-oriented mind-set and positive can-do attitude
 * Ability and willingness to work with a diverse team across functions
 * Generic understanding (& seeing the value of) how to build business-critical software

Bonus Points

 * You have been Scrum Master or have other team leading experience
 * You have previous experience (and keen interest) in taking architectural responsibility
 * You have DevOps experience & care deeply about Test Automation
 * You are Microsoft certified on Azure, DevOps, Data or Development
 * Demonstrated success in building SaaS solutions, either B2B or B2C

What they offer

 * Modern zero-legacy Microsoft tech stack (Azure, .NET Core, EF Core, React, Azure SQL, Blobs etc.)
 * Possibility to grow in or out of position as the client grows (Scrum Master, Technical Architect etc.)
 * Stable but fast-paced long-term product development company that can offer a long career in development rather than consultancy (project) focus.
 * An open start-up spirited company culture, ability to make an impact in the early stages.
 * Possibility to grow in or out of your position as the company grows
 * Stable but fast-developing business with huge global market potential
 * Social events and training (incl. certification)
 * Prime office locations in Helsinki, Tampere & Oulu with fun and professional teammates & good overall benefits
 * Full remote availability.

We require fluency in English, both spoken and written. Some rudimentary understanding of Finnish is highly beneficial. Most importantly, you must already be eligible (authorized) to work in the EU.

If you'd like more information please send your CV and contact me at:

Results.Heading: Fullstack Developer

Full Stack Developer - Across Finland 

Our client is expanding their capabilities in serving their customers in their software development needs related to customer-specific information systems and is looking for skilled full-stack developers to join our team.  * Capability and willingness to direct customer interaction
 * Genuine interest to keep technical know-how up to date
 * Fluent Finnish and English

 * Startup spirit and benefits of a big company - with the client you get the best of both worlds. You get to work in an agile way as in any startup community, while they ensure you stability with long-term and a large range of projects.

Full Stack Developer - Espoo

They are a trusted partner for over 100 customers across Europe, with the Nordics as the focal market. They offer retail analytics for the FMCG industry retailers and brands. All the services you would develop are modern cloud-based SaaS (software as a service) applications.
 * The tech stack you would be working with is ,NET, C#, SQL, Angular, Javascript, Typescript, AWS, Redshift, Snowflake, Kubernetes (you do not need to have had experience with all of this tech, .NET, C# and SQL is a must! anything else is just beneficial)

What this means for you 

 * The architecture is at its early stages - opportunity to be part of something from its early phases of development (Cloud Data Engineer role)

 * Encourages their employees to use 20% of their paid working time per week to develop their own skills. They can choose how to use this time and If any funds are needed - the company is happy to sponsor them

Results.Heading: Analyst Developer
Results.Descr:
Are you passionate about coding and developing world-class products that are used every day by people across the globe? 

Do you want to work within a rapidly growing business which offers an incredible range of opportunities to develop your career? 

Do you want to be part of a team that creates value for our customers, their clients and our business? 

FNZ is the power behind many high-scale financial services platforms. Our customers rely on us to create web applications that meet their own high standards for usability and design. These range from highly usable sites for direct investors to sophisticated systems for wealth managers. They always need to be fast, reliable, responsive/adaptive and accessible.

We are currently looking for multiple developers to join our talented teams across Europe . 

Analyst developers at FNZ are all-rounders who analyse required system changes, design databases, write complex financial business logic and create slick web applications. They also work closely with analyst testers and other members of the project team to produce world class software. 

Our technology stack is built across Microsoft, so you'll be using C#, .NET, jQuery and many more technologies on a daily basis, however we're also passionate about exploring the newest technologies and incorporating them into our development. 

Who you are: 
Experience with one Microsoft development products (including C#/VB.NET, ASP.NET, MVC and SQL Server), jQuery, Java, CSS.
A confident developer who is able to take initiative in a delivery-focused environment.
Independent with a self-directing work style.
Enjoy working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment as part of a high-performance team.
Passionate about creating innovative solutions for customers.
Experience with web development and an understanding of web services.


What can FNZ offer you? 
As a global organization, with offices around the world, we offer travel opportunities and remote working, as well as real investment into your own personal and professional growth.
Be part of a highly successful, rapidly growing, global business that is leading the delivery of financial services via cloud computing and partners with some of the world's largest companies.
Remuneration and career advancement is based on individual contribution and business impact rather than tenure or seniority.
We provide global career opportunities for our employees at any of our offices in the UK, Czech Republic, Australia, New Zealand, Nordics or China.


If this sounds like you then please apply!  

At FNZ, we recognize that diversity, inclusion and accessibility are important factors for our success. We embrace the unique perspective and capabilities of our current and future employees, which will help us continue to drive innovation and achieve our business goals. Recruitment decisions at FNZ are made in a non-discriminatory manner where all employees are valued and respected. In particular, we want to ensure accessibility needs are well supported thus, ensuring our recruitment process is fair and equitable for all applicants.

Please let us know if there is any support we can provide to ensure FNZ's recruitment process is fully accessible to you. You can contact us at recruitment@fnz.co.uk to discuss specific requirements.

With our commitment to innovation, driven by the award-winning Nokia Bell Labs, we are a leader in the development and deployment of 5G networks. 
 Our communications service provider customers support more than 6.4 billion subscriptions with our radio networks, and our enterprise customers have deployed over 1,300 industrial networks worldwide. Adhering to the highest ethical standards, we transform how people live, work and communicate. A truly global company, we are 166 nationalities working in more than 118 countries. 
 Come create the technology to connect the world.

 We are developing L1 Fronthaul SW for new baseband products for 4G and 5G. We are looking for C++ SW developers to different types of roles. We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work. 

The team you'll be part of 

Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards. 

What you will learn and contribute to 

The intern position relates to software development and data analytics for intelligent application support in network management. The intern will have the chance to work on use cases that bring new values to mobile networks such as Media and entrainment (M&E) and future smart industry applications. With the help of the team, the intern will implement and evaluate software components and data analytics methods that bring intelligence to future wireless networks. This work will contribute to demonstrations, proof-of-concepts, and research publications. 

The intern will be responsible for implementing software components and machine-learning based data analytics methods for intelligent network management purposes. They are expected to be at advanced stage of their postgraduate studies, preferably doctoral studies, and has knowledge of software development and data science. 

Your skills and experience 

You have: 

  Solid Java SE programming skills 
 Experience with system level programming such as C/C++ 
 Knowledge of Intel DPDK 
 Experience with machine learning implementation (Python3 and TensorFlow/Keras) 
 It would be nice if you also had: 
   Knowledge of web front-end technology 
 Knowledge of networking and communication systems 
 Knowledge of networking and cloud development 
 Experience of Secure Shell (SSH) and Linux command line 
 
 What we offer 
 Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. All our traineeships are paid. The salary is determined on the basis of course credits.

Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer 

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality: 

 One of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark
LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation
 
 At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. 

Nokia's employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
 We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect. 

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

Results.Heading: Senior IT Developer, Data & Analytics
Results.Descr:
Senior IT Developer, Data & Analytics

Do you want to build scalable applications with modern cloud technologies? Do you believe value is best created in cross-functional teams with direct user access?

Innovating and designing new products as well as tweaking and maturing existing ones, you will cooperate with data scientists, DevOps engineers, ML engineers, frontend developers, data engineers, business experts and other specialists to create the digital products of tomorrow.

Join a team focused on our most valuable digital products

You will join the Data & Analytics team. The purpose of our team is to build advanced end-to-end products that create direct business value for DSV's divisions, including:
•  Customs declaration automation
•  Vendor invoices automation
•  Booking transparency
•  Address validation
•  ETA prediction

The use cases we solve tend to have a high degree of complexity, requiring non-deterministic problem solving (i.e., the use of ML/AI), near real-time data processing, a need for high availability, vertical and horizontal scalability, and an extremely high volume of transactions.

However, fancy technologies and accurate ML models do not solve the issues at hand alone. We strive to combine our competencies to build holistic solutions where the underlying complexity is hidden for the user to create simple and value-adding experiences. We do this with close, ongoing dialogue with our end-users - that is one of the benefits of having the users internally in the organization!

Your new unit is divided into cross-functional product teams with a mix of young and highly experienced colleagues. We strive to base our work on knowledge and insight rather than hierarchical structures, and we make sure that our decisions are based on conversations between people with different competencies rather than one individual.

Build high-quality software with fault tolerance and scalability

As our next Senior IT Developer, you will use the right tools in the toolbox to solve the issues at hand. You will engage in solution architecture discussions as well as building, testing, and deploying the software using our standard CI/CD pipelines.

Additionally, you will be:
•  Building micro services for processing data, reading/writing to the database, exposing data to other applications, and more.
•  Using the architectural patterns that are relevant for a specific context such as event-based data streaming, request-response web services, file transport jobs, and more.
•  Making sure that relevant logs are created, are understandable, are shared with our central logging platform, and that the necessary alerts are setup.
•  Testing your software from a functional, quality, fault-tolerance, performance, and scalability perspective.
•  Building security features into the solution such as federated authentication and authorization, role-based access control, and similar.
•  And much more...

Using the right technology for the use case

You thrive in an environment where you can use modern cloud-based technologies that are fit-for-purpose, and you enjoy staying up to date with the latest technologies. You have a broad experience with many of the technologies in the list below, but we do not expect you to have experience with all of these:
•  Backend applications: Mostly coded in Java, Scala (and some C#)
•  Event streaming: Confluent Kafka (KStreams etc.)
•  Database technologies: Mostly MongoDB Atlas (and some PostgreSQL, MySql)
•  Version control: Git
•  CI/CD Pipelines: Jenkins, Argo, AzureDevOps
•  Requirements: Jira
•  Documentation: Confluence
•  Authentication: OIDC, OAuth2, SAML
•  Containerization: Docker
•  Container orchestration: Kubernetes
•  Logging, monitoring & Alerting: ELK stack

Want to know more and apply?

We will be happy to answer any questions you may have regarding the position and about your options in DSV. You are welcome to call Senior Product Owner, Data & Analytics Nikolaj Thiesen on +45 2631 4696.

We look forward to receiving your application via the link below as soon as possible. We will process the applications as we receive them.

Working with us, you will get to know these systems as well:
•  ML Frameworks: TensorFlow / PyTorch
•  ML model serving: TensorFlow serving, Torch serving
•  ML model development: Mostly coded in Python
•  ML Ops Platform: Kubeflow, MLFlow, SeldonCore, KNative, KServe
•  Load balancing: NGINX, Cloud LBs
•  Installation scripts: Ansible, Terraform
•  Frontend technologies: React JS, Material UI, JavaScript/TypeScript, Redux
•  Test framework: Jest, Junit, Jmeter
•  Identity & Access Management broker: Redhat SSO

Results.Heading: Software Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a passionate Software Developer to join our forces in Espoo!
 
 This permanent position includes versatile tasks ranging from application coding and design, to developing and maintaining API-surfaces, microservices and data pipelines in cloud environments. In addition you may for example work on embedded software. Your colorful variety of tasks also include software lifecycle design and planning, DevOps related tasks, and unit testing. Most importantly you will support our customers in developing their business through digitalization. In this position, you have the opportunity to work even completely remotely. 
 
 In this position you will have an opportunity to work as part of an experienced team of true, rock solid professionals and become accustomed to utilizing agile methods in your work. The most modern equipment in the industry will be at your disposal, either at one of our own offices or in our customer's premises.
 
 Who are we looking for?
 
 Preferably you have several years of experience in working with backend (eg. C#, NET Core, Node js or Java) and frontend (eg. Web components, PWA and SPA applications, React, Angular or JavaScript) techniques. We would highly appreciate your experience in cloud services (AWS or Azure) and an applicable educational background.
 
 You will be working as a valuable member of the team and in frequent, close cooperation with our customers which is why we hope that you possess excellent communication and group work skills. Additionally, you are known for your independent and proactive self-starter approach to your work.
 
 What do we offer you at Etteplan?
 
 Our brand promise of "Engineering with a difference" is reflected in everything we do. We are proud of our expertise and the ability to influence the success of our customers through our software services. We support and enable continuous learning and development of our employees by providing them meaningful and challenging work tasks, the most modern tools in our field and professional growth opportunities. Our customers represent a wide range of industries which enables unlimited access to variety in your work tasks.
 
 We invest heavily on our employee wellbeing by providing health, culture and lunch benefits. We strongly believe that a healthy balance between work and free time creates inspiration in our employees which has a positive impact on their work. We have an intriguing, international work environment. We take pride in our relaxed corporate culture where we work with a professional attitude whilst having fun with our amazing co-workers.
 
 Interested?
 
 Please send your CV and cover letter through our recruitment system as soon as possible, however, no later than 30.6.2022. We would kindly notify that we will go through applications already during the application period. For more information regarding this position, please contact our Team Manager Jani Levonen, +358401483676, jani.levonen@etteplan.com. 
 
 Welcome to Etteplan!
 
 "Work performance reaches completely new dimensions when the element of trust is present. In the midst of the most challenging of moments one can let go of any uncertainties as the environment leaves no room for unnecessary hesitation. Even the most roughest Mondays flow smoothly onward when a person is surrounded by an incredible crew of amazing people. One simply feels right at home here."
 - Roope, Junior UX Designer
 
 "Speaking from my own experience the work tasks have been truly fascinating, yet they have offered enough challenges. My employer offers a listening ear for each individual and takes their unique determination and desire into consideration. By no means is anyone forced to participate in projects. We have an easy-going atmosphere which promotes openness and fosters encouragement."
 - Janne, Software Developer
 
 "It's easy to feel sense of belonging here at Etteplan, thanks to the incredible peer support and our community. We spend time together doing all kinds of different things and have the opportunity to attend exciting events, both official and unofficial."
 - Jouni, Senior Software Designer

Results.Heading: Senior Frontend Developer 55-85k€ / year
Results.Descr:
About Logmore 

 We think and dream big to push boundaries and to grow fast, and today we are a team of +50 professionals committed to serving over 400 logistics, food, pharmaceutics and other customers globally. Through our pioneering cloud-based monitoring technology, we at Logmore are on a mission of making supply chains transparent, ensuring product safety as well as minimising waste for enterprises and consumers. Logmore enables the gathering of data from shipments and effective organisation, storing and distribution of it. With the help of Logmore Cloud and dynamic QR data loggers we are able to convert complexity and stress into knowledge and peace of mind. 

Your role as the Senior Frontend Developer

You'll be involved in the development of Logmore Cloud Platform. The Cloud is both the brains and the beating heart of the Logmore service, so your work will be seen and felt by all our customers and users.

As a senior frontend engineer, you will be working mainly on the customer facing parts of the Logmore Cloud. Depending on your experience, skillset and interests, you can also focus on the backend application parts. On many occasions you will be working with large datasets and visualising information for our customers. Performance is important to you and your work will focus on efficiency when choosing right approaches and algorithms. Access to data is via RESTful APIs for which you'll take part in designing with our Software team.

In the frontend you will use Javascript and HTML to write Vue.js UI components and expand our existing solution. SPA state is managed in Vuex and API calls are handled with Axios. Emphasis on our software is with usability and speed. We are handling critical information for multiple different markets and getting to the relevant details via our frontend is important for our customers. This also shows in our testing practises and we expect you to be fluent in writing and maintaining tests for the code you work with.

Your work with testing also intersects with the DevOps side of things. You will fluently write tests with Jest and deal with CircleCI, Kubernetes and AWS for software releases.

Obviously the work is not all coding, though. You'll start your day in the daily team meeting to sync things with other developers, and use Jira as your compass for development tasks. You will be involved in meetings and planning sessions to create specifications for new features with developer colleagues as well as members of the Customer Success and Sales teams. In order to succeed in a fast growing company like Logmore, we value good communications and problem solving skills. 

What will you be doing
 Develop and maintain Logmore Cloud services UI components
Work with large datasets and data visualisation optimising performance and latency
Collaborate with agile team in software development on data visualisation and dashboards
Take part in defining next steps in scaling our Cloud services for ever growing audience by participating in our DevOps activities

Qualities that will ensure your success in the role
5+ years experience in software development preferably with modern Javascript frameworks such as React or Angular
 An attitude for delivering results in a fast-paced environment. We are out to change the world!
You learn fast and eagerly. You are eager to question things and approach unknowns
Mindset of coaching other team members and sharing best practises
Strong communication skills in English (Finnish is a nice bonus)
Strong experience working with SPAs utilising RESTful APIs
Experience in frontend frameworks & technologies (we use Vue.js, Vuex, Axios, Jest)
Some familiarity with the DevOps tech in our stack: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CircleCI

Technical background that would suit this position
 React
Angular
Typescript
Design systems
CSS / SASS / LESS
Jest
Cypress
Babel
Webpack
AWS


So why Logmore?
 You'll have the opportunity to work as part of a fast-growing, international and ambitious team with a warm and friendly atmosphere
Get to work with our top-level developers. We know how to make things happen! We are also on the cutting edge of technology both on the software and hardware side. 
Create a real impact and grow along with the company - you get to join us at an extremely interesting time. 
See your handiwork in scaling up the organisation
Make the world smarter: reduce the amount of waste, make logistics operations more efficient and build more transparent supply chains

 Tech •  Helsinki •  Hybrid Remote

Results.Heading: Healthtech Software Developer (Open application)
Results.Descr:
Terveystalo Digital Health is looking for new talents to join us as we are building the smartest platform in the industry. We have super-talented people working on that mission already, but we need more hands to do it. 
 
We have a very modern and continuously developing technology stack. If your passion is aligned with what we do, we can offer full support for your professional growth. 
 
In our Digital Health Software & Services we work on: 
 
 Services for individual customers
  Mobile applications, website, appointment booking and remote services (chats, video appointments, messaging etc.)
 
Services for private sector
  Tailored occupational healthcare solutions and employer work ability tracking
 
Services for public sector
  Tailored services and integrations to/from our services
 
Internal services
  Mobile app for professionals, care efficiency tracking, tools to help with patient work and streamlining processes (for example Covid)
 
We have development centers in Helsinki, Tampere, Oulu, Jyväskylä and Kuopio so you need to be ready to work from one of these when necessary (once a week/biweekly). Most of the work will be done remotely from your own preferred location. Some of the projects require fluent Finnish but most projects don't - fluent English is enough. 
 
You just might be the person we are looking for if:You have experience with some of the following: C#, .NET, React, React-Native, Node, Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, PHP, OutSystems, Azure or GCP.
You find value in healthcare services and wish to be a part of delivering the smartest service platform in the industry
You want to work with modern technologies among talented colleagues
 
 

 
 
Want to discuss more about possibilities at Terveystalo Digital Health?
 
If what we do resonates with your ambitions and professional goals, please drop us your contact information and CV / LinkedIn profile via the link below and we'll be in touch when applicable opportunities arise!
 
Any questions regarding our software development team or working at Terveystalo? Don't hesitate to contact Talent Acquisition Consultant Max Hedman (max.hedman@terveystalo.com) or connect with me on LinkedIn.

Results.Heading: HS Datadesk Senior Developer
Results.Descr:
Helsingin Sanomat Datadesk is looking for a
 SENIOR DEVELOPER 
Do you want to be a vanguard of digital journalism? Do you want to support investigative journalists expose wrongdoings in the society and help the newsroom react to historic events?

Helsingin Sanomat datadesk is looking for a developer. The goal of datadesk is to be a top of the class creator of digital journalism globally, and good quality software development is a mandatory prerequisite for that.

As a developer in the datadeks you are a part of the Helsingin Sanomat editorial room. Datadesk develops data journalism tools, makes visual special articles and analyses data for the newsroom needs. In a cross disciplinary working environemnt you'll act as the technical specialist, enabling implementation of ideas and on the other hand offering opportunities that weren't previously available.

The unique addition to traditinoal programming work in the editorial room is the pulse of the news cycle - at times, datadesk develops longer term visions and at times reacts to breaking news.

Having a varied technical background and knowledge of different software development methods and tools helps thrive in this environment. A drive to learn new things is essential in the world of news.

We're looking for an experienced candidate, who can offer insights to ways of working and software architecture in addition to development. At the moment our tech stack consists of for example TypeScript, React, Vue, Nodejs, AWS, DynamoDB, Docker and GitHub.

We offer you

- Millions of users for the services you develop

- An opportunity to make societally impactful journalism

- Inspiring, inspired and veru professional working environment

- The chance to develop the future of data journalism

Datadesk is located in the Helsingin Sanomat newsroom in Helsinki. Remote work opportunity 60-80% of the time.

Are you interested? Apply now, the position will be filled when a suitable candidate is found.

Applicants may be required to undergo a security clearance in accordance with the Security Clearance Act (726/2014).

Results.Heading: Software Developer/Architect (Java technologies) - Tietoevry Create
Results.Descr:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile. 

 About Us 

 Tietoevry creates digital advantage for businesses and societies. We are a leading digital services and software company with local presence and global capabilities. Nordic values and heritage are the foundation of Tietoevry success. Let's build a brighter future. Together. 

 About the positions 

 We at Tietoevry are expanding our capabilities in serving our customers in their software development needs related to customer specific information systems and are looking for skilled full stack developers to join our team. Our Java Software Development teams are working with various modern Java technologies like Node, Angular, React, and Vue. Cloud is strongly present in majority of our customer projects, AWS and Microsoft Azure being the most popular cloud technologies. 

We are part of Tietoevry Create Finland, which is serving over 150 customer organizations. Our customers represent extensively both public and private sectors. With us you have a great possibility to see the whole spectrum of the IT field! You can decide whether you would prefer growing as an expert in specific business or whether you would like to gain wide experience in different business areas. 

We are looking for a person who wants to work with us on a permanent basis. You have already track record as a full stack developer or you have gained experience on front-end or back-end developer. Degree in information technology would be appreciated. With us you would be working closely not only with software, but with your team members and customers, and often with colleagues from other companies, too. You should also be able to speak and write both Finnish and English fluently. 

We have currently team members e.g. in Espoo, Tampere, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Lappeenranta and Kuopio but any other location in Finland is possible as well. 

 What's needed in the position? 

 We are looking for candidates willing to help our customers to take digital advantage for society or business, by means of modern full stack software development. Your exact role can be tailored within our wide domain of custom software development, depending on your unique skills and interests. 

Skills and characteristics needed in the role: 
 You are experienced in Java technologies like Java, Spring, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Angular, React or Vue etc 
 Experience in working with agile methodologies like Scrum or SAFe 
 Capability and willingness to teamwork 
 Capability and willingness to direct customer interaction 
 Genuine interest to keep technical know-how up to date 
 Fluent Finnish and English

 Additional skills and characteristics being beneficial in the role: 
 Experience in industrial scale software development 
 Knowledge of common software design patterns like software layers, error handling, data validation, REST-APIs, asynchronous programming, transactional processing, caching, and event-driven architecture 
 Experience in working or studying in international environment 
 Experience in working with cloud platforms (Microsoft Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud) 
 Experience in working with different databases 
 Experience in working with Entity Framework 
 SQL scripting skills 
 HTML and CSS skills 
 Experience in working with version control tools like Git 
 Experience in working with DevOps (CI/CD)

 What's in it for you? 
 You can genuinely impact the future  by working in meaningful projects. You get to influence how digitalization serves millions of Finns, today and tomorrow. From e-healthcare services to state administration, and everything in between such as developing HSL app to make daily travelling smoother or developing solutions fighting against our common enemy Covid-19. Or is maybe supporting some of the biggest Finnish companies in gaining state-of-the-art digital advantage against their rivals in the global competition more your thing? 
 Startup spirit and benefits of a big company - with us you get the best of both worlds.  You get to work in an agile way as in any startup community, while we ensure you stability with long-term and large range of projects. Competitive compensation and a great work-life balance is ensured - you will have the tools and freedom to organize your work and, more importantly, your life. It's all in your hands. 
 You become part of a community where people are respected and valued.  Come as you are and work the way you want. Our communities are nurtured and driven by passionate people at the front line. For us, diversity and inclusion are fundamental in the creation of an inspirational workplace and being different is how we drive innovation forwards. 
 Professional growth is guaranteed.  We believe that learning and growing together helps us to become better every day - with us you learn and overcome the challenges together. Our Continuous Learning platform offers anything from new technologies to developing your business understanding. Let's not forget our large client base, covering all industries and the exciting projects we get to work - endless opportunities to learn, grow and change between projects.

 Join us and make your mark! 

 We look forward to hearing from you! Please send us your application as soon as possible. We will evaluate candidates continuously. 

 How is it to work with us at Tietoevry? Please find it out from the blogs of our colleagues Ella Viitasuo , Hennileena Calonius , and Jani Salomaa (in Finnish). 

For additional information, please contact our Head of Software Development Java, Pauli Lalla via email: pauli.lalla@tietoevry.com or by phone +358 40 544 2076 or Head of Software Development Java, Henna Sopanen via email: henna.sopanen@tietoevry.com or by phone +358 50 433 5116.

Results.Heading: Lead Developer - Digital Customer Service
Results.Descr:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile. 

 Haemme Full Stack kehittäjää Espooseen ja Ouluun!  

 Oletko innostunut ja aikaansaava sovelluskehittäjä? Haluatko merkityksellisen työn, jossa voit kehittyä ja kasvaa? Jos vastasit kyllä, jatka lukemista. 

 Etsimme joukkoomme nyt vakituiseen työsuhteeseen Full Stack kehittäjää monipuoliseen tehtävään Customer Experience (CX) kehittäjäporukkaan. 

 Millaiset tehtävät sinua odottavat?  

 Tarjoamme sinulle selkeän tehtäväkentän ja valtuudet sekä läpinäkyvät odotukset. Full Stack kehittäjänä pääset isosti mukaan mielenkiintoisiin kehityshankkeisiin ja digitaalisen asiakaskokeman kehittämiseen erityisesti verkkoasioinnin ratkaisuissa. Sinua odottaa mielenkiintoinen tehtäväkenttä, jossa pääset haastamaan ja kehittämään kykyjäsi huipputiimissä. 

 Osana meidän jengiä  

 Meidän kanssamme pääset aidosti vaikuttamaan miten digitalisaatio palvelee miljoonia pohjoismaalaisia ratkomalla asiakkaidemme haasteita osana asiantuntevaa tiimiä. 

 Asiakaskokemus (CX)  on yksi TietoEvryn keihäänkärkiliiketoiminnoista. Autamme asiakkaitamme ylivertaisen digitaalisen asiakaskokemuksen tuottamisessa hyödyntäen älykästä teknologiaa, dataa ja analytiikkaa. Asiakaskokemus onkin strateginen kilpailutekijä asiakkaillemme. Me uskomme, että pysyvää kilpailuetua digitaalisella asiakaskokemuksella syntyy vain kokonaisvaltaisesti johdetulla ja rakennetulla integroidulla asiakaskokemuksella pistemäisen lähestymisen sijaan. Siksi olemmekin usein mukana monessa asiakaskokemuksen kehittämisen vaiheissa aina strategiasta, designiin, arkkitehtuuriin ja teknologia- ja dataratkaisuihin saakka. Tuemme asiakkaitamme tarvittaessa koko ratkaisun elinkaaren ajan varmistaen investoinnin optimaaliset liiketoimintahyödyt. Teemme töitä useiden kansainvälisten ohjelmistotyökalu- ja pilvialustatoimijoiden kanssa kattaen ratkaisualueina mm. Contact Center-ratkaisut, videoneuvottelutekniikat, integraatiot, markkinoinnin automaatio, CRM, online- ja mobiilikehityspalvelut.

 Millaista osaamista etsimme?  

 Tiimimme jäsenenä sinulla tulee olla vahva tekninen osaaminen ja ennen kaikkea asennetta oppia ja ottaa haltuun uutta. 

Toiveemme on, että 
Full Stack kehittäjänä hallitset hands-on kokemuksella useimpia seuraavista: Java 8, NodeJS, Angular 11/Angular Material, WebRTC, REST, SQL, RabbitMQ
Sinulla on osaamista useimmista moderneista ympäristöistä: Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, AWS (ECS/ALB/EC2 jne.), Azure, O365, Active Directory, GitHub, GitLab, Linux, Jira, Confluence, ServiceNOW
Kokemuksesi kattaa myös mm. termit: Agile, Scrum, ITIL, DevOps, CI/CD
Eksoottisemmistakin sinulla saattaa olla käryä: KeyCloak, Genesys Purecloud  (REST), Vonage (REST), Signicat/Telia/NETS (OAuth2), Suomi.fi (SAML)
 Vakuutat asiakkaat teknisen osaamisesi lisäksi myös kommunikoinnin avulla 
 Olet itsenäinen ja aikaansaava sekä autat muita monikansallisessa tiimissämme 


Eduksi katsomme aiemman kokemuksen finanssialueen sovelluskehitystyöstä ja asiakaspalveluratkaisujen ja digitaalisen asioinnista parissa. 

 Mitä tarjoamme?  

 Pääset aidosti vaikuttamaan  yhteiskuntaan - kehitämme elämää helpottavia sovelluksia e-terveyspalveluista julkishallinnon palveluihin ja finanssisektorin digitaalisista palveluista teollisuuden B2B verkkoliiketoiminnan ratkaisuihin.

 Pääset osaksi yhteisöä, jossa ihmisiä kunnioitetaan ja arvostetaan  . Kysy keneltä vain, parasta meillä on meidän asiantuntevat työkaverit ja huipputiimit. Tule sellaisena kuin olet ja tee työsi niin kuin itse haluat. Meille moninaisuus ja osallistaminen ovat inspiroivan työpaikan kulmakiviä, ja erilaisuudella edistämme innovaatiota. 

 Mahdollisuus kasvaa ja oppia.  Meillä oppiminen ei lopu koskaan, sillä käytössäsi on parhaat työkalut ja ympäristö itsesi kehittämiseen. Olipa kyse IT-teknologioiden oppimisesta tai liiketoimintaosaamisen kehittämisestä, meiltä saat tarvitsemasi tuen! Meillä oppiminen on elämäntapa. 

 Kasvuyrityksen henki yhdistettynä suuren yrityksen etuihin - meillä voit kokea parhaat puolet molemmista.  Tarjoamme kilpailukykyisen palkkatason ja erinomaista tasapainoa työelämän ja yksityiselämän välille. Me tarjoamme sinulle tarvittavat työkalut, että voit järjestää työsi ja, mikä tärkeintä, elämäsi juuri niin kuin sinulle parhaiten sopii. 

 Liity joukkoomme ja ole osana menestystä!  

 Inspiroiduitko? Lähetä hakemuksesi ja CV:si pikimmiten, sillä käymme hakemuksia läpi jo hakuajan puitteissa. 

 Lisätietoja tehtävästä antaa Hannu Haanpalo, hannu.haanpalo@tietoevry.com +358 (40) 5931818 

Toteutamme kaikki haastattelut turvallisesti ja helposti videohaastatteluina. Rekrytointiprosessimme etenevät siis normaalisti etäyhteyksiä hyödyntäen. 

TietoEVRYon pohjoismaiden johtava digitaalisiin palveluihin ja ohjelmistoihin keskittynyt yhtiö. Luomme digitaalista etumatkaa yrityksille ja yhteiskunnalle yhdistämällä paikallisen osaamisen ja globaalit kyvykkyydet. Liity mukaan 24000 asiantuntijamme joukkoon palvelemaan tuhansia yksityisen ja julkisen sektorin asiakkaita yli90:ssämaassa. Meillä pääset auttamaan yrityksiä ja yhteisöjä saavuttamaan täyden potentiaalinsa - samalla kun tavoittelet omaasi. www.tietoevry.com

Results.Heading: Intern - SW developer for network intelligence
Results.Descr:
Come create the technology that helps the world act together

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people's lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of

Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards.

What you will learn and contribute to

The intern position relates to software development and data analytics for intelligent application support in network management. The intern will have the chance to work on use cases that bring new values to mobile networks such as Media and entrainment (M&E) and future smart industry applications. With the help of the team, the intern will implement and evaluate software components and data analytics methods that bring intelligence to future wireless networks. This work will contribute to demonstrations, proof-of-concepts, and research publications.

The intern will be responsible for implementing software components and machine-learning based data analytics methods for intelligent network management purposes. They are expected to be at advanced stage of their postgraduate studies, preferably doctoral studies, and has knowledge of software development and data science. 

Your skills and experience

You have:
 Solid Java SE programming skills
Experience with system level programming such as C/C++
Knowledge of Intel DPDK
Experience with machine learning implementation (Python3 and TensorFlow/Keras)
It would be nice if you also had:
  Knowledge of web front-end technology 
Knowledge of networking and communication systems 
Knowledge of networking and cloud development 
Experience of Secure Shell (SSH) and Linux command line

What we offer

Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. All our traineeships are paid. The salary is determined on the basis of course credits.

Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:
 One of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark
LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation

At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people.

Nokia's employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
 We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect.

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

Results.Heading: Senior Front End Developer
Results.Descr:
Description
 
 Position at Ekahau 

Senior Front End DeveloperAbout EkahauWe are the global leader in solutions for enterprise wireless network design and troubleshooting, seriously! More than 50% of Fortune 500 companies run their networks with Ekahau's Wi-Fi planning and measurement solutions.

We are looking for a seasoned Senior Front End Developer for our software technology team. The software technology team is responsible for implementing our future cloud products. Together with the team, you would take part in setting the direction for our future software stack and architecture. You would be innovating and validating options that will be pushing the limits of what we currently think would be possible.

Your daily activities would include designing and implementing clean, high performing and reusable application code targeting web and mobile. You would be implementing proof of concepts to evaluate technological options that would meet our business requirements, and you would be creating reference implementations and for our application development teams.

You might have experience in any modern web framework like Vue.js, Reach or Lit. You could be a polyglot programmer interested in languages such as Rust, Kotlin, Scala or C++ and you would be using web technologies such as Web Components, WebAssembly, WebCL, WebGL and Tensorflow.js.

What we wish from you:
You have front end development experience on responsive web applications
You are familiar with current state of the art frontend technologies and toolchains
You are proficient in JavaScript or TypeScript and in HTML and CSS
You have 6+ years of software development experience
You get things done and you have a growth mindset
You have communications skills in written and spoken English

What we offer:
Participation in a world-class technology company in a fast growing market
Competitive salary with fringe benefits
Nice office environment in the centre of Helsinki
Awesome team-mates

You can be from Helsinki metropolitan area to be office based, but rest of Finland and EU is cool too.

Ready for some Good Code?

Coding is not only a profession, it's a hobby, lifestyle and above all; a community. Coding is also an art form (or at least good code is), and as any other art form, you strive for perfecting your expression. Let your expression serve humanity. Let it be Good Code.

Go to our Good Code campaign site to see our wide range of opportunities within the software development space!

Why not just click "Apply" and give it a try!

Why choose us?

Experience local speed & global muscles

We have the muscles powering large scale engagements, but with speed and specialization needed for surgical solutions on a local level. This gives you a dynamic work environment with new experiences in every step of your journey.

Develop through learning communities

One key element of our Keep Learning culture is social learning, which allows us to learn from each other and grow together. That's why we have the Learning Communities. They represent the competence areas in which we need to collaborate and learn new skills.

Make an actual impact on society

We create solutions that have an actual impact on how society functions by enabling technology to include and empower every citizen. While we might not be saving the world, we are making a better one - and you can as well.

Join us and express yourself.

Results.Heading: Full-stack Developer
Results.Descr:
Sanoma News & Feature Media digital development team is looking for

DEVELOPER

Do you want to have your work seen by half of the Finnish population? Do you want to help the best journalists in Finland to excel in their job?

Sanoma News&Feature Media digital development team is looking for a skilled developer to work on our news web sites such as Helsingin Sanomat, Ilta-Sanomat, Aamulehti and Satakunnan Kansa. In this role, you will be part of our team developing services for our news products. We use modern technologies such as Scala, Typescript, React, AWS, PSQL, Redis, Docker, Github, and Datadog.

Developer responsibilities
Designing, creating, and maintaining TypeScript and Scala -based services
Interpreting business objectives to create high-quality implementation that achieves key results
Problem solving with other team members in the project
Identifying and resolving immediate and potential issues in the system
Participating in team meetings
Assisting other developers with troubleshooting, debugging, and coding

Developer requirements
Master's degree in Computer Science and/or equivalent experience/qualification
2-5 years of experience in working with TypeScript and Scala
Practitioner level understanding of AWS
Experience in developing APIs and knowledge of scalable architectures
Exceptional problem-solving and analytical abilities
Eagerns to learn

What we offer
Opportunity to hone your cloud skills as a developer, performance optimizer and a solver of hard technical problems
Open culture that supports your development and embraces constant improvement
Large-scale business critical software development environment to develop your skills
Workplace located either in Tampere or Helsinki, hybrid office/Finland remote way of working model

Interested? Apply now or ask for more information from Jyrki Hokkanen (jyrki.hokkanen@sanoma.com) or Harri Virtala (harri.virtala@sanoma.com). This position is fulfilled when a suitable candidate is found.

Applicants may be required to undergo a security clearance in accordance with the Security Clearance Act (726/2014).

Results.Heading: Lead Developer, Genesys Cloud
Results.Descr:
Lead Developer, Genesys Cloud 

We are looking for a Lead Developer to join our team working on the Genesys Cloud platform! You might wonder what our team does in practice? Well, basically we ensure that our customer facing colleagues can control all the incoming & outgoing phone calls and digital contacts with our most meaningful contact points - our customers. This position is located in Helsinki, but like the rest of OP, we work flexibly, combining both office days and remote work.

What is the role like? 

Your focus as a Lead Developer will be on making sure that our team's software development work is done in best possible way, filling the architectural needs and given requirements. You also make sure that the software architecture is developing into the right direction. You will be in contact with our business stakeholders to understand the actual needs from the field and you interpret those requirements and turn them into technical solutions. One of the next projects will be integration with Microsoft Dynamics CRM, and you will have a big role in making this happen.

We believe that experienced Backend Developer with couple of years' experience from Node.js and AWS would be great fit for the role! Core elements that we value a lot are following:
• hands on experience from software development with the following stack: Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, AWS, React, MySQL. Also, previous experience from responsible Developer role is needed to manage in this role.
• previous experience from Agile & DevOps models and interest to automate things (e.g., Robot Framework and Continuous Delivery are familiar concepts to you).
• interest in software architecture and capability to lead its development.
• communication skills in English are required, fluency in Finnish is seen as an advantage.

Even though we are looking for Lead Developer to join our team focusing on developing Genesys Cloud, you don't need to have previous experience from the platform. You will be able to learn the details also with us! We at OP have so called "70/20/10 rule" in use, which means you will use 70% of your time for your daily tasks, 20% to develop the way you do those tasks, and the last 10% is reserved for you to learn and try new things.

What is the catch, then? 

It wouldn't be fair if we had nothing to offer you. We have a wide range of staff benefits including a personnel fund and special terms for employee banking, insurance, and loan services. We offer comprehensive occupational health care, extensive medical treatment expenses insurance and a full-time group accident insurance policy. We invest in wellbeing at work by encouraging a good work-life balance, providing flexibility in your daily life, and offering lunch, sport and cultural benefits and opportunities for affordable holidays in OP timeshares.

Did we spark your interest? 

Great, we can't wait to hear from you! The application period is open until 11.9.2022, so now it is your time to shine! Do you have some questions related to the role in your mind? Our Product Owner Antti Kurtelius will be happy to answer to your questions via email (antti.kurtelius(a)op.fi) or via phone (0401678718).

In the financial sector, our business is founded on trust and accountability, which is why the successful candidate will be checked for credit history, corporate connections, security clearance and must take a drug test. 

OP Financial Group is the leading financial services group in Finland and a pioneer in the industry's digital transformation. Owned by our customers, we are the largest financial sector employer in Finland. OP Financial Group employs over 12,000 professionals and provides banking, asset management, wealth management and insurance services for our more than four million customers. For more information about OP as an employer and for all vacancies, go to www.op-careers.fi.

Results.Heading: Frontend Software Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a passionate software developer to join the Enkora team. You will create awesome products and features used by tens of thousands of people on a daily basis. If you enjoy independence, creativity and a lot of responsibility, this could be your dream job!
 
Enkora is the leading provider of modern customer service solutions in Finland. Our software and hardware products help our customers to sell their services, accept payments, control access, manage reservations of resources, and self-service for end-users. Every year, over 10 million customer visits are managed by our systems all around Finland. We build web-based, desktop, mobile and embedded software, design hardware and we even do some electronics!
 
Just as we don't stop innovating with our products, we also have modern approach with development: the development environment has been well containerized, automated tests are running at every commit: unit tests, integration tests and static code analysis.
 
Minimum requirements
  advanced frontend (js / ts, html, css)
experience with angular
not afraid of legacy (js, jquery, backbone, even some coffeescript that we're slowly factoring out)
 
Not required, but nice to have
  experience with continuous integration for frontend (builds, tests, browser tests)
not afraid of backend: php / mysql
 
We offer a full-time job in Kalasatama, Helsinki (right next to the metro!)
  Team of awesome international colleagues
Possibility to grow and learn new things
Freedom to plan your work
Small team, your work will have a big impact on the final product
Competitive salary and benefits
 
Please provide examples of your projects and code, and your salary expectations. Also send in links to your profiles on LinkedIn, StackOverflow, GitHub, etc.
 
Any questions? Contact Artem (CTO) at artem[at] enkora.fi , 0407606484 or through Facebook / LinkedIn (in English).

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Etsimme kasvavaan joukkoomme ohjelmistokehittäjiä työskentelemään mielenkiintoisten ja monipuolisten projektien pariin. Projekteissa riittää valinnanvaraa ja käytettyjä teknologioita ovat muun muassa Java, Node.js., React, React Native, Vue.js, Angular, Typescript, C#, Python. Tärkeää on, että löydämme juuri sinua kiinnostavan projektin!
 
Tukenasi työssäsi on koko Goforen laaja asiantuntijaverkosto ja jokaisella meistä on omat erityisosaamisalueemme, joiden kautta voimme toisia työssämme tukea ja sparrata. Voit päästä mukaan esimerkiksi terveydenhuollon, varhaiskasvatuksen tai liikennetoimialan kehitys- tai uudistusprojektiin - tarjolla on aidosti merkityksellisiä projekteja, jotka vaikuttavat satojen tuhansien suomalaisten elämään. Asiakasprojektimme ovat yleensä pitkäkestoisia ja pääset useimmiten keskittymään yhteen projektiin kerrallaan. 
 
Asiakasprojektiin sijoittuminen Goforella on työntekijälähtöistä. Ymmärrämme, että omia toiveita ja kehittymistavoitteita vastaava projekti vaikuttaa suuresti arjen sujuvuuteen ja työntekijätyytyväisyyteen. Meillä on jatkuvasti avoinna noin 20-50 asiakastarvetta. Jokaisella goforelaisella on täysi läpinäkyvyys asiakastarpeisiimme ja teemmekin lopulliset projektipäätökset aina yhdessä keskustellen. Välillä elämäntilanteet voivat muuttua, uusia kehittymistoiveita ilmaantua tai epätäydellisiä projektipäätöksiä tapahtua, jolloin toki huolehdimme projektikierron mahdollistamisesta.
 
 Jos React, Java, .NET, tai oikeastaan mikä tahansa moderni web-teknologia saa sinut innostumaan, pidät tärkeänä yhteisöllisyyttä ja jatkuvan kehittymisen mahdollisuuksia, voit olla etsimämme vahvistus joukkoomme! 

Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Työnantajana ja yhteisönä lupaamme huolehtia sinusta, sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat yrityksemme ydin. Maineemme laadukkaiden palveluiden tuottamisessa asiakkaillemme on yksinomaan huippuasiantuntijoidemme ansiota. Matala organisaatiomallimme mahdollistaa itseohjautuvan ja läpinäkyvän toimintakulttuurin. Monimuotoista osaajajoukkoamme yhdistää pioneerihenkisyys sekä halu työskennellä yrityksessä, jonka olemassaololla on suurempi tarkoitus kuin pelkästään voiton tuottaminen - pyrkimys inhimillisempään, kestävämpään ja eettisempään digimaailmaan.
 
Koemme tärkeänä henkilöstömme ammatillisen osaamisen kehittämisen. Valitset vapaasti etenemispolkusi kehittämällä osaamistasi niillä osa-alueilla, jotka koet tärkeäksi. Ammatillista kehittymistäsi tukee myös mahdollisuus osallistua erilaisiin ulkoisiin koulutuksiin, sekä liiketoimintaa tukevien sertifikaattien suorittamiseen.
 
Goforelaisena pääset osalliseksi myös paikalliskerhoihimme sekä työyhteisötoimintaan. Kerhotoiminnan puitteissa kokoonnumme työn ulkopuolella mm. lautapelien, liikunnan, elektroniikan ja elokuvien parissa. Työntekijöistä koostuva työyhteisöryhmä järjestää myös muita erilaisia yhteisiä tapahtumia.
   Monipuoliset opiskelumahdollisuudet ja Goforen kustantamat verkkokurssit 
 Joustavat työajat sekä mahdollisuus valita missä ja miten teet työsi 
 Yhteisöllisen kulttuurin ja mukavat tiimikaverit sekä koko Goforen osaajayhteisön tuen 
 Vaikuttamisbonukset (blogi-, open source)  ja muut kattavat henkilöstöedut, joista kerromme sinulle tapaamisessamme mielellämme lisää 
 

Mitä odotamme sinulta? 

Sinulla on monipuolisesti aiempaa työkokemusta jo useamman vuoden ajan ohjelmistokehittäjänä toimimisesta sekä pilvipalveluiden käytöstä. Pystyt muodostamaan näkemyksen myös laajempiin kokonaisuuksiin ja teknologiavalintoihin. Kykenet tarvittaessa yhteistyössä asiakkaan kanssa ratkaisemaan moniulotteisia ongelmia hienostuneesti ja nopeasti.
 
Syvällisempi osaaminen ja kiinnostus voi kuitenkin kohdentua johonkin tiettyyn osa-alueeseen. Yksittäistä ohjelmointikielen osaamista tärkeämpää on kiinnostus ja kyky uuden teknologian haltuun ottamiselle. Asiantuntijamme toimivat asiakasprojekteissa konsultteina ja he voivat sopia yhdessä asiakkaan kanssa, millä teknologioilla he työskentelevät. Projekteissa käytettyjä teknologioita ovat muun muassa Java, Node.js., React, Vue.js, Angular, Typescript, C#, Python.
 
Tehtävään valitulle henkilölle voidaan tehdä henkilöturvallisuusselvitys.

" Olen Juha ja toiminut Goforella full stack -kehittäjänä vuodesta 2017. Työssäni käytän useita eri teknologioita erilaisten asiakashaasteiden ratkaisemiseen. Työpäiviini sisältyy koodausta, suunnittelua, uuden opettelua ja arkkitehtuurien kanssa työskentelyä. Työni on monipuolista ja tarjoaa jatkuvan mahdollisuuden kehittyä. Goforelaisista löytyy niin paljon eri alojen huippuosaajia, että sparrausapua löytyy aina tarvittaessa. Viime aikoina olen tehnyt töitä enimmäkseen funktionaalisten ohjelmointikielien, pilvipohjaisten ratkaisujen ja mobiilikehityksen parissa. Töiden ohessa pelaan työkavereiden kanssa jalkapalloa ja osallistun eri harrastekerhojen toimintaan."

Results.Heading: Senior Backend Developer 55-85k€ / year
Results.Descr:
About Logmore 

 We think and dream big to push boundaries and to grow fast, and today we are a team of +50 professionals committed to serving over 400 logistics, food, pharmaceutics and other customers globally. Through our pioneering cloud-based monitoring technology, we at Logmore are on a mission of making supply chains transparent, ensuring product safety as well as minimizing waste for enterprises and consumers. Logmore enables the gathering of data from shipments and effective organisation, storing and distribution of it. With the help of Logmore Cloud and dynamic QR data loggers we are able to convert complexity and stress into knowledge and peace of mind. 

Your role as the Senior Backend Developer

You'll be involved in the development of Logmore Cloud Platform. The Cloud is both the brains and the beating heart of the Logmore service, so your work will be seen and felt by all our customers and users.

Your main work will focus on developing new functionality on Logmore Cloud Platform with heavy focus on RESTful APIs and managing data from Logmore logger devices. Depending on your experience, skillset and interests, you can also focus on the frontend application parts.

Our Cloud setup consists of micro services mainly written in Go language. These services deal with tasks like MongoDB and Redis queues while providing our integrating customers API capabilities. You'll develop APIs and event handlers to maximise both the functionality and the efficiency of the Logmore service.

Your work also intersects with DevOps topics. You will fluently use Docker containers and sometimes deal with CircleCI, Kubernetes and AWS.

Obviously the work is not all coding, though. You'll start your day in the daily team meeting to sync things with other developers, and use Jira as your compass for development tasks. You will be involved in meetings and planning sessions to create specifications for new features with developer colleagues as well as members of the Customer Success and Sales teams. In order to succeed in a fast growing company like Logmore, we value good communications and problem solving skills. 

What will you be doing
 Develop and maintain Logmore Cloud services
Work with large datasets in databases optimising performance and latency
Collaborate with agile team in software development on data visualisation and dashboards
Take part in defining next steps in scaling our Cloud services for ever growing audience by participating in our DevOps activities


Qualities that will ensure your success in the role
5+ years experience in software development preferably with RESTful APIs in container environments
 An attitude for delivering results in a fast-paced environment. We are out to change the world!
You learn fast and eagerly. You are eager to question things and approach unknowns
Mindset of coaching other team members and sharing best practises
Strong communication skills in English (Finnish is a nice bonus)
Strong experience working with and creating RESTful APIs
Experience in backend languages & technologies (we use Go, Laravel, MongoDB, Redis)
Some familiarity with the DevOps tech in our stack: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CircleCI

Technical background that would suit this position
 Python
Java
Vue.js / React.js
SQL
Redis
CircleCI
Docker
Kubernetes
AWS
Infrastructure as a code


So why Logmore?
 You'll have the opportunity to work as part of a fast-growing, international and ambitious team with a warm and friendly atmosphere
Get to work with our top-level developers. We know how to make things happen! We are also on the cutting edge of technology both on the software and hardware side. 
Create a real impact and grow along with the company - you get to join us at an extremely interesting time. 
See your handiwork in scaling up the organisation
Make the world smarter: reduce the amount of waste, make logistics operations more efficient and build more transparent supply chains
