Results.Heading: Experienced Full Stack Developer (Node.js)
Results.Descr:
Experienced Full Stack developer - join our talented and diverse developer community to work with impactful projects. 

We are looking for experienced Full Stack developers to work with us in Helsinki, Lahti, Tampere, Turku, or Oulu, as well as in our light offices (Jyväskylä, Pori, Kuopio, Joensuu), and in some cases completely remotely in other locations within Finland. What is it that we're looking for now? Passionate people who want to work in meaningful projects and help others around them shine! 

We are developing solutions for both private and public sector customers. We don't have customers from any specific business area, as we concentrate on having varied projects that are meaningful. This can mean that we have an impact on how we help  users find more convenient routes  , we get to use the newest technologies or we  handle a global pandemic  . Solita's projects are a combination of dev, data, cloud, and service design. The diversity of our projects also gives opportunities for continuous learning and rotation. 

We're not unicorns here - just ordinary people. However, those ordinary people make one big unicorn in the form of a team. We don't put emphasis on individual performances as it's all about teamwork and helping each other out. Our staffing works in a very human way, finding the best persons for the right project and making sure it's a two-way match. 
 
We offer for you   Possibility to grow and widen your knowledge in new areas that are interesting for you. Many of our Developers are interested in working for example with cloud technologies. 
 If you want, you can do many other things too besides coding. Depending on your interest, you can contribute for example to our culture in various ways, participate in job interviews or recruitment marketing, become an expert on a specific topic, act as a people person etc. - whatever interests you the most 
 You have an effect on the technologies and methodologies we use in projects. 
 Human-centric work environment where people take care of each other. 
 We want to ensure you have a good balance between work and free time. That's what our employees see as one of the biggest benefits at Solita. 
 Great benefits - such as choosing your own devices (you can freely choose PC laptop with Windows/Linux or Apple laptop, and the phone you like), massages to relax during your workdays, In-house coach to support your mental well-being, many hobby clubs, gyms (Hki and Tre), sports / culture and lunch benefit, extensive occupational healthcare and many more! 
 
These qualities help you to succeed in this position   You are a TypeScript expert or you want to become one. For example strong experience on other backend technologies helps 
 You have experience in Express or some other similar framework. 
 You have worked with databases (relational database, MySQL, DynamoDB). 
 You are experienced with some Front-End technologies for example React.js 
 You might have some experience in cloud services, information security, or CI/CD. 
 
 For us, the most important thing above any specific technologies is that you have good software development practices, and that you are willing to learn new. The potential for growth and learning is the core of our recruitment. 

This is what one of our Senior Software Developers Heikki - who works with Node.js in his current project, had to say: 

"I've worked at Solita for five years now. During that time I've worked with two different clients, in various projects. The work that we do is so versatile that it allows constant learning no matter how senior you already are. The project team has a big impact on what technologies we use in different situations. During my time at Solita, I have deepened my knowledge for example with Java, Clojure, Typescript / Node.js 
 What's the best thing about working at Solita for me? I would say it's learning from others, and getting to do very diverse tasks, such as coding, job interviews, participating in book clubs / study groups etc.- whatever interests me the most!" 

Would you like to discuss this opportunity a bit more and get to know each other? Leave your details below and we'll be in contact!
For more information about our dev-culture, you can also reach our Development Talent Acquisition Owner - Mirka: 
 [email protected]

Results.Heading: Developer (Process Automation)
Results.Descr:
We are looking for Developers to join us in our Skaler business unit. In this role, you will be developing the next generation of Robotic Process Automation solutions with open source technologies , solving real business problems and helping our clients work more efficiently. This is a unique opportunity to join the open source RPA movement! 
 
 What you'll do:  
   Work together with developers, strategists and the client to clarify ambiguous requirements, define the best course of action and together shape the end result 
   Be responsible for either automation/infrastructure development in a software development project, and work with your teammates to pick the right technologies and deliver continuously 
 Commit working code, perform code reviews for peers and help develop the team's ways of working 
 Take your share of responsibility for the team and the project and have the vision and drive to do more than just "type in the code". 
 
 As a software developer, you have:  
   Experience of working with modern technologies in a software engineering or test automation role. Previous experience with Python, Robotic Process Automation, cloud technologies, Robot Framework, and CI tools such as Jenkins is appreciated but not required, as you will get the chance to learn and deepen your expertise in collaboration with our team of experts. 
 An ability to adopt new software engineering technologies and methods, and may have side projects built using different tech. 
 Great collaboration skills: You share what you learn, help others, learn from your peers, and ask for help when you need it. 
 Good communication skills both in Finnish and English. 
 
 More of Software Developer's day-to-day work you can read from here . 
 
 What do we offer?  
 
 Skaler is a new independent business unit within Siili. We can offer multiple opportunities and growth paths depending on your background, experience and interests. With us, you will be working with a team of professionals whose expertise ranges from RPA and DevOps to machine learning and process development. 
 
 At Siili you can expect to thrive and to learn with colleagues who are driven towards excellence. We also offer you an attractive compensation package . Working at Siili means that you get to be the master of your own work - we trust you. With us, you get to work with colleagues who challenge you every day and expect the same from you. There are more than 800 of us in Europe and the US, and we keep growing. This means we are constantly improving and evolving the ways we operate. We offer a great ride for those who enjoy the new possibilities it has to offer! 
 
 Interested?  
 
 If you want to know more about this role or Siili, we are happy to help. Just contact Tiina from our Talent team.

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Me olemme InSolution - kasvava joukko teollisen ohjelmoinnin, automaation, robotiikan ja tietojärjestelmien asiantuntijoita, jotka syttyvät ongelmien ratkaisemisesta, uuden oppimisesta sekä kättensä jäljen näkemisestä. Arvostamme asiakkaitamme, toisiamme ja työmme vaikuttavuutta.
 
 Maksimoimme asiakkaidemme tuottavuuden automatisoimalla tuotanto- ja dataprosesseja. Asiakkaitamme ovat johtavat koneenrakentajat, valmistava teollisuus, konepajat sekä IoT- ja bioenergia-alan laitevalmistajat. Työssämme yhdistyy fyysinen ja digitaalinen todellisuus - pääsemme näkemään sen, kuinka robotit, automaatiolinjat ja kokonaiset tehtaat tanssivat koodimme tahtiin.
 
 Etsimme ohjelmistokehittäjiä suunnittelemaan, toteuttamaan, ja testaamaan ohjelmistoratkaisuja älykkäisiin koneisiin ja laitteisiin tehdasjärjestelmien arkkitehtuurin eri tasoille. Toimimme tehokkaissa tiimeissä, mutta kykenemme tarvittaessa myös itsenäiseen työskentelyyn. Käytämme työssämme moderneja ohjelmistokehityksen menetelmiä ja työkaluja.
 
 Arvostamme sinussa hyviä tiimityöskentelytaitoja sekä teknisen englannin hallintaa. Lisäksi arvostamme näitä taitoja:
 
 - C# / .NET
 - SQL
 - Ohjelmistotason palvelinkonfigurointi
 - HTML / Angular
 - Javascript / Typescript
 - Automaatioarkkitehtuurien hallitseminen

Työssäsi tulet pääsemään mukaan haastaviin ja monipuolisiin asiakasprojekteihin sekä Suomessa että ulkomailla. Päivittäisiin tehtäviisi kuuluu projektista riippuen ylemmän tason ohjelmistokehitys (front-end ja/tai back-end), kevyt tietokantahallinnointi, yleinen IT-konfigurointi, projektinsuunnittelu ja -hallinta, sekä asiakasrajapinnassa toimiminen (myynnin tuki ja tekninen tuki).
 
 Taustaltasi voit olla automaatio-, ohjelmisto-, elektroniikka- tai sähköinsinööri/diplomi-insinööri (tai sellaiseksi opiskeleva) tai vastaavat taidot itse hankkinut. Arvostamme luontaista kiinnostusta tekniikkaan ja mikäli alan työkokemusta ei vielä ole karttunut alan vapaa-ajan harrastuneisuus lasketaan eduksi.
 
 Meillä InSolutionilla on sellainen asenne, että onnistumiset ovat yhteisiä ja ongelmista puhutaan avoimesti, eikä kaveria jätetä. Lisäksi työntekijöiden vapaa-aikaa arvostetaan.
 
 Haluamme kuulla sinusta lisää!

Results.Descr:
Me olemme InSolution - kasvava joukko teollisen ohjelmoinnin, automaation, robotiikan ja tietojärjestelmien asiantuntijoita, jotka syttyvät ongelmien ratkaisemisesta, uuden oppimisesta sekä kättensä jäljen näkemisestä. Arvostamme asiakkaitamme, toisiamme ja työmme vaikuttavuutta.
 
 Maksimoimme asiakkaidemme tuottavuuden automatisoimalla tuotanto- ja dataprosesseja. Tätä kehitystä kutsumme maksimaatioksi. Asiakkaitamme ovat johtavat koneenrakentajat, valmistava teollisuus, konepajat sekä IoT- ja bioenergia-alan laitevalmistajat. Käytämme työssämme maailman johtavien automaatiojärjestelmätoimittajien kuten Beckhoff Automation CodeSys -pohjaisia IEC 61131-3 standardin mukaisia työvälineitä ja kehitysympäristöjä.
 
 Voit olla automaatioalan vasta-alkaja, opiskelija tai jo kokeneempi virtuoosi. Perehdytämme, koulutamme ja tuemme sinua tekemisesi joka vaiheessa, mutta jätämme sinulle mieluusti niin paljon itsenäistä vastuuta kuin kulloinkin haluat kantaa.

Results.Heading: Ohjelmistokehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Full stack -kehittäjä Rovaniemelle!
 
 Digimen Oy on avannut toimipisteen Rovaniemelle ja etsii asiakasprojekteihin kokeneita sekä kehityskykyisiä ohjelmistokehittäjiä. Haluamme palvella asiakkaitamme rippumatta käytetystä teknologiasta tai pilvialustasta. Uskomme vahvasti, että teknologiaa ei tule ajatella ainoastaan työkaluna, vaan ennemminkin menestyvän nykyaikaisen liiketoiminnan mahdollistajana.
 Osaamisemme kattaa perinteisen ohjelmistokehityksen lisäksi haastavatkin tiedonhallintaan sekä liiketoimintaprosessien kehittämiseen liittyvät teknologiset tarpeet nykyaikaisin välinein sekä menetelmin. Osaamisemme sekä palveluidemme laadun varmistamiseksi luotamme tarkoin valittujen kumppaneittemme teknologioihin. Tunnemme kumppaneittemme teknologiat hyvin ja huolehdimme henkilöstömme kouluttamisesta valittujen teknologioiden asiantuntijoiksi. 
 
 Toivomme sinulta:
 - Tehtävään soveltuvaa teknistä koulutusta sekä työkokemusta ohjelmistoalalta
 - Fullstack osaamista
 - Kokemusta ohjelmistokehityksessä pilvipalveluympäristössä (Azure, AWS tai Google)

 - Kommunikoit sujuvasti suomen kielellä ja sinulla on hyvät viestintä- ja ryhmätyötaidot sekä ongelmanratkaisukykyä

Results.Heading: Full Stack Developer (React, Spring Boot)
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a Full Stack Developer for our digital service projects. 

At HiQ, we know the art of designing and developing digital services and are therefore a good partner for digital development projects. Our business-oriented, practical, and eye-to-end solutions are always implemented with passion, professional pride, and flexible delivery models from turnkey projects to consulting teams. 

We have refined business models, practices, and know-how to support predictability, efficiency, delivery reliability, and quality for the most common customer development needs. 

We are now looking for a Full Stack Developer who wants to make quality code, appreciates teamwork and has good communication and interaction skills. You enjoy varied work tasks and are able to work with a wide range of different technologies and tools, and you are not afraid to take on new challenges. 

To thrive in this position, you'll need: 
3+ years of experience in software development 
Experience in modern front-end development (React, TypeScript, JavaScript) 
Experience in Java backend development and Spring Boot 
Experience in agile methods 
Eagerness to learn new things 
You have a consultant attitude, and you are used to working with clients 
Good communication skills in Finnish and English

Nice to have 
Experience in cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) 
Experience with Docker or Kubernetes 

We offer 
competitive salary 
the opportunity to further develop and expand your skills 
flexible working hours and temporarily remote work 
an employer who supports in various life situations 
safe and stable workplace 
low hierarchy and flexible and relaxed organizational culture 
comprehensive personnel benefits (e.g., learning platforms, self-development days, extensive occupational health care and health insurance, lunch benefit, sport & cultural benefit vouchers, cultural and sports club, sick childcare benefit) 


Interested to join us? 

If the role sparked your interest and you think you'd be a great match for HiQ, send us your application. You can write the application either in Finnish or English. 

You can also apply by sending an email directly to Oona Muilu (oona.muilu@hiq.fi). Just tell us briefly about your work experience and leave us your contact information. 

Other related to the job 
The start is flexible according to your situation. 
The role requires minimum professional proficiency in Finnish language. 
You can currently work either remotely (within Finland), or in our offices in Espoo or Helsinki. 


HiQ saves the personal data you submit so we can process your application.
See HiQ's Privacy Policy for more information on how your personal data are
processed.

Share  Apply

Results.Heading: Tools / Tech Programmer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for an experienced Programmer for our Tools and Tech team (TNT). The TNT team is a small and independent team that maintains our internal tech stack, and works seamlessly with our game teams to develop solutions and tools that revolutionize the way we develop games at Supercell.
 
We're looking for someone like you, who ideally has years of experience, and knowledge acquired from the gaming industry. To be successful in this role, you will need to be a proactive programmer who works directly with game teams to deliver world-class mobile games.
 
If this sounds like you and you're interested in finding out if Supercell would be a great fit for you - hit that apply button. 
 
Responsibilities
 Maintaining, improving and developing editors, tools and plugins for game content creation and graphics pipelines on Windows and Mac OS platforms
Working closely with game teams, especially with game artists 
Identifying and implementing improvements to game engine and other code bases used by live and upcoming games
 
Requirements
 Strong, professional experience using C++
Ability to quickly get up to speed with existing code
Experience in writing custom editors and tools for game development
Game engine / 3D engine development experience
Ability to communicate with non-technical people
Driven, focused and willing to see projects through delivery
 
Nice-to-haves
 Experience in writing plugins for 3rd party content creation tools, like Maya & Photoshop
Experience in iOS / Android development
Experience in Flash / Animate
 


 
On the Job
Wonder what working here could be like? Read about the experience of joining Supercell and the TNT team from a Graphics Engineer here!

About Supercell
 
We are a game company based in Helsinki, Finland, with offices in San Francisco, Seoul and Shanghai. Since our launch in 2010, we've released five games globally - Hay Day, Clash of Clans, Boom Beach, Clash Royale and Brawl Stars.
 
To make five games, we've killed dozens along the way. That's because we're obsessed with quality. Our goal is to make the best games - games that are played by millions, enjoyed for years and remembered forever. To achieve this goal, we create the best possible teams and give them the freedom and independence that are core to our success.

You might love it here...

If you love to think, talk, play and make games, Supercell is the place for you. We're made up of proactive, independent teams with the freedom to do what they think is best for their players, our games and the company at large. We know that it takes more than just independence to make great games, so we also take very good care of our people - providing them with the compensation, work environment and resources they need to succeed. Read More

This position is in Helsinki, but you're not?

Luckily, moving to Helsinki is easier than you might think. No matter where you would be moving from, our dedicated people will help you from beginning to end. We're here to make sure the process is as smooth as possible for you, your family and whoever and whatever you're bringing along. Read More

Results.Heading: Microsoft Power Platform Developer
Results.Descr:
Have you already gathered experience with Microsoft Power Platform, and would like to continue on this road? We are expanding our low-code business and are looking for key players to be part of this journey! 

We are looking for Microsoft Power Platform -developers who have already gathered some experience with the Power Platform. You can work in Helsinki, Lahti, Tampere, Turku or Oulu, as well as remotely in other locations within Finland. What is it that we're looking for? Passionate people who want to work in meaningful projects and help others around them shine! 

We are working with the core business systems with our customers. We have seen that with Microsoft Power Platform we can create value fast and easily on top of current systems. We are mostly working in environments without D365 presence. 
 
Continuous learning is in our DNA 
 Solita is known as a strong competence company and we can guarantee that you will continue to learn more when you join us. You will always find someone who can teach you something new. Continuous learning is in our DNA and together we find the best way for you to develop your competencies further. For example, you can take advantage of our in-house learning paths, info sessions, code coffees, mentor programs,  internal hackathons  and other continuous possibilities to learn from your colleagues.  By cherishing continuous learning  we make sure that we have interesting projects for the future as well, and also possibilities for project rotations. After all, all we have is our people. 
 
These qualities help you to succeed in this position   You have basic understanding and/or experience of software development 
 You have some experience with Microsoft Power Platform. Certificates are a plus. 
 You enjoy working in a team with other developers and architects 
 You feel comfortable working directly with clients 
 You are a fast learner and interested in different technologies and solutions 
 You have passion towards a low-code paradigm 
 
What's in it for you   The possibility to join the team at an early stage, and build up your career and competence in low-code development. 
 Challenging, impactful projects to work on. Solita's projects are a combination of dev, data, cloud, and service design. The diversity of our projects also gives opportunities for continuous learning and rotation. So you don't only work with software developers but also service designers, UX-designers, cloud specialists and data professionals in cross-functional teams. 
 Our culture is self-made - trust, responsibility and freedom are in the centre of it. We have many subcultures in our dev community so it's easy to find your own community of like-minded people. 
 Flexible working conditions  to support the work-life balance - freedom to choose  when and where you work 
 If you want, you can do many other things too besides coding. Depending on your interest, you can contribute for example to our culture in various ways, participate in job interviews or recruitment marketing, become an expert on a specific topic, act as a people person etc. - whatever interests you the most! 
 Great benefits - such as choosing your own devices (you can freely choose your laptop with Windows/Linux or Apple OS, and the phone you like), massages to relax during your workdays, in-house coach to support your mental well-being, many hobby clubs, gyms (Hki and Tre), sports / culture and lunch benefit, extensive occupational healthcare and many more! 
 
Let's talk more! 
 We want to hear from you and figure out together what works best for us both. Tell us about yourself and your background in your own words. 

Our recruitment consists of two rounds of interviews where you will meet our team and learn more about working at Solita. You will be given the opportunity to show your skills and ask us questions. The purpose is to get to know each other better. 

If you have any questions about the role, technologies or work culture don't hesitate to reach out to Jasmo +358504999337 / [email protected]

Results.Heading: (Senior) Fullstack Java Developer (Games Technology)
Results.Descr:
The Games Technology team encompasses a whole host of data and analytics expertise areas, including (but not limited to) machine learning, build and submission tools, and cloud infrastructure. Powered by Beacon, Rovio's in-house cloud services platform, the team supports tens of millions of players, capturing 4 billion events and over 1TB of data per day. All of this work results in services and tools that enable successful live operations and continuous optimization in Rovio's games.

As a Full-Stack Java Developer, your work will include developing Rovio's Beacon services and other tools for our game teams. Rovio's Beacon cloud services are used by all of all our games providing user identity, analytics, advertising, segmentation, live ops, payments and third party services. We also provide game server infrastructure templates and microservices, and are working to introduce AI to our game development.

You will work closely with our game teams to find great answers to challenges we face building and operating our games. You will work on projects with other members of our team of developers (client, front-end, server, data, cloud, QA), product managers, and designers to implement versatile solutions.

Some of your responsibilities as a Fullstack developer will be  To architect, implement and maintain cloud services and capabilities for Rovio's games and studios
To lead small development projects, coaching other developers working on the project
To fix your fair share of bugs

  We are looking for someone who has  Several years of experience with recent Java development for cloud services and working with NoSQL and SQL database
Experience of web development in modern Javascript, HTML, CSS, Angular
 Experience developing RESTful services
Experience in cloud technologies and orchestration (e.g. AWS, Google Cloud Platform)
Wide understanding of both software and platform architectures and components used to build them
Practical experience working in Agile software development teams using Scrum or Kanban
Passion to work in all parts of the software development lifecycle from planning to testing, documentation and deployment
Team player mind-set with good communication skills especially in English and have a can-do attitude

  What you get when you join us  We give you the best support we can, helping you to grow and achieve your professional goals
Our team is hands-on, open, collaborative and ambitious
You will get to work in a truly international environment with more than 15 nationalities in the Technology team
Relocation assistance if you are from abroad
Flexible work hours
No crunch; standard work day is 7.5 hours
Competitive benefits: such as choice of current gen smartphone and home internet service paid, choice of laptop, lunch and sport vouchers, breakfast, gaming area, gym, sauna

Results.Heading: Software Developer (Java / Kotlin)

We can affect people's everyday lives with the work that we do together here at Solita. 
In addition to interesting projects, we want to ensure that Solitans have a balance between work and free time. Want to join our diverse community? 

We are looking for experienced Java / Kotlin software developers to work in Helsinki, Lahti, Tampere, Turku or Oulu, as well as remotely in other locations within Finland. What is it that we're looking for now? Passionate people who want to work in meaningful projects and help others around them shine!

This can mean that we have an impact on how we handle  a global pandemic  , we get to use the newest technologies or we make life significantly  easier for the end user  . Our aim is to always find the best person for the right project, and make sure it's a two-way match. 
 Continuous learning is in our DNA 
 Solita is known as a strong competence company and we can guarantee that you will learn more when you join us. You will always find someone who can teach you something new. Continuous learning is in our DNA and together we find the best way for you to learn. For example, we have in-house learning paths, info sessions, code coffees, mentor programs, and continuous possibilities to learn from each other.  By cherishing continuous learnin  g we make sure that we have interesting projects for the future, and also possibilities for project rotations. After all, all we have is our people. 
 Techs we use 
 At Solita, the teams have a lot of autonomy, so teams often get to decide if they want to use for example Kotlin instead of Java - and many do. We have a wide range of techs we use, e.g. the following:  Java, Clojure, Kotlin, REST interfaces, Vue, React, and of course Ecmascript as well as AWS  . Alongside these, we want to do things in a smart way, meaning that we are pretty fanatical when it comes to automating things. Agile, continuous delivery, and continuous feedback are also part of our operating methods. Security is also built in from the start. 
 What we offer   Challenging, impactful projects to work with - not only with dev professionals but also data, cloud and design 
On our customer cases we work as a Solita team, so you won't be left alone
 Our culture is self made - trust, responsibility and maximum freedom are in the center of it. We have many subcultures in our dev community so it's easy to find your own place 
 You can concentrate on what matters. We have People Leads who take care of you 
 Community of almost 400 Software Professionals 
 Wide onboarding program that helps you to find your own place at Solita. 
 
 If you want, you can do many other things too besides coding. Depending on your interest, you can contribute for example to our culture in various ways, participate in job interviews or recruitment marketing, become an expert on a specific topic, act as a people person etc. - whatever interests you the most 
 Great benefits - such as choosing your own devices (you can freely choose PC laptop with Windows/Linux or Apple laptop, and the phone you like), massages to relax during your workdays, In-house coach to support your mental well-being, many hobby clubs, gyms (Hki and Tre), sports / culture and lunch benefit, extensive occupational healthcare and many more! 
 Let's talk more! 
 We want to hear from you and figure out together what works best for us both. Tell us about yourself and your background in your own words. 

Our recruitment consists of two rounds of interviews where you will meet our team and learn more about working at Solita. You will be given the opportunity to show your skills and ask us questions. The purpose is to get to know each other better.

Please note that at the moment most of our Java based projects require knowledge of the Finnish language.

Any thoughts or questions, please reach out to dev-recruiter Mirka / [email protected] / 0407258194 

Ask more about our projects from Riikka on 040 738 4110 /  [email protected]

Results.Heading: Fantasy Developer
Results.Descr:
Cargotec is at the forefront of the transformation in the cargo handling industry. Our cargo handling solutions and services make global trade smarter, better and more sustainable. As leaders in ports, on roads and at sea, our business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor have a unique position to optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. 

Join the forerunner in sustainable cargo handling 

Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub creates data-driven software and services for intelligent cargo handling for all of the three Cargotec businesses: Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor. By using cutting-edge cloud technologies and industry best practices, we are responsible for driving digital transformation and accelerating the development of software solutions across Cargotec.

Sustainability is at the core of everything we do and we strive to make global trade smarter and eco-friendly while securing the growth of new digital business for Cargotec and its customers. Cargotec is a leading provider of cargo and load handling solutions globally so your actions will have a great impact on the industry.

Our recent projects at DiSH include for example McGregror OnWatch Scout condition monitoring solution transforming the predictive maintenance of maritime equipment (https://www.macgregor.com/intelligent-solutions/onwatch-scout/) and Kalmar Insight performance management tool for cargo handling operations that turns data into actionable, impactful insights (https://www.kalmarglobal.com/equipment-services/kalmar-insight/). 

Design your own role! 

We are hiring Lead Developers, Software Architects, Full-Stack Developers and DevOps Engineers, among others. The job titles give a peek on the competencies we are looking for, but nobody fits such descriptions perfectly. We understand that every professional comes with their own unique background and interests, and people tend to be at their happiest when they find just the right balance between using their competencies and learning new stuff. Defining the role and responsibilities that go under a particular title is a two way dialogue.

So, if you couldn't find the perfect match from our ready-made titles and job ads, don't let that stop you from applying. Have a role that really suits you by customizing your own job description. You can start by combining things from the list of qualities we here at Cargotec's Digital Solutions Hub appreciate.

Main toppings: 

• Several years of professional experience in software development
 • Programming experience with languages like Typescript, Javascript/Node.js, and Python or Java
 • Proficiency with agile and lean software development methods
 • Good communication skills allowing collaboration with stakeholders from various backgrounds

Extra toppings:

• Large-scale cloud and Web based software systems
 • React or other modern JavaScript frameworks
 • Cloud platforms like AWS or GCP
 • AWS services (ECS, RDS, Lambda, Glue, Kinesis, S3, DynamoDB, Athena, IAM, AWS IoT Core, AWS Greengrass, and CloudFormation)
 • GCP services (Kubernetes, Cloudron, Cloud Functions, BigQuery, Cloud Storage, Data Flow)
 • Containers, serverless computing, DevOps, data streaming, microservices, databases, and REST APIs
 • Automation and infrastructure management tools like Ansible, CloudFormation, Terraform, Jenkins, BitBucket pipelines, and similar
 • End-to-end IoT systems
 • Time series databases such as TimescaleDB
 • M.Sc (Eng.) or higher in Software Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent
 • Pineapple

What can we offer you? 

We could be your ideal employer, if you value working on your own software products with leading edge software and cloud technologies, including our IoT and data analytics system on AWS. Read more on https://lnkd.in/dr4vhAq

We have the culture and opportunities supporting continuous growth and learning of our professionals and we provide them highly interesting and meaningful software projects to work with.

There is a high level of autonomy and freedom to e.g. drive development initiatives most inspiring to you. We appreciate work life balance and provide flexible working hours.

Cargotec is a global company and working environment - around 11,500 people in 45 countries and operations in more than 100 countries.

We are a strong and stable, publicly listed employer with market-leading cargo brands to work for - and to have a huge impact on transforming the cargo industry and making the world more sustainable.

Cargotec and its businesses 
 
 Cargotec (Nasdaq Helsinki: CGCBV) enables smarter cargo flow for a better everyday with its leading cargo handling solutions and services. Cargotec's business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor are pioneers in their fields. Through their unique position in ports, at sea and on roads, they optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. Cargotec has signed United Nations Global Compact's Business Ambition for 1.5°C. The company's sales in 2020 totalled approximately EUR 3.3 billion and it employs around 11,500 people. www.cargotec.com

Results.Heading: Salesforce Lead developer & Technical Architect
Results.Descr:
Be yourself, make a difference.

Are you ready to take your expertise to the next level?
There is never a typical day at Accenture, but that is why we love it here! This is an outstanding opportunity to build a rewarding career at Accenture Technology. Working in highly collaborative teams for world-leading clients, we will nurture your talent in an inclusive culture that values diversity.

We are now looking for Salesforce Insurance Industry LEAD Developer / Technical Architect 

Accenture Technology powers our clients to achieve high performance. We combine business and deep industry insights with innovative technology such as Cloud Computing and Applied Intelligence to drive business growth.
Within the process of crafting your Salesforce.com expertise at Accenture, you will be trained, certified and working alongside experienced specialists on exciting projects. The position is based in Helsinki, Stockholm, Copenhagen or Oslo and will include travel. You can already be Salesforce or Technical Architect or have strong aspiration to become in near future. You certified System Architect, Application Architect decide the pace while we provide the tools and the help you need to achieve your career goals.

What is Salesforce? Salesforce is a cloud-based software company and a $1 Trillion ecosystem estimated by IDC in terms of new business revenue generated between 2019 and 2024, Accenture is the #1 Salesforce consulting partner globally. Salesforce offers leading Solutions for business areas such as Sales, Customer service, Marketing automation, eCommerce, Configure Price and Quote, Billing and Analytics. Moreover, MuleSoft, Tableau and Slack to name few are also Solutions owned by Salesforce.

Job Details
We are looking for Salesforce Industries Professional, who is passionate about Digital Transformation and Customer Experience development of Insurance Companies. Your responsibility is to understand the customer's business requirement to design, configure and develop the desired solution

As a Salesforce Industries (Vlocity) Professional at Accenture, you will 
Work closely with the customers to understand their business problems and challenge ideas when needed
Help Accenture's Nordic customers to succeed and thrive on working with leading-edge Salesforce technologies
Perform Lead Developer / Technical Architect role on Salesforce Industries projects: typically, part-time on more than 1 project at a time. 
Identify and Align customer's business requirements to the native Salesforce Industry (CPQ and Vlocity) functionality and to construct a development plan that will deliver the desired solution
Work with complex business requirements related to Financial Services Cloud, Insurance product configuration, Underwriting Rules and Rating Models, Claim Processes, Process Modeling and Automations, User Interface Customizations, and Integrations
Facilitate workshops and Collaborate with Business Stakeholders and Functional Design Teams to determine how best to implement Salesforce Industries solutions
Manage other Developers and Architects, typically in Agile scrum teams, and support them to deliver high quality outcomes
Produce Project documentation, Technical design documentation, and Test plans
Enhance and build development plans using knowledge of core business processes and best practices within the Insurance industry
Mentor resources and take on leadership roles to expand Accenture's Industry Cloud Practice
Learn Accenture's methodologies
Demonstrate Accenture's technology delivery assets
Network and learn with Accenture's global specialists
Work in a pre-sales cycle on high level estimates, RFPs and other artefacts


Qualifications 
Experience and Technical Skills
Ideally you would already have
2-3 years of work experience within consulting
Experience creating solution and technical architecture for complex Salesforce Insurance / Health Cloud or related applications such as Tia, Sapiens, or Guidewire in a SaaS environment
Proven track record of successful Salesforce delivery of customer projects, preferably enterprise CRM implementations for Insurance Companies
Minimum of 5 years of Salesforce Development Experience
Preferably 2 years of Salesforce Industry (Vlocity) Implementation Experience (in any Industry: CMT, Insurance, Health, Energy) and Hands-on experience with some of the following Salesforce CapabilitiesSalesforce Experience Cloud
Salesforce OmniStudio: Vlocity DataRaptor, Vlocity Cards, Vlocity OmniScript
Salesforce CPQ and7or Vlocity CPQ (either Vlocity Communication EPC or Insurance Ratings Engine)
Lightning Web Components Development and APEX coding
Vlocity Integration Procedures
Performance Testing
Dev Ops for CI/CD using Salesforce DX, VlocityDX, Copado or other similar tools.
Experience integrating business processes across disparate systems and multiple Salesforce instances using web services, SOAP, XML, REST, MSMQ, workflow, XML, HTML, UML and JavaScript
Web development experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript is considered as added value
We are prepared to further train you on Salesforce specific programming concepts and languages.

Foundational understanding of Insurance Industry (e.g. Home, Car, Health, Commercial Property and Workers Compensation)
In-depth understanding of or Passion to Learn more about key Insurance processes, including rating models, quote to card processes, underwriting, claims processing, etc.
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Business or a related field
Ability to adapt to a dynamic work environment and be creative within a team. 
Self-starter, adept at picking up new skills and technologies, and eager to break new ground
Excellent communication skills to communicate with customers, partners, and internal team members in both technical and user-friendly language
Strong interest in growing your own technology skills and developing domain expertise
Good written and oral communication skills in English

Typically people in this role have some of the following salesforce certifications:
Salesforce Sales/Service Cloud Consultant
Salesforce Administrator / Application Builder
Salesforce Developer I & II
Salesforce OmniStudio / Industry Certifications
Salesforce Data Architect
Salesforce Integration Architect
Salesforce Sharing and Visibility Architect
Salesforce CPQ
Marketing Cloud Developer
MuleSoft Developer

What is in it for you?
We believe in bringing the best to our clients through continuous learning & improvement - from basic skills to industry-specific content
Mentoring and continuous evaluation that ensure your career continues to progress
We offer a performance management process that focuses on your strengths, progress and career possibilities
Flexible work arrangements for maintaining work-life balance
Extensive occupational healthcare to take care of your overall wellbeing
Active support for mental health, we are recognized by the Mieli (Mental Health Finland) organization as a "Hyvän Mielen Työpaikka"
Opportunities to get involved in corporate citizenship initiatives, from volunteering to doing charity work, as well as Inclusion & Diversity networks

Interested? Make your move - apply online and attach a CV and a letter of application in English. 

We look forward to receiving your application!

Be sure to follow us on  Facebook ,  Instagram  and  LinkedIn !

 Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity! 
 If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and need special assistance due to a disability or accommodation for a disability, please call us at +358 20 572 5000. 

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services-all powered by the world's largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com. 

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law. 
Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process. 
Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women. 
Please read Accenture's Recruiting and Hiring Statement for more information on how we process your data during the Recruiting and Hiring process.

Results.Heading: Senior Graphics Programmer
Results.Descr:
Remedy Entertainment, the creator of Control®, Max Payne®, Alan Wake® and one of the leading independent game studios in the world is looking for a Senior Graphics Programmer to create high quality gaming experiences for the next generation of games . 

What you get to doDevelop, design, modify, optimize and debug rendering pipeline and engine systems
Deploy, evaluate performance and test software on Xbox Series X and S / PS5 / Windows platforms
Communicate features and collaborate with engineering, design and art teams
Participate in the design, performance and code review process
Contribute to the design and roadmap of an industry-leading AAA engine
What you bring to the role Demonstrated experience working with Computer Graphics and/or other game-related technologies
Background with code and data optimization
Strong math skills
Knowledge of CPU, GPU and memory architectures
Experience in writing shaders in HLSL, Cg or GLSL
Fluency in a modern 3D graphics API
Familiarity using modern GPU/CPU performance analysis tools
Strong background in C/C++ 
Solid debugging skills including ability to debug at an assembly-level when necessary
You're good communicator who enjoys collaboration with other programmers, artists and designers
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Math related field
Additional skills that are beneficial in this role include knowledge on parallel programming and multi-threaded renderers and experience with PS5 GNM, Direct3D 12 and/or Vulkan APIs
What is in it for you?At Remedy you get to work on awesome, memorable gaming experiences for our players, in a studio where your input is valued and your creative freedom is encouraged. 
We work in an environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone's voice is heard & workload stays sensible. We believe in and support work-life balance. Happy people work better! 
We offer an extensive set of employee benefits and an annual bonus system as well as opportunities for you to develop your skills further. On top of this, in Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to public holidays and other special occasions. 
Our studio is based in Helsinki metropolitan area in Finland, a safe country with exceptional quality of life, free education and pristine nature at your doorstep. If you're not already in Finland, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we'll take care of everything else! 
If you are based in Sweden, we also welcome candidates to our new location in Stockholm. 
We enthusiastically welcome diverse viewpoints and backgrounds. We at Remedy value and are committed to ensuring an inclusive and safe work environment for all our team members.

For this role we can case-by-case consider remote working within Europe.

To apply, please fill in the application form with your CV (in English), github and other information relevant to the position.

What you bring to the roleA minimum of 5 years' experience in programming

Excellent C++ skills
Strong mathematical skills
Experience with multithreaded programming
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (English)
Ability to collaborate and work with a range of disciplines from art to design
Ability to take ownership of multiple game systems and drive them to final quality
The ideal candidate will also haveExperience working on 1st person/3rd person action games
Experience in working on PC or console platforms
Experience in working with engine features or tools
Experience with an Entity-Component-Systems (ECS) framework
Experience in shipping AAA games
What is in it for you?At Remedy you get to work on awesome, memorable gaming experiences for our players, in a studio where your input is valued and your creative freedom is encouraged. 
We work in an environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone's voice is heard & workload stays sensible. We believe in and support work-life balance. Happy people work better! 
We offer an extensive set of employee benefits and an annual bonus system as well as opportunities for you to develop your skills further. On top of this, in Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to public holidays and other special occasions. 
Our studio is based in Helsinki metropolitan area in Finland, a safe country with exceptional quality of life, free education and pristine nature at your doorstep. If you're not already in Finland, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we'll take care of everything else!

Results.Heading: .NET-kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Etsimme kasvavaan joukkoomme .NET-kehittäjiä erilaisiin ja erikokoisiin hankkeisiin niin julkiselle kuin yksityiselle sektorille. Sinulla on mahdollisuus vaikuttaa, hyppäätkö mukaan esimerkiksi terveydenhuollon, varhaiskasvatuksen tai liikennetoimialan kehitys- tai uudistusprojektiin. Tarjolla on aidosti merkityksellisiä projekteja, jotka vaikuttavat satojen tuhansien suomalaisten elämään.
 
Pääset työskentelemään monipuolisissa projekteissa kokeneiden ohjelmistokehittäjiemme kanssa - tiimissä voit tehdä yhteistyötä myös esimerkiksi ohjelmistoarkkitehdin, pilviasiantuntijan, designerin ja projektipäällikön kanssa. Asiakasprojektimme ovat yleensä pitkäkestoisia ja pääset useimmiten keskittymään yhteen projektiin kerrallaan.

Mitä toivomme sinulta 

Sinulla on vahvaa ohjelmointiosaamista .NET-ympäristössä, ja hallitset modernin .NET-kehityksen, kuten vaikkapa C#, F# ja ASP.NET Core. Olet ylpeä luomastasi koodista, joka on testattua ja toimivaa. Olet tottunut työskentelemään osana ketterää, itseohjautuvaa tiimiä ja yhteistyössä asiakkaan tuoteomistajan kanssa. Asiakaslähtöisyys ja ei-teknisten ihmisten kanssa kommunikointi ovat myös olennainen osa toimenkuvaasi.
 
Eduksesi on, mikäli sinulta löytyy sekä DevOps-henkisyyttä että kiinnostusta pilvialustoja (AWS, Azure, GCP) kohtaan. Mikäli olet kiinnostunut kehittymään myös frontend-kehittämisen (JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue, Angular) suuntaan, tuemme sinua tässä mielellämme.

Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Työnantajana ja yhteisönä lupaamme huolehtia sinusta, sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat yrityksemme ydin. Maineemme laadukkaiden palveluiden tuottamisessa asiakkaillemme on yksinomaan huippuasiantuntijoidemme ansiota. Matala organisaatiomallimme mahdollistaa itseohjautuvan ja läpinäkyvän toimintakulttuurin. Monimuotoista osaajajoukkoamme yhdistää pioneerihenkisyys sekä halu työskennellä yrityksessä, jonka olemassaololla on suurempi tarkoitus kuin pelkästään voiton tuottaminen - pyrkimys inhimillisempään, kestävämpään ja eettisempään digimaailmaan.
 
Koemme tärkeänä henkilöstömme ammatillisen osaamisen kehittämisen ja voit vapaasti valita etenemispolkusi kehittämällä osaamistasi niillä osa-alueilla, jotka koet tärkeäksi. Ammatillista kehittymistäsi tukee myös mahdollisuus osallistua erilaisiin ulkoisiin koulutuksiin, sekä liiketoimintaa tukevien sertifikaattien suorittamiseen.
 
Goforelaisena pääset osalliseksi myös paikalliskerhoihimme sekä työyhteisötoimintaan. Kerhotoiminnan puitteissa kokoonnumme työn ulkopuolella mm. lautapelien, liikunnan, elektroniikan ja elokuvien parissa. Työntekijöistä koostuva työyhteisöryhmä järjestää myös muita erilaisia yhteisiä tapahtumia.
   Monipuoliset opiskelumahdollisuudet ja Goforen kustantamat verkkokurssit 
 Joustavat työajat sekä mahdollisuus valita missä ja miten teet työsi 
 Yhteisöllisen kulttuurin, kaikille avoimia tapahtumia ja aktiiviset kilta- ja kerhotoiminnat 
 Vaikuttamis-  ja sertifiointibonukset (AWS, Azure, Scrum) 
 
Tutustu toki Goforen omaan työehtosopimukseen ja kokonaisuudessaan työsuhde-etuihimme.

Projektimahdollisuudet 

Työnantajana ja yhteisönä lupaamme huolehtia sinusta, sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat yrityksemme ydin. Maineemme laadukkaiden palveluiden tuottamisessa asiakkaillemme on yksinomaan huippuasiantuntijoidemme ansiota. Matala organisaatiomallimme mahdollistaa itseohjautuvan ja läpinäkyvän toimintakulttuurin. Monimuotoista osaajajoukkoamme yhdistää pioneerihenkisyys sekä halu työskennellä yrityksessä, jonka olemassaololla on suurempi tarkoitus kuin pelkästään voiton tuottaminen - pyrkimys inhimillisempään, kestävämpään ja eettisempään digimaailmaan.
 
Asiakasprojektiin sijoittuminen Goforella on työntekijälähtöistä. Ymmärrämme, että omia toiveita ja kehittymistavoitteita vastaava projekti vaikuttaa suuresti arjen sujuvuuteen ja työntekijätyytyväisyyteen.
 
Meillä on jatkuvasti avoinna noin 20-50 asiakastarvetta ja sopivaa projektia valitessa esittelemme sinulle muutamia kiinnostavia vaihtoehtoja. Jokaisella goforelaisella on täysi läpinäkyvyys asiakastarpeisiimme ja teemmekin lopulliset projektipäätökset aina yhdessä keskustellen. Välillä elämäntilanteet voivat muuttua, uusia kehittymistoiveita ilmaantua tai epätäydellisiä projektipäätöksiä tapahtua, jolloin toki huolehdimme projektikierron mahdollistamisesta.
 
Projekteja, joihin voisit liittyä
 
Aimo Park
 
Projekti alkoi, kun kehitimme muutaman React Native -kehittäjän voimin pysäköintisovelluksen Suomen markkinoille. Sovellus oli onnistunut ja olemme nyt laajentamassa sovelluksen toimintaan kaikissa Pohjoismaissa. Tällä hetkellä projektissa työskentelee noin 30 goforelaista ja tiimit ovat jakautuneet backend-, mobiili-, infra- ja ylläpitotiimeiksi. Olemme pystyneet jakamaan kehittäjillemme hyvin erilaisia vastuualueita kehittymistoiveiden mukaisesti. Lue lisää: https://gofore.com/en/cases/aimo-park-cloud/.
 
Helsingin kaupunki
 
Helsingin kaupunki on yksi isoimmista asiakkaistamme. Asiakkuudessa kehitämme usean kehitystiimin voimin digipalveluita päiväkodeille ja kouluille. Kehitetyt palvelut ovat erittäin merkittäviä kuntalaisille, koska niiden kautta perheet hakevat esimerkiksi päiväkoti- ja koulupaikkoja. Asiakkaan kanssa meille on muotoutunut onnistunut yhteistyö: olemme onnistuneet löytämään heidän tarpeisiinsa sopivia konsultteja ja vastaavasti he ovat meidän suuntaamme joustavia. Tyypilliseen kehitystiimiin kuuluu noin viisi kehittäjää ja UX-suunnittelijaa.
 
Teollisuusasiakkaat
 
Meillä on useita isoja teollisuusalan asiakkaita, mutta referenssit eivät ole julkisia. Tyypillisesti asiakas on suomalainen konepaja, jonka digitalisoitumisessa olemme auttamassa. Pyrimme valitsemaan hankkeita, joissa on mukana jonkinlainen ympäristökulma, eli päästöjen vähentäminen tai kulutuksen optimoiminen. Tällaisiin hankkeisiin sisältyy monesti todella mielenkiintoiset ympäristöt, isoja koneita, laiterajapintoja ja paljon mielenkiintoista dataa.
 
Pienet projektit
 
Isojen asiakkuuksien lisäksi meillä on jatkuva virta pieniä projekteja. Tavallisessa miniprojektissa asiakas tarvitsee noin 1-2 konsulttia tekemään pienen sovelluksen, tai lisäominaisuuksia jo olemassa oleviin sovelluksiin. Näissä hankkeissa korostuu konsulttien itseohjautuvuus ja läheinen yhteistyö asiakkaan kanssa.

" Nimeni on Olli Mankonen, ja työskentelen Goforen Jyväskylän toimistolla .Net-kehittäjänä. Reilun parin vuoden Gofore-työurani aikana olen päässyt osallistumaan jo moneen mielenkiintoiseen projektiin, ja jokaisessa projektissa olen päässyt oppimaan jotain uutta. Nykyinen projektini on osa suurta kansallista julkisen sektorin hanketta, jossa projektitiimimme toteuttaa backend-palveluja, kuten kirjautuminen ja session hallinta, muille hankkeen tiimeille. Palvelut toteutetaan nykyaikaisesti microservice-arkkitehtuurilla Azure Functioneina, jotka luonollisesti pyörivät Microsoftin Azure-pilvessä. Muutenkin projektissa hyödynnetään uusimpia mahdollisia teknologioita, kuten .Net Corea, Entity Framework Corea ja Azure Table Storagea. Vaikka koko hankkeessa on useampi projektitiimi ja yli 100 henkeä, pyörii se ketterästi Safe agile frameworkia hyödyntäen. Itsensä kehittäminen ja uuden oppiminen on minulle tärkeää, ja Goforella kannustetaankin jatkuvaan itsensä kehittämiseen. Erilaisiin koulutuksiin ja alan tapahtumiin on mahdollista osallistua, ja kuka tahansa voi järjestää sisäisiä tietoiskuja aiheesta kuin aiheesta. Myös siihen on mahdollista itse vaikuttaa, millaisiin projekteihin osallistuu, tuomalla esiin omat kiinnostuksen kohteensa. Työnteon vastapainona Goforella pääsee nauttimaan loistavien työkavereiden seurasta. Kahvitauot sujuvat mukavasti pöytäjalkapalloa tai biljardia pelaillen. Tiistaisin järjestetään toimiston yhteinen aamupalahetki, jossa on helppo vaihtaa kuulumisia ihmisten kanssa. Toisinaan jäämme työpäivän jälkeen pelailemaan lautapelejä tai konsolipelejä. Hyvän ilmapiiriin ja työyhteisön ylläpitäminen onkin yksi suurimmista asioista, mistä Goforella työskentelyssä tykkään."

Results.Heading: Senior Software Developer, Cloud
Results.Descr:
Cargotec is at the forefront of the transformation in the cargo handling industry. Our cargo handling solutions and services make global trade smarter, better and more sustainable. As leaders in ports, on roads and at sea, our business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor have a unique position to optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. 

Join the forerunner in sustainable cargo handling 

"I enjoy coming to work because we get to collaborate with amazing and talented colleagues. Our team is international, professional and self-guided. We are working with smart people which we can rely on."
 
- Scrum Master Marko at Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub -

Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub creates data-driven software and services for intelligent cargo handling for all of the three Cargotec businesses: Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor. By using cutting-edge cloud technologies and industry best practices, we are responsible for driving digital transformation and accelerating the development of software solutions across Cargotec.

Sustainability is at the core of everything we do and we strive to make global trade smarter and eco-friendly while securing the growth of new digital business for Cargotec and its customers. Cargotec is a leading provider of cargo and load handling solutions globally so your actions will have a great impact on the industry.

Our recent projects at DiSH include for example McGregror OnWatch Scout condition monitoring solution transforming the predictive maintenance of maritime equipment (https://www.macgregor.com/intelligent-solutions/onwatch-scout/) and Kalmar Insight performance management tool for cargo handling operations that turns data into actionable, impactful insights (https://www.kalmarglobal.com/equipment-services/kalmar-insight/). 

We are now looking for a Senior Cloud Software Developer to join us in Tampere. 

You will be a member of our team developing digital software products for our customers and building system capabilities for various projects in cloud environments. We are a multicloud organisation using both AWS and Google Cloud, and based on your experience and interests your daily tasks can focus on either one or both. You master different aspects of cloud development from software development to devops tools and appreciate working in an international, cross-functional setup and engaging with various teams working with frontend and backend software solutions.

As a software engineering expert, you thrive in using modern DevOps tools and practises to produce quality cloud native software solutions. You are able to communicate effectively when analyzing, troubleshooting, and resolving issues together with other developers and stakeholders.

Our ideal candidate has: 

• Several years of professional experience in designing and developing software in the cloud environment (preferably either AWS or GCP)
 • Strong working knowledge in programming languages like Typescript, Python or Java
 • Proven track record of crafting elegant and fit-for-purpose system and software architectures using managed cloud services
 • Good working knowledge of technologies like containers, serverless computing, data streaming, ETL, microservices, relational databases (Postgres or MySQL), noSQL databases and REST APIs
 • Understanding of automation and infrastructure management tools like Cloudformation, CDK, Terraform, Jenkins, Ansible or similar.
 • Natural drive for continuous learning and interacting with the development team community
 • Proficiency with agile and lean software development methodologies
 • Strong analytical problem solving skills
 • Good communication skills allowing collaboration with stakeholders from various backgrounds
 • Proficiency in English (written and verbal)
 • M.Sc(Eng.) or higher in software Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent

Additionally, we appreciate:

• Experience with AWS services like ECS, RDS, Lambda, Glue, Kinesis Data streams, Kinesis Firehose, S3, DynamoDB, Athena, IoT Core, Greengrass
 • Experience with GCP big data tooling, Cloud functions, Big Query, Cloud Storage and Data flow
 • Experience with BI systems such as SAP
 • GCP or AWS certificates

 What can we offer you? 

We could be your ideal employer, if you value working on your own software products with leading edge software and cloud technologies, including our IoT and data analytics system on AWS. Read more on https://lnkd.in/dr4vhAq

We have the culture and opportunities supporting continuous growth and learning of our professionals and we provide them highly interesting and meaningful software projects to work with.

There is a high level of autonomy and freedom to e.g. drive development initiatives most inspiring to you. We appreciate work life balance and provide flexible working hours.

Cargotec is a global company and working environment - around 11,500 people in 45 countries and operations in more than 100 countries.

We are a strong and stable, publicly listed employer with market-leading cargo brands to work for - and to have a huge impact on transforming the cargo industry and making the world more sustainable.

Interested to join? 

Please submit your CV or LinkedIn profile by 18.12.2021
 The applications will be continuously reviewed until the position is filled.

Our recruitment process in a nutshell:

There are four phases: Brief call, 1st interview, technical assignment and 2nd interview. First two phases focus on getting to know each other, letting you know what we do here at DiSH and how you would fit into our team. The two latter phases focus more on the technical know-how and requirements.

For more information about the role and the recruitment process, please contact Chief Software Engineer Petri Selonen by email: petri.selonen@cargotec.com 

Cargotec and its businesses 
 
 Cargotec (Nasdaq Helsinki: CGCBV) enables smarter cargo flow for a better everyday with its leading cargo handling solutions and services. Cargotec's business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor are pioneers in their fields. Through their unique position in ports, at sea and on roads, they optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. Cargotec has signed United Nations Global Compact's Business Ambition for 1.5°C. The company's sales in 2020 totalled approximately EUR 3.3 billion and it employs around 11,500 people. www.cargotec.com
