Results.Heading: Full Stack Developer (Java, Node.js, React), PK-Yritysrahoitus
Results.Descr:
Haluatko osaltasi olla kehittämässä erinomaisia palveluja kaikenkokoisille yrityksille? Miltä kuulostaisi kriittisiin yritysrahoituksen järjestelmiin liittyvä ohjelmistokehitys ja kädenjälkesi näkyminen tuhansille ja tuhansille yritysasiakkaillemme? Mahtavaa - tutustutaan ihmeessä lisää! 

 Full Stack Developer (Java, Node.js, React), PK-Yritysrahoitus  

Etsimme nyt osaavaa Full Stack -kehittäjää vahvistukseksi tiimiimme kehittämään ja ylläpitämään PK-yritysrahoitusliiketoiminnoille kriittisiä järjestelmiä, kuten OPn omaa asiakkuudenhallinta- ja luottopäätösjärjestelmää sekä op.fi -sovelluksia.

Reilut kymmenhenkisellä tiimillämme on kokonaisvastuu PK-yritysrahoituksen alueen sovelluksista samalla, kun tiimimme yhteinen tehtävä on suunnitella, kehittää ja toteuttaa teknisiä ratkaisuja ja tuoda ne korkealaatuisina loppukäyttäjiemme käyttöön. Lisäksi pöydällämme on koko OP Yritysrahoituksen liiketoiminnan kannalta kiinnostavia projekteja (mm. reaaliaikaisten datalähteiden hyödyntäminen rahoituksessa), joista kerromme mielellämme lisää.

Muilta osin tiimimme arkista tekemistä voisi luonnehtia isojen kokonaisuuksien pariin keskittyväksi ja itsenäiseksi mutta yhteisölliseksi (esim. säännöllinen mobbaus). Emme polje paikallamme, vaan kokeilemme mielellämme uusia ideoita ja keräämme säännöllisesti palautetta loppukäyttäjiltämme. Vastuutakin on tarjolla juuri niin paljon, kuin sitä olet valmis ottamaan.

Millaisesta hommasta on kyse? 

Teknisesti sovelluksemme on MSSQL-serverin päälle rakennettu tietokantapohjainen järjestelmä, jota on uudistettu ja edelleen aktiivisesti kehitetään modernimmilla teknologioilla.  Tiiminä meillä on ylläpito ja kehittämisvastuu tuotteemme osalta sekä vastuu pilvi-infrasta AWS:n osalta. Näin ollen päivittäiset työtehtäväsi keskittyvät muun muassa backend-kehitykseen MSSQL- ja NodeJS-ympäristössä, frontti-kehitykseen Reactilla sekä teknisten ratkaisuiden suunnitteluun yhteistyössä tiimisi kanssa. Lisäksi otat käyttöön ja kehität tiimisi työn tueksi DevOps-toimintatapoja teknisen ketteryyden parantamiseksi. Kyseessä on siis monisyinen kehitysalue, joten kiinnostavaa haastetta on tarjolla kokeneellekin tekijälle niin teknisessä mielessä kuin tiimin arkea liidaavan suunnannäyttäjän roolissa.

Oman tiimisi lisäksi pääset osaksi kattavaa osaajaverkostoa, sillä järjestelmiä kehitetään aktiivisesti useassa eri kehitystiimissä, neljässä eri heimossa. Käytössämme on valtava määrä tietoa ja olemme ylpeitä, että tuhansia loppukäyttäjiä päivittäin tavoittavan sovelluksen parissa sekä työskentelemään modernissa ja monipuolisessa teknologisessa ympäristössä nyt ja tulevaisuudessa. 

Mitä toivoisimme sinulta?

Etsimme osaajaa, jolta löytyisi mm. seuraavaa osaamista:

• Kokemus backend-kehittämisestä Javalla tai NodeJS:llä
• Aiempaa kosketuspintaa front-end kehittämiseen (JavaScript, TypeScript ja/tai React)
• Ymmärrys ja mahdollisesti aiempi osaaminen relaatiotietokantojen parista (erit. MSSQL ja/tai T-SQL)
• Sujuva suomen ja englannin kielen taito

Näillä pääsee jo todella pitkälle, mutta katsomme lisäksi eduksi, mikäli edellisten lisäksi sinulla on jonkinasteinen kosketuspinta seuraaviin: järjestelmäintegraatiot, Docker, Kubernetes, pilviympäristöt (AWS), monitoimittajaympäristö.

Miksi juuri OP:lle?

Pankkialan toimijana voisi helposti kuvitella muuta, mutta olemme yksi Suomen suurimpia IT-taloja ja tuotamme asiakkaille näkyvät IT-ratkaisut pääosin itsenäisesti alusta loppuun. Meille on tärkeää, että voimme konkreettisesti tukea ja auttaa sinua kehittymään ammatillisesti.

Meillä on käytössä ns. 70-20-10 -periaate, mikä tarkoittaa, että käytät 70% ajastasi päivittäisiin tehtäviin, 20% työskentelytapojen hiomiseen ja viimeiset 10% vapaasti uusien taitojen oppimiseen. Tämän osuuden voit käyttää esimerkiksi meidän omassa OP Software Academyssa, jossa voit laajentaa osaamistasi monella eri osa-alueella. Kyllä, voit siis laajentaa osaamistasi työajalla!

Elämä on kuitenkin paljon muutakin kuin työtä. Meille on tärkeää, että työ ja vapaa-aika kulkevat rinnakkain ja työnantajana olemme valmiita joustamaan elämän eri tilanteissa. Saat käyttöösi monipuoliset henkilöstöetumme, johon kuuluvat muun muassa henkilöstörahasto sekä henkilökuntaehtoiset pankki-, vakuutus- ja lainapalvelut. Tarjoamme myös kattavan työterveyshuollon, laajan hoitokuluvakuutuksen sekä täysajan tapaturmavakuutuksen. 

Heräsikö kiinnostuksesi?

Hieno juttu - ole ihmeessä yhteydessä sinulle mahdollisesti heräävien kysymysten tiimoilta tai jätä hakemuksesi oheisesta linkistä. Viimeinen hakupäivä on tiistaina 20.9.

Hanna-Leena Lampén (Lead Product Owner) kertoo sinulle mielellään lisää roolista ja tiimissä työskentelystä (p. 0503397139) tai etunimi.sukunimi(at).op.fi. 

Finanssialalla luottamus ja vastuullisuus ovat toimintamme perusta, minkä vuoksi tehtävään valittavalta henkilöltä tarkistetaan luottotiedot ja yritysyhteydet sekä teetetään huumausainetesti.

Results.Heading: Salesforce Developer / Architect
Results.Descr:
Description - External
Be yourself, make a difference.

Are you ready to take your expertise to the next level?
There is never a typical day at Accenture, but that is why we love it here! This is an outstanding opportunity to build a rewarding career at Accenture Technology. Working in highly collaborative teams for world-leading clients, we will nurture your talent in an inclusive culture that values diversity.

We are now looking for Salesforce.com Developers of all levels.

Accenture Technology powers our clients to achieve high performance. We combine business and deep industry insights with innovative technology such as Cloud Computing and Applied Intelligence to drive business growth.

Within the process of crafting your Salesforce.com expertise at Accenture, you will be trained, certified and working alongside experienced specialists on exciting projects. The position is based in Helsinki and will include travel based on customer requirements. You can already be Salesforce certified System Architect, Application Architect or Technical Architect or have strong aspiration to become one soon. You decide the pace while we provide the tools and the help you need to achieve your career goals.

What is Salesforce? Salesforce is a cloud-based software company and a $1 Trillion ecosystem estimated by IDC in terms of new business revenue generated between 2019 and 2024, Accenture is the #1 Salesforce consulting partner globally. Salesforce offers leading Solutions for business areas such as Sales, Customer service, Marketing automation, eCommerce, Configure Price and Quote, Billing and Analytics. Moreover, MuleSoft, Tableau and Slack to name few are also Solutions owned by Salesforce.

Work you will do:
Develop and deliver software modules and/or components of all sizes on the Salesforce.com platform
Work complexity will be based on your level of experience
Collaborate and work with various teams to deliver high quality outcomes
Produce technical documentation and test plans for your development work
Learn Accenture's methodologies
Demonstrate Accenture's technology delivery assets
Network and learn with Accenture's global specialists


Qualifications 
Qualifications - External
Who are we looking for?
Ideally you would already have 1-2 years of developer work experience but we are also looking for passionate people with the right attitude
A Bachelor's or Master's Degree
Ability to work as part of a team in a collaborative environment
Ability to communicate ideas in both technical and user-friendly language
Strong interest in growing your own technology skills and developing domain expertise
Good written and oral communication skills in both English and preferably Finnish
Typically people in this role have some of the following skills:
1-2 Salesforce certifications
Software testing methodology and unit testing concept
Data Object Oriented design & principles
Experience with SOQL/APEX
Version control and DevSecOps tools
Web Services, SOAP & REST
Web development experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript is considered as added value
We are prepared to train you on Salesforce specific programming concepts and languages. However, previous experience on Salesforce development is greatly valued.
What is in it for you?
We believe in bringing the best to our clients through continuous learning & improvement - from basic skills to industry-specific content
Mentoring and continuous evaluation that ensure your career continues to progress
We offer a performance management process that focuses on your strengths, progress and career possibilities
Flexible work arrangements for maintaining work-life balance
Extensive occupational healthcare to take care of your overall wellbeing
Active support for mental health, we are recognized by the Mieli (Mental Health Finland) organization as a "Hyvän Mielen Työpaikka"
Opportunities to get involved in corporate citizenship initiatives, from volunteering to doing charity work, as well as Inclusion & Diversity networks

Interested? Make your move - apply online and attach a CV and a letter of application in English. 

We look forward to receiving your application!

Be sure to follow us on  Facebook ,  Instagram  and  LinkedIn !

Please note that business is closed during the month of July. If you are applying during summer, please expect delays in our responses.

 Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity! 
 If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and need special assistance due to a disability or accommodation for a disability, please call us at +358 20 572 5000. 

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services-all powered by the world's largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law. 
Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process. 
Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women. 
Please read Accenture's Recruiting and Hiring Statement for more information on how we process your data during the Recruiting and Hiring process.

Results.Heading: Backend Developer, Vakuutuspalvelut
Results.Descr:
Backend Developer, Vakuutuspalvelut 

Etsimme kehittäjää Pohjola Vakuutuksen digitaalisten palveluiden kehittämisen tiimin vahvuuteen, jossa pääset kehittämään ratkaisujamme yritys- ja henkilöasiakkaiden vakuutuspalveluihin liittyen. Pääset toteuttamaan Op.fi palveluita, joilla on yli miljoona kirjautumista kuukaudessa, ja ne ovat osa Suomen kriittistä digitaalista infrastruktuuria. Tehtävä sijaitsee Helsingissä, mutta kuten muuallakin OP:lla, yhdistelemme arjessamme joustavasti lähi- ja etätyöskentelyä.

Millainen on tuleva tiimisi ja roolisi? 

Vakuutuksen palveluiden asiakaspolku tuottaa meille arvokasta dataa ohjata digikanavaa, tuotetarjoamaa, saatavuutta ja hintoja. Tiimimme vastuulla on suunnitella, kehittää ja toteuttaa teknisiä ratkaisuja tämän datan pohjalta ja tuomme valmiit ratkaisut korkealaatuisina loppukäyttäjiemme käyttöön. Toteutamme tulevaisuuden palveluita julkiseen pilveen, uudessa arkkitehtuurissa, moderneilla työkaluilla ja tiimissä, jossa on vankka kokemus ketterästä softatuotannosta. 

Työarjessasi kehittäjänä keskityt ennen kaikkea backend-kehitykseen. Omasta mielenkiinnostasi riippuen sinulla on mahdollisuus osallistua myös frontend-kehitykseen, API-rajapintaratkaisujen suunnitteluun ja toteutukseen, kuten myös teknisten ratkaisujen suunnitteluun. 

Noin kymmenen hengen tiimissämme löytyy vahvaa asiantuntijuutta ja draivia viedä uusia ratkaisuja eteenpäin. Tiiminä arvostamme innokasta työotetta. Työarjessamme tarvitsemme sekä suomea että englantia, ja tästä syystä toivommekin myös sinulla olevan näillä kielillä hyvät kommunikointitaidot.

Mitä toivomme sinulta & mitä etsimme hakemuksestasi?

Kuten jo mainittua, tiimistämme löytyy jo ennestään kokeneita asiantuntijoita ohjelmistokehityksen saralla. Tästä syystä etsimmekin nyt uransa alkupuolella olevaa ohjelmistokehittäjää (esim. 1-3v kehityskokemuksella varustettuna), joka haluaa kasvattaa omaa osaamistaan. Tokikaan emme pane pahaksemme, vaikka sinulta löytyisi jo ennestään pidemmältäkin ajalta aiempaa kokemusta koodauksen parista. 

Olennaista tehtävään sujahtamiseen on aiempi kokemus backend Java-kehityksestä ja halu syventää osaamistasi myös muilla alueille. Mainitsimmekin jo, että omasta mielenkiinnostasi riippuen sinun on mahdollista osallistua pelkän backend-kehityksen lisäksi myös muuhun tiimimme tekemiseen, kuten esimerkiksi frontend-toteutukseen (JavaScript, React) tai vaikkapa designerin kanssa UI-tekemiseen. Tiimimme työskentelee AWS-pohjaisten ratkaisuiden parissa, joten toivomme sinulla olevan kiinnostusta syventyä AWS:n ihmeelliseen maailmaan. 

Miksi meille kannattaa hakea? 

Kannustamme ja autamme sinua kehittymään myös ammatillisesti. Meillä on käytössä ns. 70-20-10 -periaate, mikä tarkoittaa, että käytät 70% ajastasi päivittäisiin tehtäviin, 20% työskentelytapojen hiomiseen ja viimeiset 10% vapaasti uusien taitojen oppimiseen. Tämän osuuden voit käyttää esimerkiksi OP Software Academyssa, jossa voit laajentaa osaamistasi monella eri osa-alueella. Voit siis laajentaa osaamistasi työajalla!

Saat lisäksi käyttöösi monipuoliset henkilöstöetumme, johon kuuluvat henkilörahasto sekä henkilökuntaehtoiset pankki-, vakuutus- ja lainapalvelut. Tarjoamme myös kattavan työterveyshuollon, laajan hoitokuluvakuutuksen sekä täysajan tapaturmavakuutuksen. Työssäjaksamiseen panostamme arjen tasapainolla ja joustavuudella sekä tarjoamalla käyttöösi lounas-, liikunta- ja kulttuuriedut sekä mahdollisuuden edulliseen lomailuun OP:n lomaosakkeissa. 

Kuulostaako tulevalta rooliltasi?

Jes - tämä oli toiveenammekin! Hae tehtävää rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta viimeistään sunnuntaina 11.9.2022. 

Finanssialalla luottamus ja vastuullisuus ovat toimintamme perusta, minkä vuoksi tehtävään valittavalta henkilöltä tarkistetaan luottotiedot ja yritysyhteydet sekä teetetään huumausainetesti ja perusmuotoinen turvallisuusselvitys. 

OP Ryhmä on Suomen suurin finanssiryhmä. Olemme asiakkaidemme omistama, finanssialan houkuttelevin työnantaja Suomessa. Ryhmässämme työskentelee yli 12 000 alan ammattilaista, ja tuotamme sekä kehitämme pankki-, sijoitus-, vakuutus- ja kiinteistönvälityspalveluita neljälle miljoonalle asiakkaallemme. Lisätietoa OP:sta työnantajana ja kaikki avoimet tehtävämme löydät osoitteesta www.op-careers.fi.

Results.Heading: Software Developer, Solutions
Results.Descr:
Cargotec is at the forefront of the transformation in the cargo handling industry. Our cargo handling solutions and services make global trade smarter, better and more sustainable. As leaders in ports, on roads and at sea, our business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor have a unique position to optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. 

Join the forerunner in sustainable cargo handling 

"I enjoy coming to work because we get to collaborate with amazing and talented colleagues. Our team is international, professional and self-guided. We are working with smart people which we can rely on." 
 - Scrum Master Marko at Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub - 

Cargotec Digital Solutions Hub creates data-driven software and services for intelligent cargo handling for all of the three Cargotec businesses: Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor. By using cutting-edge cloud technologies and industry best practices, we are responsible for driving digital transformation and accelerating the development of software solutions across Cargotec.

Sustainability is at the core of everything we do and we strive to make global trade smarter and eco-friendly while securing the growth of new digital business for Cargotec and its customers. Cargotec is the global market leader in cargo handling solutions so your actions will have a great impact on the industry.

Our recent projects at DiSH include for example McGregror OnWatch Scout  condition monitoring solution transforming the predictive maintenance of maritime equipment (https://www.macgregor.com/intelligent-solutions/onwatch-scout/) and Kalmar Insight performance management tool for cargo handling operations that turns data into actionable, impactful insights (https://www.kalmarglobal.com/equipment-services/kalmar-insight/). 

We are now looking for a Software Developer to join us in Tampere. 

You will be a member of our team developing digital software products for our customers and building data driven web and mobile applications in agile teams. You appreciate working in a cross-functional setup and engaging with various internal and external stakeholders, ranging from developers and data scientists to designers and business owners. Depending on your interests and experience, your responsibilities may range from implementing robust backend services to building front-end applications with clean and intuitive user interfaces to doing full-stack development. Some of the main technologies used in the team include Node.js, React and Python. You are able to communicate effectively when analyzing, troubleshooting, and resolving issues together with other developers and stakeholders.

Our ideal candidate has:A few years of hands-on full-stack development experience
Pragmatic and proactive attitude to get things done in a usable, maintainable and performant way
Good collaboration skills to solve problems in a rapidly changing environment together with designers, developers and customers
Eagerness to learn new technologies
Ability to work in a diverse environment and working together with a team towards a common goal
Proficiency in English (written and verbal)
M.Sc (Eng.) or B.Sc. in Software Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent
Additionally, we appreciate:

 Experience with some of the following: React or other modern JavaScript framework, TypeScript, Node.js, Python, React Native, PostgreSQL
Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Git, NPM
Experience in Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration process and tools
Experience in all phases of a software project lifecycle.
What can we offer you? 

We could be your ideal employer, if you value working on your own software products with leading edge software and cloud technologies, including our IoT and data analytics system on AWS. Read more on https://lnkd.in/dr4vhAq 
 We have the culture and opportunities supporting continuous growth and learning of our professionals and we provide them highly interesting and meaningful software projects to work with.

There is a high level of autonomy and freedom to e.g. drive development initiatives most inspiring to you. We appreciate work life balance and provide flexible working hours.
 Cargotec is a global company and working environment - around 11,500 people in 45 countries and operations in more than 100 countries.
 We are a strong and stable, publicly listed employer with market-leading cargo brands to work for - and to have a huge impact on transforming the cargo industry and making the world more sustainable.

Interested to join? 

Please submit your  CV or LinkedIn profile. The applications will be continuously reviewed until the position is filled.

Our recruitment process in a nutshell:

There are four phases: Brief call, 1st interview, technical assignment and 2nd interview. First two phases focus on getting to know each other, letting you know what we do here at DiSH and how you would fit into our team. The two latter phases focus more on the technical know-how and requirements. 
 
 For more information about the role and the recruitment process, please contact Chief Software Engineer Petri Selonen by email: petri.selonen@cargotec.com 

Cargotec and its businesses 
 
 Cargotec (Nasdaq Helsinki: CGCBV) enables smarter cargo flow for a better everyday with its leading cargo handling solutions and services. Cargotec's business areas Kalmar, Hiab and MacGregor are pioneers in their fields. Through their unique position in ports, at sea and on roads, they optimise global cargo flows and create sustainable customer value. Cargotec has signed United Nations Global Compact's Business Ambition for 1.5°C. The company's sales in 2020 totalled approximately EUR 3.3 billion and it employs around 11,500 people. www.cargotec.com

Results.Heading: Mobile / Web Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for a Mobile Developer for application projects, maintenance, and small development tasks. 

HiQ is a leading provider of demanding and intelligent web services. Today, web services are the platform for digital experiences. It enables a great online communication service, modern online stores, mobile applications, a superior online experience, and new experiences e.g., augmented reality (AR) as well as virtual reality (VR). 

Our mobile solutions have always been implemented using the technology that best serves our customers' needs, be it the development of a native application with Swift or Kotlin, or alternatively a cost-effective development with React Native or Flutter. In certain cases, Progressive Web Apps (PWA) or responsive Web development with modern frameworks can be chosen as the technology. 

We are now looking for an experienced developer who wants to make quality code, appreciates teamwork and has good communication and interaction skills. You enjoy varied work tasks and are able to work with a wide range of different technologies and tools, and you are not afraid to take on new challenges. 

To thrive in this position, you'll need: 
Several years of experience in software development 
Experience in mobile development (either Native, React Native or Flutter) 
Experience in Front End and possibly experience of modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue) 
Eagerness to learn new things 
Good communication skills in Finnish and English


We offer 
competitive salary 
the opportunity to further develop and expand your skills 
flexible working hours and temporarily remote work 
an employer who supports in various life situations 
safe and stable workplace 
low hierarchy and flexible and relaxed organizational culture 
comprehensive personnel benefits (e.g., learning platforms, self-development days, extensive occupational health care and health insurance, lunch benefit, sport & cultural benefit vouchers, cultural and sports club, sick childcare benefit) 


Interested to join us? 

If the role sparked your interest and you think you'd be a great match for HiQ, send us your application. You can send the application either in Finnish or English. 

You can also apply by sending an email directly to Oona Muilu (oona.muilu@hiq.fi). Just tell us briefly about your work experience and leave us your contact information. 

Other related to the job 
The start is flexible according to your situation. 
The role requires minimum professional proficiency in Finnish language. 
You can currently work either remotely (within Finland), or in our offices in Espoo or Helsinki. 


HiQ saves the personal data you submit so we can process your application.
See HiQ's Privacy Policy for more information on how your personal data are
processed.

Results.Heading: Open application, Software Developer positions (Helsinki)
Results.Descr:
Open Application, Software Developer positions, Helsinki 

Can't find an open position equipped with your preferences and tech competencies, and not feeling very happy about it? No worries - as the leading financial organization in Finland and one of the country's largest software companies we are constantly looking for new colleagues with different skill sets.

From frontend to backend and from full stack to DevOps, there's quite a selection of different teams to choose from. You might fancy developing mobile or card payments, mortgage or insurance solutions, online banking services at op.fi or develop our data solutions, just to name a few. A wide range of solutions to develop = wide range of possibilities to do something meaningful for our end users.

What are we usually looking for?

Well, this naturally varies a lot. We are still trying our best to tell you some things that are usually very relevant for us! Our teams are usually working with some of the following technologies: Javascript/Typescript, React, Java, Node.js, SAS, SQL, Jenkins, REST, Git. We want to highlight that we don't expect anyone to master all these mentioned technologies, but we hope you to be familiar at least with some of them. Other things we value in a potential future colleague:

• previous software development experience in an agile environment. 
• familiarity with cloud environment(s)
• DevOps mindset is something you value.
• You are eligible to work in Finland.

It all starts with engineering culture and practices! At OP, we cherish agility, security, responsiveness and efficiency to serve better our customers, not to forget increasing our employee and developer experience and development efficiency. Software is at the core of OP's business, and we take it seriously, as you might be able to tell here ;). 

Do you think we might have matching interests?

Awesome, now it is your time to act! Please let us get to know you by describing your technical talent and what excites you professionally. We prefer CVs and application letters just to make sure we catch your core competencies. Also e.g. Linkedin or Github profiles are valued a lot. 
 
We go through received applications regularly and we try our best to match your profile into our current needs. Sometimes this happens quickly, sometimes it might take more time. During the hottest summer holiday season in July we are enjoying our holidays and we will start going through received open applications during August. So please be patient with us. :) If something interesting appears, we'll be in touch after that! Remember also to keep an eye on our job opportunities at opcareers.fi and shoot us with an application if something interesting caught your attention.

Meanwhile, for example, get comfortable in your armchair and listen to the OP Tech Podcast where we cover financial technology matters from OP's perspective. Hope to hear you soon!
 
In the financial sector our business is built on trust and accountability. Due to this we will carry out credit reference and security clearance checks, drug tests, and an occupational healthcare survey before signing the final work contract.

OP Financial Group is the leading financial services group in Finland and a pioneer in the industry's digital transformation. Owned by our customers, we are the largest financial sector employer in Finland. OP Financial Group employs over 12,000 professionals and provides banking, asset management, wealth management, insurance services for our more than four million customers. For more information about OP as an employer and for all vacancies, go to www.op-careers.fi.

Results.Heading: Senior Java Developer to Madrid
Results.Descr:
Want to be part of building something totally new? Want to be member of one of the Great Places to Work® in Europe? 

Gofore is an international company with a strong presence in the private and public sector, driving digitalization and business transformation for our customers in Smart Cities, eGovernment, Industry 4.0, and many more.
 
We are building a competence centre in Madrid with a focus on human-centric digital governance solutions, kicking off with data exchange layer X-Road.

Your experience 
   You have at least 10 years hands-on experience in software development in Java.
You are experienced in one or more of these technologies: Spring Boot, Ansible, Docker, Jenkins but you have been through so many different technologies that you are motivated to learn new ones.
You have extensive experience in developing REST API and SOAP/XML web services.
You are comfortable to work with PostgreSQL or other relational databases.
You love the elegant code that is easy to maintain and develop.
You prefer working in teams but are not afraid to be the driver in projects.
You have a customer-oriented attitude when communicating with non-technical people.
Being fluent in English and have residency or working Visa in Spain is required for this position.
 
 

 Extra points if you have experience with: 
  Microservices and messaging frameworks such as Kafka or Akka.
Public cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure or GCP.
Also, you know and appreciate the principles of software development and web application security practices such as OWASP.
Experience in an international environment and experience with testing and agile methodologies such as Scrum.
 

Benefits 
 A competitive salary and a fixed contract.
Flexible work schedule (8 hours per day including lunch time).
Flexible hybrid work mode, choose your own location: work from home or at the office.
Restaurant and transport tickets, and private healthcare insurance on top of your salary.
Thirteen days a year for your own personal development.
You choose to work with the latest MacBook Pro or Lenovo X1 models.
Enjoy Nordic-inspired flat hierarchies, lean working methods, and cultural diversity in multidisciplinary teams.
 

Keywords 
Java, Spring Boot, Ansible, Docker, Jenkins

Results.Heading: Senior Java Developer to Estonia
Results.Descr:
Want to be part of building something totally new? Want to be member of one of the Great Places to Work® in Europe? 

Gofore is an international company with a strong presence in the private and public sector, driving digitalization and business transformation for our customers in Smart Cities, eGovernment, Industry 4.0, and many more. We embrace cultural diversity and multidisciplinary teams. Our team of 1000 Goforeans across ten offices is the best in our field and we are passionate about delivering customer value.
 
In Estonia, you get to work in a start-up atmosphere, but still as part of a larger organization and stable business. With us you will be welcomed in a great international working environment, with open and transparent minimal management.
 
Our team is looking for an energetic, open-minded, and curious person, who is always eager to learn more and help colleagues with continuous improvement. You must be a good communicator in English. You have a track record of successful products or projects, but out of everything, who you are matters the most.
 
To help you succeed in your role, we provide support, trust, and flexibility. You will participate in challenging projects that will offer you possibilities for personal growth. As a Nordic company culture, we value a healthy work-life balance, lean working methods, innovation, and self-development. Our values are proudly stated together with our code of ethics.

Your experience 

If you think the following points describe you, we want to hear from you! 
  You have a minimum of 5 years hands-on experience in software development with Java.
You are fluent in one or more of these technologies: Spring, Node.js, React, Angular, AWS or Azure, but you have been through so many different technologies that you are motivated to learn new ones.
Extra points if you have experience with PHP, Python, Ansible, Kubernetes, Docker, GraphQL, Gitlab CI, RabbitMQ, or Kafka
You have a customer-oriented attitude when communicating with non-technical people.
Experience in an international environment and experience with testing and agile methodologies such as Scrum will be positively valued.
 

Benefits 

Our team is the best in our field, and we offer a complete employment package
    The best of two worlds: a young and dynamic atmosphere, as you find it in a start-up. And the stability and security you find in a big company.
A unique company culture that is based on equality, transparency and trust.
Nordic level work-life balance. We support employee wellbeing and trust our experts to know how they work at their best.
Flexible work schedule (8 hours per day).
Flexible hybrid work mode, choose your own location: work from home or at the office.
Work equipment of your choice, office refreshments and a Spotify account.
Monthly sports benefit (Stebby).
Bonuses for successful recruiting hints.
Possibility to become an owner of Gofore Plc through our Crew share program.
Flat company culture and community events
 
 

Keywords 
Spring, Java, Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Angular

Results.Heading: Gameplay Programmer, New Game
Results.Descr:
We're looking for a Gameplay Programmer to join us. At Supercell, Game programmers are at the centre of our teams, working together with every other discipline and making our games great. We're looking for someone who can help us create the next generation of games at Supercell, to work on ambitious prototypes and grand ideas that have the potential to redefine how future free-to-play mobile games will look and play. This is an opportunity to join a bold new game team at Supercell that is building both games, and technology, which challenge the limits of mobile gaming. Work with a small team, where you can have true ownership and a big impact. We're looking for someone that wants to dream big, and can help us build it.

With only a few game programmers on the team you'll get to enjoy the variety of working on lots of different areas of game development. It's important that you take pride in your work, and know what it means to take responsibility and deliver quality and fun to players. You are comfortable taking a feature from an idea on a post-it to a fully working and polished implementation and can teach us something new, too. 
 
We offer you a chance to join a team of professionals, where we believe that talent feeds talent. We do not believe in bureaucracy or complicated processes. We believe game development is a team sport and work together to achieve the best results. All of us have a genuine chance to contribute to the making of the world's best mobile games. We believe in each other's skills and value each other's work. If these are values that you are passionate about, then you might just be the person we are looking for.
 
Responsibilities
 Involvement in all areas of game development including Programming of Game Logic, Artificial Intelligence, Graphics and User Interface
Support and contribute new ideas to game design
Write robust code to be used by millions of users
Independently create complete solutions from scratch
Work as part of a team, but with plenty of opportunity to take responsibility on an individual level
 
Requirements
 Strong, professional experience using C++ in large code bases
Deep understanding and experience in different game technology areas (gameplay, graphics, tools etc.)
Deep understanding of and experience with Game Design
Independence, ownership and solid team working skills. You have the ability to find the path forward for code and design and create great gameplay, whilst taking input from the team and also using your own initiative
Previous experience of making and shipping 3D gameplay, on mobile, console or PC
Passion for games
 



 
About Supercell

We are a game company based in Helsinki, Finland, with offices in San Francisco, Seoul and Shanghai. Since our launch in 2010, we've released five games globally - Hay Day, Clash of Clans, Boom Beach, Clash Royale and Brawl Stars.
 
To make five games, we've killed dozens along the way. That's because we're obsessed with quality. Our goal is to make the best games - games that are played by millions, enjoyed for years and remembered forever. To achieve this goal, we create the best possible teams and give them the freedom and independence that are core to our success. Read More

You might love it here...

If you love to think, talk, play and make games, Supercell is the place for you. We're made up of proactive, independent teams with the freedom to do what they think is best for their players, our games and the company at large. We know that it takes more than just independence to make great games, so we also take very good care of our people - providing them with the compensation, work environment and resources they need to succeed. Read More

This position is in Helsinki, but you're not?

Luckily, moving to Helsinki is easier than you might think. No matter where you would be moving from, our dedicated people will help you from beginning to end. We're here to make sure the process is as smooth as possible for you, your family and whoever and whatever you're bringing along. Read More

At Supercell, Game programmers are at the centre of our teams, working together with every other discipline and making not just our games great, but also making how we make games, great too! Passion for games
