Results.Heading: Frontend Developer
Results.Descr:
Lyhyesti

Rooli
Frontend Developer

Sijainti
Helsinki, Tampere, Turku

Teknologiat
JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, PostCSS, CSS-in-JS, React, React Native, Vue, Svelte, Angular, REST, JSON, GraphQL, Webpack, Jest ja muut testausmenetelmät, Storybook, web components, WebAssembly, Git

Kuvaus

Oletko sinä etsimämme käytännönläheinen, visuaalisella silmällä ja insinöörijärjellä varustettu Frontend Developer?

Mitä on tarjolla?

Frontend-kehittäjänä Nitorilla sinulla on mahdollisuus päästä vastaamaan Frontend-kehityksestä kokonaisuudessaan asiakasprojekteissamme. Teemme yhteistyötä monien tunnettujen suomalaisten yritysten kanssa, joten pääset taatusti mukaan kiinnostaviin projekteihin! 

Miltä kuulostaisi palkan saaminen omista harrasteprojekteistasi? Nitorilla saat käyttää 10% työajastasi omiin projekteihisi, käytämme siitä nimitystä Nitor Core, josta voit lukea lisää  täältä . Pääset tietenkin kehittämään taitojasi alan parhaissa koulutuksissa ja opiskelemaan sinulle kiinnostavia asioita. Kiinnostaisiko esimerkiksi syventää osaamista mobiilikehitykseen? 

Nitorilla kulttuurimme keskiössä ovat oppiminen ja yhdessä tekeminen. Meillä on myös oma Frontend Forum, joka kokoaa kaikki Frontendistä kiinnostuneet Nitorilaiset yhteen jakamaan parhaita oppeja ja käytäntöjä aiheeseen liittyen. Pääset oppimaan uusimmista Frontend-teknologioista sekä sparrailemaan kollegoidesi kanssa.

Miksi Nitorille? 

Anna Salo aloitti Nitorilla ohjelmistokehittäjänä vuoden 2020 alkupuoliskolla. "Kiinnostuin Nitorista, koska täällä pääsen tekemään laadukkaita teknisiä ratkaisuja, jotka kestävät aikaa. Nitorin pyrkimys kestävään digitaaliseen kehitykseen tukee laajempaa kestävän ja vastuullisen tulevaisuuden tavoitetta, joka on minulle henkilökohtaisesti tärkeä asia. Lisäksi minulla on ollut mahdollisuus oppia uusia teknologioita kuten ClojureScriptiä työajalla tehtävän harrasteprojektin myötä, joka liittyy ekologiseen kuluttamiseen."

Minkälaista osaamista kaipaamme?

Me etsimme työkaveria, joka suhtautuu intohimoisesti kehittämiseen ja haluaa tehdä käyttöliittymistä sekä käyttäjäystävällisiä että toimivia. Käytettävyyteen ja visuaalisuuteen kohdistuva osaaminen on tässä eduksi, sillä kehittäjänä pääset vaikuttamaan myös palvelujen designiin. Nitorin kehittäjien toivotaan myös ymmärtävän, miten asiat puhuvat keskenään: ratkaisuarkkitehtuuri, REST- ja mikropalveluarkkitehtuuri - ei pelkästään sovelluksen sisäinen, vaan myös sen yhtymäpisteet muihin järjestelmiin. Testattavuus, jatkokehitettävyys, ylläpidettävyys ovat meille elintärkeitä juttuja

Etsimme pragmaattista kehittäjää, joka on kiinnostunut moderneista fronttiteknologioista ja puhuu samaa kieltä designereidemme kanssa. Sinulla on paloa ja osaamista rakentaa intuitiivisia, helppokäyttöisiä ja visuaalisesti näyttäviä sovelluksia. Tiedät miten asiat toimivat kokonaisvaltaisesti bundlauksesta saavutettavuuteen asti, ja olet ehkä työskennellyt Design Systemien parissa. 

 Kuulostaako hyvältä? Hae jo tänään jos haluat tehdä töitä alasi huippuammattilaisten kanssa! Voit heittää meille myös linkkiä esim. Githubiin, jos sellainen löytyy.

Nitorilla äänesi kuullaan

Nitor haluaa tarjota tekijöilleen parhaan mahdollisen paikan kasvaa ja kehittyä alansa ammattilaisena. Nitorilla saat olla oma itsesi ja rakennat urapolkusi osaamisen ja kiinnostuksesi mukaan. 

Haastavat työtehtävät ja työkavereiden sparraus ylläpitävät oppimisen iloa. Voit osallistua myös kiinnostaviin koulutuksiin, tapahtumiin ja konferensseihin Nitorin tukemana. Halutessasi pääset käyttämään työaikaa uusien asioiden opiskeluun, Nitorin kehittämiseen organisaationa tai vaikka yleistä hyvää edistäviin projekteihin.

Suomen ja Euroopan parhaimpien työpaikkojen joukkoon useana vuonna valittu Nitor on sitoutunut kehittämään kulttuuriaan jatkuvasti paremmaksi yhdessä. Läpinäkyvyys on tärkeimpiä työtämme ohjaavia tapojamme - meillä äänesi kuullaan.

Lisää kysymyksiä?

Laita viesti People Partner Ella Raskilalle. Hän vastaa sinua askarruttaviin kysymyksiin. Emme rekrytoi massoja, vaan yksilö kerrallaan. Niinpä jokainen rekrytointiprosessimme on myös yksilöllinen. Haluamme, että voit mutkattomasti tutustua Nitoriin ja löydät itsellesi oikean paikan.

Results.Heading: DevOps Testiautomaatio-kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Goforen kasvun myötä etsimme DevOps-tiimeihimme testiautomaatiokehittäjiä PK-seudulle, Tampereelle ja Jyväskylään.
 
Työnantajana ja yhteisönä lupaamme huolehtia sinusta, sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat yrityksemme ydin. Maineemme laadukkaiden palveluiden tuottamisessa asiakkaillemme on yksinomaan huippuasiantuntijoidemme ansiota. Matala organisaatiomallimme mahdollistaa itseohjautuvan ja läpinäkyvän toimintakulttuurin. Monimuotoista osaajajoukkoamme yhdistää pioneerihenkisyys sekä halu työskennellä yrityksessä, jonka olemassaololla on suurempi tarkoitus kuin pelkästään voiton tuottaminen - pyrkimys inhimillisempään, kestävämpään ja eettisempään digimaailmaan. Lisätietoja Goforesta työnantajana löydät halutessasi täältä.
 
Osaamiseesi ja työkokemukseesi pohjautuvan palkan lisäksi tarjoamme sinulle toiveisiisi pohjautuvan tehtäväkokonaisuuden haastavissa ja kehittävissä asiakasprojekteissa. Monipuolinen asiakaskuntamme koostuu sekä yksityisen että julkisen sektorin organisaatioista (mm. Elisa, Kone, Verohallinto), joita yhdistää nykyaikaisilla teknologioilla toteutettavat haastavat kehitystehtävät. Konsultoinnin ohella palvelemme asiakkaita Test Automation Hubimme avulla.
 
Goforelaisten yhteisöllisyys ulottuu myös työn ulkopuolelle erilaisten aktiviteettien kuten saunailtojen, videopelien ja perhepäivien muodossa. Jotta työ ja vapaa-aika löytäisivät tarvitsemasi tasapainon, tarjoamme sinulle joustavat työskentelyolosuhteet ja työvälineet, jotka saat valita tarpeesi mukaan.
 
• Sertifiointibonukset, opiskelumahdollisuudet (Udemy)
 • Lounas-, liikunta-, työmatka-, polkupyöräetu
 • Hieronta-, hammaslääkäri- ja silmälasietu
 
Nämä ja monet muut edut odottavat sinua Goforella!

Mitä toivomme sinulta 
 Sinulla on vahva ymmärrys testiautomaatiosta ja Robot Framework tai vastaava on sinulla hyvin hallussa
Ohjelmoit sujuvasti esim. Pythonilla tai Javalla
Sinulla on kokemusta DevOps-työskentelystä ja CI-työkaluista esim. Jenkins tai VSTS/Azure DevOps
Versionhallinta on tuttua (esim. Git)
Olet kehittänyt jo testiautomaatiokirjastoja ja avainsanoja sekä sinulle on muodostunut omia hyväksi kehittyneitä käytäntöjä ja näkemyksiä testiautomaatiosta ja jatkuvasta integroinnista
Kommunikoit sujuvasti sekä suomeksi että englanniksi
Tehtävä voi edellyttää turvallisuusselvitystä.
 

Millaista on työskentely Goforella 

Goforella pyrimme takaamaan ohjelmistojen virheetön toiminta. Nopeutamme ohjelmistokehitystä ja parannamme käyttökokemusta robottitestauksella. Anselmi Valasmo työskentelee Goforella testiautomaatiokonsulttina. Työnkuvaan kuuluu paljon koodaamista, joka on Anselmin intohimo. Nykyisin lähes kaikki pyörii jonkin ohjelmiston päällä, ja siksi julkaistavan softan on oltava laadukasta. Tässä Gofore auttaa asiakkaitaan.
 
- Työskentelen asiakastoimeksiannossa yhdessä valtion virastossa. Meitä on täällä Pasilan toimistolla kuuden hengen tiimi, ja jokaisella on omat vahvuusalueet. Itse kehitän testiautomaatiokirjastojamme ja vastaan DevOps-putkesta, Anselmi kertoo.
 
- Duunissani kivointa on itsenäinen tekeminen. Voi itse valita parhaan toteutustavan. Saa tehdä juuri sitä mistä tykkää, koodata Pythonia ja kirjoittaa bash-scriptejä, Anselmi mainitsee.
 Työhön tarjotaan kattava perehdytys 
Kun Goforelle tulee uusia työntekijöitä, heille järjestetään perehdytysjakso. Jaksolla opetellaan testiautomaatiota ja siihen liittyviä kirjastoja. Lisäksi perehdytään konsultin elämään ja siihen, kuinka asiakastoimeksiannoissa pärjää.
 
- Konsulttihommissa on tärkeää pitää asiakas ajan tasalla siitä, mitä tehdään. Asiakkaan on pystyttävä seuraamaan, mitä on saatu tehtyä ja kuinka tehty työ hyödyttää heitä, Anselmi toteaa.
 Yritys liikuttaa työntekijöitään. 
Yrityksessä kokeillaan yhdessä erilaisia lajeja, ja Anselmi on esimerkiksi käynyt työporukalla suunnistamassa firmaliigassa kolmessa osakilpailussa.
 
- Kun on yhdessä eksynyt metsässä, niin sen jälkeen työhaasteet ovat aika pieniä, Anselmi sanoo.

Avainsanat 
Testaus ja testiautomaatio, Robot framework, Python, Java, Devops, CI-työkalut, Jenkins, VSTS, Versionhallinta

Tutustu työhömme tarkemmin Testiautomaatio → Ohjelmistotestaus ja Laadunvarmistus →

Results.Heading: Senior Software Developer, Turku
Results.Descr:
Are you looking to work on challenging projects in a wide range of industries using modern methods and technologies? 
 Do you want to work with peers who are all top-notch in their own area of expertise - designers, developers, strategists, and content specialists - to create products that are more than a sum of their parts? 
 Do you want to feel like you're working in a startup and take part in shaping the future of Reaktor Turku? 
 
Our award-winning tech community is looking for software developers to join our office in Turku.

As a software developer at Reaktor, you'll

 Turn digital visions into working products 

Your daily tasks include: 
   Building digital services for both locally and internationally renowned major brands 
 Working together with a hybrid team of developers, designers, strategists and the client to clarify ambiguous requirements, define the best course of action and together shape the end result 
 Being responsible for the web-facing parts of the project and working with your teammates to pick the right technologies and deliver continuously 
 Commiting working code, performing code reviews for peers and helping develop the team's ways of working 
 Taking your share of the responsibility for the team and the project, and having the vision and drive to do more than just "type in the code". You're not necessarily expected to lead - but if you have a natural knack for it, then go for it! 
 

You are 

 A skilled collaborator looking to stay at the top of their game 

To thrive in this position, you'll need: 
   3 to 5+ years of experience of working in a software engineering role and experience with both back end and front end - one may be stronger than the other 
 At least two full-stack web projects in production 
 A demonstrated ability to adopt new software engineering technologies and methods - and also possible side projects built using different tech 
 A history of working with multiple technologies (such as JavaScript, Scala or Clojure) or multiple domains within the same technology (like front end and back end) 
 Great collaboration skills - you share what you learn, help others, learn from your peers, and ask for help when you need it. 
 Fluency in either English or Finnish, good communication skills, and the necessary permits for working in Finland 
 

 Why join us? 

For two decades, we've been developing qualities and capabilities for adapting, reacting, and supporting change - building Reaktor to hold up in a fast-paced environment while ensuring the well-being of our people. 

Our experts are the foundation of our high-quality client work, and your wellbeing is always our utmost priority. You'll be supported with internal training and events, development discussions, various hobby clubs, and an altogether comprehensive benefit package. 
 
 While working at Reaktor, we'll provide you with: 
 
  The freedom to impact how you work. Your team chooses the approach, technologies, and methodologies you think will work best in any given situation.
A community with as much support as your heart desires.
A team that's not only experienced but considerate as well. Your coworkers are likely as experienced as you are, and they all want you to succeed.
A sustainable work-life balance and support for your daily life outside of work (free moving day, moving van & other cars to loan for free, sick child care services, office space to use for your private events, etc.).
An opportunity to grow as a professional. We offer +35 internal training events on average every month, +15 community events and several 15-minute coffee breaks to discuss hot topics in tech and design.
A possibility to take part in longer academy-like studies like leading a team, delivering challenging projects, Cloud Academy, Mobile Academy, GraphQL Academy, UX Academy, and much more.
300+ hobby clubs from winter swimming and running to knitting and archery that bring people together outside (and sometimes inside) of office hours. Many of these are supported by Reaktor.
 
In addition to our culture perks, we're offering you an extensive benefit package including the following and more:
  Extended healthcare services, with broad-spectrum specialist services included
Dental care up to 250€/year
300€/year for exercise and relaxation
200€/month lunch benefit on top of your salary
Travel and health insurance
Company shares
Bicycle benefit and commuting benefits
Subsidized massages
A phone of your choice with a phone subscription
Internet subscription of your choice
State-of-the-art working equipment you pick yourself
A programme to support Open Source work
Freedom to work remotely wherever in Finland full-time, or work up to two months from another EU country
Support for possible relocations and help to acquire a residence permit if needed
 

Interested? Drop us a line via the form below and introduce yourself. 
 
 P.S. Listen to our podcast Fork Pull Merge Push . The second season is out now!

Results.Heading: Full-Stack Developer (m/w/d, German speaking)
Results.Descr:
As a company, we believe that the world is constantly changing for the better.  

 In a digitally disrupted world, services will be constantly reinvented. Technology revolutionises the way we live, work, make decisions and act on a daily basis . We enjoy more open, democratic, accessible, and happy lives than ever before. At Gofore , we help to bring new technologies and ideas from the drawing board into daily use. Our aim is to help organisations transform, stay current in the ever-changing environment, and create new opportunities. We seek to build an increasingly functional, delightful , and sustainable future. 
 Do you want to be part of building something new? 
 In Braunschweig or Munich, you get to work in a start-up-like atmosphere, but still as part of a larger organization and stable business. Interesting projects in private and public sectors will offer you possibilities for personal growth . We are drivers in digitalization and business transformation for our c ustomers in Agriculture, eGovernment, Industry 4.0, and New Mobility . 
 
 We are l ooking for an energetic, open-minded, and curious person, who is always eager to learn more and help colleagues with continuous improvement. You are a good communicator both in German and in English. You have a track record of successful products or projects, but out of everything, who you are matters the most. 
 
 We will welcome you in a great international working environment, with open and transparent minimal management. We embrace cultural diversity and multidisciplinary teams. Our team of 700 G oforeans across ten offices is the best in our field and are passionate about delivering customer value. 
 
 To help you succeed in your role, we provide support, trust, and flexibility. As a Nordic company culture, we value healthy work-life balance, lean working methods, innovation , and self-development. Our  values  are proudly stated together with our  code of ethics .

Your Experience  

 If you think the following points describe you, we want to hear from you! 
   You have a minimum of 5 years hands -on experience   in software development  and you are willing to take the next step of growth. 
 You are a team player - sparring with colleagues and sharing knowledge is something you value. 
 You are energetic, enthusiastic , and customer-oriented, hav e strong problem-solving skills and a "can-do" attitude. 
 You handle with ease one or more of these web technologies: React /React Native , A ngular , Vue.JS , Java, Python, Spring-boot, Node.js, Cloud, Docker , DevOps, Serverless, M icroservices, o r you have been through so many different technologies that you could learn those quickly. 
 You are comfortable working with relational and non-relational databases . 
 You love elegant code that is easy to maintain and develop. Also, you know and appreciate the principles of software development. 
 You are interested in modern technologies and you are not afraid to learn new ones . You have perhaps proven this in some communities or open-source projects . 
 Experience in an international environment and experience with agile methodologies such as Scrum will be positively valued. 
 We appreciate , but not require, experience in public sector or/and mobility projects. 
 

Besides the Obvious 
  You will be working in an international environment, English and German ( fluent or native ) will be of your daily use to communicate fluently with colleagues and clients . 
 You will be helping our German and international customers on-site and remotely. A willingness to travel occasionally is required. 
 We help you develop your skills and career. Y ou will have the chance and requirement to support a colleague or client when necessary. 
 You can be a young talent, or a seasoned specialist - your personality matters most. 
 

Keywords 
React/React Native, Angular, Vue.JS, Java, Python, Spring-boot, Node.js, Cloud, Docker, DevOps, Serverless, Microservices

Results.Heading: Senior Frontend Developer
Results.Descr:
What we offer 

As an employer and community, we promise to take care of you, because happy and healthy employees are the core of our business. Our reputation as a provider of high-quality services for our customers is the pinnacle result from our top-notch professionals. We operate in a low hierarchy, self-directed, and transparent way. Common features among our diverse network of Gofore professionals are the pioneering spirit and the willingness to work in an organisation that aims not only to yield profits, but also to create a more human, sustainable, and ethical digital world.
 
Versatile customer projects offer you endless opportunities for professional development, and you can pick what you find the most interesting from our weekly presentations and guild activities. We support participating in other trainings and events as well to grow your expertise. The Gofore community also extends beyond work in the form of various activities such as video games, sauna, and family days. To support work-life balance, we offer you flexible working conditions and freedom to choose the tools that you need. These and many other benefits await you at Gofore!

What we expect from you 

You are interested in modern front end technologies and won't be shy about using them. You love elegant code that is easy to maintain and develop further.For many, JavaScript mostly reminds them of pop-ups and alerts - but you think of SPA. You want to make web applications that are intuitive and easy to use - on all devices. You are able to apply the principles of good software design also in terms of style and markup.
 
You may be interested in software development or already have experience in it. Experience in modern web frameworks and libraries and functional and reactive programming are considered an asset. Use of cloud services and implementation of high-quality web interfaces by various means may also be close to your heart.
 
Gofore is an international workplace, and we welcome people from different backgrounds. Please note that as some of our customers work in Finnish, professional working proficiency in Finnish is a big advantage. Some projects require a security clearance check by the Finnish Security Intelligence Service. In case you will work in such a project, this check is required. It is always done with the applicant's consent.
 #LI-DNI 

" I'm Panu Klemola and I work at Gofore on Finnish Institute of Occupational Health projects. In practice, my days are spent working with Vue.js and the project's DevOps side. Work is done with the Scrum methodology in two-week sprints. What we do varies considerably; sometimes it's pure user interface programming, while the next sprint may focus more on architecture and AWS automation. Every day is different and it never becomes boring. The technologies we currently use in the project include Vue.js, Terraform, Node.js and a number of AWS services. However, it is less important for a front end developer to know about the latest buzzword technologies but to have an ability and keen interest to always learn something new. This is why Gofore encourages learning in many ways, such as through its guild activities. Employees can establish or join guilds that help them develop, to learn new things and reinforce what they already know. Gofore offers its employees guild funding, and time spent on guild activities is considered working hours (you can use 6% of your working hours on self-development). This gives all Gofore employees a chance to develop in their career in a direction they see fit.""

Results.Heading: Software Robot Developer
Results.Descr:
We are looking for Software Robot Developers to join us in our Skaler business unit. In this role, you will be developing the next generation of Robotic Process Automation solutions with open source technologies , solving real business problems and helping our clients work more efficiently. This is a unique opportunity to join the open source RPA movement!
  What you'll do:  Work together with developers, strategists and the client to clarify ambiguous requirements, define the best course of action and together shape the end result
Be responsible for either automation/infrastructure development in a software development project, and work with your teammates to pick the right technologies and deliver continuously
Commit working code, perform code reviews for peers and help develop the team's ways of working
Take your share of responsibility for the team and the project and have the vision and drive to do more than just "type in the code". 
  As a software developer, you have:  Experience of working with modern technologies in a software engineering role. Previous experience with Python, Robotic Process Automation, cloud technologies, Robot Framework, and CI tools such as Jenkins is appreciated but not required, as you will get the chance to learn and deepen your expertise in collaboration with our team of experts. 
An ability to adopt new software engineering technologies and methods, and may have side projects built using different tech.
Great collaboration skills: You share what you learn, help others, learn from your peers, and ask for help when you need it.
 
 More of Software Developer's day-to-day work you can read from here .
 What do we offer? 
Skaler is a new independent business unit within Siili. We can offer multiple opportunities and growth paths depending on your background, experience and interests. With us, you will be working with a team of professionals whose expertise ranges from RPA and DevOps to machine learning and process development.
 
At Siili you can expect to thrive and to learn with colleagues who are driven towards excellence. We also offer you an attractive compensation package . Working at Siili means that you get to be the master of your own work - we trust you. With us, you get to work with colleagues who challenge you every day and expect the same from you. There are more than 800 of us in Europe and the US, and we keep growing. This means we are constantly improving and evolving the ways we operate. We offer a great ride for those who enjoy the new possibilities it has to offer!
 Interested? 
If you want to know more about this role or Siili, we are happy to help. Just contact Tiina from our Talent team.

Results.Heading: Senior Drupal Developer
Results.Descr:
MAKE YOUR STORY REAL

We are looking for talented Drupal Developers eager to work on meaningful projects and solve challenging problems. You will join our team of about 25 experienced Drupal developers, who not only make sure our clients have elegant, functional web sites, but also extra value from versatile integrations and state of the art front-ends. Although our Drupal projects are mainly found in the capital area, you might be located anywhere in Finland, as remote work is possible.

 "At Siili, I've been able to grow my other competencies along with Drupal development, such as test automation, agile project management, and integrations." - Juho, Senior Drupal Developer

 "Challenging myself and trying new things is the most important thing in my work. Solving clients' problems is especially rewarding, as it allows me to see the meaning of my work." - Mika, Senior Drupal Developer

What are we looking for?
You can be focused in either Drupal frontend or backend, or both.
The Drupalist we are looking for is able to utilize the following technologies:
  PHP, MySQL, Git
HTML5, CSS
Drupal 9 is a must, and Drupal 7 experience might help.
Experience working with local development environments based on Vagrant/Docker or similar, is considered a plus.
 
As a back-end developer you will use object-oriented PHP programming in your daily work, so experience with that is a must. You know how to use the Drupal APIs and have experience in integrations.

A Drupal front-ender should be familiar with Drupal theming layer and best practices related to it. In addition to that, we appreciate understanding such concepts as accessibility, CSS architecture, atomic design, component libraries and UX design. Technology-wise Sass is an everyday tool, and you should be interested in the new CSS features. JavaScript and frameworks such as React, Vue.js or Next.js are something you have experience on and want to go deeper into.

Finnish skills are a huge plus, but you do need to be fluent in English. You want to learn new technologies, keep up with constantly evolving best practices - or develop them yourself - and want to strive for delivering what the customer needs.

Life as a Senior Drupal Developer at Siili

 "Drupal development at Siili thrives in our cozy and comforting atmosphere, created by our helpful, team-oriented people." - Anna, Drupal Developer

When you work with us, you are never alone with your development ideas and/or questions. Most of our Drupalists are senior level experts, who learn from each other every day and usually work in teams of several developers. There are regular events and meetings for sharing our knowledge. You will have a great chance to impact what technical solutions we utilize and how we work.

We really do put effort into continuously developing your expertise. Many of our Drupalists are Acquia certified through Siili, and we want to support you with acquiring similar certificates if you don't already have them. We are also very committed to the Drupal community as a whole - for example, we are regulars at DrupalCon and local and nearby Drupal Camps.

We offer you the chance to work with interesting, challenging and ambitious customer projects, with the best colleagues and grow with other Siilis. Being a Siili means that you get to be the master of your own work - we trust you.

As we aim to build versatile and diverse teams, we have been active in growing the Drupal community and coaching aspiring software developers to become Drupal professionals, giving our experienced developers opportunities to pass on their knowledge and get valuable mentoring experience.

If you have any questions about the position or about Siili in general, please contact Anna Kerava ( anna.kerava@siili.com ) from Siili's Talent team.

Looking forward to you joining our team!

Results.Heading: Backend Developer (node.js)
Results.Descr:
Screenful is building the future of business intelligence. We are a data analytics & visualization startup based in Helsinki. Our cutting edge analytics tools and visual dashboards are currently used by 500+ of customers in 40+ countries.

We are seeking a talented Backend Developer (node.js) to join our top notch software team. You'll partner with our CTO to create groundbreaking technology. This is a great opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the future of Screenful.

We're based in Helsinki, but part-time remote working is possible. We're flexible as long as we can ensure smooth flow of communication. Screenful is profitable, backed by investors, and ready grow!

Responsibilities Work directly with our CTO
Implementing new features to our data analytics backend
Working with large data sets that need to be managed under a heavy load
Lead the development of new features
Design and build data processing pipelines
Scale up our analytics backend to match our growth


 Qualifications You know how to develop large-scale high-performance web applications
You are fluent in Node.js and some other backend technology (e.g. Go, Python, or Java)
You speak SQL and know how to scale relational databases
Strong written and spoken English

What you'll get Competitive salary package with stock options 💸
Trust and autonomy to work on what you see fit and essential 🤝
Fancy office in the center of Kallio, Helsinki 📍
Friendly and supportive co-workers 🤗
Ability to work remotely 💻
Bring your dog to work 🐶
Annual trips with the team (last year we were in Spain!) 🏖️


 How to Apply 
We acknowledge that finding a person who ticks every box is nearly impossible. But if you felt these definitely are your shoes to fill, show us what you got. Show us your passion to grow as well. More than anything, we are looking for those "If I don't know, I'll figure out" -type of folks.

Send whatever gets your foot in the door by clicking Apply.Send along links that best showcase the relevant things you've built and done.

 
 
 For more information or questions please contact us at jobs@screenful.com

Flexible working hours 
Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.

Screenful helps teams to avoid those low value weekly status update meetings by automating the report generation and distribution to the right people. Results.Heading: Web front-end software developer (React, Redux)
Results.Descr:
The financial industry is built on unclarity, jargon, and myth. Selma aspires to be different, open, nice, transparent, and human. We want to make things clear and easy to understand and at the same time automate all the processes that should be automated. Join us in making Selma the friendliest, most exciting way to take care of your finances.

Your future team? 
We are looking for experienced and eager to learn software engineers to join our small but growing engineering team.

The Selma team includes folks from Finland, Switzerland, Austria, Ukraine, Vietnam and Jordan. Remote work is part of our backbone, which means we arrange every meeting remote-first, and share everything from emails to plans to meeting notes in the company chat.

At Selma, you will join a team that appreciates skill over hierarchy, ideas over egos and experiments over guesswork. We build things with clients and follow a customer-centered business philosophy. This means co-design workshops, open roadmap, a visible stream of #feedback and much more!

Technology Our current technology stack consists of Ruby on Rails in the backend with Postgres and Redis as our choices of database. The Rails backend serves both a REST API as well as a new GraphQL API.
In the web front end we run React and Redux and we're in the process of moving to TypeScript from JavaScript.
We are currently building a mobile app for iOS and Android using React Native.
Our development process is based on continuous integration and deployment, where anything that goes into master, also goes into production. That means that we are big fans of automated testing: we have wide suites of unit, integration, end-to-end and visual regression tests that prove the correct functionality of our service at every build.

Skills we're after 
We expect you tohave solid experience in our current tech stack
be versatile in software development in general
be always hungry to learn new things and technologies
be excited about taking and having ownership of entire parts of our system, and taking part in making technology choices
be excited to make engineering decisions based on the best interest of our customers and the business

You will get a competitive salary package with a sizeable options component
trust to manage your own work and schedule
ability to work remotely
support for you to be as productive as you can and keep learning and improving
annual trips with the team (last year we were in Poland!)

Think we might make a match? 
Lovely! 😊

This is how things will progress:


An introductory chat 

Let's get to know each other - we will want to learn all about you and this will be a great opportunity for you to learn everything you want to know about Selma.

A work exercise 

Let's try working together - we will pick a real-life work task and try to solve it together. This will allow us to see how well we get along as we work together and you will get a real, unpolished look at the engineering landscape in which you would be working.

A final talk 

Let's bring our CEO to the table and have the final talk about you starting at Selma!

 
 
 For more information or questions please contact us at hello@selma.io

Investing is hard. It takes time to learn and even more time to manage. Selma is your new friendly personal investment assistant who helps you do the right things with your money. Selma is now available in Switzerland🇨🇭, have +8000 clients, and are eager to scale throughout Europe. We ❤️ building Selma together with our users. This is why we launched open.selma.io and made our product roadmap public. Join our +20 people awesome international team, and help people to handle their money in the right way.

Results.Heading: Experienced software developers in Jyväskylä
Results.Descr:
What we offer  

As a developer, you will dive into the development of new services of our customers'. We want to give you as much responsibility and freedom as possible. This way you will have chance to influence the way you work, what technologies and tools you will use.
 
You don't have to feel left alone. You will have a broad network of Gofore professionals and over 40 people from Gofore's office in midtown Jyväskylä. Each of us have our own areas of expertise and we can use them to help you in all the areas you feel like you need some help or want to change ideas with someone. Gofore as an organization is built in a way that enables this way of working and supporting.
 
As an employer and community, we promise to take care of you, because happy and healthy employees are the core of our business. Our reputation as a provider of high-quality services for our customers is the pinnacle result from our top-notch professionals. We operate in a low hierarchy, self-directed, and transparent way. Common features among our diverse network of Gofore professionals are the pioneering spirit and the willingness to work in an organisation that aims not only to yield profits, but also to create a more human, sustainable, and ethical digital world.
 
It is crucial for us to make sure our professionals stay professionally sharp and you can choose your career path by developing those skills you feel are important. As an employee at Gofore you will have a chance to participate in different kind of trainings and gain certificates that you need to become better as a software professionals.
 
Here in Jyväskylä we also have a lot different kinds of activities you can take part in. Our employees host clubs where you can play board games, go to movies or do sports together. Gofore will support all of this, because the balance between work and free time is becoming ever more important, and happy employees are great employees.
 
We also offer a lot of other benefits, as well: flexible working hours, a possibility to work remotely, and freedom to choose your working equipment. We offer a really comprehensive healthcare package, dental care, reimbursed nanny for sick child, and paid leave if you need to take care of your sick parent.

What we expect from you 

You have at least about 5 years of experience working as a software professional. You are able to see the big picture when thinking about the technical tools and solutions. You are able to do this in co-operation with the customer to solve the challenges quickly and delicately.
 
The buzzwords we are looking for: fullstack, Java, cloud, AWS, etc.
 
If you have a spesific interest for something, we want to provide you chance to focus on that. More important than a specific understanding one particular technology is the interest and will to learn new things and find the best solution for each situation. Previous is experience working with IoT, distributed systems and industry is seen as a plus. If you have worked as a team lead and want to use those skills, let us know and we will see if there's something that you can put those skills in good use.
 
Please note that due to our clientele and current customer projects, we hope that you have professional working proficiency  in  Finnish . Some projects require a security clearance check by the Finnish Security Intelligence Service. In case you will work in such a project, this check is required. It is always done with the applicant's consent.
 #LI-DNI 

" I'm Juha and I've worked as a fullstack developer for Gofore since 2017. In my day-to-day work I use many different technologies with different customers to solve their problems. My working days include coding, planning, learning new things and working with different architectures. My work is versatile and it provides a possibility for constant improvement and a chance to develop as a developer. There are so many great professional working for Gofore and they help me grow and learn as well. Lately I've been working with functional languages, cloud-based solutions and mobile development. On my spare time I play football with my colleagues and take part in the activities of the many clubs of Gofore."

Results.Heading: Software Developer 3 - Toolchain Engineer for Linux
Results.Descr:
Hiring team/group description:

Our engineering team is part of the Corporate Architecture department and develops and supports the Linux OS and Linux Cloud products for Oracle. In particular the team we are recruiting for is responsible for the Linux Toolchain, Tracing and some Oracle Cloud components.

Position:

Toolchain Engineer (glibc, gcc, gdb, binutils, go, etc) in Linux Environment and

Oracle Cloud Developer Image maintainer.

General:

We are looking for a highly motivated individual contributor who feels

passionate about coding and delivering the best product possible.

As part of daily activities, the position involves improving the performance and

stability of the GNU toolchain on Linux. This entails working in part with the GNU tools open source communities, such as gcc, gdb, binutils, glibc, go, etc.

Peer review (internal and external) of patches will be standard practice.

Additionally: maintain the Oracle Cloud Developer Image. This is a Linux OS image collecting tools and packages for cloud development. Tasks involve producing the image by running scripts, which are maintained in the team, testing the image and troubleshooting it.

Our team is very geographically distributed, therefore the position involves a majority of long distance and electronic communication (phone, IRC, email).

The candidate needs to have a proven ability to work as a team player who can both participate in complex projects with a group of peers and team members.

The position will also require participation in the testing process through test

review, analysis, and development. In addition the engineer will be required to

interact with documentation, QA and support teams.

Needs to have good written and verbal English communication skills including occasionally presenting and demonstrating to technical audiences.

Needs to be a self-starter, able to deliver projects on time and to high standards with minimal supervision and coaching.

Required Experience:

3+ years in Linux/Unix environment.

Skills: Strong experience with the GNU toolchain.

Good working knowledge of Linux operating system concepts required.

Development of GNU tools (gcc, gdb, glibc, binutils, etc).

Good knowledge of debugging formats (dwarf), file formats (ELF), C, Scripting Languages.

Unix and Linux development environment experience strictly required.

Experience with the Open Source communities and processes.

Good working knowledge of assembly languages and processor architectures (X86,arm).

Familiarity with source code control systems (Subversion and GIT).

Ability to maintain and update your workstation/laptop.

Ability to work in virtualized environments.

Detailed Description and Job Requirements
 Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.
 
As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.
 
Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 4 years of software engineering or related experience.

As part of Oracle's employment process candidates will be required to successfully complete a pre-employment screening process. This will involve identity and employment verification, professional references, education verification and professional qualifications and memberships (if applicable).

Work is non-routine and very complex, involving the application of advanced technical/business skills in area of specialization. Leading contributor individually and as a team member, providing direction and mentoring to others. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 7 years of software engineering or related experience.

As part of Oracle's employment process candidates will be required to successfully complete a pre-employment screening process. This will involve identity and employment verification, professional references, education verification and professional qualifications and memberships (if applicable).

Results.Heading: Senior Full Stack Developer
Results.Descr:
What we offer 

As an employer and community, we promise to take care of you, because happy and healthy employees are the core of our business. Our reputation as a provider of high-quality services for our customers is the pinnacle result from our top-notch professionals. We operate in a low hierarchy, self-directed, and transparent way. Common features among our diverse network of Gofore professionals are the pioneering spirit and the willingness to work in an organisation that aims not only to yield profits, but also to create a more human, sustainable, and ethical digital world.
 
Versatile customer projects offer you endless opportunities for professional development, and you can pick what you find the most interesting from our weekly presentations and guild activities. We support participating in other trainings and events as well to grow your expertise. The Gofore community also extends beyond work in the form of various activities such as video games, sauna, and family days. To support work-life balance, we offer you flexible working conditions and freedom to choose the tools that you need. These and many other benefits await you at Gofore!

What we expect from you 

You like to code both front end and back end, even if you may to prefer one to the other. Your toolbox may include JVM languages like Java and Scala, and modern Javascript frameworks, such as React or Vue.js. You are familiar with REST.APIs and microservices, and you're not afraid of diving into databases. We also value DevOps spirit and an interest in cloud computing.
 
You like to work in teams and with the customer's product owner. A customer-oriented approach and communicating with non-technical people are also key parts of your job description. The scrum and its routines is a familiar way of working for you, and you like to share what you know in your team.
 
Gofore is an international workplace, and we welcome people from different backgrounds. Please note that as some of our customers work in Finnish, professional working proficiency in Finnish is a big advantage. Some projects require a security clearance check by the Finnish Security Intelligence Service. In case you will work in such a project, this check is required. It is always done with the applicant's consent.
 #LI-DNI 

" My name is Henri Ihalainen and I work at Gofore as a full stack developer. My job includes design and implementation of backend services as well as frontend development. Also, I'm doing DevOps work in my projects, e.g. building AWS infrastructure and CI pipelines.  I appreciate that I can have an influence on projects and roles I'll work in. Typically, my role in a project is a software developer with main focus on designing and coding the system. In some projects I have worked as a scrum master and more in the customer interface. At work, It's important to me that I get things done and that the outcome of my work really matters. I like to work with people and that's what my job is in many ways. Also, learning new things and improving my skills is very important to me.  Learning new is a quite big part of my work. Every project is a new adventure and always comes with new stuff to learn and I feel that Gofore supports me well in this. Currently, my focus is in functional programming and software architecture. I'm able to spend some of my working time for studying and I can always ask help or discuss new ideas with my colleagues. I think working at Gofore is very flexible. I've been doing shortened working week twice and I was half a year at home taking care for a child. All of this has always been regarded positively and I have received support from the employer as well as the co-workers."

Results.Heading: Senior Backend Developer
Results.Descr:
What we offer 

As an employer and community, we promise to take care of you, because happy and healthy employees are the core of our business. Our reputation as a provider of high-quality services for our customers is the pinnacle result from our top-notch professionals. We operate in a low hierarchy, self-directed, and transparent way. Common features among our diverse network of Gofore professionals are the pioneering spirit and the willingness to work in an organisation that aims not only to yield profits, but also to create a more human, sustainable, and ethical digital world.
 
Versatile customer projects offer you endless opportunities for professional development, and you can pick what you find the most interesting from our weekly presentations and guild activities. We support participating in other trainings and events as well to grow your expertise. The Gofore community also extends beyond work in the form of various activities such as video games, sauna, and family days. To support work-life balance, we offer you flexible working conditions and freedom to choose the tools that you need. These and many other benefits await you at Gofore!

What we expect from you 

As a software development expert, you are interested in modern technologies and won't be shy about getting your hands dirty in source code. You always want to learn something new and are always prepared to help your colleagues and customers.
 
The JVM platform and databases are familiar to you from previous projects, and you can design high-quality interfaces. You are interested in building a good build pipeline and in launching cloud services. You may also have learned about functional programming.
 
Gofore is an international workplace, and we welcome people from different backgrounds. Please note that as some of our customers work in Finnish, professional working proficiency in Finnish is a big advantage. Some projects require a security clearance check by the Finnish Security Intelligence Service. In case you will work in such a project, this check is required. It is always done with the applicant's consent.
 #LI-DNI 

" "Hi, I'm Anna Ruokonen and I work at Gofore as a software designer. I've been involved for almost three years with industrial Internet application, an IoT platform, for a paper mill and hydroelectric plant context. The platform focuses on data collection, and various applications are developed on top of it for monitoring, analytics and data visualisation purposes. The system adheres to a microservice architecture. At the beginning of the project, I was focusing on implementing the presentation layer middleware, including a data model and REST API. The tools I was using were mainly Node.js and MongoDB. Later the focus shifted to microservices and presentation layer integration. I have also become familiar with database migrations and client-end Angular. A lot has taken place during the project's life cycle. The high points have included transfer to a Docker based publication, replacing Jenkins with GitLab CI/CD, transfer to AWS and most recently, replacing our own database with a MongoDB Atlas cluster. Currently I'm working in the modularisation team, the purpose of which is to enable application development and publication independent of each other, and to improve the scalability of the presentation layer. The best thing about Gofore and this project is that I have been able to decide the direction of my work and my expertise. I have been able to work in various roles within the project according to my interest. I have also been able to complete the AWS Solutions Architect and Scrum Master certificates while working. At Gofore, you can develop your own competences not only in projects and by studying but also by taking part in guild activities and by making use of coaching services.""

Results.Heading: Software Developer for Cloud
Results.Descr:
Want to work with drones and lasers? We are looking for talented and enthusiastic people to join our core team and use the latest technologies to shake up the outdated industry practices with our outstanding end to end asset inspection solution.

You are ambitious developer and you're able to adopt new things quickly as we are moving fast where solid background in math and physics will help. You bring your own unique talent mix to the bowl where we can learn from each other's. You will be working in close collaboration with the drone team empowering our clients to inspect their assets with easiness and accuracy they have never before experienced.

We are following clean code practices with continuous delivery in place. It will be your job to ensure that the code base will stay modular and easy to maintain to be extensible with the greatest and latest technologies.

We offer highly interesting and challenging tasks. Our domain includes capturing, geo-referencing, analyzing and processing gigabytes of 3D point cloud and imaging data near real-time and visualizing results with modern web UI.

We also offer flexible working hours and vacation time, as well as the ability to learn intriguing things from drones, geographic information systems, sensors integrations like LiDAR and thermal cameras, machine learning/AI, embedded programming, DevOps, and running a startup.

 

Skills & Requirements 

If you are excited about taking cutting edge web tech its limits - then you are the person we are looking for! You love writing beautiful code, tests and docs, but are not afraid to move fast and break things. You like to cut your teeth on pioneering libraries, but are aware of the risks and trade-offs involved.

Ideally you:have good skills in multiple programming languages, such as go, python, scala, javascript
have some experience of our technology stack
write functional code
have great communication skills
have experience in creating restful microservices
have devops attitude
are long spanned developer
are capable to hunt down issues in different OSI layers


All our developers are encouraged to challenge themselves to learn new skills, so most important of all is that you are clever minded and fast learner.

Skills in some of these are also appreciated:

Go, Python, NodeJs, Scala, Java, C++, React, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Linux, Databases

Apply via the Hub today!

Perks and benefits 
 This job comes with several perks and benefits 

Flexible working hours 
Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.

Free coffee / tea 
Get your caffeine fix to get you started and keep you going.

Working at 
Sharper Shape 
 
 See company profile 

Our Mission is to help electric network operators improve the reliability and safety of their assets. We deliver the most advanced integrated intelligence platform that combines automation, human and artificial intelligence for inspection services, enabling our customers to act proactively and minimize the risks of outages, wildfires and other incidents. By doing this we help saving lives and property. Programming is at our core. We operate around the world, our international team of more than 60 employees with more than 10 different nationalities is primarily situated in Finland and the west coast of USA. We work with "more than state of the art" technologies, such as LIDAR & other sensor technologies, drones & helicopters, AI/ML, Big Data (Peta bytes), Cloud etc. We create a digital twin (Virtual copy) of our customers environment and perform advanced technical/mathematical analysis to recognize potential risks related to their network, eg vegetation too close to the lines or broken components. We work closely in teams and support each other to succeed in our work. At Sharper Shape we have flexible working hours and remote work opportunities (also from other countries), The main office for Tech Development is located next to a metro station in Espoo, a 15 minute ride from the capital Helsinki. If you are a WIZARD in any of the following areas LIDAR, Hyperspectre, UH cameras, UV, Heath cameras, drone automation AWS, Golang, Python, Kubernetes, React, Kafka and interested in MEANINGFULL, technically challenging work - Contact us! jobs@sharpershape.com WWW.SHARPERSHAPE.COM 

Read more about Sharper Shape

Results.Heading: Senior Programmer (Character Tech)
Results.Descr:
Remedy Entertainment, the creator of Control®, Quantum Break®, Max Payne®, Alan Wake® and Death Rally®, and one of the leading independent game studios in the world is looking for a Senior Programmer for a key role to support the creation of exceptional gaming experiences for the next generation of Remedy games. 

As a Senior Programmer, you will join our Character Technology team on a journey to unify our digital character creation workflows. We are building a novel character creation pipeline from scratch and thus this role presents you a unique opportunity to join our team of talented and experienced programmers and artists. Our Character Tech team works as a service group inside the larger Northlight technology team - we leverage both internal and external libraries written in Python, C++, and C# on daily basis to support our animators, rigging artists and motion capture artists and ensure that they have the tooling that they need.

We are looking for a colleague with a test-driven mindset - you know what it takes to write clean, optimal and maintainable code in Python and C++. While this a full-time software engineering role, our Character Technology team has also on R&D, in the past we have implemented skinning algorithms, novel convolutional neural network architectures, facial blendshape solvers, built custom photogrammetry hardware and performed statistical analysis of motion capture among other things.

For this role we can case-by-case consider remote working outside of Finland.

What you get to doHelp develop an industry leading digital content creation pipeline
Collaborate with our proprietary engine and tools teams to build deep integrations between the Northlight engine and DCCs 
Adhere to high quality programming standards
Support the teams involved with character creation with tools and algorithms to make their work easier
What you bring to the role4+ years of experience working in the game, film or equivalent industry
Demonstrable proficiency in at least C++ and Python
Curiosity, ability to learn fast and to communicate concisely
Experience working with any of the following APIs: Maya, MotionBuilder, Houdini, Modo
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (in English) 
The ideal candidate will also haveA degree in computer science or software engineering 
Strong mathematical skills: calculus, linear algebra, optimization and numerical analysis
Experience with any of the following: custom in-house game engines, test driven development, continuous integration, machine learning, UI frameworks, API design, parallelism
What is in it for you?Above all, you get to work on awesome, unique video games that the global audience is interested in at a studio where your input is valued. We try our hardest to keep our team sizes and the work load sensible, so your contributions feel valuable
Our studio is based in Helsinki metropolitan area in Finland, where the quality of life is exceptional and cost of living is affordable. If you're not already in Finland, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we'll take care of everything else
If you are based in Sweden, we also welcome candidates to our new secondary location in Stockholm.
You will be offered competitive compensation with a bonus system
We work hard, but at Remedy we believe in a great work life balance. Happy people work better. In Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation every year. This is on top of public holidays and other special occasions
To apply, please fill in the application form with your CV and other information relevant to the position. The position will be filled as soon as a suitable applicant is found.

Results.Heading: Frontend-kehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Tule kehittämään kanssamme eettistä digitaalista maailmaa!
 
Palkkaamme frontend-kehittäjiä erilaisiin ja erikokoisiin hankkeisiin niin julkiselle kuin yksityiselle sektorille. Sinulla on mahdollisuus vaikuttaa, hyppäätkö mukaan esimerkiksi terveydenhuollon, varhaiskasvatuksen tai liikennetoimialan kehitys- tai uudistusprojektiin. Tarjolla on aidosti merkityksellisiä projekteja, jotka vaikuttavat satojen tuhansien suomalaisten elämään.
 
Pääset työskentelemään monipuolisissa asiakasprojekteissa kokeneiden ohjelmistokehittäjiemme kanssa - tiimissä voit tehdä yhteistyötä myös esimerkiksi ohjelmistoarkkitehdin, pilviasiantuntijan, designerin ja projektipäällikön kanssa. Asiakasprojektimme ovat yleensä pitkäkestoisia ja pääset useimmiten keskittymään yhteen projektiin kerrallaan.

Mitä toivomme sinulta 

Olet kiinnostunut moderneista frontend-teknologioista etkä ujostele käyttää niitä. Rakastat eleganttia koodia, jota on helppo ylläpitää ja jatkokehittää. Toisten mielestä JavaScriptiin liittyvät lähinnä popupit ja alertit - sinulle se tuo ennemminkin mieleen avainsanan SPA. Haluat tehdä web-sovelluksia, jotka ovat intuitiivisia ja helppokäyttöisiä kaikilla eri päätelaitteilla. Osaat soveltaa hyvän ohjelmistosuunnittelun periaatteita myös tyyleihin ja merkkaukseen.
 
Sinulla voi olla kiinnostusta ohjelmistokehitykseen tai kokemusta siitä myös laaja-alaisemmin. Erityisesti kokemus moderneista web-frameworkeista ja kirjastoista sekä funktionaalisesta ja reaktiivisesta ohjelmoinnista katsotaan eduksi. Pilvipalveluiden (AWS, Azure, GCP) käyttö ja laadukkaiden web-rajapintojen toteutus eri keinoin voivat myös olla lähellä sydäntäsi.
 
Olet ylpeä luomastasi koodista, joka on testattua ja toimivaa. Olet tottunut työskentelemään osana ketterää, itseohjautuvaa tiimiä ja yhteistyössä asiakkaan tuoteomistajan kanssa. Asiakaslähtöisyys ja ei-teknisten ihmisten kanssa kommunikointi ovat myös olennainen osa toimenkuvaasi. Scrum on sinulle rutiineineen tuttu tapa työskennellä ja jaat mielelläsi osaamistasi sparraillen tiimisi kesken.

Projektimahdollisuudet 

Asiakasprojektiin sijoittuminen Goforella on työntekijälähtöistä. Ymmärrämme, että omia toiveita ja kehittymistavoitteita vastaava projekti vaikuttaa suuresti arjen sujuvuuteen ja työntekijätyytyväisyyteen.
 
Meillä on jatkuvasti avoinna noin 20-50 asiakastarvetta ja sopivaa projektia valitessa esittelemme sinulle muutamia kiinnostavia vaihtoehtoja. Jokaisella goforelaisella on täysi läpinäkyvyys asiakastarpeisiimme ja teemmekin lopulliset projektipäätökset aina yhdessä keskustellen. Välillä elämäntilanteet voivat muuttua, uusia kehittymistoiveita ilmaantua tai epätäydellisiä projektipäätöksiä tapahtua, jolloin toki huolehdimme projektikierron mahdollistamisesta.
 
Projekteja, joihin voisit liittyä
 
Aimo Park
 
Projekti alkoi, kun kehitimme muutaman React Native -kehittäjän voimin pysäköintisovelluksen Suomen markkinoille. Sovellus oli onnistunut ja olemme nyt laajentamassa sovelluksen toimintaan kaikissa Pohjoismaissa. Tällä hetkellä projektissa työskentelee noin 30 goforelaista ja tiimit ovat jakautuneet backend-, mobiili-, infra- ja ylläpitotiimeiksi. Olemme pystyneet jakamaan kehittäjillemme hyvin erilaisia vastuualueita kehittymistoiveiden mukaisesti. Lue lisää: https://gofore.com/en/cases/aimo-park-cloud/.
 
Helsingin kaupunki
 
Helsingin kaupunki on yksi isoimmista asiakkaistamme. Asiakkuudessa kehitämme usean kehitystiimin voimin digipalveluita päiväkodeille ja kouluille. Kehitetyt palvelut ovat erittäin merkittäviä kuntalaisille, koska niiden kautta perheet hakevat esimerkiksi päiväkoti- ja koulupaikkoja. Asiakkaan kanssa meille on muotoutunut onnistunut yhteistyö: olemme onnistuneet löytämään heidän tarpeisiinsa sopivia konsultteja ja vastaavasti he ovat meidän suuntaamme joustavia. Tyypilliseen kehitystiimiin kuuluu noin viisi kehittäjää ja UX-suunnittelijaa.
 
Teollisuusasiakkaat
 
Meillä on useita isoja teollisuusalan asiakkaita, mutta referenssit eivät ole julkisia. Tyypillisesti asiakas on suomalainen konepaja, jonka digitalisoitumisessa olemme auttamassa. Pyrimme valitsemaan hankkeita, joissa on mukana jonkinlainen ympäristökulma, eli päästöjen vähentäminen tai kulutuksen optimoiminen. Tällaisiin hankkeisiin sisältyy monesti todella mielenkiintoiset ympäristöt, isoja koneita, laiterajapintoja ja paljon mielenkiintoista dataa.
 
Pienet projektit
 
Isojen asiakkuuksien lisäksi meillä on jatkuva virta pieniä projekteja. Tavallisessa miniprojektissa asiakas tarvitsee noin 1-2 konsulttia tekemään pienen sovelluksen, tai lisäominaisuuksia jo olemassa oleviin sovelluksiin. Näissä hankkeissa korostuu konsulttien itseohjautuvuus ja läheinen yhteistyö asiakkaan kanssa.

Mitä tarjoamme sinulle 

Työnantajana ja yhteisönä lupaamme huolehtia sinusta, sillä hyvinvoivat työntekijät ovat yrityksemme ydin. Perusperiaatteisiimme kuuluvat toimintamme eettisyys, läpinäkyvyys, vaikuttamisen mahdollisuudet ja päätösten tekeminen yhdessä. Pyrimme luomaan yhdessä inhimillisempää ja kestävämpää digimaailmaa.
 
Meillä pääset kehittymään ja kartuttamaan kokemusta monipuolisissa asiakasprojekteissa ja valitsemaan itsellesi sopivimman tavan kehittää osaamistasi, esimerkiksi tuetun itseopiskelun, teknologiakiltatoiminnan tai muiden koulutusten ja tapahtumien avulla.
 
Goforelaisten yhteisöllisyys ulottuu myös työn ulkopuolelle erilaisten aktiviteettien, kuten yhteisen urheilun, videopelien ja perhepäivien muodossa - toivomme pääsevämme pian palaamaan arkeen, jossa pystymme jälleen viettämään vapaammin aikaa yhdessä.
 
Me Goforella olemme vahvasti sitä mieltä, että työt sujuvat parhaiten siellä, missä viihtyy parhaiten. Siksi saat itse päättää, teetkö työsi toimistollamme Helsingissä, Tampereella, Jyväskylässä tai Turussa, kotonasi vai mökillä Iivantiirassa. Pääasia että teet työsi ajallaan ja hyvin. Me työnantajana lupaamme mahdollistaa valitsemasi työskentelytavat ja tarjota niille tuen ja puitteet. Nämä ja monet muut edut odottavat sinua Goforella!

Avainsanat 
JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Node.js, Angular

Tutustu työhömme tarkemmin Web-kehitys →

Results.Heading: Kokenut ohjelmistokehittäjä
Results.Descr:
Etsimme ohjelmistokehittäjiä ja DevOps-ammattilaisia Reaktorin Seinäjoen toimipisteelle. Olet sopiva yhdistelmä full-stack-ohjelmoijaa ja sysadminia. Ydinosaamistasi on järjestelmien automatisointi ja hallinta.
 
Työssäsi pääset osaksi kokenutta tiimiämme, joka vastaa kehittämiemme palveluiden menestyksekkäästä operoinnista ja hallinnasta, sekä osallistuu mielenkiintoisiin asiakasprojekteihin.
 
Me Reaktorilla olemme ylpeitä erityislaatuisesta kulttuuristamme, joka perustuu avoimuuteen, asiantuntijuuteen ja ihmislähtöisyyteen. Organisaatiomatriisien ja tarpeettoman byrokratian sijaan uskomme vapauden ja vastuun tasapainoon. Meillä on asiantuntijan hyvä olla.
 
Etsimällämme osaajalla on:
  Ainakin yhden ohjelmointikielen hallinta; kielellä ei ole merkitystä. Projekteissamme käytetään esimerkiksi Scalaa, JavaScriptia, Rubya ja Clojurea.
Ymmärrys selkeän koodin ja suunnitelun vaikutuksesta softan ylläpidettävyyteen
Kokemusta pilviympäristöstä, kuten AWS, Azure tai Google Cloud sekä automatisointi- ja hallintatyökaluista, kuten Ansible tai Terraform
Intoa ja mielenkiintoa kehittää itseäsi sekä halua tehdä asioita aina paremmin
Soveltuvaa osaamista tai työkokemusta ohjelmoinnista
 
Lähetä hakemus täyttämällä alla oleva lomake.

Reaktor lyhyesti

Reaktor kehittää digitaalisia palveluita ja tulevaisuuden liiketoimintaa. Ratkomme asiakkaiden kinkkisimmätkin ongelmat yhdistämällä strategiasuunnittelua, valmennusta, palvleumuotoilua ja ohjelmistokehitystä. Noin 500 huippuasiantuntijaamme työskentelevät itseohjautuvissa tiimeissä Helsingissä, Turussa, Amsterdamissa, New Yorkissa, Dubaissa ja Tokiossa sijaitsevissa asiakkuuksissa. Asiakkaitamme ovat muun muassa Nasdaq, HBO, Supercell, Kone, Finnair, Yle ja Air France-KLM.

P.S. Kuuntele uusi podcastimme, Fork Pull Merge Push.
Ajatuksia, inspiraatiota, ja tajunnanräjäyttäviä teknisiä keskusteluja. Uusi jakso joka toinen viikko!
